English Sentences: Blessed is the man that walketh not in the counsel of the ungodly, nor standeth in the way of sinners, nor sitteth in the seat of the scornful.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitatu zoriyan beennaagee, woikko nagaranchchatu ogiyan eqqennaagee, qilliicciyaageetu shiiquwan uttennaagee heegee anjjettidaagaa.

English Sentences: But his delight is in the law of the LORD; and in his law doth he meditate day and night.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAA higgiyan i ufaittees; a higgiyaa gallassinne qammi qoppees.

English Sentences: And he shall be like a tree planted by the rivers of water, that bringeth forth his fruit in his season; his leaf also shall not wither; and whatsoever he doeth shall prosper.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee goggiya haattaa xaphuwan tokettidi, aifiyoo aginan aifiya, ba haittaakka qoqqofenna mittaa mala. I oottiyo ubbai au hanees.

English Sentences: The ungodly are not so: but are like the chaff which the wind driveth away.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin iitati hegaa mala gidokkona; carkkoi pitti efiyo suullaa mala.

English Sentences: Therefore the ungodly shall not stand in the judgment, nor sinners in the congregation of the righteous.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, iitatu bolli GODAI pirddana; nagaranchchatikka xillotu yaa7an eqqokkona.

English Sentences: For the LORD knoweth the way of the righteous: but the way of the ungodly shall perish.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAI xillotu ogiyaa erees; shin iitatu ogee xayana.

English Sentences: Why do the heathen rage, and the people imagine a vain thing?
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotettati aissi denddiyoonaa? Qassi asai aissi pattennabaa maqettii?

English Sentences: The kings of the earth set themselves, and the rulers take counsel together, against the LORD, and against his anointed, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7aa kawotinne deriyaa haariyaageeti denddidosona; eti GODAA bollinne GODAI tiyidoogaa bolli issippe shiiqidosona.

English Sentences: Let us break their bands asunder, and cast away their cords from us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti, "Nuuni eta sanssalataa duuttoos; eti nuna qachchiyoogaakka wora oloos" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: He that sitteth in the heavens shall laugh: the LORD shall have them in derision.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwan ba araatan uttidaagee eta bolli miiccees; Godai eta bolli qilliiccees.

English Sentences: Then shall he speak unto them in his wrath, and vex them in his sore displeasure.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qilliiccidi i ba hanqquwan eta seerees; ba wolqqaama hanqquwan eta yashissees.

English Sentences: Yet have I set my king upon my holy hill of Zion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godai, "Taani ta geeshsha deriyaa Xiyoone bolli ta kawuwaa kawoyaas" yaagees.

English Sentences: I will declare the decree: the LORD hath said unto me, Thou art my Son; this day have I begotten thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: He kawoi, "Taani GODAA higgiyaa awaajjana; GODAI tana, Neeni ta na7aa; taani hachchi neeyyo aawa gidaas.

English Sentences: Ask of me, and I shall give thee the heathen for thine inheritance, and the uttermost parts of the earth for thy possession.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana woossa; taani kawotettaa ubbaa neeyyo immana; sa7a ubbai nebaa gidana.

English Sentences: Thou shalt break them with a rod of iron; thou shalt dash them in pieces like a potter's vessel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni birata xam77an eta haarana; eta neeni urqqa miishshaa menttiyoogaadan menttana yaagees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Be wise now therefore, O ye kings: be instructed, ye judges of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, inttenoo kawotoo, eeyyoppite; ha sa7aa haariyaageetoo, inttena ye77e!

English Sentences: Serve the LORD with fear, and rejoice with trembling.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAAYYO bonchcho yashshatettan oottite; yashshaa kokkoriyoogan ufaittite.

English Sentences: Kiss the Son, lest he be angry, and ye perish from the way, when his wrath is kindled but a little. Blessed are all they that put their trust in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hanqqettin, ogiyan intte xayennaadan na7aa yerite; aissi giikko, hanqquwaa eesuwan i eexxi kiyana. Baqati an qosetti attiya ubbati anjjettidaageeta.

English Sentences: Lord, how are they increased that trouble me! many are they that rise up against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ta morkketi aiba corattidonaa! Ta bolli aappunati denddiyoonaa!

English Sentences: Many there be which say of my soul, There is no help for him in God. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daroti, "Xoossai a ashshenna" yaagidi tabaa haasayoosona.

English Sentences: But thou, O LORD, art a shield for me; my glory, and the lifter up of mine head.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin abeet GODAU, neeni ta yuushuwan gonddalle. Tana bonchchissiyaageenne gitayiyaagee nenattennee.

English Sentences: I cried unto the LORD with my voice, and he heard me out of his holy hill. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta qaalaa xoqqissada GODAAKKO waassais. Waassin ba geeshsha deriyaappe taassi i zaarees.

English Sentences: I laid me down and slept; I awaked; for the LORD sustained me.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI tana naagiyo gishshau, taani zin77ada xiskkaisinne beegottais.

English Sentences: I will not be afraid of ten thousands of people, that have set themselves against me round about.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani tana dooddidi denddida tammaa sha7iya asatuyyookka yayyikke.

English Sentences: Arise, O LORD; save me, O my God: for thou hast smitten all mine enemies upon the cheek bone; thou hast broken the teeth of the ungodly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, dendda! Abeet ta Xoossau, tana ashsha! Aissi giikko, neeni ta morkketa ubbaa goggocuwaa shocadasa; iitatu achchaakka menttadasa.

English Sentences: Salvation belongeth unto the LORD: thy blessing is upon thy people. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ashettai GODAAGAA; GODAU, ne asaa neeni anjja.

English Sentences: Hear me when I call, O God of my righteousness: thou hast enlarged me when I was in distress; have mercy upon me, and hear my prayer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet tana xillissiya Xoossau, taani nena xeesiyo wode, taayyo koya. Taani un77ettido wode, neeni tana shemppissadasa. Taayyo neeni qarettada ta woosaa siya.

English Sentences: O ye sons of men, how long will ye turn my glory into shame? how long will ye love vanity, and seek after leasing? Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo asatoo, intte aude gakkanaassi ta bonchchuwaa kaushshuuteetii? SHori bainnabaakka aude gakkanaassi intte siiquuteetii? Wordduwaanne aude gakkanaassi caddi oiqqi kaalluuteetii?

English Sentences: But know that the LORD hath set apart him that is godly for himself: the LORD will hear when I call unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAI Xoossaa asata baayyo dummayi wottidoogaa intte erite. Taani GODAA xeesiyo wode, i taayyo siyees.

English Sentences: Stand in awe, and sin not: commune with your own heart upon your bed, and be still. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hanqqettite, shin intte hanqquwan nagaraa oottoppite. Hiixan zin77iyo wode, intte wozanaa qoritenne sirphphi giite.

English Sentences: Offer the sacrifices of righteousness, and put your trust in the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAAYYO likke yarshshuwaa yarshshitenne GODAN ammanettite.

English Sentences: There be many that say, Who will shew us any good? LORD, lift thou up the light of thy countenance upon us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daroti, "Nuna lo77obaa bessanai oonee?" yaagoosona. Abeet GODAU, neeni nuna keha aifiyan xeella.

English Sentences: Thou hast put gladness in my heart, more than in the time that their corn and their wine increased.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta wozanan gita ufaissaa kunttadasa. Hegeenne, katta aifeenne ooratta woiniyaa eessai banttayyo darin ufaittiyaageeta ufaissaappekka dariyaagaa.

English Sentences: I will both lay me down in peace, and sleep: for thou, LORD, only makest me dwell in safety.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne xalaalai tana saruwan naaga wottiyo gishshau, taani zin77ada sarotettan xiskkais.

English Sentences: Give ear to my words, O LORD, consider my meditation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani yootiyoogaa ezgga; ta ooliyaanne siya.

English Sentences: Hearken unto the voice of my cry, my King, and my God: for unto thee will I pray.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta kawuwaunne ta Xoossau, tana maadda gaada taani waassiyo gishshau, ta woosaa waasuwaa siya.

English Sentences: My voice shalt thou hear in the morning, O LORD; in the morning will I direct my prayer unto thee, and will look up.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, maallado maallado guuran neeni ta qaalaa siyaasa. Maallado maallado guuran taani ta woosaa ne sintti shiishshada, neeni taayyo immiyo zaaruwaa ekkana gaada naagais.

English Sentences: For thou art not a God that hath pleasure in wickedness: neither shall evil dwell with thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni iitatettan ufaittenna Xoossaa; iitabi nenaara de7enna.

English Sentences: The foolish shall not stand in thy sight: thou hatest all workers of iniquity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ceeqettiyaageeti ne sinttan eqqokkona; iitabaa oottiya ubbata neeni ixxaasa.

English Sentences: Thou shalt destroy them that speak leasing: the LORD will abhor the bloody and deceitful man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wordduwaa haasayiyaageetanne neeni xaissaasa. Suuttaa gussiyaageetanne cimmiya asata GODAI shenetees.

English Sentences: But as for me, I will come into thy house in the multitude of thy mercy: and in thy fear will I worship toward thy holy temple.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani ne siiquwaa daruwan ne keettaa gelana. Ne geeshsha Beeta Maqidasiyaakko, bonchcho yashshatettan goinnana.

English Sentences: Lead me, O LORD, in thy righteousness because of mine enemies; make thy way straight before my face.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ta morkketu gishshaassi gaidda, tana ne xillotettan kaaletta; ne ogiyaa ta sinttan sittaya.

English Sentences: For there is no faithfulness in their mouth; their inward part is very wickedness; their throat is an open sepulchre; they flatter with their tongue.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta doonaappe kiyiyaabi ammanttenna. Eta wozanankka genee kumiis; eta doonai dooyettida duufo mala; eti bantta inxxarssan cimmoosona.

English Sentences: Destroy thou them, O God; let them fall by their own counsels; cast them out in the multitude of their transgressions; for they have rebelled against thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, eta neeni pirdda; eta kobai eta ekki bo. Eta nagarai daro gidido gishshau, neeni eta yedetta; aissi giikko, eti ne bolli makkalidosona.

English Sentences: But let all those that put their trust in thee rejoice: let them ever shout for joy, because thou defendest them: let them also that love thy name be joyful in thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin neekko baqati qosetti attiya ubbai ufaittona; eti ubbaton ufaissan yexxona. Neenikka eta naagana; ne sunttaa siiqiya ubbati nenan keehi ufaittona.

English Sentences: For thou, LORD, wilt bless the righteous; with favour wilt thou compass him as with a shield.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, abeet GODAU, tumukka neeni xilluwaa anjjaasa. Neeni gonddallee kammiyoogaadan ne kehatettan a kammaasa.

English Sentences: O LORD, rebuke me not in thine anger, neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne hanqquwan tana seeropparkkii; woikko ne yiilluwan tana qaxxayopparkkii.

English Sentences: Have mercy upon me, O LORD; for I am weak: O LORD, heal me; for my bones are vexed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani labbannido gishshau, tana maararkkii. Abeet GODAU, ta meqettati tana sahuwan woriyo gishshau, tana patta.

English Sentences: My soul is also sore vexed: but thou, O LORD, how long?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta shemppiyaa daroppe un77ettaasu; shin GODAU, tana maaddanau neeni aude gakkanaassi gam77uutee?

English Sentences: Return, O LORD, deliver my soul: oh save me for thy mercies' sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni simmada, tana ashsha; ne siiquwaa daruwan tana kessa ekka.

English Sentences: For in death there is no remembrance of thee: in the grave who shall give thee thanks?
Wolaitta Sentences: Haiqqida uri ooninne nena hassayenna; duufon nena galatiyai baawa.

English Sentences: I am weary with my groaning; all the night make I my bed to swim; I water my couch with my tears.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ooliyan daafuraas; qamma ubban taani yeekkaidda, ta hiixaa irxxissaas; ta borkkotaakka ta afuttan musissaas.

English Sentences: Mine eye is consumed because of grief; it waxeth old because of all mine enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketu ubbaa gaasuwan taani afuxxido gishshau, ta aifee galjjiis; ta aifee demmennan ixxiis.

English Sentences: Depart from me, all ye workers of iniquity; for the LORD hath heard the voice of my weeping.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI taani yeekkiyo yeehuwaa siyido gishshau, inttenoo, iitaa oottiya ubbatoo, taappe shaahettite.

English Sentences: The LORD hath heard my supplication; the LORD will receive my prayer.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ta watiwatuwaa siyiis; GODAI ta woosaanne siyees.

English Sentences: Let all mine enemies be ashamed and sore vexed: let them return and be ashamed suddenly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkke ubbati yeellatonanne tuggatona. Eti issi kuttan yeellatidi, guyye simmona.

English Sentences: O LORD my God, in thee do I put my trust: save me from all them that persecute me, and deliver me:
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ta Xoossau, taani neekko baqatada qosettais. Tana yedettiya ubbatuppe neeni tana ashsha ekka.

English Sentences: Lest he tear my soul like a lion, rending it in pieces, while there is none to deliver.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana ashshennabaa gidikko, eti tana gaammuwaadan zaazidi, ooninne ashshennan dafidi carqqayana.

English Sentences: O LORD my God, if I have done this; if there be iniquity in my hands;
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU ta Xoossau, taani asa naaqqidabaa gidikko,

English Sentences: If I have rewarded evil unto him that was at peace with me; (yea, I have delivered him that without cause is mine enemy:)
Wolaitta Sentences: hegeenne ta laggiyaassi lo77uwaa gishshaa iitaa zaaridabaa gidikkonne, woikko gaasoi bainnan ta morkkiyaa bonqqidabaa gidikko, hagaa mala yohotuppe issuwaanne taani oottidobaa gidikko,

English Sentences: Let the enemy persecute my soul, and take it; yea, let him tread down my life upon the earth, and lay mine honour in the dust. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: ta morkkee tana yedettidi oiqqo. Oiqqidi tana sa7an kinchcheretto; yaatidi, tana biittan oli bayo.

English Sentences: Arise, O LORD, in thine anger, lift up thyself because of the rage of mine enemies: and awake for me to the judgment that thou hast commanded.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne hanqquwan denddada, ta morkketu eexxiya hanqquwaa xaissa. Ta Xoossau, beegotta; tumaa pirdda.

English Sentences: So shall the congregation of the people compass thee about: for their sakes therefore return thou on high.
Wolaitta Sentences: Deretu yaa7ai ne yuushuwan shiiqo; neeni etappe bollaara gidada haara.

English Sentences: The LORD shall judge the people: judge me, O LORD, according to my righteousness, and according to mine integrity that is in me.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI dere asata bolli pirddees. Abeet GODAU, taayyo ta xillotettaadaaninne ta suuretettaadaaninne pirdda.

English Sentences: Oh let the wickedness of the wicked come to an end; but establish the just: for the righteous God trieth the hearts and reins.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qofaanne wozanaa qorada eriya xillo Xoossau, iitatu geniyaa neeni xaissa. SHin xilluwaa sarotan mintta wotta.

English Sentences: My defence is of God, which saveth the upright in heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wozanaa xilluwaa ashshiya Xoossai taayyo gonddalle.

English Sentences: God judgeth the righteous, and God is angry with the wicked every day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai xillo pirddiyaagaa; i hachchi hachchi hanqqettiya Xoossaa.

English Sentences: If he turn not, he will whet his sword; he hath bent his bow, and made it ready.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi ba nagaraa paaxidi simmennan ixxikko, Xoossai ba bisuwaa leefees; i ba wonddafiyaa tolidi giigissees.

English Sentences: He hath also prepared for him the instruments of death; he ordaineth his arrows against the persecutors.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba woriya ola miishshata giigissees; tamaa lacuwaadan pol77attiya ba zubbiyaa giigissees.

English Sentences: Behold, he travaileth with iniquity, and hath conceived mischief, and brought forth falsehood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitatettaa shahaaridi, geniyaa abbe ixetidaagee, wordduwaa yelees.

English Sentences: He made a pit, and digged it, and is fallen into the ditch which he made.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hara asatuyyo olla bookkida asi ba bookkido ollan bau kunddees.

English Sentences: His mischief shall return upon his own head, and his violent dealing shall come down upon his own pate.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ehiyo genee a huuphiyau simmees. A makkalainne a huuphiyau simmees.

English Sentences: I will praise the LORD according to his righteousness: and will sing praise to the name of the LORD most high.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA xillotettaa gishshataayyo taani GODAA galatana; qassi Ubbaappe Xoqqiya GODAA sunttaayyo taani galataa yexxana.

English Sentences: O LORD, our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth! who hast set thy glory above the heavens.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, nu Godau, ne sunttai sa7aa ubbaa bollan aiba bonchchettideeshsha! Neeni ne bonchchuwaa salotuppe bollan xoqqu xoqqu ootta wottadasa.

English Sentences: Out of the mouth of babes and sucklings hast thou ordained strength because of thine enemies, that thou mightest still the enemy and the avenger.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne morkketu gishshau ne baarigaaraanne neeyyo manddiyaagaa sirphphi oottanau, guutta naatu doonan xammiya naatu doonan galataa kunttadasa.

English Sentences: When I consider thy heavens, the work of thy fingers, the moon and the stars, which thou hast ordained;
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne biradhdhetun medhdhido ne salota, sohuwan sohuwan neeni wottido aginaanne xoolintteta taani be7iyo wode,

English Sentences: What is man, that thou art mindful of him? and the son of man, that thou visitest him?
Wolaitta Sentences: neeni asabaa qoppanau asi aibee? Woi neeni ayyo hirgganau i aibee?

English Sentences: For thou hast made him a little lower than the angels, and hast crowned him with glory and honour.
Wolaitta Sentences: A neeni kiitanchchatuppe amaridaagaa ziqqissadasa; bonchchuwaanne gitatettaa akililiyaa a huuphiyan wottadasa.

English Sentences: Thou madest him to have dominion over the works of thy hands; thou hast put all things under his feet:
Wolaitta Sentences: A neeni ne medhdhido meretetta ubbaa bollan haariyaagaa oottada sunttadasa; ubbabaa a tohuwaappe garssaara wottadasa.

English Sentences: All sheep and oxen, yea, and the beasts of the field;
Wolaitta Sentences: Dorssatanne boorata, sa7aa do7atanne

English Sentences: The fowl of the air, and the fish of the sea, and whatsoever passeth through the paths of the seas.
Wolaitta Sentences: saluwaa kafota, abbaa moletanne abbai goggiyoosan wadhdhiyaageeta ubbaakka a haarissadasa.

English Sentences: O LORD our Lord, how excellent is thy name in all the earth!
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, nu Godau, ne sunttai sa7aa ubban aiba bonchchettideeshsha!

English Sentences: I will praise thee, O LORD, with my whole heart; I will shew forth all thy marvellous works.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani nena ta kumetta wozanaappe galatana; neeni oottido garamissiya ne oosuwaa ubbaakka yootana.

English Sentences: I will be glad and rejoice in thee: I will sing praise to thy name, O thou most High.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nenan ufaittananne hashshu gaana. Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossau, taani ne sunttaayyo galataa yexxana.

English Sentences: When mine enemies are turned back, they shall fall and perish at thy presence.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketi guyye simmiyo wode, ne sinttappe xubetti xayana.

English Sentences: For thou hast maintained my right and my cause; thou satest in the throne judging right.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni taayyo xillo pirddaa pirddadasa; neeni xillotettan pirddaidda, ne kawotaa araatan uttadasa.

English Sentences: Thou hast rebuked the heathen, thou hast destroyed the wicked, thou hast put out their name for ever and ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni kawotettata qaxxayadasa; iitatakka xaissadasa. Neeni eta sunttaa meri merinaukka quccarggadasa.

English Sentences: O thou enemy, destructions are come to a perpetual end: and thou hast destroyed cities; their memorial is perished with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Morkketi merinaa xayuwaa xayidosona; qassi eta katamata muleera xoqollarggadasa. Eti muleera dogetti attidosona.

English Sentences: But the LORD shall endure for ever: he hath prepared his throne for judgment.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAI merinaassi kawotidi de7ees; i ba kawotaa araataa pirddaayyo giigissiis.

English Sentences: And he shall judge the world in righteousness, he shall minister judgment to the people in uprightness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha sa7aa xillotettan pirddana; deretakka tumatettan pirddana.

English Sentences: The LORD also will be a refuge for the oppressed, a refuge in times of trouble.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI un77ettidaageetuyyo baqati attiyoobaa; meto wodiyankka geli attiyo soho.

English Sentences: And they that know thy name will put their trust in thee: for thou, LORD, hast not forsaken them that seek thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne sunttaa eriyaageeti nenan ammanettoosona; aissi giikko, GODAU, neeni nena koyiyaageeta yegga bayakka.

English Sentences: Sing praises to the LORD, which dwelleth in Zion: declare among the people his doings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xiyoone Deriyan kawoti uttida GODAAYYO galataa yexxite. I oottido ubbabaakka asa ubbaayyo yootite.

English Sentences: When he maketh inquisition for blood, he remembereth them: he forgetteth not the cry of the humble.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, suuttaa gussiyaageetayyo halo kessiya Xoossai naaqettidaageetu waasuwaa shenehoo geenna.

English Sentences: Have mercy upon me, O LORD; consider my trouble which I suffer of them that hate me, thou that liftest me up from the gates of death:
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, Xiyoone asaa karen taani eqqada, ne galataa yootana malanne hegan ne atotettan keehi ufaittana mala, ta morkketi tana yedettiyoogaa be7a.

English Sentences: That I may shew forth all thy praise in the gates of the daughter of Zion: I will rejoice in thy salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni taayyo qarettada, haiquwaappe tana ashsha.

English Sentences: The heathen are sunk down in the pit that they made: in the net which they hid is their own foot taken.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotettati bantta bookkido ollan banttau kunddidosona. Eti qotti wottido piree eta tohuwaa oiqqiis.

English Sentences: The LORD is known by the judgment which he executeth: the wicked is snared in the work of his own hands. Higgaion. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ba xillo pirddan baayyo erettiis; iita asi ba kushiyan oottido oosuwaa piriyan ohettiis.

English Sentences: The wicked shall be turned into hell, and all the nations that forget God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitati duufuwaa baana; Xoossaa dogiya kawotettati ubbaikka etadan hanana.

English Sentences: For the needy shall not alway be forgotten: the expectation of the poor shall not perish for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hiyyeesi ubbatoo dogetti attenna; woikko metootanchchi wottido ufaissi merinaayyo xayenna.

English Sentences: Arise, O LORD; let not man prevail: let the heathen be judged in thy sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni dendda! Asi xoonoppo! Ne sinttan kawotettatu bolli neeni pirdda.

English Sentences: Put them in fear, O LORD: that the nations may know themselves to be but men. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, eta neeni yashshissa; eti asa gidiyoogaa neeni eta erissa.

English Sentences: Why standest thou afar off, O LORD? why hidest thou thyself in times of trouble?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, aissi haakkada eqqai? Metuwaa wodiyan aissi neeni geemmai?

English Sentences: The wicked in his pride doth persecute the poor: let them be taken in the devices that they have imagined.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba otoruwan iita asi hiyyeesaa shankkatees. Eti bantta pala maqquwan banttau oiqettidosona.

English Sentences: For the wicked boasteth of his heart's desire, and blesseth the covetous, whom the LORD abhorreth.
Wolaitta Sentences: He iitai ba wozanaa iita amuwan ceeqettees; yorai GODAA qanggeesinne kaddees.

English Sentences: The wicked, through the pride of his countenance, will not seek after God: God is not in all his thoughts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitai ba otoruwan Xoossaa koyenna; ba qofa ubbankka Xoossaa ainne wudenna.

English Sentences: His ways are always grievous; thy judgments are far above out of his sight: as for all his enemies, he puffeth at them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbabai au mule wodekka kumees; i otoruwaa meexxees. Ne higgee ayyo gelenna; ba morkketu bollan i qilliiccees.

English Sentences: He hath said in his heart, I shall not be moved: for I shall never be in adversity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba wozanan i, "Tana aibinne qaattenna. Tana mulekka metoi gakkenna" yaagidi qoppees.

English Sentences: His mouth is full of cursing and deceit and fraud: under his tongue is mischief and vanity.
Wolaitta Sentences: A doonan qanggettai, worddoinne manddettai kumiis. Ba inxxarssan genebaanne iitabaa haasayanau eesotees.

English Sentences: He sitteth in the lurking places of the villages: in the secret places doth he murder the innocent: his eyes are privily set against the poor.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heeran qosettiyoosan i zuggidi uttees. Ba woriyoogaa woranau qosetti naagiiddi, wolqqi bainna ashkketa xeellees.

English Sentences: He lieth in wait secretly as a lion in his den: he lieth in wait to catch the poor: he doth catch the poor, when he draweth him into his net.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba qosettiyoosan geemmidi, hiyyeesa oiqqanau gaammuwaagaadan zuggees. I hiyyeesaa oiqqidi, ba piriyan goochchidi efees.

English Sentences: He croucheth, and humbleth himself, that the poor may fall by his strong ones.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, wolqqi bainna hiyyeesai bikillettees; nippi geesinne he minuwan xoonettees.

English Sentences: He hath said in his heart, God hath forgotten: he hideth his face; he will never see it.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba wozanan, "Xoossai tana dogiichchiis. Ba som77uwaa taappe genttiichchiis; mulekka i be7enna" yaagees.

English Sentences: Arise, O LORD; O God, lift up thine hand: forget not the humble.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, dendda. Xoossau, ne kushiyaa xoqqu oottada dentta; hiyyeesaa dogoppa.

English Sentences: Wherefore doth the wicked contemn God? he hath said in his heart, Thou wilt not require it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nagaranchcha urai ba wozanan Xoossaa aissi karii? Ba qofankka, "Xoossai tana qaxxayenna" aissi yaagii?

English Sentences: Thou hast seen it; for thou beholdest mischief and spite, to requite it with thy hand: the poor committeth himself unto thee; thou art the helper of the fatherless.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossau, neeni tumukka be7aasa; metuwaakka waayiyaakka xeellaasa. Neeni ubba wode nuna maaddanaassi giiga uttadasa. Aawai bainnaageeta neeni maaddiyo gishshau, hiyyeesai woikko qohettidaagee neeni maaddanaadan bana neeyyo sheedhdho.

English Sentences: Break thou the arm of the wicked and the evil man: seek out his wickedness till thou find none.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nagaranchchatunne iita asatu wolqqaa neeni wurssa. Wurssada naa77antto eta giddon iitatetti beettennan aggana gakkanaassi eta qaxxaya.

English Sentences: The LORD is King for ever and ever: the heathen are perished out of his land.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI meri merinau kawotidi de7ees; kawotettati a biittaappe xayana.

English Sentences: LORD, thou hast heard the desire of the humble: thou wilt prepare their heart, thou wilt cause thine ear to hear:
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni banttana ziqqissiyaageetu amuwaa siyaasa. Neeni eta minttettaasa.

English Sentences: To judge the fatherless and the oppressed, that the man of the earth may no more oppress.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aawi bainnaageetanne un77ettidaageeta morggiyaa oiqqada, asi biittappe merettidaagee, simmi mulekka eta yashissenna mala, eta waasuwaa siyaasa.

English Sentences: In the LORD put I my trust: how say ye to my soul, Flee as a bird to your mountain?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAA giddon baqata qosetta attais. Yaatin, intte tana aissi, "Kafodan ne deriyaa baqata" yaageetii?

English Sentences: For, lo, the wicked bend their bow, they make ready their arrow upon the string, that they may privily shoot at the upright in heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hekko nagaranchchati wozanaa geeshshata caddanaassi, xuman bantta wonddafiyaa baqettaa bollan zubbiyaa toloosona.

English Sentences: If the foundations be destroyed, what can the righteous do?
Wolaitta Sentences: Baasoi bayyiyo wode, xilloi ai oottanau danddayii?

English Sentences: The LORD is in his holy temple, the LORD's throne is in heaven: his eyes behold, his eyelids try, the children of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ba geeshsha Beeta Maqidasiyan de7ees; ba saluwaa kawotaa araatan GODAI asaa xeellees; GODAA aifee asaa qorees.

English Sentences: The LORD trieth the righteous: but the wicked and him that loveth violence his soul hateth.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI xilluwaa qorees. SHin iitatanne hanttaarabaa siiqiyaageeta i keehippe ixxees.

English Sentences: Upon the wicked he shall rain snares, fire and brimstone, and an horrible tempest: this shall be the portion of their cup.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI iitatu bollan eexxiya tamaa bonqquwaanne eexxiya diniyaa bukissana. Xuuggiya gote carkkuwan eta qaxxayana.

English Sentences: For the righteous LORD loveth righteousness; his countenance doth behold the upright.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI xillo gidido gishshau, xillotettaa dosees. Suure asati a sinttaa be7ana.

English Sentences: Help, LORD; for the godly man ceaseth; for the faithful fail from among the children of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAU, nuna maaddarkkii? Aissi giikko, Xoossa asi mulekka baawa; asa giddon ammanettiyaabi xayiichchiis.

English Sentences: They speak vanity every one with his neighbour: with flattering lips and with a double heart do they speak.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbatikka issoi issuwaassi wordduwaa haasayoosona; issoi issuwaa sheleeshshiya inxxarssan baletuwan haasayoosona.

English Sentences: The LORD shall cut off all flattering lips, and the tongue that speaketh proud things:
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ha sheleeshshiya doonaa bara. Otoruwan, "Nuuni nu inxxarssan xoonana; nu inxxarssai nuugaa;

English Sentences: Who have said, With our tongue will we prevail; our lips are our own: who is lord over us?
Wolaitta Sentences: nu godai oonee?" yaagidi, ceeqettiya inxxarssa ubbaa neeni qanxxa ola.

English Sentences: For the oppression of the poor, for the sighing of the needy, now will I arise, saith the LORD; I will set him in safety from him that puffeth at him.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI, "Hiyyeesati un77ettido gishshaunne, metootanchchatu ooliyaa gishshau, ha77i taani denddana. Taani eti amottiyo sarotettan eta wottana" yaagees.

English Sentences: The words of the LORD are pure words: as silver tried in a furnace of earth, purified seven times.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalati walahi bainna geeshshata; coociyaa taman laapputoo tigettida biraadan geeyidaageeta.

English Sentences: Thou shalt keep them, O LORD, thou shalt preserve them from this generation for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni nuna sarotettan naaganne hagaa mala asappe merinau nuna ashsha.

English Sentences: The wicked walk on every side, when the vilest men are exalted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaa gidduwan iitai bonchchettido wode, iitati ubba sohuwaara simerettoosona.

English Sentences: How long wilt thou forget me, O LORD? for ever? how long wilt thou hide thy face from me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, aude gakkanaassi neeni tana doguutee? Merinaayyo tana doguutee? Aude gakkanaassi neeni taappe geemmuutee?

English Sentences: How long shall I take counsel in my soul, having sorrow in my heart daily? how long shall mine enemy be exalted over me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta qofaara baaxetiyoogee aude gakkanaassee? Ubba gallassi azzanoi ta wozanan de7anaagee aude gakkanaassee? Ta morkketi ta bolli goobanaagee aude gakkanaassee?

English Sentences: Consider and hear me, O LORD my God: lighten mine eyes, lest I sleep the sleep of death;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAU ta Xoossau, haa taakko xeellada, taayyo zaara. Zaarada ta aifiyaa poo7issada, haiquwaappe tana ashsha.

English Sentences: Lest mine enemy say, I have prevailed against him; and those that trouble me rejoice when I am moved.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nuuni a xoonida" yaagidi, ta morkketi ceeqettennaadan teqqa. Ta kunddettan eti ufaittennaadan digga.

English Sentences: But I have trusted in thy mercy; my heart shall rejoice in thy salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin aggenna ne siiquwan taani ammanettais; neeni tana ashshiyo gishshau, taani ufaittais.

English Sentences: I will sing unto the LORD, because he hath dealt bountifully with me.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAU, taani neeyyo yexxana; aissi giikko, neeni taayyo kehadasa.

English Sentences: The fool hath said in his heart, There is no God. They are corrupt, they have done abominable works, there is none that doeth good.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eeyyati bantta wozanan, "Xoossai baawa" yaagoosona. Eta de7oi moorettiis. Eti sheneyiyaabaa oottoosona; lo77iyaabaa oottiya asi baawa.

English Sentences: The LORD looked down from heaven upon the children of men, to see if there were any that did understand, and seek God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa koyiya eranchchati de7iyaakkonne be7anau, GODAI saluwaappe duge asaa xeellees.

English Sentences: They are all gone aside, they are all together become filthy: there is none that doeth good, no, not one.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ubbaikka wora simmidosona; ubbaikka muleera go77ennabaa gididosona. Lo77iyaabaa oottiya ooninne baawa; harai atto issoinne baawa.

English Sentences: Have all the workers of iniquity no knowledge? who eat up my people as they eat bread, and call not upon the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI, "Hageeti ta asaa bonqqi miidi de7iya iita asati tumu ainne erokkonaa? Eti tana woossokkona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: There were they in great fear: for God is in the generation of the righteous.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai xillo asatuura de7iyo gishshau, eti hegan dagammana.

English Sentences: Ye have shamed the counsel of the poor, because the LORD is his refuge.
Wolaitta Sentences: He iita asati hiyyeesatu halchchuwaa halissoosona; shin GODAI hiyyeesati baqatidi, qosetti attiyo soho.

English Sentences: Oh that the salvation of Israel were come out of Zion! when the LORD bringeth back the captivity of his people, Jacob shall rejoice, and Israel shall be glad.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eelayyo atotettai Xiyooneppe yeerennee! GODAI eta omooduwaa zaariyo wode, Yaaqooba zerettai ufaittana; Israa7eela asai ufaissaa poccu gaana.

English Sentences: Lord, who shall abide in thy tabernacle? who shall dwell in thy holy hill?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne dunkkaaniyaa gelanau bessiyaagee oonee? Ne geeshsha deriyan nenaara de7anau bessiyaagee oonee?

English Sentences: He that walketh uprightly, and worketh righteousness, and speaketh the truth in his heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Suure de7uwaa de7iyaagaa, xillobaa oottiyaagaa, ba wozanaappe tumaa haasayiyaagaa,

English Sentences: He that backbiteth not with his tongue, nor doeth evil to his neighbour, nor taketh up a reproach against his neighbour.
Wolaitta Sentences: hara asa sunttaa moorennaagaa, ba lagge bolli iitabaa oottennaagaa, ba shooro zigirennaagaa;

English Sentences: In whose eyes a vile person is contemned; but he honoureth them that fear the LORD. He that sweareth to his own hurt, and changeth not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ixxiyo asata kariyaagaa, shin GODAU yayyiya asata bonchchiyaagaa, ba caaqqidoogaa ai deexxinkka poliyaagaa,

English Sentences: He that putteth not out his money to usury, nor taketh reward against the innocent. He that doeth these things shall never be moved.
Wolaitta Sentences: ba miishshaa dichchau immennaagaa, xillo asa bolli wordduwaa markkattanau mattaayiyaa ekkennaagaa. Ha yohota oottiyaagee merinaukka qaaxxenna.

English Sentences: Preserve me, O God: for in thee do I put my trust.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, taani neekko baqatido gishshau, tana naaga.

English Sentences: O my soul, thou hast said unto the LORD, Thou art my Lord: my goodness extendeth not to thee;
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAAYYO, "Neeni ta Godaa; taani neeppe ekkiyobaappe attin, taayyo lo77obai baawa" yaagais.

English Sentences: But to the saints that are in the earth, and to the excellent, in whom is all my delight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7an de7iya geeshshati ai mala galatettidonaa! Ta ufaissai ubbai etaara issippe gidiyoogaa.

English Sentences: Their sorrows shall be multiplied that hasten after another god: their drink offerings of blood will I not offer, nor take up their names into my lips.
Wolaitta Sentences: Worddo xoossata kaalliyaageeti bantta bolla metuwaa darissoosona. SHin taani eta worddo xoossatuyyo yarshshikke; taani eta sunttan woossikke.

English Sentences: The LORD is the portion of mine inheritance and of my cup: thou maintainest my lot.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta GODAU, ta de7uwaa saamai nena; tana koshshiya ubbaa neeni taassi immaasa. Ta sintta de7uwau waasee nena.

English Sentences: The lines are fallen unto me in pleasant places; yea, I have a goodly heritage.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni taayyo immido saamai ai keesa lo77oo! Ee tumuppe lo77o!

English Sentences: I will bless the LORD, who hath given me counsel: my reins also instruct me in the night seasons.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana zoriya GODAA galatais; bilahekka ta wozanai tana seerees.

English Sentences: I have set the LORD always before me: because he is at my right hand, I shall not be moved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ubbaton GODAI ta sinttan de7iyoogaa hassayais. I taappe ushachcha baggaara de7iyo gishshau, taani yeeqikke.

English Sentences: Therefore my heart is glad, and my glory rejoiceth: my flesh also shall rest in hope.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, ta wozanai ufaittees; ta shemppoikka ufaittees. Ta bollaikka hirggi bainnan de7ees.

English Sentences: For thou wilt not leave my soul in hell; neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana Si7ooliyau aattada immakka; neeni nenan ammanettiyaagaa musissakka.

English Sentences: Thou wilt shew me the path of life: in thy presence is fulness of joy; at thy right hand there are pleasures for evermore.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana de7o ogiyaa bessaasa. Taani ne achchan de7in, ta ufaissai polettees; ne ushachcha baggaara ufaissai merinau de7ees.

English Sentences: Hear the right, O LORD, attend unto my cry, give ear unto my prayer, that goeth not out of feigned lips.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni taayyo xillo pirddaa pirddana mala, taani nena oichchiyoogaa siya; ta waasuwaa ezgga. Taani cimmenna inxxarssaappe woossiyo woosaakko, ne haittaa zaara.

English Sentences: Let my sentence come forth from thy presence; let thine eyes behold the things that are equal.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta shatinttai ne sinttappe yo; ne aifee likke gidiyaagaa xeello.

English Sentences: Thou hast proved mine heart; thou hast visited me in the night; thou hast tried me, and shalt find nothing; I am purposed that my mouth shall not transgress.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni qamman tana xomoosadasa; ta wozanaa paaccadasa. SHin paaccadakka; ta bolli ainnekka demmakka.

English Sentences: Concerning the works of men, by the word of thy lips I have kept me from the paths of the destroyer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hara asatudan iita qaalaa haasayikke; taani ne azazuwaa naagiyo gishshau, gene ogiyaa kaallabeikke.

English Sentences: Hold up my goings in thy paths, that my footsteps slip not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ubbatoo ne ogiyan hemettais; mulekka ne ogiyaappe gaxi kiya erikke.

English Sentences: I have called upon thee, for thou wilt hear me, O God: incline thine ear unto me, and hear my speech.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, taani woossin, neeni siyiyo gishshau, taani nena woossais. Ne haittaa taakko zaarada, taani neeyyo yootiyoogaa ezgga.

English Sentences: Shew thy marvellous lovingkindness, O thou that savest by thy right hand them which put their trust in thee from those that rise up against them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bantta morkketuppe baqatiyaageeta ne ushachcha kushiyan qottada ashshiyaagoo, garamissiya aggenna ne siiquwaa bessa.

English Sentences: Keep me as the apple of the eye, hide me under the shadow of thy wings,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne aifiyaa na77iyaadan tana naaga; ne qefiyaa giddon tana qotta.

English Sentences: From the wicked that oppress me, from my deadly enemies, who compass me about.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana un77i wottida iitatuppenne dooddi wottida diina morkketu kushiyaappe tana qosa.

English Sentences: They are inclosed in their own fat: with their mouth they speak proudly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etassi qareti baawa; otoruwan haasayoosona.

English Sentences: They have now compassed us in our steps: they have set their eyes bowing down to the earth;
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani biyo soho ubban eti tana dooddoosona. Tana biittan aatti yegganau xeelloosona.

English Sentences: Like as a lion that is greedy of his prey, and as it were a young lion lurking in secret places.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti banttau miyoobaa koyiya gaammotu mala; geeman zuggi naagiya wodala gaammotu mala.

English Sentences: Arise, O LORD, disappoint him, cast him down: deliver my soul from the wicked, which is thy sword:
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, dendda. Ta morkketuura eqettada xoona; ne bisuwan iitatuppe tana ashsha ekka.

English Sentences: From men which are thy hand, O LORD, from men of the world, which have their portion in this life, and whose belly thou fillest with thy hid treasure: they are full of children, and leave the rest of their substance to their babes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, hagaa mala asaappe, eta qaadai ha sa7aa de7uwaa xalaalaa gidiyo asaappe ne kushiyan tana ashsha. Neeni etayyo minjjido boshan eta qaxxaya; he boshainne eta naatussi gididi, eta naatu naatussikka palaho.

English Sentences: As for me, I will behold thy face in righteousness: I shall be satisfied, when I awake, with thy likeness.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani xillotettan nena be7ana. Taani denddiyo wode, nena be7ada ufaittana.

English Sentences: I will love thee, O LORD, my strength.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ta wolqqau, taani nena siiqais.

English Sentences: The LORD is my rock, and my fortress, and my deliverer; my God, my strength, in whom I will trust; my buckler, and the horn of my salvation, and my high tower.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI tau wogga zaallaa; taani olaappe naagettiyo miixaa; i tana ashshiyaagaa. Ta Xoossai taani akko baqatiyo ta wogga zaallaa. I ta gonddalliyaa. I tana ashshiya wolqqaamaa; i taani qosetta attiyo soho.

English Sentences: I will call upon the LORD, who is worthy to be praised: so shall I be saved from mine enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Galatai bessiyo GODAA taani xeesais; i ta morkketuppe tana ashshees.

English Sentences: The sorrows of death compassed me, and the floods of ungodly men made me afraid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haiquwaa hirggai wodorodan tana phuphphuriis; bashshai di7odan tana muukkiis.

English Sentences: The sorrows of hell compassed me about: the snares of death prevented me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Duufuwaa wodoroi tana qachchana hanees; haiqoi piredan tana oiqqiis.

English Sentences: In my distress I called upon the LORD, and cried unto my God: he heard my voice out of his temple, and my cry came before him, even into his ears.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana metoi iissin, GODAA xeesaas; "Tana maadda" gaada ta Xoossaayyo waassaas. I ba Beeta Maqidasiyan ta cenggurssaa siyiis; taani waassido waasoi a haittan wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: Then the earth shook and trembled; the foundations also of the hills moved and were shaken, because he was wroth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wodhdhin Xoossai hanqqettido gishshau, biittai yaaqiyaaqidi qaaxxiis; deretu xaphoi gajigajidi kokkoriis.

English Sentences: There went up a smoke out of his nostrils, and fire out of his mouth devoured: coals were kindled by it.
Wolaitta Sentences: A siiriyaappe hanqquwaa cuwai cuwattiis; a doonaappe miya tamaa lacoinne xuuggiya bonqqoi kiyiis.

English Sentences: He bowed the heavens also, and came down: and darkness was under his feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwaa i phalqqidi, duge wodhdhiis; he wode a gediyaappe garssaara sikkida shaarai de7ees.

English Sentences: And he rode upon a cherub, and did fly: yea, he did fly upon the wings of the wind.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qefiyaara de7iya kiitanchchaa kiruubiyan uttidi paalliis; carkkuwaa qefiyaa ekkidi eesotiis.

English Sentences: He made darkness his secret place; his pavilion round about him were dark waters and thick clouds of the skies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bana xuman kammiis; a dunkkaanee iraara sikkida shaaraa.

English Sentences: At the brightness that was before him his thick clouds passed, hail stones and coals of fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: A sinttan de7iya gita poo7uwaappe shachchainne tamaa lacoi kiyiis; kiyidi sikkida shaaraa kanttidi biis.

English Sentences: The LORD also thundered in the heavens, and the Highest gave his voice; hail stones and coals of fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi GODAI dadaadan saluwaappe guummiis; Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossai ba cenggurssaa sissiis.

English Sentences: Yea, he sent out his arrows, and scattered them; and he shot out lightnings, and discomfited them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba wonddafiyaa zubbiyaa yeddidi, ba morkketa laaliis; wolqqanttaa poo7uwaa kiittidi, eta yedettiis.

English Sentences: Then the channels of waters were seen, and the foundations of the world were discovered at thy rebuke, O LORD, at the blast of the breath of thy nostrils.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni seerido wodenne, hanqqettada peenuqido wode, abbaa haattai zin77ido biittai beettiis. Qassi sa7aa baasoikka qoncciis.

English Sentences: He sent from above, he took me, he drew me out of many waters.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI bollappe kushiyaa duge yeddidi, tana oiqqiis; ciimma haattaappe tana kessiis.

English Sentences: He delivered me from my strong enemy, and from them which hated me: for they were too strong for me.
Wolaitta Sentences: I tana ta wolqqaama morkkiyaappenne tana ixxiyaageetuppe ashshiis. Aissi giikko, eti taayyo keehi daro wolqqaama.

English Sentences: They prevented me in the day of my calamity: but the LORD was my stay.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta waayiyaa gallassi eti ta bolli denddidosona; shin GODAI tana zemppissiyaagaa.

English Sentences: He brought me forth also into a large place; he delivered me, because he delighted in me.
Wolaitta Sentences: I tana aaho sohuwaa kessiis; tanan ufaittido gishshau, tana ashshiis.

English Sentences: The LORD rewarded me according to my righteousness; according to the cleanness of my hands hath he recompensed me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta xillotettaadan GODAI tau qanxxiis; ta kushiyaa geeshshatettaadan i tau zaariis.

English Sentences: For I have kept the ways of the LORD, and have not wickedly departed from my God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAA ogiyaa kaallaas; taani ta Xoossaa aggada wora babeikke.

English Sentences: For all his judgments were before me, and I did not put away his statutes from me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani a higgiyaa ubbaa naagaas; a wogaa poliyoogaa aggabeikke.

English Sentences: I was also upright before him, and I kept myself from mine iniquity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani a sinttan suure de7aas; taani tana nagarappe naagaas.

English Sentences: Therefore hath the LORD recompensed me according to my righteousness, according to the cleanness of my hands in his eyesight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, GODAI tau ta xillotettaadaaninne ta kushee a sinttan geeshsha gidiyoogaadan zaariis.

English Sentences: With the merciful thou wilt shew thyself merciful; with an upright man thou wilt shew thyself upright;
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ammanettiyaageetuyyo neeni ammanettiyaagaa; suuretuyyo neenikka suure.

English Sentences: With the pure thou wilt shew thyself pure; and with the froward thou wilt shew thyself froward.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geeshshatuyyo neenikka geeshsha; shin geellatuyyo neeni cincca.

English Sentences: For thou wilt save the afflicted people; but wilt bring down high looks.
Wolaitta Sentences: Banttana ziqqissiyaageeta ashshaasa; shin banttana xoqqissiyaageeta neeni ziqqissaasa.

English Sentences: For thou wilt light my candle: the LORD my God will enlighten my darkness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni ta xomppiyaa poo7issaasa; ta Xoossai poo7issin, ta xumai kichchees.

English Sentences: For by thee I have run through a troop; and by my God have I leaped over a wall.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne maaduwan taani ta morkke wottaaddaratu bolli woraajjais; ta Xoossan taani eta miixaa xeeraara guppa aadhdhais.

English Sentences: As for God, his way is perfect: the word of the LORD is tried: he is a buckler to all those that trust in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa ogee suure. GODAA qaalai ammanettiyaagaa. Akko baqatiya ubbatussi i gonddalle.

English Sentences: For who is God save the LORD? or who is a rock save our God?
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAAPPE attin, hara xoossi baawa; nu Xoossaappe attin, hara wogga zaalli baawa.

English Sentences: It is God that girdeth me with strength, and maketh my way perfect.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taayyo wolqqaa immiyaageenne ta ogiyaa saro oottiyaagee Xoossaattennee.

English Sentences: He maketh my feet like hinds' feet, and setteth me upon my high places.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ta gediyaa genessaa gediyaadan minttees; tana xoqqa sohotun sarotettan wottees.

English Sentences: He teacheth my hands to war, so that a bow of steel is broken by mine arms.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ta kushiyaa olaa meezeyees; hegaa gishshau, taani ta qesiyan nahaasiyaa giyo birataa wonddafiyaa dafada dukkais.

English Sentences: Thou hast also given me the shield of thy salvation: and thy right hand hath holden me up, and thy gentleness hath made me great.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana ashshiya ne gonddalliyaa neeni taayyo immadasa. Ne ushachcha kushee tana zemppissees; ne lo77o ohettai tana gitayees.

English Sentences: Thou hast enlarged my steps under me, that my feet did not slip.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta hemettiyoosaa aassaasa; hegaa gishshau, ta tohoi harchchibeenna.

English Sentences: I have pursued mine enemies, and overtaken them: neither did I turn again till they were consumed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketa taani yedetta oiqqaas; taani eta xaissennan de7aidda guyye simmabeikke.

English Sentences: I have wounded them that they were not able to rise: they are fallen under my feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta naa77antto denddennaadan shocaas; eti ta tohuwan wullidosona.

English Sentences: For thou hast girded me with strength unto the battle: thou hast subdued under me those that rose up against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Olau tana wolqqaa gixissadasa; tanaara gaaddetiyaageeta taayyo gulbbatissadasa.

English Sentences: Thou hast also given me the necks of mine enemies; that I might destroy them that hate me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketa ta sinttappe guyye baqatissadasa; tana ixxiyaageeta taani xaissaas.

English Sentences: They cried, but there was none to save them: even unto the LORD, but he answered them not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Banttana maaddana mala waassidosona, shin ooninne eta ashshibeenna. GODAAKKA eti xeesidosona, shin i etau koyibeenna.

English Sentences: Then did I beat them small as the dust before the wind: I did cast them out as the dirt in the streets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Carkkoi pittidi efiyo baanadan taani eta liiqissaas; ogiyan de7iya urqqaadankka eta yedhdhaas.

English Sentences: Thou hast delivered me from the strivings of the people; and thou hast made me the head of the heathen: a people whom I have not known shall serve me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Makkala asappe tana ashshadasa. Tana kawotettatu bollan sunttadasa; taani erenna asai tau haarettiis.

English Sentences: As soon as they hear of me, they shall obey me: the strangers shall submit themselves unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ta woriyaa siyidi, tau azazettoosona; allaga deree asaikka ta sinttan lahottees.

English Sentences: The strangers shall fade away, and be afraid out of their close places.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti wozanaa kahaa bayoosona. Bantta naagettiyo miixaappe kokkoriiddi yoosona.

English Sentences: The LORD liveth; and blessed be my rock; and let the God of my salvation be exalted.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI de7ees! Xoossai, ta wogga zaallai galatetto! Tana ashshiya Xoossai xoqqu xoqqu go!

English Sentences: It is God that avengeth me, and subdueth the people under me.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ta haluwaa kessiya Xoossaa; kawotettata taappe garssaara haarissiyaagaa;

English Sentences: He delivereth me from mine enemies: yea, thou liftest me up above those that rise up against me: thou hast delivered me from the violent man.
Wolaitta Sentences: ta morkketuppe tana ashshiyaagaa. Abeet GODAU, neeni tanaara gaaddetiyaageetu bollan tana xoqqu xoqqu oottaasa; makkalanchcha asatuppe neeni tana ashshaasa.

English Sentences: Therefore will I give thanks unto thee, O LORD, among the heathen, and sing praises unto thy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani nena kawotettatu giddon galatana; taani ne sunttaa sabbana.

English Sentences: Great deliverance giveth he to his king; and sheweth mercy to his anointed, to David, and to his seed for evermore.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ba kawuwaassi xoonuwaa bollan xoonuwaa immees. Ba tiyidoogaassi, Daawitassinne a zerettaassi, aggenna siiquwaa merinau bessees.

English Sentences: The heavens declare the glory of God; and the firmament sheweth his handywork.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saloti Xoossaa bonchchuwaa haasayoosonanne salotu gufanttoi i ba kushiyan oottidobaa awaajjees.

English Sentences: Day unto day uttereth speech, and night unto night sheweth knowledge.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassai hankko gallassaayyo hegaa yootees; issi qammaikka hankko qammaayyo eratettaa qonccissees.

English Sentences: There is no speech nor language, where their voice is not heard.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haasayi woikko qaali baawa; eta cenggurssaikka siyettenna.

English Sentences: Their line is gone out through all the earth, and their words to the end of the world. In them hath he set a tabernacle for the sun,
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkokka, eta haasayaa cenggurssai sa7a ubban laalettiis; eta qaalaikka sa7aa gaxaa gakkiis. Xoossai awai de7iyo sohuwaa saluwan giigissiis.

English Sentences: Which is as a bridegroom coming out of his chamber, and rejoiceth as a strong man to run a race.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ufaittiiddi karesooppe kiyiya mishiraadan, wottaa naasiyaayyo giigida wottanchchaadan, awai maallado maallado kiyees.

English Sentences: His going forth is from the end of the heaven, and his circuit unto the ends of it: and there is nothing hid from the heat thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Awai issi bagga saluwaa gaxaappe mokkidi, hara bagga saluwaa gaxaa gakkanaassi bees; a ho77uwaappe geemmiyaabi aibinne baawa.

English Sentences: The law of the LORD is perfect, converting the soul: the testimony of the LORD is sure, making wise the simple.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA higgee suure; shemppuwaa zaarees. GODAI yootiyoogee ammanettiyaagaa; akeekai paccidoogeetussi eratettaa immees.

English Sentences: The statutes of the LORD are right, rejoicing the heart: the commandment of the LORD is pure, enlightening the eyes.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA wogai likke; wozanaa ufaissees. GODAA azazoi geeshsha; wozanaa poo7issees.

English Sentences: The fear of the LORD is clean, enduring for ever: the judgments of the LORD are true and righteous altogether.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAASSI bonchchuwan yayyiyoogee lo77o yoho; hegee merinaukka eqqidi de7iyaagaa. GODAA pirddai tuma; i ubbatonkka xillo.

English Sentences: More to be desired are they than gold, yea, than much fine gold: sweeter also than honey and the honeycomb.
Wolaitta Sentences: Worqqaappenne walahi bainna worqqaappe aadhdhidi dosettees; eessaappenne eessaa ililuwaappe aadhdhi mal77ees.

English Sentences: Moreover by them is thy servant warned: and in keeping of them there is great reward.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi tana ne ashkkaraa naagettanaadan zorees; ne higgiyaa naagiyoogan taani daro go7ettais.

English Sentences: Who can understand his errors? cleanse thou me from secret faults.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba huuphe balaa demmiyai oonee? Abeet GODAU, geemmida nagaraappe tana geeshsha.

English Sentences: Keep back thy servant also from presumptuous sins; let them not have dominion over me: then shall I be upright, and I shall be innocent from the great transgression.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi taani, ne ashkkarai, xalan nagaraa oottennaadan, neeni tana naaga. Tana nagarau haarissoppa; he wode taani suure gidada, gita mooruwaappe geeyana.

English Sentences: Let the words of my mouth, and the meditation of my heart, be acceptable in thy sight, O LORD, my strength, and my redeemer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ta wogga zaallau, tana wozidaagoo, ta doonaappe kiyiya qaalainne ta wozanaa qofai nena ufaissiyaabaa gido.

English Sentences: The LORD hear thee in the day of trouble; the name of the God of Jacob defend thee;
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni metootido wode GODAI ne woosaa siyo; Yaaqooba Xoossaa sunttai nena naago.

English Sentences: Send thee help from the sanctuary, and strengthen thee out of Zion;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba Beeta Maqidasiyaappe neeyyo maaduwaa kiitto; Xiyooneppe nena kaafo.

English Sentences: Remember all thy offerings, and accept thy burnt sacrifice; Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne yarshshuwaa ubbaa i neeyyo hassayo; ne xuuggiyo yarshshuwan ufaitto.

English Sentences: Grant thee according to thine own heart, and fulfil all thy counsel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne wozanaa amuwaa neeyyo immo; ne halchchuwaa ubbaa polo.

English Sentences: We will rejoice in thy salvation, and in the name of our God we will set up our banners: the LORD fulfil all thy petitions.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne xoonuwaa gishshau, nuuni ufaissau hombbocana; nu Xoossaa sunttan nu banddiraa xoqqu oottana. Neeni woossidobaa ubbaa GODAI neessi immo.

English Sentences: Now know I that the LORD saveth his anointed; he will hear him from his holy heaven with the saving strength of his right hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ba doorido kawuwaassi xoonuwaa immiyoogaa taani biron erais. I ba geeshsha saluwan siyana; siyidi, ba ushachcha kushiyan gita xoonuwaa ayyo immana.

English Sentences: Some trust in chariots, and some in horses: but we will remember the name of the LORD our God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issooti issooti bantta ola parai goochchiyo gaariyan, harati bantta paran ceeqettoosona; shin nuuni GODAA nu Xoossaa wolqqan ceeqettoos.

English Sentences: They are brought down and fallen: but we are risen, and stand upright.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti xubettidi kunddana; shin nuuni denddidi, minni eqqana.

English Sentences: Save, LORD: let the king hear us when we call.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, kawuwaassi xoonuwaa imma; nuuni nena xeesiyo wode siya.

English Sentences: The king shall joy in thy strength, O LORD; and in thy salvation how greatly shall he rejoice!
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, kawoi ne minotettan ufaittees; neeni immido xoonuwan i aiba ufaittii!

English Sentences: Thou hast given him his heart's desire, and hast not withholden the request of his lips. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni a wozanaa amuwaa ayyo immadasa; qassi i nena ba inxxarssan oichchidobaa diggabaakka.

English Sentences: For thou preventest him with the blessings of goodness: thou settest a crown of pure gold on his head.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni lo77o anjjuwaara akko yaasa; geeshsha worqqa kallachchaa a huuphiyan wottaasa.

English Sentences: He asked life of thee, and thou gavest it him, even length of days for ever and ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni de7uwaa ayyo immanaadan nena woossiis; woossin ayyo immadasa. Meri merinau a bariyaa adussadasa.

English Sentences: His glory is great in thy salvation: honour and majesty hast thou laid upon him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni xoonuwaa immido gishshau, a bonchchoi darees; gitatettaanne anggaa ayyo immadasa.

English Sentences: For thou hast made him most blessed for ever: thou hast made him exceeding glad with thy countenance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ayyo merinaa anjjuwaa immaasa; ne achchan de7iyo ufaissan a ufaissaasa.

English Sentences: For the king trusteth in the LORD, and through the mercy of the most High he shall not be moved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi GODAN ammanettees. Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossai a aggennan siiqiyo gishshau, i yeeqenna.

English Sentences: Thine hand shall find out all thine enemies: thy right hand shall find out those that hate thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne kushee ne morkketa ubbaa kutuutana; ne ushachchai nena ixxiyaageeta oiqqana.

English Sentences: Thou shalt make them as a fiery oven in the time of thine anger: the LORD shall swallow them up in his wrath, and the fire shall devour them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni qoncciyo wode, eta tama coociyaadan xuuggana. GODAI ba hanqquwaa suuluwan eta mittana; a tamaikka eta mi xaissana.

English Sentences: Their fruit shalt thou destroy from the earth, and their seed from among the children of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni eta naata biittaappe, eta zerettaakka asaa giddoppe xaissana.

English Sentences: For they intended evil against thee: they imagined a mischievous device, which they are not able to perform.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne morkketi ne bolli yaa7oosonanne iitabaa maqettoosona; shin polokkona.

English Sentences: Therefore shalt thou make them turn their back, when thou shalt make ready thine arrows upon thy strings against the face of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, neeni eta ne wonddafiyaa zubbiyan dukkanau baabisana; baabisada guyye zaarada baqatissana.

English Sentences: Be thou exalted, LORD, in thine own strength: so will we sing and praise thy power.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne minotettan xoqqu xoqqu ga; ne wolqqaassi nena sabboosinne galatoos.

English Sentences: My God, my God, why hast thou forsaken me? why art thou so far from helping me, and from the words of my roaring?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta Xoossau, ta Xoossau, tana aissi aggadii? Tana maadda gaada taani neeyyo watiwatiyo wode, aissi taappe haakkai?

English Sentences: O my God, I cry in the day time, but thou hearest not; and in the night season, and am not silent.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet ta Xoossau, gallassan ubban taani neeyyo waassais; shin neeni taayyo allakka. Qamman ubbankka neeyyo waassais, shin woppaa demmikke.

English Sentences: But thou art holy, O thou that inhabitest the praises of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, neeni kawotaa araatan geeshsha gidada uttadasa. Neeni Israa7eelati galatiyoogaa.

English Sentences: Our fathers trusted in thee: they trusted, and thou didst deliver them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kase nu aawati nenan ammanettidosona; nenan ammanettin, neeni eta ashshadasa.

English Sentences: They cried unto thee, and were delivered: they trusted in thee, and were not confounded.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeyyo waassidi attidosona; nenan ammanettidi yeellatibokkona.

English Sentences: But I am a worm, and no man; a reproach of men, and despised of the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani asa gidikke; taani guxune. Taani asan karettidaagaanne qilliiccettidaagaa.

English Sentences: All they that see me laugh me to scorn: they shoot out the lip, they shake the head, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana be7iya ubbati qiroosona; eti tana qoosoosonanne bantta huuphiyaa qaattoosona.

English Sentences: He trusted on the LORD that he would deliver him: let him deliver him, seeing he delighted in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi, "Neeni GODAN ammanettoohoo; aissi nena ashshennee? GODAI nena dosikko, ane nena ashsho" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: But thou art he that took me out of the womb: thou didst make me hope when I was upon my mother's breasts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, tana ta aayee uluwaappe suure yeletissidaagee nena; ta aayee xanttaa xammiyo wodekka taani nenan ammanettanaadan oottadasa.

English Sentences: I was cast upon thee from the womb: thou art my God from my mother's belly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani yelettoosappe doommada nenan diccaas; ta aayee uluwaappe doommadakka, neeni ta Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Be not far from me; for trouble is near; for there is none to help.
Wolaitta Sentences: Metoi taakko matiyo gishshaunne tana maaddiyaabi bainna gishshau, hai neeni taappe haakkoppa.

English Sentences: Many bulls have compassed me: strong bulls of Bashan have beset me round.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro morkketi korima booratudan tana dooddoosona; qaiciya Baasaane biittaa booratudan tana dooddoosona.

English Sentences: They gaped upon me with their mouths, as a ravening and a roaring lion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mentterettiyaanne gudiya gaammuwaadan bantta doonaa ta bolli hanggoosona.

English Sentences: I am poured out like water, and all my bones are out of joint: my heart is like wax; it is melted in the midst of my bowels.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani haattaadan goggaas; ta meqettati bantta kuushshaappe kolettidosona. Ta wozanai eessaa muqaaddaa mala, ta giddon seeri wurees.

English Sentences: My strength is dried up like a potsherd; and my tongue cleaveth to my jaws; and thou hast brought me into the dust of death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta qooree kon77adan melees; ta inxxarssai kookkiyaara ohettees. Neeni tana haiqqida asadan baanan yeggadasa.

English Sentences: For dogs have compassed me: the assembly of the wicked have inclosed me: they pierced my hands and my feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita asati cora kanatudan tana yuuyi aadhdhidi teqqoosona. Ta kushetanne ta tohota caddoosona.

English Sentences: I may tell all my bones: they look and stare upon me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta meqettati ubbai taayyo beettoosona. Ta morkketi tana xeelloosonanne dereqqoosona.

English Sentences: They part my garments among them, and cast lots upon my vesture.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta maayuwaa shaakki ekkoosona; ta adussa maayuwan saamaa yeggoosona.

English Sentences: But be not thou far from me, O LORD: O my strength, haste thee to help me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni mati taappe haakkoppa. Abeet ta wolqqau, tana maaddanau eesuwan haaya.

English Sentences: Deliver my soul from the sword; my darling from the power of the dog.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana bisuwaappe ashsha; ta al77o de7iyo kanatu wolqqaappe ashsha.

English Sentences: Save me from the lion's mouth: for thou hast heard me from the horns of the unicorns.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaammotu doonaappe tana ashsha; qaiciya bazzo booratu kaciyaappe tana naaga.

English Sentences: I will declare thy name unto my brethren: in the midst of the congregation will I praise thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne sunttaa ta ishanttussi yootana; mabaaraa shiiquwankka nena galatana.

English Sentences: Ye that fear the LORD, praise him; all ye the seed of Jacob, glorify him; and fear him, all ye the seed of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, GODAASSI yayyiyaageetoo, a galatite. Inttenoo, Yaaqooba zerettatoo, ubbaikka a bonchchite. Inttenoo, Israa7eela zerettatoo, ubbatikka bonchchuwan ayyo yayyite.

English Sentences: For he hath not despised nor abhorred the affliction of the afflicted; neither hath he hid his face from him; but when he cried unto him, he heard.
Wolaitta Sentences: I naaqettidaageeta karenna; eta gakkida qohuwaa tau ai metoo geenna. Bari som77uwaa etappe genttenna; shin eti maaduwaassi akko waassiyo wodiyan, eta waasuwaa siyees.

English Sentences: My praise shall be of thee in the great congregation: I will pay my vows before them that fear him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani neeni oottido lo77o oosuwaa gishshaassi, kunttida yaa7an galatana. Taani shiiqettidobaa neeyyo yayyiya asaa sinttan gattana.

English Sentences: The meek shall eat and be satisfied: they shall praise the LORD that seek him: your heart shall live for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hiyyeesati miidi kallana. GODAA koyiyaageeti a galatana. Eti merinau duretana.

English Sentences: All the ends of the world shall remember and turn unto the LORD: and all the kindreds of the nations shall worship before thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7aa gaxaa gakkanaassi de7iya asai ubbai hassayidi, GODAAKKO simmana. Asa zare ubbai assi goinnana.

English Sentences: For the kingdom is the LORD's: and he is the governor among the nations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, kawotiyo maatai GODAABAA; kawotettata i haarees.

English Sentences: All they that be fat upon earth shall eat and worship: all they that go down to the dust shall bow before him: and none can keep alive his own soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7an de7iya dure asati ubbai maananne ayyo goinnana. Banttana haiquwaappe ashshanau danddayennaageetinne baanau laamettiyaageeti ubbati ayyo gulbbatana.

English Sentences: A seed shall serve him; it shall be accounted to the Lord for a generation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yiya zerettai ayyo kiitettana; asai Godaa oosuwaa yiya yeletau yootana.

English Sentences: They shall come, and shall declare his righteousness unto a people that shall be born, that he hath done this.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biron yelettibeenna asaassikka, "Xoossai ba asaa ashshiis" yaagiyoogee odettana.

English Sentences: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ta henttanchchaa; taayyo aibinne paccenna.

English Sentences: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana aaca qooruwan allaxxissees; woppu giida haattaakko laaggees.

English Sentences: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name's sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta de7uwaa ooraxissees. Ba sunttaa gishshau, tana xillotettaa ogiyan kaalettees.

English Sentences: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta GODAI tanaara de7iyo gishshau, taani haiquwaa milatiya xumaa giddoora biikkokka, iitabau yayyikke. Ne gatimainne ne guufee tana minttettoosona.

English Sentences: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketu sinttan taayyo gibiraa makkaasa. Tana mokkaidda, ta huuphiyaa zaitiyaa tiyaasa. Ta wanccai palahidi goggana gakkanaassi kunttaasa.

English Sentences: Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the LORD for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne kehatettainne aggenna ne siiqoi ta de7uwaa laitta ubban tumuppe tana kaallana. Taani GODAA keettan merinaassi de7ana.

English Sentences: The earth is the LORD's, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ainne sa7an kumidabai ubbai GODAABAA; biittainne biittan de7iyaabai ubbai abaa.

English Sentences: For he hath founded it upon the seas, and established it upon the floods.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, sa7aa gita abbaa bollan i hiixxiis; ciimma haattaa bollan minttidi essiis.

English Sentences: Who shall ascend into the hill of the LORD? or who shall stand in his holy place?
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA deriyaa gi77anau bessiyaagee oonee? A geeshsha sohuwan eqqanau bessiyaagee oonee?

English Sentences: He that hath clean hands, and a pure heart; who hath not lifted up his soul unto vanity, nor sworn deceitfully.
Wolaitta Sentences: A kushee nagaraappe geeyidoogaa, a wozanai geeshsha gididoogaa, eeqau goinnennaagaa, wordduwan caaqqennaagaa.

English Sentences: He shall receive the blessing from the LORD, and righteousness from the God of his salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: I GODAAPPE anjjuwaa ekkana; ashshiya Xoossaappe i xillotettaa ekkana.

English Sentences: This is the generation of them that seek him, that seek thy face, O Jacob. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaakko xeelliya asainne Yaaqooba Xoossaa sinttaa koyiya asai hageetu mala.

English Sentences: Lift up your heads, O ye gates; and be ye lift up, ye everlasting doors; and the King of glory shall come in.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kareta dooyite! Bonchcho kawoi gelana mala, he beni penggeti dooyettona!

English Sentences: Who is this King of glory? The LORD strong and mighty, the LORD mighty in battle.
Wolaitta Sentences: He bonchcho kawoi oonee? Minoinne wolqqaamai GODAATTENNE! Olaukka i wolqqaama GODAATTENNE!

English Sentences: Lift up your heads, O ye gates; even lift them up, ye everlasting doors; and the King of glory shall come in.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kareta dooyite! Bonchcho kawoi gelana mala, he beni penggeta dooyite!

English Sentences: Who is this King of glory? The LORD of hosts, he is the King of glory. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha bonchcho kawoi oonee? Ha bonchcho kawoi Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAATTENNE!

English Sentences: Unto thee, O LORD, do I lift up my soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ta shemppuwaappe nena woossais.

English Sentences: O my God, I trust in thee: let me not be ashamed, let not mine enemies triumph over me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet ta Xoossau, taani nenan ammanettais; tana yeellayoppa; ta morkketu haittaa kessoppa.

English Sentences: Yea, let none that wait on thee be ashamed: let them be ashamed which transgress without cause.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenan ufaissaa oottiyaageeti yeellatokkona; shin gaasoi bainnan geniyaageeti yeellatana.

English Sentences: Shew me thy ways, O LORD; teach me thy paths.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, tana ne ogiyaa bessa; ne ogiyaa tana tamaarissa.

English Sentences: Lead me in thy truth, and teach me: for thou art the God of my salvation; on thee do I wait all the day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana ashshiya Xoossaa gidiyo gishshau, ne tumatettan tana kaalettanne tamaarissa. Gallassa kumettan taani nenan ufaissaa oottais.

English Sentences: Remember, O LORD, thy tender mercies and thy lovingkindnesses; for they have been ever of old.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, beniisappe de7iya ne maarotaanne aggenna ne siiquwaa hassaya.

English Sentences: Remember not the sins of my youth, nor my transgressions: according to thy mercy remember thou me for thy goodness' sake, O LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta yelagatettaa nagaraanne mooruwaa hassayoppa. Abeet GODAU, neeni keha gidiyo gishshau, aggenna ne siiquwaadan tana hassaya.

English Sentences: Good and upright is the LORD: therefore will he teach sinners in the way.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI kehanne suure; hegaa gishshau, nagaranchchata ba ogiyaa tamaarissees.

English Sentences: The meek will he guide in judgment: and the meek will he teach his way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ashkketa suuretettan kaalettees; ashkketa ba ogiyaa tamaarissees.

English Sentences: All the paths of the LORD are mercy and truth unto such as keep his covenant and his testimonies.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA maachchaanne a awaajjuwaa naagiyaageetayyo a ogee ubbai tumatettanne aggenna siiqo.

English Sentences: For thy name's sake, O LORD, pardon mine iniquity; for it is great.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ta nagarai keehi daro; gidikkokka, ne sunttaa gishshau, atto yaaga.

English Sentences: What man is he that feareth the LORD? him shall he teach in the way that he shall choose.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAASSI yayyiya asi oonee? I kaallanau bessiyo ogiyaa GODAI a tamaarissana.

English Sentences: His soul shall dwell at ease; and his seed shall inherit the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ubbatookka lo77o duussaa de7ana; a zerettati biittaa laattana.

English Sentences: The secret of the LORD is with them that fear him; and he will shew them his covenant.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI baayyo yayyiyaageetau ba xuuraa shaakkiyaagaa; i etau ba maachchaakka minttees.

English Sentences: Mine eyes are ever toward the LORD; for he shall pluck my feet out of the net.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ta gediyaa piriyaappe kessiyo gishshau, ta aifee maaduwaassi ubbatoo akko xeellees.

English Sentences: Turn thee unto me, and have mercy upon me; for I am desolate and afflicted.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAU, taani tarkka de7iya qohettida asa gidiyo gishshau, haa taakko simma; taayyo qaretta.

English Sentences: The troubles of my heart are enlarged: O bring thou me out of my distresses.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taayyo hirggai dariis; ta metuwaappe tana neeni kessa.

English Sentences: Look upon mine affliction and my pain; and forgive all my sins.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta metuwaanne ta tuggaa neeni be7a. Ta nagaraa ubbaa atto ga.

English Sentences: Consider mine enemies; for they are many; and they hate me with cruel hatred.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketi ai keena daridaakkonne be7a; eti tana woranaadan ixxiyoogaa xeella.

English Sentences: O keep my soul, and deliver me: let me not be ashamed; for I put my trust in thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana naaga; neeni tana ashsha; taani neekko baqatido gishshau, tana yeellayoppa.

English Sentences: Let integrity and uprightness preserve me; for I wait on thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nenan ufaissaa oottido gishshau, suuretettainne tumatettai tana naago.

English Sentences: Redeem Israel, O God, out of all his troubles.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, Israa7eela asaa eta meto ubbaappe neeni ashsha.

English Sentences: Judge me, O LORD; for I have walked in mine integrity: I have trusted also in the LORD; therefore I shall not slide.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani suuretettan hemettido gishshaunne siree bainnan nena ammanettido gishshau, taayyo pirdda.

English Sentences: Examine me, O LORD, and prove me; try my reins and my heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, tana paacca, tana qora; ta wozanaa kahaa xomoosa.

English Sentences: For thy lovingkindness is before mine eyes: and I have walked in thy truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, aggenna ne siiqoi ta sinttan de7ees; taani ne tumatettaa ogiyan hemettais.

English Sentences: I have not sat with vain persons, neither will I go in with dissemblers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani cimmiya asatuura issippe uttikke; lo77o milatiya iitatu maabaran gelikke.

English Sentences: I have hated the congregation of evil doers; and will not sit with the wicked.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitaa oottiya asatu yaa7aa taani ixxais; palatuura issippe uttikke.

English Sentences: I will wash mine hands in innocency: so will I compass thine altar, O LORD:
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani qohabeennaagaa bessanau ta kushiyaa meeccais. Meeccada neeyyo yarshshiyo sohuwaa yuuyais;

English Sentences: That I may publish with the voice of thanksgiving, and tell of all thy wondrous works.
Wolaitta Sentences: yuuyaidda ne galata yettaa yexxaisinne neeni oottido oorattabaa ubbaa yootais.

English Sentences: LORD, I have loved the habitation of thy house, and the place where thine honour dwelleth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni de7iyo keettaa, ne bonchchoi aqiyo sohuwaa taani dosais.

English Sentences: Gather not my soul with sinners, nor my life with bloody men:
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana nagaranchchatuura issippe pittoppa; woikko asa woriyaageetuura issippe xaissoppa.

English Sentences: In whose hands is mischief, and their right hand is full of bribes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta kushiyan iita halchchoi de7ees; qassi eta ushachcha kushiyan mattaayee kumi uttiis.

English Sentences: But as for me, I will walk in mine integrity: redeem me, and be merciful unto me.
