Wolaitta Sentences: SHin tana gidikko, taani suuretettan hemettais. Tana woza; taayyo qaretta.

English Sentences: My foot standeth in an even place: in the congregations will I bless the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta tohoi lo77o sohuwan eqqiis; taani kunttida yaa7an GODAA galatana.

English Sentences: The LORD is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the LORD is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid?
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI taayyo poo7onne tana ashshiyaagaa; yaatin, taani ooyyo yayyanee? GODAI ta de7oi naagettiyo miixaa; yaatin, taani ooyyo dagammanee?

English Sentences: When the wicked, even mine enemies and my foes, came upon me to eat up my flesh, they stumbled and fell.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita asati, ta ixotinne ta morkketi tana woranau taakko horddofiyo wode, eti banttau xubettidi kunddana.

English Sentences: Though an host should encamp against me, my heart shall not fear: though war should rise against me, in this will I be confident.
Wolaitta Sentences: Morkkiya toorai tana dooddiyaakkokka ta wozanai yayyenna. Olai ta bolli woraajjiyaakkokka, taani GODAN ammanettais.

English Sentences: One thing have I desired of the LORD, that will I seek after; that I may dwell in the house of the LORD all the days of my life, to behold the beauty of the LORD, and to enquire in his temple.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAA issibaa oichchaas; taani hegaa koyaas; hegeenne, taani ta de7o laitta ubban GODAA keettan de7anaagaa; de7aidda, taani GODAA lo77otettaa be7anaagaanne a Beeta Maqidasiyan a koyanaagaa.

English Sentences: For in the time of trouble he shall hide me in his pavilion: in the secret of his tabernacle shall he hide me; he shall set me up upon a rock.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, metuwaa gallassan i tana ba de7iyoosan genttana; ba dunkkaaniyan i tana qosi ashshana. I tana xoqqa shuchchaa bollan essana.

English Sentences: And now shall mine head be lifted up above mine enemies round about me: therefore will I offer in his tabernacle sacrifices of joy; I will sing, yea, I will sing praises unto the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode taani tana dooddida ta morkketuppe gitatada, xoqqu xoqqu yaagana. Taani a dunkkaaniyan ufaittaidda yarshshuwaa yarshshana. Taani GODAAYYO diixxananne yexxana.

English Sentences: Hear, O LORD, when I cry with my voice: have mercy also upon me, and answer me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani nena xeesiyo wode, neeni taayyo koya; taayyo qaretta; taayyo siya.

English Sentences: When thou saidst, Seek ye my face; my heart said unto thee, Thy face, LORD, will I seek.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni, "Ta sinttaa koyite" giido wode, ta wozanai, "Abeet GODAU, eeno; taani ne sinttaa koyana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Hide not thy face far from me; put not thy servant away in anger: thou hast been my help; leave me not, neither forsake me, O God of my salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne sinttaa taappe genttoppa. Tana maaddidaagoo, tana ne ashkkaraa hanqqettada guyye zaaroppa. Abeet tana ashshiya Xoossau, tana oloppanne aggoppa.

English Sentences: When my father and my mother forsake me, then the LORD will take me up.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta aawainne ta aayyiyaa tana aggiyaakkonne GODAI tana dichchana.

English Sentences: Teach me thy way, O LORD, and lead me in a plain path, because of mine enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne ogiyaa tana tamaarissa; ta morkketu gishshau, tana suure ogiyaa kaaletta.

English Sentences: Deliver me not over unto the will of mine enemies: for false witnesses are risen up against me, and such as breathe out cruelty.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana naassiya worddo markkati ta bolli denddido gishshau, tana ta morkketu amuwaayyo aattada immoppa.

English Sentences: I had fainted, unless I had believed to see the goodness of the LORD in the land of the living.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA kehatettaa taani paxa de7aidda be7anaagaa ammanais.

English Sentences: Wait on the LORD: be of good courage, and he shall strengthen thine heart: wait, I say, on the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAN ufaissaa wotta; minnadanne wozannaamada, GODAN ufaissaa wotta.

English Sentences: Unto thee will I cry, O LORD my rock; be not silent to me: lest, if thou be silent to me, I become like them that go down into the pit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ta wogga zaallau, taani nena xeesais; taani nena xeesin, taayyo tulloppa. Ne co77u giikko, taani duufuwaa biida asatu mala gidais.

English Sentences: Hear the voice of my supplications, when I cry unto thee, when I lift up my hands toward thy holy oracle.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Maaddo" gaada taani nena xeesiyo wodenne ne geeshsha Beeta Maqidasiyaakko zaarada ta kushiyaa micciyo wode, neeni ta watiwatuwaa siya.

English Sentences: Draw me not away with the wicked, and with the workers of iniquity, which speak peace to their neighbours, but mischief is in their hearts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana iita asatuura gattada oiqqoppa; eti iitabaa oottiyaageeta. Hegeeti bantta wozanan kobabaa qoppi uttidi, bantta doonan bantta shooruwaara sarobaa haasayiyaageeta.

English Sentences: Give them according to their deeds, and according to the wickedness of their endeavours: give them after the work of their hands; render to them their desert.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta oosuwaadaaninne eta oosuwaa iitatettaadan etau qanxxa; eta kushiyaa etau zaara. Etau bessiya iitaa etau zaara.

English Sentences: Because they regard not the works of the LORD, nor the operation of his hands, he shall destroy them, and not build them up.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti GODAA oosuwaanne a kushee medhdhidobaa wudennan ixxido gishshau, GODAI eta qolana; zaaridi eta mulekka keexxenna.

English Sentences: Blessed be the LORD, because he hath heard the voice of my supplications.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta watiwatuwaa siyido gishshau, GODAI galatetto.

English Sentences: The LORD is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI taayyo wolqqanne gonddalle; ta wozanai an ammanettees; hegan taani maadettaas. Hegaa gishshau, ta wozanai an ufaittees; taani yettan a sabbana.

English Sentences: The LORD is their strength, and he is the saving strength of his anointed.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ba asaayyo wolqqa; i ba dooridi tiyido kawuwaa ashshiya miixaa.

English Sentences: Save thy people, and bless thine inheritance: feed them also, and lift them up for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAU, ne asaa ashsha; neessi gidiyaageeta anjja. Eta heemmiyaagee nena gida; neeni eta merinaukka heemma.

English Sentences: Give unto the LORD, O ye mighty, give unto the LORD glory and strength.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo saluwan de7iya meretatoo, GODAABAA yootite; "Bonchchoinne wolqqai GODAABAA" giidi yootite.

English Sentences: Give unto the LORD the glory due unto his name; worship the LORD in the beauty of holiness.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Bonchchoi a sunttaassa" giidi, GODAABAA yootite; a geeshshatettaa puulan GODAAYYO goinnite.

English Sentences: The voice of the LORD is upon the waters: the God of glory thundereth: the LORD is upon many waters.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA gunttai haattatu bollan siyettees. Bonchcho Xoossai dadaadan guummees; GODAI gita haattatu bollan guummees.

English Sentences: The voice of the LORD is powerful; the voice of the LORD is full of majesty.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA gunttai wolqqaama; GODAA gunttai, "Hoola!" giissiyaabaa.

English Sentences: The voice of the LORD breaketh the cedars; yea, the LORD breaketh the cedars of Lebanon.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA gunttai zigata mentterettees; Liibaanoosa giyo biittan de7iya zigatakka GODAI mentterettees.

English Sentences: He maketh them also to skip like a calf; Lebanon and Sirion like a young unicorn.
Wolaitta Sentences: Liibaanoosa dereta galo maraadan buraaqissees; Siriyoona giyo gita deriyaa bazzo korima booraadan phixxillissees.

English Sentences: The voice of the LORD divideth the flames of fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA gunttai wolqqanttaa wolqqammissees.

English Sentences: The voice of the LORD shaketh the wilderness; the LORD shaketh the wilderness of Kadesh.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA gunttai bazzuwaa qaattees; GODAI Qaadeesa Bazzuwaa qaattees.

English Sentences: The voice of the LORD maketh the hinds to calve, and discovereth the forests: and in his temple doth every one speak of his glory.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA gunttai wolata qaattees; mittaa haittaakka qoqqofees. Yaatin, a Beeta Maqidasiyan de7iyaageeti, "Bonchchoi GODAASSI gido" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: The LORD sitteth upon the flood; yea, the LORD sitteth King for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI bashshaa haattaa bolli de7iya ba kawotaa araataa wottidi uttiis; GODAI ba kawotaa araatan uttidi, merinau kawotiis.

English Sentences: The LORD will give strength unto his people; the LORD will bless his people with peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ba asaassi wolqqaa immees. GODAI ba asaa sarotettan anjjees.

English Sentences: I will extol thee, O LORD; for thou hast lifted me up, and hast not made my foes to rejoice over me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni tana ciimmaappe kessido gishshaunne ta morkketan, "Hashshu au" giissabeenna gishshau, taani nena xoqqu xoqqu oottana.

English Sentences: O LORD my God, I cried unto thee, and thou hast healed me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU ta Xoossau, neeni tana maaddanaadan, taani nena xeesaas; xeesin neeni tana pattadasa.

English Sentences: O LORD, thou hast brought up my soul from the grave: thou hast kept me alive, that I should not go down to the pit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, tana duufuwaa beennaadan naagadasa; duge ciimma ollan gelennaadan, neeni tana paxa ashshadasa.

English Sentences: Sing unto the LORD, O ye saints of his, and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo Xoossaa asatoo, GODAAYYO yexxite; a geeshsha sunttaakka galatite.

English Sentences: For his anger endureth but a moment; in his favour is life: weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning.
Wolaitta Sentences: A hanqqoi guutta wodiyaassa, shin a kehatettai de7o laitta ubbaassa. Qammi yeekiiddi aqikko, maalladoi ufaissa gidees.

English Sentences: And in my prosperity I said, I shall never be moved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani woppan de7iyo wode, "Simmi taani mulekka yeeqikke" yaagaas.

English Sentences: LORD, by thy favour thou hast made my mountain to stand strong: thou didst hide thy face, and I was troubled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni taayyo kehido wode, tana gita deriyaadan minttada essadasa. SHin neeni ne sinttaa wora zaarido wode, taani dagammaas.

English Sentences: I cried to thee, O LORD; and unto the LORD I made supplication.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani nena xeesaas; taani GODAASSI watiwatada hagaadan yaagaas;

English Sentences: What profit is there in my blood, when I go down to the pit? Shall the dust praise thee? shall it declare thy truth?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani haiqqiyoogaappe woikko duufuwan geliyoogaappe ai demmuutee? Baanau laamettida asi nena galatii? Neeni ammanettiyoogaa yootii?

English Sentences: Hear, O LORD, and have mercy upon me: LORD, be thou my helper.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taayyo neeni siya; taayyo qaretta. Abeet GODAU, neeni taayyo maado gida" yaagaas.

English Sentences: Thou hast turned for me my mourning into dancing: thou hast put off my sackcloth, and girded me with gladness;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta yeehuwaa yettau laammadasa. Kayyo maayuwaa taappe qaarada, ufaissaa tana maizzadasa.

English Sentences: To the end that my glory may sing praise to thee, and not be silent. O LORD my God, I will give thanks unto thee for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani nena sabbanaappe attin, co77u giikke. Abeet GODAU ta Xoossau, taani nena merinaukka galatana.

English Sentences: In thee, O LORD, do I put my trust; let me never be ashamed: deliver me in thy righteousness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani neekko baqatais; audenne tana yeellayoppa. Ne xillotettan tana ashsha.

English Sentences: Bow down thine ear to me; deliver me speedily: be thou my strong rock, for an house of defence to save me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne haittaa taakko yegga; eesuwan tana ashsha. Neeni taani geemmiyo wogga zaallanne tana ashshiya mino qato taassi gida.

English Sentences: For thou art my rock and my fortress; therefore for thy name's sake lead me, and guide me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ee, neeni taayyo wogga zaallanne qato; ne sunttaa gishshau, neeni tana kaalettanne bessa.

English Sentences: Pull me out of the net that they have laid privily for me: for thou art my strength.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni taayyo geemmiyoosaa gidiyo gishshau, eti tau qotti wottido piriyaappe tana neeni naaga.

English Sentences: Into thine hand I commit my spirit: thou hast redeemed me, O LORD God of truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, tumaa Xoossau, taani ta shemppuwaa ne kushiyan wottais; neeni tana wozana.

English Sentences: I have hated them that regard lying vanities: but I trust in the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pattenna eeqatussi goinniyaageeta neeni ixxaasa; shin taani GODAN ammanettais.

English Sentences: I will be glad and rejoice in thy mercy: for thou hast considered my trouble; thou hast known my soul in adversities;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta metuwaa neeni be7ido gishshaunne ta tuggaa neeni erido gishshau, taani aggenna ne siiquwan ufaittananne ufaissau poocu gaana.

English Sentences: And hast not shut me up into the hand of the enemy: thou hast set my feet in a large room.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana morkkiyaa kushiyan aattada immabaakka; ta tohotakka aaho sohuwan essadasa.

English Sentences: Have mercy upon me, O LORD, for I am in trouble: mine eye is consumed with grief, yea, my soul and my belly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani metuwan gelido gishshau, taayyo qaretta. Taani daro mishettido gishshau, ta aifeekka, ta ashoikka, ta shemppoikka daafuriis.

English Sentences: For my life is spent with grief, and my years with sighing: my strength faileth because of mine iniquity, and my bones are consumed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mishuwaa daruwan ta de7oi ciriis; ta laittatikka oolishin wuridosona. Metuwaa daruwan ta wolqqai hitiis; ta meqettatikka arggaacidosona.

English Sentences: I was a reproach among all mine enemies, but especially among my neighbours, and a fear to mine acquaintance: they that did see me without fled from me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketu ubbaa gaasuwan taani ta shoorotuyyo kariyoobaa, ta dabbotuyyookka yashissiyaabaa gidaas. Ogiyan tana be7idaageetikka taappe baqatoosona.

English Sentences: I am forgotten as a dead man out of mind: I am like a broken vessel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani haiqqidabaadan dogettaas; moorettin olidobaa mala gidaas.

English Sentences: For I have heard the slander of many: fear was on every side: while they took counsel together against me, they devised to take away my life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani darotu saasukettaa siyaas; dagamai ubbasaara de7ees. Eti ta bolli yaa7oosonanne tana woranau maqettoosona.

English Sentences: But I trusted in thee, O LORD: I said, Thou art my God.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAU, taani nenan ammanettada, "Neeni ta Xoossaa" yaagais.

English Sentences: My times are in thy hand: deliver me from the hand of mine enemies, and from them that persecute me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta de7oi ne kushiyaana. Tana yedettiya ta morkketu kushiyaappe tana neeni ashsha.

English Sentences: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant: save me for thy mercies' sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne ashkkaraa bollan ne som77uwaa poo7issa; aggenna ne siiquwan tana ashsha.

English Sentences: Let me not be ashamed, O LORD; for I have called upon thee: let the wicked be ashamed, and let them be silent in the grave.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani nena xeesiyo gishshau, tana yeellayoppa. SHin iitati yeellatona; eti duufuwan gelidi, sirphphi goona.

English Sentences: Let the lying lips be put to silence; which speak grievous things proudly and contemptuously against the righteous.
Wolaitta Sentences: Otoruwaaninne kariyan xillotu bolli xalidi haasayiyo gishshau, eta worddotiya doonaa co77u ootta.

English Sentences: Oh how great is thy goodness, which thou hast laid up for them that fear thee; which thou hast wrought for them that trust in thee before the sons of men!
Wolaitta Sentences: Neessi yayyiyaageetuyyo neeni minjjidonne neekko baqatiyaageetuyyo asaa sinttan neeni oottido ne kehatettai aiba daroo!

English Sentences: Thou shalt hide them in the secret of thy presence from the pride of man: thou shalt keep them secretly in a pavilion from the strife of tongues.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni eta ne sinttan geema sohuwan genttada, asaa maqquwaappe ashshaasa. Neeni eta ne dunkkaaniyan qosada, inxxarssaa boshaappekka ashshaasa.

English Sentences: Blessed be the LORD: for he hath shewed me his marvellous kindness in a strong city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani morkkee doddido katamaa giddon de7iyo wode, i tana maalaalissiya ba aggenna siiquwaa bessido gishshau, GODAI galatetto.

English Sentences: For I said in my haste, I am cut off from before thine eyes: nevertheless thou heardest the voice of my supplications when I cried unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani dagammada, "Taani ne sinttaappe kichchaas" yaagaas. SHin tana maaddana mala, nena xeesido wode, ta watiwatuwaa neeni siyadasa.

English Sentences: O love the LORD, all ye his saints: for the LORD preserveth the faithful, and plentifully rewardeth the proud doer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, Xoossaa asatoo, GODAA siiqite. GODAI ammanettiyaageeta naagees; shin otoranchchatussi eta waagaa wurssi qanxxees.

English Sentences: Be of good courage, and he shall strengthen your heart, all ye that hope in the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, GODAN ufaissaa oottiyaageetoo, minnitenne wozannaamite.

English Sentences: Blessed is he whose transgression is forgiven, whose sin is covered.
Wolaitta Sentences: A mooroi atto geetettidonne a nagarai kamettido urai anjjettidaagaa.

English Sentences: Blessed is the man unto whom the LORD imputeth not iniquity, and in whose spirit there is no guile.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI a iitatettaa qoodenna asinne a qofan baletoi bainna asi anjjettidaagaa.

English Sentences: When I kept silence, my bones waxed old through my roaring all the day long.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta nagaraa paaxennan de7aidda, taani gallassa kumettaa oolidoogee ta asatettai daafuriis.

English Sentences: For day and night thy hand was heavy upon me: my moisture is turned into the drought of summer. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gallassinne qammi ne kushee ta bolli deexxiis. Haattai bone awan melidi wuriyoogaadan, ta wolqqai wuriis.

English Sentences: I acknowledged my sin unto thee, and mine iniquity have I not hid. I said, I will confess my transgressions unto the LORD; and thou forgavest the iniquity of my sin. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta nagaraa neessi paaxaas; ta iitatettaakka neeppe genttabeikke; "Ta mooruwaa GODAASSI paaxana" gaas. Yaatin, neeni tana deexxida nagaraa atto yaagadasa.

English Sentences: For this shall every one that is godly pray unto thee in a time when thou mayest be found: surely in the floods of great waters they shall not come nigh unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Xoossaa asa gidiya ooninne, neeni beettishin, nena woosso. Gita haattai kixxiyo wode, tumuppe he uraa gakkenna.

English Sentences: Thou art my hiding place; thou shalt preserve me from trouble; thou shalt compass me about with songs of deliverance. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni taayyo qosettiyo soho; neeni tana metuwaappe naagana. Atotettaa yettaa yexxiyaageeta ta yuushuwan wottadasa.

English Sentences: I will instruct thee and teach thee in the way which thou shalt go: I will guide thee with mine eye.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI, "Taani nena erissananne neeni baanau bessiya ogiyaa nena tamaarissana; taani nena zorananne naagana.

English Sentences: Be ye not as the horse, or as the mule, which have no understanding: whose mouth must be held in with bit and bridle, lest they come near unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bixaalaaninne puluwan ohettennan azazettenna, wozani bainna baqulodan woi paradan intte hanoppite" yaagees.

English Sentences: Many sorrows shall be to the wicked: but he that trusteth in the LORD, mercy shall compass him about.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitatuyyo tuggai darana; shin GODAN ammanettiyaageeta aggenna siiqoi dooddana.

English Sentences: Be glad in the LORD, and rejoice, ye righteous: and shout for joy, all ye that are upright in heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, xillotoo, GODAN ufaittitenne "Hashshu!" giite; inttenoo, wozanaa suuretoo, ufaissau yexxite.

English Sentences: Rejoice in the LORD, O ye righteous: for praise is comely for the upright.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, xillotoo GODAASSI ufaissan yexxite; suure asati a galatanau bessees.

English Sentences: Praise the LORD with harp: sing unto him with the psaltery and an instrument of ten strings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maazinqqiyaa diixxiiddi, GODAA galatite; tammu baqettan waaxettida diittaakka ayyo diixxite.

English Sentences: Sing unto him a new song; play skilfully with a loud noise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ooratta yettaa yexxite; loitti diixxiiddi, qaalaa xoqqissidi yexxite.

English Sentences: For the word of the LORD is right; and all his works are done in truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalai suure; i oottiyo ooso ubbai ammanettiyaagaa.

English Sentences: He loveth righteousness and judgment: the earth is full of the goodness of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI xillotettaanne tumu pirddaa dosees; aggenna a siiqoi sa7aa kumiis.

English Sentences: By the word of the LORD were the heavens made; and all the host of them by the breath of his mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA qaalan saloti merettidosona. A doonaappe kiyiya shemppuwan etan de7iya awai, aginainne xoolintteti oosettidosona.

English Sentences: He gathereth the waters of the sea together as an heap: he layeth up the depth in storehouses.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gita abbaa haattaa i issidiran eelissiis; he ciimma haattaa issisan zeeriis.

English Sentences: Let all the earth fear the LORD: let all the inhabitants of the world stand in awe of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7a ubbai GODAAYYO yayyo; sa7an de7iya asai ubbai GODAA bonchcho.

English Sentences: For he spake, and it was done; he commanded, and it stood fast.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i haasayin haniis; i azazin, minnidi eqqiis.

English Sentences: The LORD bringeth the counsel of the heathen to nought: he maketh the devices of the people of none effect.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA erenna kawotettatu zoretaa GODAI laalees; eta halchchuwaakka halissees.

English Sentences: The counsel of the LORD standeth for ever, the thoughts of his heart to all generations.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA halchchoi merinaassi eqqidi de7ees; a wozanaa qofaikka yeleta ubbaa gakkanau de7ees.

English Sentences: Blessed is the nation whose God is the LORD; and the people whom he hath chosen for his own inheritance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai GODAA gidido kawotettai, i baassa oottidi doorido asai anjjettidaagaa.

English Sentences: The LORD looketh from heaven; he beholdeth all the sons of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI saluwaara duge xeellidi, asaa ubbaa be7ees.

English Sentences: From the place of his habitation he looketh upon all the inhabitants of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ba de7iyoosaappe sa7an de7iya ubbaa xeellees.

English Sentences: He fashioneth their hearts alike; he considereth all their works.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta ubbaa wozanaa medhdhees; eti oottiyoobaa ubbaa erees.

English Sentences: There is no king saved by the multitude of an host: a mighty man is not delivered by much strength.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi ba wottaaddaraa coratettan attenna; olanchchai ba wolqqaa minotettan kessi ekkenna.

English Sentences: An horse is a vain thing for safety: neither shall he deliver any by his great strength.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ola pari xoonissana giidi naagiyoobi mela; i ba wolqqaa minotettan ashshanau danddayenna.

English Sentences: Behold, the eye of the LORD is upon them that fear him, upon them that hope in his mercy;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA aifeti ayyo yayyiyaanne aggenna a siiquwan ufaissaa oottiya asatu bollaana.

English Sentences: To deliver their soul from death, and to keep them alive in famine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, eta haiquwaappe ashshanaassanne koshaa wodiyan paxa wottanaassa.

English Sentences: Our soul waiteth for the LORD: he is our help and our shield.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni GODAN ufaissaa oottoos; i nuna maaddiyaagaanne nu gonddalle.

English Sentences: For our heart shall rejoice in him, because we have trusted in his holy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni a geeshsha sunttan ammanettiyo gishshau, nu wozanai an ufaittees.

English Sentences: Let thy mercy, O LORD, be upon us, according as we hope in thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, nuuni nenan ufaissaa oottiyoogaadan, aggenna ne siiqoi nunaara gido.

English Sentences: I will bless the LORD at all times: his praise shall continually be in my mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAA ubba wode galatana; a galatai ai wodenne ta doonaappe paccenna.

English Sentences: My soul shall make her boast in the LORD: the humble shall hear thereof, and be glad.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAN ceeqettais; naaqettidaageeti hegaa siyidi ufaittona.

English Sentences: O magnify the LORD with me, and let us exalt his name together.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tanaara gididi, GODAA gitayite. Ane issippe a sunttaa xoqqu xoqqu oottoos.

English Sentences: I sought the LORD, and he heard me, and delivered me from all my fears.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAA koyaas; koyin i taayyo zaariis; taani yayyiyoobaa ubbaappe tana i ashshiis.

English Sentences: They looked unto him, and were lightened: and their faces were not ashamed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naaqettidaageeti akko xeellidi ufaittoosona; eta som77oi mulekka yeellatenna.

English Sentences: This poor man cried, and the LORD heard him, and saved him out of all his troubles.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha hiyyeesa bitanee waassiis; waassin GODAI a waasuwaa siyiis; a metuwaa ubbaappe a ashshiis.

English Sentences: The angel of the LORD encampeth round about them that fear him, and delivereth them.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA kiitanchchai GODAASSI yayyiya asata naagees; i eta yuushuwan gididi, eta ashshees.

English Sentences: O taste and see that the LORD is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI keha gidiyoogaa xeelli be7ite. Akko baqatiya asi anjjettidaagaa.

English Sentences: O fear the LORD, ye his saints: for there is no want to them that fear him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, a geeshsha asatoo, GODAAYYO yayyite; aissi giikko, ayyo yayyiya ubbatuyyo aibinne paccenna.

English Sentences: The young lions do lack, and suffer hunger: but they that seek the LORD shall not want any good thing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaammotikka miyoobai xayin namisettoosona; shin GODAA koyiyaageetau lo77obi aibinne paccenna.

English Sentences: Come, ye children, hearken unto me: I will teach you the fear of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta tamaaretoo, haa yiite; siyite; GODAA yashshaa taani inttena tamaarissana.

English Sentences: What man is he that desireth life, and loveth many days, that he may see good?
Wolaitta Sentences: Lo77o de7uwaa de7anaunne kehabaa be7ana mala, ba baree aduqqanau koyiya asi waanida asee?

English Sentences: Keep thy tongue from evil, and thy lips from speaking guile.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne inxxarssai iitabaa haasayennaadan, ne doonaikka wordduwaa odennaadan teqqa.

English Sentences: Depart from evil, and do good; seek peace, and pursue it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitaappe shaahetta; lo77obaa ootta; sarotettaa keehi koyada kaalla.

English Sentences: The eyes of the LORD are upon the righteous, and his ears are open unto their cry.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA aifee xillotukko xeellees; qassi i ubba wode eta waasuwaa ezggees.

English Sentences: The face of the LORD is against them that do evil, to cut off the remembrance of them from the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta hassayissiyaabaa biittaappe xaissana mala, GODAI iitaa oottiyaageeta ba hanqqo som77uwan xeellees.

English Sentences: The righteous cry, and the LORD heareth, and delivereth them out of all their troubles.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xilloti waassoosona; waassin GODAI eta waasuwaa siyees. I eta meto ubbaappe ashshees.

English Sentences: The LORD is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI wozanai me77idoogeetussi mataana; qassi bantta ayyaanan liiqidaageeta ashshees.

English Sentences: Many are the afflictions of the righteous: but the LORD delivereth him out of them all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xillo asa metoi daro; shin GODAI a he ubbaappe ashshees.

English Sentences: He keepeth all his bones: not one of them is broken.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI a mintti naagiyo gishshau, a meqettaappe issoinne meqqenna.

English Sentences: Evil shall slay the wicked: and they that hate the righteous shall be desolate.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitata iitatettai worana; xillota ixxiyaageeti pirddettana.

English Sentences: The LORD redeemeth the soul of his servants: and none of them that trust in him shall be desolate.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ba ashkkarata ashshees. Akko baqatida ooninne pirddettenna.

English Sentences: Plead my cause, O LORD, with them that strive with me: fight against them that fight against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, tanaara eqettiyaageetuura neeni eqetta; tanaara olettiyaageetuura neeni oletta.

English Sentences: Take hold of shield and buckler, and stand up for mine help.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gonddalliyaanne hara ola miishshaa oiqqada, tana maaddanau dendda.

English Sentences: Draw out also the spear, and stop the way against them that persecute me: say unto my soul, I am thy salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana yedettiyaageetu bollan ne tooraanne mashshaa dentta. Tana, "Aikkobaa; taani nena ashshiyaagaa" yaaga.

English Sentences: Let them be confounded and put to shame that seek after my soul: let them be turned back and brought to confusion that devise my hurt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta shemppiyo woranau koyiyaageeti yeellatonanne kauyyona; ta bolli iitabaa maqettiyaageeti kauyyidi guyye simmona.

English Sentences: Let them be as chaff before the wind: and let the angel of the LORD chase them.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA kiitanchchai eta yedettiyo wode, eti carkkuwaa sinttan de7iya suullaadan hanona.

English Sentences: Let their way be dark and slippery: and let the angel of the LORD persecute them.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA kiitanchchai eta dechchana haniyo wode, eta ogee xumanne hallitta gido.

English Sentences: For without cause have they hid for me their net in a pit, which without cause they have digged for my soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Coo tana oiqqanau bantta piriyaa wottidosona; qassikka coo tana oogganau ollaa bookkidosona.

English Sentences: Let destruction come upon him at unawares; and let his net that he hath hid catch himself: into that very destruction let him fall.
Wolaitta Sentences: Erennan de7ishin, eta bollan bashshai puttu go. Eti wottido piree eta oiqqo; eti bashshan kunddona.

English Sentences: And my soul shall be joyful in the LORD: it shall rejoice in his salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode taani GODAN ufaittana; i ashshido gishshau, taani ufaissaa poocu gaana.

English Sentences: All my bones shall say, LORD, who is like unto thee, which deliverest the poor from him that is too strong for him, yea, the poor and the needy from him that spoileth him?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta kumetta asatettai nena, "Abeet GODAU, ne mali oonee? Hiyyeesaa wolqqaamaa kushiyaappe wotta ekkaasa. Hiyyeesaanne metootanchchaa bonqqi miyaageetu kushiyaappe ashshaasa" yaagana.

English Sentences: False witnesses did rise up; they laid to my charge things that I knew not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wordduwaa markkattiyaageeti ta bolli denddoosona. Taani erennaban tana mootoosona.

English Sentences: They rewarded me evil for good to the spoiling of my soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani lo77o oottidoogaa kushiyaa iitaa zaaroosona; yaatin, taani azzanais.

English Sentences: But as for me, when they were sick, my clothing was sackcloth: I humbled my soul with fasting; and my prayer returned into mine own bosom.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani eti harggido wode, waaruwaa maayaas; ta asatettaa xooman daafurssaas.

English Sentences: I behaved myself as though he had been my friend or brother: I bowed down heavily, as one that mourneth for his mother.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta huuphiyaa ziqqi oottada, ta dabbossi woikko ta ishassi woossiyoogaadan woossaas. Issi asi ba aayeessi kayyottiyoogaadan ta huuphiyaa ziqqissada, yeekkaidda hemettaas.

English Sentences: But in mine adversity they rejoiced, and gathered themselves together: yea, the abjects gathered themselves together against me, and I knew it not; they did tear me, and ceased not:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti taani xubettidoogan ufaittidi, ta bolli shiiqidosona. Taani erenna asati tana wadhdhidi, aguwaa ixxidosona.

English Sentences: With hypocritical mockers in feasts, they gnashed upon me with their teeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti wobbiyaa asa baceessiyaabaadan tana baceessoosona; eti yiillotidi, bantta achchaa garccidosona.

English Sentences: Lord, how long wilt thou look on? rescue my soul from their destructions, my darling from the lions.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau, neeni aude gakkanaassi co77u gaada xeelluutee? Eta iita oosuwaappe tana ashsha; ha gaammotu mala asatuppe tana wotta ekka.

English Sentences: I will give thee thanks in the great congregation: I will praise thee among much people.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode kunttida yaa7an taani neeyyo galataa immana; cora asaa shiiquwan taani nena galatana.

English Sentences: Let not them that are mine enemies wrongfully rejoice over me: neither let them wink with the eye that hate me without a cause.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wordduwan tana morkkiyaageeti ufaittoppona; tana coo ixxiyaageeti ta bolli qim77otoppona.

English Sentences: For they speak not peace: but they devise deceitful matters against them that are quiet in the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti sarobaa haasayiyoogaa aggidi, biittan co77u giidi de7iya asatu bollan wordduwaa medhdhidi haasayoosona.

English Sentences: Yea, they opened their mouth wide against me, and said, Aha, aha, our eye hath seen it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta inxxarssaa ta bolli qarayidi, "Ee, ee, neeni oottidoogaa nuuni nu aifiyan be7ida" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: This thou hast seen, O LORD: keep not silence: O Lord, be not far from me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni hagaa be7adasa; co77u gooppa. Abeet Godau, neeni taappe haakkoppa.

English Sentences: Stir up thyself, and awake to my judgment, even unto my cause, my God and my Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet ta Xoossau, ta Godau, ta gishshaa dendda; ta doona gidada mootetta.

English Sentences: Judge me, O LORD my God, according to thy righteousness; and let them not rejoice over me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ta Xoossau, ne xillotettan tana shatintta; ta morkketa ufaissoppa.

English Sentences: Let them not say in their hearts, Ah, so would we have it: let them not say, We have swallowed him up.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti banttau, "Hashshu, hashshu, nuuni nu wozanan amottidoogaa gattida. Nuuni a mittida" gaanaadan oottoppa.

English Sentences: Let them be ashamed and brought to confusion together that rejoice at mine hurt: let them be clothed with shame and dishonour that magnify themselves against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta waayiyan ufaittiyaageeti mule yeellatonanne kauyyona. Ta bollan otorettiyaageeti yeellaanne kaushshaa maayona.

English Sentences: Let them shout for joy, and be glad, that favour my righteous cause: yea, let them say continually, Let the LORD be magnified, which hath pleasure in the prosperity of his servant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani shatimmiyoogaa dosiyaageeti ufaittidi, "Hashshu!" goosona. Eti ubbatoo, "Ba ashkkaraa sarotettan ufaittiya GODAI gitato" yaagona.

English Sentences: And my tongue shall speak of thy righteousness and of thy praise all the day long.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gallassa kumettan ta inxxarssai ne xillotettaabaanne ne galataabaa yootana.

English Sentences: The transgression of the wicked saith within my heart, that there is no fear of God before his eyes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita asi ba wozanan de7iya iitatettaa cenggurssaa ezggees. Xoossaassi yayyiyoobi a qofan baawa.

English Sentences: For he flattereth himself in his own eyes, until his iniquity be found to be hateful.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i bana keehippe nashshees; hegaassi i ba nagaraa demmanaunne ixxanau danddayenna.

English Sentences: The words of his mouth are iniquity and deceit: he hath left off to be wise, and to do good.
Wolaitta Sentences: A doonaappe kiyiya haasayai genenne worddo. Aadhdhida eraabaanne lo77obaa oottiyoogaa i aggiis.

English Sentences: He deviseth mischief upon his bed; he setteth himself in a way that is not good; he abhorreth not evil.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba hiixan de7iiddikka genebaa oottanau halchchees. I lo77o gidenna ogiyan eqqiis; i iitabaa ixxenna.

English Sentences: Thy mercy, O LORD, is in the heavens; and thy faithfulness reacheth unto the clouds.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, aggenna ne siiqoi salota gakkees; ne tumatettaikka bolla shaaraadan xoqqees.

English Sentences: Thy righteousness is like the great mountains; thy judgments are a great deep: O LORD, thou preservest man and beast.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne xillotettai ubbaappe xoqqa deretu mala; ne pirddaikka ubbaappe ziqqa ciimmaa mala. Abeet GODAU, neeni asaakka do7aakka naagaasa.

English Sentences: How excellent is thy lovingkindness, O God! therefore the children of men put their trust under the shadow of thy wings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, aggenna ne siiqoi aiba al77obee! Asai ne qefiyaa giddo baqati attees.

English Sentences: They shall be abundantly satisfied with the fatness of thy house; and thou shalt make them drink of the river of thy pleasures.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ne so gidaappe miidi kalloosona; ne kehatettaa shaafaappe neeni eta ushshaasa.

English Sentences: For with thee is the fountain of life: in thy light shall we see light.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, de7uwaa pulttoi ne achchan de7ees; ne poo7uwan nuuni poo7uwaa be7oos.

English Sentences: O continue thy lovingkindness unto them that know thee; and thy righteousness to the upright in heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nena eriyaageeta neeni siiqiyo siiquwaanne suuretussi kehiyo kehaa aggoppa.

English Sentences: Let not the foot of pride come against me, and let not the hand of the wicked remove me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Otoranchchaa tohoi tana yedhdhoppo; nagaranchchatu kushee tana yedettoppo.

English Sentences: There are the workers of iniquity fallen: they are cast down, and shall not be able to rise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita asati kunddidaageeta be7ite; eti kunddidosona; denddanaukka danddayokkona.

English Sentences: Fret not thyself because of evildoers, neither be thou envious against the workers of iniquity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitaa oottiyaageetu gishshau yiillotoppa. Nagaraa oottiyaageeta anaacoppa.

English Sentences: For they shall soon be cut down like the grass, and wither as the green herb.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti maataadan eesuwan melana; shullida bonccuwaadan eti haiqqana.

English Sentences: Trust in the LORD, and do good; so shalt thou dwell in the land, and verily thou shalt be fed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni GODAN ammanetta; lo77obaa ootta. Yaatada biittan saro de7a.

English Sentences: Delight thyself also in the LORD: and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAN ufaitta; i neeyyo ne wozanaa amuwaa immana.

English Sentences: Commit thy way unto the LORD; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne ogiyaa hadaraa GODAAYYO imma. An ammanetta; i neessi oottana.

English Sentences: And he shall bring forth thy righteousness as the light, and thy judgment as the noonday.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ne shatinttaa maallado xalqqiyaadan, qassi ne yohuwaa pirddaa gallassa seetaa awaadan poo7issana.

English Sentences: Rest in the LORD, and wait patiently for him: fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way, because of the man who bringeth wicked devices to pass.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA sinttan co77u gaada, i oottanaashin, danddayan naaga. Eta iita halchchoi polettin, duretida asatu bolli yiillotoppa.

English Sentences: Cease from anger, and forsake wrath: fret not thyself in any wise to do evil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hanqquwaa agga; yiilluwaappe teqetta. Yiillotoppa; aissi giikko, hegee metuwan yeggees.

English Sentences: For evildoers shall be cut off: but those that wait upon the LORD, they shall inherit the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitaa oottiyaageeti xoqollettidi xayana; shin GODAN ufaissaa oottiyaageeti biittaa laattana.

English Sentences: For yet a little while, and the wicked shall not be: yea, thou shalt diligently consider his place, and it shall not be.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitaa oottiyaageeti guutta wodiyaappe guyyiyan de7okkona; neeni eta koyiyaakkokka eti beettokkona.

English Sentences: But the meek shall inherit the earth; and shall delight themselves in the abundance of peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ashkketi biittaa laattana; eti sarotettaaninne duretettaan ufaittidi daana.

English Sentences: The wicked plotteth against the just, and gnasheth upon him with his teeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita asi xillo asa bolli maqetteesinne ba achchaa garccees.

English Sentences: The LORD shall laugh at him: for he seeth that his day is coming.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Godai iitatu bollan miiccees; aissi giikko, eta gallassai yiyoogaa i erees.

English Sentences: The wicked have drawn out the sword, and have bent their bow, to cast down the poor and needy, and to slay such as be of upright conversation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita asati hiyyeesatanne metootanchchata ongganaunne suuretettan hemettiyaageeta woranau, bantta bisuwaa shoddidosonanne bantta wonddafiyaa dafidosona.

English Sentences: Their sword shall enter into their own heart, and their bows shall be broken.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eta bisoi eta wozana aifiyan gelana; eta wonddafeekka meqqana.

English Sentences: A little that a righteous man hath is better than the riches of many wicked.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xilluwaassi de7iya guuttabai cora iita asatussi de7iya darobaappe lo77o.

English Sentences: For the arms of the wicked shall be broken: but the LORD upholdeth the righteous.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, iitatu wolqqai meqqana; shin xillota GODAI zemppissees.

English Sentences: The LORD knoweth the days of the upright: and their inheritance shall be for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Suure asatu ogiyaa GODAI erees; eta laataikka merinau etabaa gidana.

English Sentences: They shall not be ashamed in the evil time: and in the days of famine they shall be satisfied.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita wodiyan suure asati yeellatokkona; koshaa wodiyan eti kallana.

English Sentences: But the wicked shall perish, and the enemies of the LORD shall be as the fat of lambs: they shall consume; into smoke shall they consume away.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin iita asati haiqqana. GODAA morkketi gam77enna dembbaa ciishshaa mala; eti cuwaadan xayana.

English Sentences: The wicked borroweth, and payeth not again: but the righteous sheweth mercy, and giveth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita asi tal77i ekkidi qanxxenna; shin xillo asi qarettidi immees.

English Sentences: For such as be blessed of him shall inherit the earth; and they that be cursed of him shall be cut off.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAN anjjettidaageeti biittaa laattana; shin qanggettidaageeti xoqolletti xayana.

English Sentences: The steps of a good man are ordered by the LORD: and he delighteth in his way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai baanau bessiya ogiyaa GODAI kaalettees. I bana ufaissiya asata minttees.

English Sentences: Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the LORD upholdeth him with his hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti xubettikkokka kunddokkona; aissi giikko, GODAI eta kushiyaa oiqqidi kaafees.

English Sentences: I have been young, and now am old; yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his seed begging bread.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani kase yelaga; ha77i simmi cimaas; shin xillo asi coo attin, woikko a naati miyoobaa woossin, taani mulekka be7a erikke.

English Sentences: He is ever merciful, and lendeth; and his seed is blessed.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ubba wodekka keha; coo tal77ees. A zaretikka anjjo gidana.

English Sentences: Depart from evil, and do good; and dwell for evermore.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitaappe haakka; lo77obaa ootta. Yaatikko, ne zerettai biittan merinau de7ana.

English Sentences: For the LORD loveth judgment, and forsaketh not his saints; they are preserved for ever: but the seed of the wicked shall be cut off.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAI xillobaa dosees. Xoossaa asata i yeggenna; xilloti merinau naagettoosona. SHin iitatu zerettai xoqollettana.

English Sentences: The righteous shall inherit the land, and dwell therein for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xilloti biittaa laattananne yan merinau de7ana.

English Sentences: The mouth of the righteous speaketh wisdom, and his tongue talketh of judgment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xilluwaa doonai aadhdhida eraa yootees; a inxxarssaikka xillobaa haasayees.

English Sentences: The law of his God is in his heart; none of his steps shall slide.
Wolaitta Sentences: A Xoossaa higgee a wozanan de7ees; a tohoikka appe harchchenna.

English Sentences: The wicked watcheth the righteous, and seeketh to slay him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita asi xillo asa wochcheesinne woranau koyees.

English Sentences: The LORD will not leave him in his hand, nor condemn him when he is judged.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAI xillo asa a kushiyan yeggenna; pirddau eqqiyo wodekka a bolli pirddissenna.

English Sentences: Wait on the LORD, and keep his way, and he shall exalt thee to inherit the land: when the wicked are cut off, thou shalt see it.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAN ufaissaa wottada, a ogiyaa naaga. Neeni biittaa laattana mala, i nena gitayana. Iita asati xoqollettidi xayishin, neeni be7ana.

English Sentences: I have seen the wicked in great power, and spreading himself like a green bay tree.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani issi wode issi daganttiya iita bitaniyaa, woladan daayidaagaa be7aas.

English Sentences: Yet he passed away, and, lo, he was not: yea, I sought him, but he could not be found.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani he sohuwaara simmada kanttiyo wode i xayiis; koyinkka i beettibeenna.

English Sentences: Mark the perfect man, and behold the upright: for the end of that man is peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ane lo77o asa akeeka; suure asa be7a; aissi giikko, saro asaassi sintta yeletai de7ana.

English Sentences: But the transgressors shall be destroyed together: the end of the wicked shall be cut off.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin mooranchchati mule xayana; iitatu yeletaikka xoqolletti xayana.

English Sentences: But the salvation of the righteous is of the LORD: he is their strength in the time of trouble.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xillotu atotettai GODAAPPE yees; metuwaa wode i etayyo naagetti attiyo soho.

English Sentences: And the LORD shall help them, and deliver them: he shall deliver them from the wicked, and save them, because they trust in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI xillota maaddeesinne ashshees. Eti akko baqatido gishshau, i eta iitatuppe wotti ekkeesinne ashshees.

English Sentences: O LORD, rebuke me not in thy wrath: neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne hanqquwan tana godatoppa; ne yiilluwan tana qaxxayoppa.

English Sentences: For thine arrows stick fast in me, and thy hand presseth me sore.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne wonddafiyaa zubbeti tana caddirggidosona; ne kusheekka tana naaqqi oiqqiis.

English Sentences: There is no soundness in my flesh because of thine anger; neither is there any rest in my bones because of my sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni lanccido gishshau, ta bollai payyenna; ta nagaraa gishshau, ta asatettai sarenna.

English Sentences: For mine iniquities are gone over mine head: as an heavy burden they are too heavy for me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta iitatettai di7uwaadan tana muukkiis; denddenna gita toohuwaadan taayyo deexxees.

English Sentences: My wounds stink and are corrupt because of my foolishness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nagaraa oottido eeyyatettaa gishshau, ta mazunttai giishshaa oittidi xinqqiis.

English Sentences: I am troubled; I am bowed down greatly; I go mourning all the day long.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta harggiyaa gaasuwan taani hokkaasinne quunnaas. Gallassa kumettaa yeekkaidda pe7aas.

English Sentences: For my loins are filled with a loathsome disease: and there is no soundness in my flesh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana mishoi xuuggees; ta bollai payyenna.

English Sentences: I am feeble and sore broken: I have roared by reason of the disquietness of my heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hitaasinne nippi gaas; taani tuggatada oolais.

English Sentences: Lord, all my desire is before thee; and my groaning is not hid from thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau, ta amo ubbai neeyyo erettees; taani ooliyoogee neeppe geemmibeenna.

English Sentences: My heart panteth, my strength faileth me: as for the light of mine eyes, it also is gone from me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta wozana aifiyan diddiqees; ta wolqqai hitiis; ta aifiyaappe payyatettai kichchiis.

English Sentences: My lovers and my friends stand aloof from my sore; and my kinsmen stand afar off.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta mazunttaa gishshau, ta shoorotikka ta laggetikka haahuwan eqqidosona. Ta dabbotikka taappe haakkidosona.

English Sentences: They also that seek after my life lay snares for me: and they that seek my hurt speak mischievous things, and imagine deceits all the day long.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana woranau koyiyaageeti bantta piriyaa taayyo yeggoosona. Tana qohanau koyiyaageeti, "Nangga; nuuni nena demmana" yaagidi, manddoosonanne gallassa kumettaa ta bolli yaa7oosona.

English Sentences: But I, as a deaf man, heard not; and I was as a dumb man that openeth not his mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode taani tulle asa mala, siyikke; taani duude asa mala, doonanne pogikke.

English Sentences: Thus I was as a man that heareth not, and in whose mouth are no reproofs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ee, taani siyennanne doonai zaarenna asa mala.

English Sentences: For in thee, O LORD, do I hope: thou wilt hear, O Lord my God.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin abeet GODAU, taani nenan ufaissaa oottais. Abeet Godau, ta Xoossau, neeni taayyo zaaruwaa immana.

English Sentences: For I said, Hear me, lest otherwise they should rejoice over me: when my foot slippeth, they magnify themselves against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAA, "Ta gedee xubettin, eti, Ayyo hashshu gaanaadaaninne ta bolli ceeqettanaadan oottoppa" yaagais.

English Sentences: For I am ready to halt, and my sorrow is continually before me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani kunddana hanais; ta sahoinne tana yeddennan ixxiis.

English Sentences: For I will declare mine iniquity; I will be sorry for my sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta iita oosuwaa paaxais; taani ta nagaraa gaasuwan azzanais.

English Sentences: But mine enemies are lively, and they are strong: and they that hate me wrongfully are multiplied.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketi goobanne wolqqaama; tana coo ixxiyaageeti cora.

English Sentences: They also that render evil for good are mine adversaries; because I follow the thing that good is.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani lo77obaa oottin, taayyo iitaa zaariya asati, taani lo77obaa kaalliyo gishshau, tana ixxoosona.

English Sentences: Forsake me not, O LORD: O my God, be not far from me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, tana yeggoppa. Abeet ta Xoossau, taappe neeni haakkoppa.

English Sentences: Make haste to help me, O Lord my salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau, tana ashshiyaagoo, tana maaddanau ellella.

English Sentences: I said, I will take heed to my ways, that I sin not with my tongue: I will keep my mouth with a bridle, while the wicked is before me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani, "Ta inxxarssan nagara oottennaadan, ta ogiyaa naagana. Iita asati ta sinttan de7iyo wode, ta doonaa barana" yaagaas.

English Sentences: I was dumb with silence, I held my peace, even from good; and my sorrow was stirred.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani duudaadan co77u gaas; taani harai atto lo77obaa haasayiyoogaara agginkka, ta waayee yaa dariis.

English Sentences: My heart was hot within me, while I was musing the fire burned: then spake I with my tongue,
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hirggaas; taani qofan sheekkidaashin, ta qofai poddu giidi, eexxi kiyiis. Yaatin, ta inxxarssan hagaadan yaagaas;

English Sentences: LORD, make me to know mine end, and the measure of my days, what it is: that I may know how frail I am.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Abeet GODAU, ta de7uwaa wurssettaanne taayyo de7anau attida gallassaa tana bessa. Qassi ta de7oi ciranau ai keenaa eesotiyaakko, tana erissa.

English Sentences: Behold, thou hast made my days as an handbreadth; and mine age is as nothing before thee: verily every man at his best state is altogether vanity. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta laittaa qii takkaaro keesa kessadasa. Ta baree ne sinttan bainnabaa mala; tumaappe asi ubbi issiton shemppiyo carkko mala.

English Sentences: Surely every man walketh in a vain shew: surely they are disquieted in vain: he heapeth up riches, and knoweth not who shall gather them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tumaappe asai eeshuwaadan hemettees; tumaappe coo mela simerettees. I aquwaa shiishshees; shin ekkana asa erenna.

English Sentences: And now, Lord, what wait I for? my hope is in thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Abeet Godau, ha77i simmi, taani naagiyoobai aibee? Taani ufaissaa oottiyoi nenaana.

English Sentences: Deliver me from all my transgressions: make me not the reproach of the foolish.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta mooro ubbaappe tana ashsha; eeyyatan tana toochissoppa.

English Sentences: I was dumb, I opened not my mouth; because thou didst it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaa ubbaa oottidaagee nena gidiyo gishshau, taani duudaas; doonanne pogabeikke.

English Sentences: Remove thy stroke away from me: I am consumed by the blow of thine hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne boshaa ta bollaappe dentta. Ne kushiyaa minotettaa gaasuwan taani hitais.

English Sentences: When thou with rebukes dost correct man for iniquity, thou makest his beauty to consume away like a moth: surely every man is vanity. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni asa a nagaraa gishshau, seeraasanne qaxxayaasa; a al77obaakka bil77aadan wurssaasa. Tumaappe asi ubbi issiton shemppiyo carkko mala.

English Sentences: Hear my prayer, O LORD, and give ear unto my cry; hold not thy peace at my tears: for I am a stranger with thee, and a sojourner, as all my fathers were.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Abeet GODAU, ta woosaa siya; tana maaddanau ta waasuwaa ezgga. Ta afuttaa co77u gooppa; aissi giikko, taani ta aawatu ubbaadan betenne imatta gidada, nenaara de7ais.

English Sentences: O spare me, that I may recover strength, before I go hence, and be no more.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani shaahettanaappenne xayanaappe kasetada ufaittana mala, hai tana agga" yaagaas.

English Sentences: I waited patiently for the LORD; and he inclined unto me, and heard my cry.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAA danddayan naagaas; i taakko simmidi, ta waasuwaa siyiis.

English Sentences: He brought me up also out of an horrible pit, out of the miry clay, and set my feet upon a rock, and established my goings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bashsha ollaappe, liqimissiyaa urqqaappe tana kessiis. Ta gediyaa shuchchaa bollan essiis; qassi ta ogiyaakka saro oottiis.

English Sentences: And he hath put a new song in my mouth, even praise unto our God: many shall see it, and fear, and shall trust in the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ta doonan ooratta yettaa wottiis; he yettainne, "Nu Xoossai galatetto" yaagiyaagaa. Daroti be7idi, yayyananne GODAN ammanettana.

English Sentences: Blessed is that man that maketh the LORD his trust, and respecteth not the proud, nor such as turn aside to lies.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA bau ammanettiyoobaa oottida asi, otoranchchatukkonne worddo xoossatussi goinniyaageetukko simmenna asi anjjettidaagaa.

English Sentences: Many, O LORD my God, are thy wonderful works which thou hast done, and thy thoughts which are to us-ward: they cannot be reckoned up in order unto thee: if I would declare and speak of them, they are more than can be numbered.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ta Xoossau, neeni daro maalaalissiyaabaa oottadasa; nenaara likkettiyai ooninne baawa! Neeni nuuyyo qoppido lo77o qofaa ooninne qoodanau danddayenna. Hegee taani yootin, wuriyaabaa gidenna.

English Sentences: Sacrifice and offering thou didst not desire; mine ears hast thou opened: burnt offering and sin offering hast thou not required.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni yarshshonne imo koyabaakka; shin siyana mala, taayyo haittaa dooyadasa. Xuuggiyo yarshshuwaanne nagaraa yarshshuwaa neeni koyabaakka.

English Sentences: Then said I, Lo, I come: in the volume of the book it is written of me,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan taani, "Xaatta maxaafan tabai xaafettidoogaadan, taani yaas.

English Sentences: I delight to do thy will, O my God: yea, thy law is within my heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet ta Xoossau, taani neeni koyiyoogaa oottanau dosais; ne higgee ta wozanaa giddon de7ees" yaagaas.

English Sentences: I have preached righteousness in the great congregation: lo, I have not refrained my lips, O LORD, thou knowest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kunttida yaa7an taani, "GODAI nuna ashshees" yaagada, mishiraachchuwaa yootaas. Abeet GODAU, neeni eriyoogaadankka, taani ta doonan yootiyoogaa aggikke.

English Sentences: I have not hid thy righteousness within my heart; I have declared thy faithfulness and thy salvation: I have not concealed thy lovingkindness and thy truth from the great congregation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne xillotettaa ta wozanaa giddon qosabeikke; neeni ammanettiyoogaanne ashshiyoogaa yootaas. Qassi aggenna ne siiquwaanne ne tumatettaa ne kunttida yaa7aappe genttabeikke.

English Sentences: Withhold not thou thy tender mercies from me, O LORD: let thy lovingkindness and thy truth continually preserve me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne maarotettaa taappe haassoppa. Aggenna ne siiqoinne ne tumatettai tana ubba wode naago.

English Sentences: For innumerable evils have compassed me about: mine iniquities have taken hold upon me, so that I am not able to look up; they are more than the hairs of mine head: therefore my heart faileth me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, qoodi bainna iitabai tana dooddiis. Ta iitatettai tana gakkidi gooziis; taani xeellanau danddayikke. Ta iita oosoi ta huuphiyaa binnaanaappe dariis; ta wozanai ta giddon seeriis.

English Sentences: Be pleased, O LORD, to deliver me: O LORD, make haste to help me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, tana ashshanau eeno ga; abeet GODAU, tana maaddanau eesota.

English Sentences: Let them be ashamed and confounded together that seek after my soul to destroy it; let them be driven backward and put to shame that wish me evil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana woranau koyiyaageeti mulekka yeellatonanne kauyyona. Taani qohettanaagaa amottiyaageeti kauyyidi guyye simmona.

English Sentences: Let them be desolate for a reward of their shame that say unto me, Aha, aha.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta bolli, "Au hashshu! Hashshu!" giidaageeti xoonettido gishshau, yeellatona.

English Sentences: Let all those that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee: let such as love thy salvation say continually, The LORD be magnified.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin nena koyiya ubbati nenan ufaittonanne hashshu goona. Qassi ne atotettaa dosiyaageeti ubbati, "GODAI gitato!" yaagona.

English Sentences: But I am poor and needy; yet the Lord thinketh upon me: thou art my help and my deliverer; make no tarrying, O my God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hiyyeesanne metootanchcha; tabaa Godai qoppo. Tana maaddiyainne ashshiyai nena; abeet ta Xoossau, gam77oppa.

English Sentences: Blessed is he that considereth the poor: the LORD will deliver him in time of trouble.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hiyyeesaayyo qoppiya asi anjjettidaagaa; metuwaa gallassi GODAI a ashshees.

English Sentences: The LORD will preserve him, and keep him alive; and he shall be blessed upon the earth: and thou wilt not deliver him unto the will of his enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI a naagidi, paxa wottees. Inne biittaa bollan anjjettidaagaa gidees; GODAI a a morkketu amuwaayyo aattidi immenna.

English Sentences: The LORD will strengthen him upon the bed of languishing: thou wilt make all his bed in his sickness.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI a harggiyaa hiittan de7ishinkka maaddees; i sahettinkka, a pattees.

English Sentences: I said, LORD, be merciful unto me: heal my soul; for I have sinned against thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana gidikko, taani, "Abeet GODAU, taani nena naaqqido gishshau, tana maara; harggiyaappenne tana patta" yaagaas.

English Sentences: Mine enemies speak evil of me, When shall he die, and his name perish?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketi iitaban tana haasayiiddi, "I aude haiqqanddeeshsha? Qassi a sunttaikka aude xayanddeeshsha?" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: And if he come to see me, he speaketh vanity: his heart gathereth iniquity to itself; when he goeth abroad, he telleth it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana be7anau yiya ooninne taayyo worddobaa yootees; ba wozanan tana zigiriyoobaa qorees. Hegaappe guyyiyan, kare kiyidi, yan han oduwaa laalees.

English Sentences: All that hate me whisper together against me: against me do they devise my hurt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana ixxiya ubbati issippe ta bollan saasukkoosona; "Iitabai a bolli gakkees" giidi qoppoosona.

English Sentences: An evil disease, say they, cleaveth fast unto him: and now that he lieth he shall rise up no more.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qoppidi, "A iita harggee oiqqiis; i he zin77idosaappe mulekka denddenna" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: Yea, mine own familiar friend, in whom I trusted, which did eat of my bread, hath lifted up his heel against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Harai attin, taani ammanettiyo ta siiqo laggee, taani barssidoogee ta kushiyaa saxxiis.

English Sentences: But thou, O LORD, be merciful unto me, and raise me up, that I may requite them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin abeet GODAU, neeni tana maara; taani eta kushiyaa kessanaadan, tana harggiyaa hiittaappe dentta.

English Sentences: By this I know that thou favourest me, because mine enemy doth not triumph over me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tanan ufaittidoogaa taani erais; aissi giikko, ta morkkee tana xoonibeennanne ta bolli gairibeenna.

English Sentences: And as for me, thou upholdest me in mine integrity, and settest me before thy face for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana ta suuretettaa gishshau kaafadasa; ne sinttan tana merinau wottadasa.

English Sentences: Blessed be the LORD God of Israel from everlasting, and to everlasting. Amen, and Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai, merinaappe merinaa gakkanau galatetto. Amin77i. Amin77i.

English Sentences: As the hart panteth after the water brooks, so panteth my soul after thee, O God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaarai goggiya haattaa laamotiyoogaadan, abeet Xoossau, hegaadan taanikka nena laamotais.

English Sentences: My soul thirsteth for God, for the living God: when shall I come and appear before God?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani baada, Xoossaa sinttaa be7anai audeeshsha?" gaada, Xoossaa, de7o Xoossaa saamettais.

English Sentences: My tears have been my meat day and night, while they continually say unto me, Where is thy God?
Wolaitta Sentences: Asati ubbatoo, "Ne Xoossai awan de7ii?" yaagiyo wode, taayyo gallassinne qammi ta afuttai quma gidiis.

English Sentences: When I remember these things, I pour out my soul in me: for I had gone with the multitude, I went with them to the house of God, with the voice of joy and praise, with a multitude that kept holyday.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta baalaa bonchchanau shiiqida daro asaa giddoora salppiyan hombbocishiininne galata yettaa yexxishin, Xoossaa keetti kaalettidoogaa qoppiyo wode, ta wozanai azzanidi, giddon seerees.

English Sentences: Why art thou cast down, O my soul? and why art thou disquieted in me? hope thou in God: for I shall yet praise him for the help of his countenance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tanooshsho, taani aissi azzaniyaanaa? Qassi aissi jabbukettiyaanaa? Taani Xoossan ufaissaa wottana. Aissi giikko, taani ha77ikka tana ashshiyaagaanne ta Xoossaa galatana.

English Sentences: O my God, my soul is cast down within me: therefore will I remember thee from the land of Jordan, and of the Hermonites, from the hill Mizar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta wozanai azzaniis; hegaa gishshau, taani Yorddaanoosa biittan, Hermmoone xoqqan, Miizaare Deriyan eqqada nena hassayais.

English Sentences: Deep calleth unto deep at the noise of thy waterspouts: all thy waves and thy billows are gone over me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne soossuwaa gunttan ciimmai ciimmau alaahees; qassi ne beetainne ne hobbee ubbai ta bollaara goggiis.

English Sentences: Yet the LORD will command his lovingkindness in the day time, and in the night his song shall be with me, and my prayer unto the God of my life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gallassi GODAI aggenna ba siiquwaa taayyo kiittees. Qammikka a yettai tanaara de7ees; he yettaikka taani taayyo de7uwaa immiya Xoossaa woossiyo woosaa.

English Sentences: I will say unto God my rock, Why hast thou forgotten me? why go I mourning because of the oppression of the enemy?
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa, ta wogga zaallaa taani, "Aissi tana dogadii? Taani aissi ta morkkiyan naaqettada azzanaidda hemettoo?" yaagais.

English Sentences: As with a sword in my bones, mine enemies reproach me; while they say daily unto me, Where is thy God?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketi tana, "Ne Xoossai awan de7ii?" yaagi yaagidi, ta meqettaa menttidi cayoosona.

English Sentences: Why art thou cast down, O my soul? and why art thou disquieted within me? hope thou in God: for I shall yet praise him, who is the health of my countenance, and my God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tanooshsho, taani aissi azzaniyaanaa? Qassi aissi jabbukettiyaanaa? Taani Xoossan ufaissaa wottana. Aissi giikko, taani ha77ikka tana ashshiyaagaanne ta Xoossaa galatana.

English Sentences: Judge me, O God, and plead my cause against an ungodly nation: O deliver me from the deceitful and unjust man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, tana shatintta. Xoossaa erenna deretuura ta mootuwaa neeni mootetta. Cimmiya iita asatuppe tana neeni ashsha.

English Sentences: For thou art the God of my strength: why dost thou cast me off? why go I mourning because of the oppression of the enemy?
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai, taani naagetta attiyo miixai nena. Neeni tana aibissi aggai? Taani aissi ta morkkiyan naaqettada azzanaidda hemettoo?

English Sentences: O send out thy light and thy truth: let them lead me; let them bring me unto thy holy hill, and to thy tabernacles.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne poo7uwaanne ne tumaa taayyo kiitta; eti tana kaalettona. Ne geeshsha deriyaa neeni de7iyoosaa efoona.

English Sentences: Then will I go unto the altar of God, unto God my exceeding joy: yea, upon the harp will I praise thee, O God my God.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode taani ta Xoossaa yarshshuwaasaa, tana ufaissiya Xoossaakko baana. Abeet Xoossau, ta Xoossau, taani diittaa diixxaidda, nena sabbana.

English Sentences: Why art thou cast down, O my soul? and why art thou disquieted within me? hope in God: for I shall yet praise him, who is the health of my countenance, and my God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tanooshsho, taani aissi azzaniyaanaa? Qassi aissi jabbukettiyaanaa? Taani Xoossan ufaissaa wottana. Aissi giikko, taani ha77ikka tana ashshiyaagaanne ta Xoossaa galatana.

English Sentences: We have heard with our ears, O God, our fathers have told us, what work thou didst in their days, in the times of old.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, aadhdhida wodiyan, beni nu aawatu wodiyan, neeni oottidobaa nuuni nu haittan siyida; nu aawatikka nuuyyo yootidosona.

English Sentences: How thou didst drive out the heathen with thy hand, and plantedst them; how thou didst afflict the people, and cast them out.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotettata neeni ne kushiyan laaggada kessadasa; nu aawata eta biittan tokkadasa; hara kawotettaa qaxxayadasa; shin ne dereta dureyadasa.

English Sentences: For they got not the land in possession by their own sword, neither did their own arm save them: but thy right hand, and thine arm, and the light of thy countenance, because thou hadst a favour unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta bisuwan mashshan olidi, he biittaa kessibookkona; eti bantta kushiyaa minotettan xoonibookkona. SHin neeni eta siiqido gishshau, eti ne ushachcha kushiyaa, ne qesiyaanne ne sinttaa poo7uwaa wolqqan xoonidosona.

English Sentences: Thou art my King, O God: command deliverances for Jacob.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqooba asau xoonota azaziya ta kawoinne ta Xoossai nena.

English Sentences: Through thee will we push down our enemies: through thy name will we tread them under that rise up against us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenan gididi, nu morkketa nuuni sugi olana; ne sunttan nu ixota nuuni yedhdhana.

English Sentences: For I will not trust in my bow, neither shall my sword save me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta tooran ammanettikke; ta bisoikka tana ashshenna.

English Sentences: But thou hast saved us from our enemies, and hast put them to shame that hated us.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin neeni nuna nu morkketuppe ashshadasa; qassi nuna ixxiyaageeta neeni kaushshadasa.

English Sentences: In God we boast all the day long, and praise thy name for ever. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni ubba wode Xoossan ceeqettoos; ne sunttaassi merinau galataa immana.

English Sentences: But thou hast cast off, and put us to shame; and goest not forth with our armies.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ha77i neeni nuna aggadasa; kaushshadasa; nu tooraasaara issippe olaa baakka.

English Sentences: Thou makest us to turn back from the enemy: and they which hate us spoil for themselves.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu morkketu sinttaappe nuna baqatissadasa; nu morkketi nubaa bonqqidosona.

English Sentences: Thou hast given us like sheep appointed for meat; and hast scattered us among the heathen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni nuna dorssatudan shuhau aattada immadasa; qassi kawotettatu giddon nuna laaladasa.

English Sentences: Thou sellest thy people for nought, and dost not increase thy wealth by their price.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne asaa hiraisuwan baizzadasa; aiba worenne demma be7akka.

English Sentences: Thou makest us a reproach to our neighbours, a scorn and a derision to them that are round about us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni nuna nu shooroti boriyoobaanne, qassi nu heeran de7iyaageeti qilliicciyoobaanne miicciyoobaa oottadasa.

English Sentences: Thou makest us a byword among the heathen, a shaking of the head among the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni nuna kawotettata giddon haise kessadasa; nuna eti bantta huuphiyaa qaatti qaatti qiriyoobaa oottadasa.

English Sentences: My confusion is continually before me, and the shame of my face hath covered me,
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani gallassa kumettan tooshettaidda de7ais; tana cayiyaageetunne boriyaageetu gaasuwan,

English Sentences: For the voice of him that reproacheth and blasphemeth; by reason of the enemy and avenger.
Wolaitta Sentences: tana morkkiyaageetunne manddiyaageetu gaasuwan, tana yeellai kammiis.

English Sentences: All this is come upon us; yet have we not forgotten thee, neither have we dealt falsely in thy covenant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni nena dogibeennabaa gidikkokka, woikko ne maachchaa kanttibeennabaa gidikkokka, hagee ubbai nu bollan haniis.

English Sentences: Our heart is not turned back, neither have our steps declined from thy way;
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu wozanai neeppe guyye simmibeenna; nu tohoi ne ogiyaappe gaxi kiyibeenna.

English Sentences: Though thou hast sore broken us in the place of dragons, and covered us with the shadow of death.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin neeni nuna mentterettada do7a giddon yeggadasa; sakkana xuman kammadasa.

English Sentences: If we have forgotten the name of our God, or stretched out our hands to a strange god;
Wolaitta Sentences: Wozanan geemmida xuuraa Xoossai eriyo gishshau,

English Sentences: Shall not God search this out? for he knoweth the secrets of the heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: nu Xoossaa sunttaa nuuni dogidaakko, hara xoossaa woossanau nuuni nu kushiyaa miccidaakko, i hagaa qoridi demmennee?

English Sentences: Yea, for thy sake are we killed all the day long; we are counted as sheep for the slaughter.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ne gishshau, gallassa ubban nuna woroosona; goor7anau efiyo dorssadan qoodettida.

English Sentences: Awake, why sleepest thou, O Lord? arise, cast us not off for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau, dendda! Aissi xiskkai? Beegotta! Merinaassi nuna aggoppa.

English Sentences: Wherefore hidest thou thy face, and forgettest our affliction and our oppression?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne som77uwaa nuuppe aissi genttai? Nu qohuwaanne nu un77uwaa aissi dogai?

English Sentences: For our soul is bowed down to the dust: our belly cleaveth unto the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni baanan duge olettida; nu bollaikka biittaara oiqettiis.

English Sentences: Arise for our help, and redeem us for thy mercies' sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau, dendda! Nuna maadda! Aggenna ne siiquwaa gishshau, nuna woza.

English Sentences: My heart is inditing a good matter: I speak of the things which I have made touching the king: my tongue is the pen of a ready writer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ha yettaa kawuwaassi xaafiyo wode, ta wozanai lo77o qofaa pulttees; ta inxxarssai lo77o xaafiya asa bi7iriyaa mala.

English Sentences: Thou art fairer than the children of men: grace is poured into thy lips: therefore God hath blessed thee for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asa ubbaappe neeni malanchcha; ne haasayai nashettiyaagaa. Hegan Xoossai nena merinaassi anjjiis.

English Sentences: Gird thy sword upon thy thigh, O most mighty, with thy glory and thy majesty.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wolqqaama kawuwau, ne bisuwaa ne xeessan gixxa; bonchchoinne gitatettai nebaa.

English Sentences: And in thy majesty ride prosperously because of truth and meekness and righteousness; and thy right hand shall teach thee terrible things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne tumatettaa, ashkketettaanne xillotettaa gishshaa olettada xoonanau, ne gitatettaa bessaidda, piriixa. Ne ushachcha kushee maalaalissiyaabaa besso.

English Sentences: Thine arrows are sharp in the heart of the king's enemies; whereby the people fall under thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne zubbeti qara; eti ne morkketu wozana aifiyaa caddona. Kawotettati ne gediyan kunddona.

English Sentences: Thy throne, O God, is for ever and ever: the sceptre of thy kingdom is a right sceptre.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, ne kawotaa araatai meri merinau de7ees; ne kawotaa xam77aikka suuretettaa xam77aa.

English Sentences: Thou lovest righteousness, and hatest wickedness: therefore God, thy God, hath anointed thee with the oil of gladness above thy fellows.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni xillotettaa siiqaasa; naaquwaa ixxaasa. Xoossai, ne Xoossai, nena ne laggetuppekka aattidi, ufaissaa zaitiyaa tiyidoogee hegaassa.

English Sentences: All thy garments smell of myrrh, and aloes, and cassia, out of the ivory palaces, whereby they have made thee glad.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sinxxan, xaittaaninne puuxisan ne maayoi ubbai xaidettiis. Danggarssaa zaaliyan alleeqettida ne kawotaa keettan diixxiyaageeti nena ufaissoosona.

English Sentences: Kings' daughters were among thy honourable women: upon thy right hand did stand the queen in gold of Ophir.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawuwaa keettan de7iya maccaasatu giddon kawotu macca naati de7oosona; kawiyaa geeshsha worqqan alleeqettada neeppe ushachcha baggan eqqaasu.

English Sentences: Hearken, O daughter, and consider, and incline thine ear; forget also thine own people, and thy father's house;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta na7ee, siya; ezgga; ne haittaa haa yegga. Ne zariyaanne ne aawaa keettaa doga.

English Sentences: So shall the king greatly desire thy beauty: for he is thy Lord; and worship thou him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne meraa kawoi amottees; i neessi goda gidiyo gishshau, assi azazetta.

English Sentences: And the daughter of Tyre shall be there with a gift; even the rich among the people shall intreat thy favour.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xiroose biittaa asai neessi woituwaa ekkidi yaana; dureti nena auddashana.

English Sentences: The king's daughter is all glorious within: her clothing is of wrought gold.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi ekkiyo na7iyaa kawo keettaa giddon aiba lo77ai! I bullachchaa maayoikka worqqa qacinan dadettiis.

English Sentences: She shall be brought unto the king in raiment of needlework: the virgins her companions that follow her shall be brought unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba alleeqo maayuwaa maayada, kawuwaakko moisettausu; i lagge naati geela7oti, o ajabidi, a sintti aadhdhoosona.

English Sentences: With gladness and rejoicing shall they be brought: they shall enter into the king's palace.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ufaittiiddinne hombbociiddi yiidi, kawuwaa keettaa geloosona.

English Sentences: Instead of thy fathers shall be thy children, whom thou mayest make princes in all the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawuwau, ne aawatu sohuwaa ne naati ekkana. Neeni eta biitta ubbaa bollan sunttana.

English Sentences: I will make thy name to be remembered in all generations: therefore shall the people praise thee for ever and ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne sunttai yeleta ubban hassayettanaadan oottana. Hegaa gishshau, asai meri merinau nena galatana.

English Sentences: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai nuuni naagetti attiyo sohonne nuuyyo wolqqa. Nuna metoi gakkiyo wode, maaddanau i ubbaton matan de7ees.

English Sentences: Therefore will not we fear, though the earth be removed, and though the mountains be carried into the midst of the sea;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, biittai qaaxxiyaakkokka, woi dereti abban kunddiyaakkokka, nuuni yayyokko.

English Sentences: Though the waters thereof roar and be troubled, though the mountains shake with the swelling thereof. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abbaa beetai guummidi, hoommuwaa maayiyaakkokka, a wolqqaama hobbiyan dereti yaaqiyaaqiyaakkokka, nuuni yayyokko.

English Sentences: There is a river, the streams whereof shall make glad the city of God, the holy place of the tabernacles of the most High.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi shaafai de7ees. He shaafai goggidi, Xoossaa katamaa, Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossai de7iyo geeshsha sohuwaa ufaissees.

English Sentences: God is in the midst of her; she shall not be moved: God shall help her, and that right early.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai a giddon de7iyo gishshau, he katamai qaaxxenna. Maallado guuran Xoossai a maaddana.

English Sentences: The heathen raged, the kingdoms were moved: he uttered his voice, the earth melted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dere asai shabbarettees; kawotettati qaaxxoosona. Xoossai ba qaalaa sissido wode, sa7ai seerees.

English Sentences: The LORD of hosts is with us; the God of Jacob is our refuge. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI nunaara de7ees; Yaaqooba Xoossai nuuni qosetti attiyo soho.
