English Sentences: Come, behold the works of the LORD, what desolations he hath made in the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haa yiite; GODAA oosuwaa xeellite; i sa7an oottido garamissiya malaataa be7ite.

English Sentences: He maketh wars to cease unto the end of the earth; he breaketh the bow, and cutteth the spear in sunder; he burneth the chariot in the fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: I sa7aa gaxaa gakkanaassi de7iya olaa teqqees; wonddafiyaa menttees; tooraa kinchchees; gonddalliyaakka taman xuuggees.

English Sentences: Be still, and know that I am God: I will be exalted among the heathen, I will be exalted in the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Co77u giite; taani Xoossaa gidiyoogaa erite. Taani kawotettatu giddon xoqqais. Qassi biittaa bollankka xoqqais.

English Sentences: The LORD of hosts is with us; the God of Jacob is our refuge. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAI nunaara de7ees; Yaaqooba Xoossai nuuni qosetti attiyo soho.

English Sentences: O clap your hands, all ye people; shout unto God with the voice of triumph.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotettati ubbai intte kushiyaa baqqite; qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, Xoossaayyo galataa yexxite.

English Sentences: For the LORD most high is terrible; he is a great King over all the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Xoqqiya GODAI yayettanau bessees; sa7a ubbaa bollan i gita kawo.

English Sentences: He shall subdue the people under us, and the nations under our feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dere asaa nuuppe garssaara, kawotettatakka nu gediyaappe garssaara wottidi, nuuyyo haarissees.

English Sentences: He shall choose our inheritance for us, the excellency of Jacob whom he loved. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: I nuuyyo laattiyo biittaa dooriis; he biittainne i siiqiyo dereti, Yaaqooba zareti ceeqettiyoogaa.

English Sentences: God is gone up with a shout, the LORD with the sound of a trumpet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai pude kawotaa araataa kiyiis. GODAI pude kiyiyo wode, ufaissaa hombbocettainne malkkataa punettai siyettiis.

English Sentences: Sing praises to God, sing praises: sing praises unto our King, sing praises.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa sabbite; ee, a sabbite. Nu kawuwaa sabbite; ee, a sabbite.

English Sentences: For God is the King of all the earth: sing ye praises with understanding.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai sa7a ubbaa kawo gidiyo gishshau, galata sabaa sabbite.

English Sentences: God reigneth over the heathen: God sitteth upon the throne of his holiness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ba geeshsha kawotaa araatan uttidi, kawotettata haarees.

English Sentences: The princes of the people are gathered together, even the people of the God of Abraham: for the shields of the earth belong unto God: he is greatly exalted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotettatu halaqati Abrahaama Xoossaa asatuura issippe shiiqoosona. Aissi giikko, sa7an de7iya wolqqaamati ubbai Xoossaassa; i keehippe xoqqu giis.

English Sentences: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised in the city of our God, in the mountain of his holiness.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI gita. Nu Xoossaa kataman a geeshsha deriyan aaro galatai ayyo bessees.

English Sentences: Beautiful for situation, the joy of the whole earth, is mount Zion, on the sides of the north, the city of the great King.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa dere gidiya Xiyoonee xoqqanne lo77o. He gita kawuwaa katamai sa7a ubbaassi ufaissa.

English Sentences: God is known in her palaces for a refuge.
Wolaitta Sentences: He katamaa gimbbiyaa giddon, banan saro sohoi de7iyoogaa Xoossai bessiis.

English Sentences: For, lo, the kings were assembled, they passed by together.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoti bantta tooranchchatuura issippe shiiqidosona; shiiqidi Xiyoone olanau yiidosona.

English Sentences: They saw it, and so they marvelled; they were troubled, and hasted away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yiidi a be7idi, garamettidinne dagammidi, guyye baqatidosona.

English Sentences: Fear took hold upon them there, and pain, as of a woman in travail.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hegan de7ishin, eta yashshaa kokkorssai oiqqiis; maaretai oiqqido maccaaseedan miixattidosona.

English Sentences: Thou breakest the ships of Tarshish with an east wind.
Wolaitta Sentences: Arshsho bagga wolqqaama carkkuwan meqqiya Tarsseesa markkabiyaadan eti kokkoridosona.

English Sentences: As we have heard, so have we seen in the city of the LORD of hosts, in the city of our God: God will establish it for ever. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni siyidoogaadankka, Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAA kataman, nu Xoossaa kataman, i oottidobaa be7ida. Xoossai he katamaa merinau mintti essees.

English Sentences: We have thought of thy lovingkindness, O God, in the midst of thy temple.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, ne Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddon aggenna ne siiquwaa qoppida.

English Sentences: According to thy name, O God, so is thy praise unto the ends of the earth: thy right hand is full of righteousness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, ne sunttaadankka ne galatai sa7aa gaxaa gakkiis. Ne ushachcha kushee xillo pirddan kumidaagaa.

English Sentences: Let mount Zion rejoice, let the daughters of Judah be glad, because of thy judgments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne pirddaa gishshau, Xiyoone asai ufaittees; Yihudaa moottatikka ufaittoosona.

English Sentences: Walk about Zion, and go round about her: tell the towers thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xiyoone yuushuwan hemettite; i yuushuwan yaa haa simerettite. I miixaa qoodite.

English Sentences: Mark ye well her bulwarks, consider her palaces; that ye may tell it to the generation following.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yiya yeletau yootanaadan, i gimbbiyaa akeekitenne i qatota xomoosite.

English Sentences: For this God is our God for ever and ever: he will be our guide even unto death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte, "Meri merinau ha Xoossai nu Xoossaa; i nuna merinaassi kaalettana" yaagidi yootite.

English Sentences: Hear this, all ye people; give ear, all ye inhabitants of the world:
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, asatoo, ubbatikka hagaa siyite. Inttenoo, sa7an de7iyaageetoo, ubbatikka hagaa ezggite.

English Sentences: Both low and high, rich and poor, together.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoqqai ziqqaikka, dure manqqoikka siyite.

English Sentences: My mouth shall speak of wisdom; and the meditation of my heart shall be of understanding.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta wozanaa qofai ciimma; ta doonai aadhdhida eratettaa haasayana.

English Sentences: I will incline mine ear to a parable: I will open my dark saying upon the harp.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta haittaa leemisuwaakko yeggana; diittaa diixxaidda, taani a birshshettaa qonccissana.

English Sentences: Wherefore should I fear in the days of evil, when the iniquity of my heels shall compass me about?
Wolaitta Sentences: Meto wodiyan, ta iita morkketi tana dooddiyo wode, taani aissi yayyiyaanaa?

English Sentences: They that trust in their wealth, and boast themselves in the multitude of their riches;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketau, bantta aquwan ammanettiyaageetaunne bantta duretettaa daruwan ceeqqiyaageetau aissi yayyiyaanaa?

English Sentences: None of them can by any means redeem his brother, nor give to God a ransom for him:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ai asinne bana wozanau, woikko ba shemppuwaa waagaa Xoossau qanxxanau danddayenna.

English Sentences: (For the redemption of their soul is precious, and it ceaseth for ever:)
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, asa shemppo waagai al77o.

English Sentences: That he should still live for ever, and not see corruption.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ai waagaa qanxxinkka, i merinau de7anaadan, woikko i haiqqennaadan oottanau gakkenna.

English Sentences: For he seeth that wise men die, likewise the fool and the brutish person perish, and leave their wealth to others.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eeyyatinne dammati haiqqiyoogaadan, aadhdhida eranchchatikka xayiyoogaanne bantta aquwaa haratussi yeggidi biyoogaa asai ubbai be7ees.

English Sentences: Their inward thought is, that their houses shall continue for ever, and their dwelling places to all generations; they call their lands after their own names.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta biittaa banttabaa ginkka, duufoi merinau eta keettanne yeletaappe yeletaa gakkanaashin eti de7iyo soho gidana.

English Sentences: Nevertheless man being in honour abideth not: he is like the beasts that perish.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi ai gitatikkokka paxa attenna; i do7adan haiqqana.

English Sentences: This their way is their folly: yet their posterity approve their sayings. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Banttarkka bantta huuphiyan ammanettiyaageetu qaadainne eta qaalaa tuma giyaageetu wurssettai hagaa.

English Sentences: Like sheep they are laid in the grave; death shall feed on them; and the upright shall have dominion over them in the morning; and their beauty shall consume in the grave from their dwelling.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHuhau qorettida dorssatudan, eti duufuwau doorettidosona; haiqoi eta henttanchchaa gidana. Suureti maallado eta haarana; eti bantta yallisa keettaappe haakkidi, duufuwan musana.

English Sentences: But God will redeem my soul from the power of the grave: for he shall receive me. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai tana wotti ekkana; i tana haiquwaa wolqqaappe ashshana.

English Sentences: Be not thou afraid when one is made rich, when the glory of his house is increased;
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi duretiyo wodenne, a aqotai dariyo wode yayyoppa.

English Sentences: For when he dieth he shall carry nothing away: his glory shall not descend after him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i haiqqiiddi, ainne ekkidi beenna; a aqotai aara issippe duufuwaa beenna.

English Sentences: Though while he lived he blessed his soul: and men will praise thee, when thou doest well to thyself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi paxa de7iyo wodiyan, "Taayyo kumiis" giikkonne, ubbabai assi giigido gishshau galatettikkonne,

English Sentences: He shall go to the generation of his fathers; they shall never see light.
Wolaitta Sentences: simmidi poo7o be7enna ba maizza aawatun gaittees.

English Sentences: Man that is in honour, and understandeth not, is like the beasts that perish.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eri bainnan gitatida asi do7adan haiqqana.

English Sentences: The mighty God, even the LORD, hath spoken, and called the earth from the rising of the sun unto the going down thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wolqqaama GODAI, Xoossai haasayees. Awai mokkiyoosaappe wulliyoosaa gakkanaassi sa7an de7iya asaa xeesees.

English Sentences: Out of Zion, the perfection of beauty, God hath shined.
Wolaitta Sentences: Merai kumetta lo77o gidiyo Xiyooneppe Xoossai poo7ees.

English Sentences: Our God shall come, and shall not keep silence: a fire shall devour before him, and it shall be very tempestuous round about him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu Xoossai yaana; co77u geenna. Eexxiya tamai a sinttaana; wolqqaama gotee a yuushuwaana.

English Sentences: He shall call to the heavens from above, and to the earth, that he may judge his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ba asaa pirddiiddi, salotanne sa7aa markkau xeesees.

English Sentences: Gather my saints together unto me; those that have made a covenant with me by sacrifice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xeesidi, "Yarshshuwaa yarshshiyoogan tanaara maachchaa maacettida Xoossaa asata taakko shiishshite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the heavens shall declare his righteousness: for God is judge himself. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai barkka pirddiyaagaa gidiyo gishshau, saloti a xillotettaa yootoosona.

English Sentences: Hear, O my people, and I will speak; O Israel, and I will testify against thee: I am God, even thy God.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta asau, siya! Taani neeyyo yootais. Israa7eela asau, taani ne bolli markkattais. Taani Xoossaa, ne Xoossaa.

English Sentences: I will not reprove thee for thy sacrifices or thy burnt offerings, to have been continually before me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne yarshshuwaa gishshaunne neeni ubbaton shiishshiyo xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa gishshau, taani nena walassikke.

English Sentences: I will take no bullock out of thy house, nor he goats out of thy folds.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka, ne dirssaappe korimata, woikko ne birddiyaappe deeshshata ekkanau koyikke.

English Sentences: For every beast of the forest is mine, and the cattle upon a thousand hills.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, bazzon de7iya do7ati ubbati taageeta; sha7u keraa bollan de7iya mehetikka taageeta.

English Sentences: I know all the fowls of the mountains: and the wild beasts of the field are mine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani xoqqa deriyan de7iya kafota ubbaa erais; dembban de7iya meretettati taageeta.

English Sentences: If I were hungry, I would not tell thee: for the world is mine, and the fulness thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Tana namisiyaakkonne, taani neeyyo yootikke: aissi giikko, sa7ainne sa7an kumidabai ubbai taagaa.

English Sentences: Will I eat the flesh of bulls, or drink the blood of goats?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani korimatu ashuwaa miyanaayyee? Woikko deeshshatu suuttaa uyiyanaayyee?

English Sentences: Offer unto God thanksgiving; and pay thy vows unto the most High:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Xoossaassi neeni immiyo yarshshoi galata gido; Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossaassi ne shiiquwaa gatta.

English Sentences: And call upon me in the day of trouble: I will deliver thee, and thou shalt glorify me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatada, metuwaa gallassi tana xeesa. Taani nena ashshana; neenikka tana bonchchana" yaagees.

English Sentences: But unto the wicked God saith, What hast thou to do to declare my statutes, or that thou shouldest take my covenant in thy mouth?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai iita asa hagaadan yaagees; "Ta higgiyaa neeni zaara zaarada aissi yootai? Woikko ta maachchaa ne doonan aibissi haasayai?

English Sentences: Seeing thou hatest instruction, and casteth my words behind thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta timirttiyaa ixxoohoo; ta qaalaakka haitta bollaara aattoohoo.

English Sentences: When thou sawest a thief, then thou consentedst with him, and hast been partaker with adulterers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni kaisuwaa be7ido wode, aara dabbotadasa; shaaramuxiyaageetu maabaran geladasa.

English Sentences: Thou givest thy mouth to evil, and thy tongue frameth deceit.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni ne doonaa iitabaa haasayanau birshsha yeddaasa. Ne inxxarssaikka wordduwaa haasayaa meezetiis.

English Sentences: Thou sittest and speakest against thy brother; thou slanderest thine own mother's son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne uttidosan ne ishaa iissada haasayaasa; ne aayee na7aa zigiraasa.

English Sentences: These things hast thou done, and I kept silence; thou thoughtest that I was altogether such an one as thyself: but I will reprove thee, and set them in order before thine eyes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni hagaa ubbaa oottiyo wode, taani co77u giido gishshau, tanakka ne mala gaada qoppadasa. SHin ha77i taani nena walassaisinne ne balaa ne sinttan qoodais.

English Sentences: Now consider this, ye that forget God, lest I tear you in pieces, and there be none to deliver.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttenoo, Xoossaa dogiyaageetoo, hagaa akeekite. Hegee xayikko, taani inttena mentterettana; he wode inttena ashshiyaabi baawa.

English Sentences: Whoso offereth praise glorifieth me: and to him that ordereth his conversation aright will I shew the salvation of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taayyo galataa immiya asi tana bonchchees. Ba ogiyaa sittissiya asa taani Xoossaa atotettaa bessana" yaagees.

English Sentences: Have mercy upon me, O God, according to thy lovingkindness: according unto the multitude of thy tender mercies blot out my transgressions.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, aggenna ne siiquwaadan tana maara; ne qaretaa daruwaadan ta mooruwaa qucca.

English Sentences: Wash me throughly from mine iniquity, and cleanse me from my sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta iitatettaappe tana mule meecca; ta nagaraappe tana geeshsha.

English Sentences: For I acknowledge my transgressions: and my sin is ever before me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ta mooruwaa taani erais; ta nagarai ubbatoo ta sinttaana.

English Sentences: Against thee, thee only, have I sinned, and done this evil in thy sight: that thou mightest be justified when thou speakest, and be clear when thou judgest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena, ne xalaalaa naaqqadis; ne aifiyaa sinttan iitabaa oottaas. Hegaa gishshau, haasayaiddakka neeni likke; pirddaiddakka neeni xillo.

English Sentences: Behold, I was shapen in iniquity; and in sin did my mother conceive me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani yelettoosappekka tumu nagaranchcha; ta aayee uluwan biron attiyo wodeesappe doommadakka taani nagaranchcha.

English Sentences: Behold, thou desirest truth in the inward parts: and in the hidden part thou shalt make me to know wisdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hekko neeni wozana giddo tumatettaa amottaasa; hegaa gishshau, ne aadhdhida eratettaa tana tamaarissa.

English Sentences: Purge me with hyssop, and I shall be clean: wash me, and I shall be whiter than snow.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hiisoophphe giyo bonccuwan neeni tana geeshsha; taani geeyana. Tana meecca; taani shachchaappe aadhdhada booxxana.

English Sentences: Make me to hear joy and gladness; that the bones which thou hast broken may rejoice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana ufaissaanne hashshu giyoobaa sissa; neeni tana mentterettidabaa gidikkokka, zaarada ufaissa.

English Sentences: Hide thy face from my sins, and blot out all mine iniquities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta nagaraappe ne sinttaa wora zaara; ta iitatettaa ubbaa qucca.

English Sentences: Create in me a clean heart, O God; and renew a right spirit within me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, geeshsha wozanaa ta giddon medhdha; ammanettiya ayyaanaa ta giddon ooraxissa.

English Sentences: Cast me not away from thy presence; and take not thy holy spirit from me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana ne sinttaappe oloppa; ne Geeshsha Ayyaanaa taappe ekkoppa.

English Sentences: Restore unto me the joy of thy salvation; and uphold me with thy free spirit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne atotettaa ufaissaa taayyo zaarada imma; taani neeyyo eeno gaada azazettanaadan, tana zemppissa.

English Sentences: Then will I teach transgressors thy ways; and sinners shall be converted unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode taani mooranchchata ne ogiyaa tamaarissana; he nagaranchchatinne neekko simmana.

English Sentences: Deliver me from bloodguiltiness, O God, thou God of my salvation: and my tongue shall sing aloud of thy righteousness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, tana ashshiya Xoossau, suuttaa gussido nagaraappe tana ashsha; he wode ta inxxarssai ne xillotettaabaa yexxana.

English Sentences: O Lord, open thou my lips; and my mouth shall shew forth thy praise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau, ta doonaa dooya; yaatikko, ta inxxarssai ne galataa awaajjana.

English Sentences: For thou desirest not sacrifice; else would I give it: thou delightest not in burnt offering.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni yarshshuwan ufaittakka. Taani neeyyo xuuggiyo yarshshuwaa yarshshiyaakkokka, neeni ufaittakka.

English Sentences: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit: a broken and a contrite heart, O God, thou wilt not despise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaayyo yarshshiyo yarshshoi meqqida wozanaa; abeet Xoossau, "Nagara oottennan aggarkkinaashsha" giya, meqqida wozanaa neeni karakka.

English Sentences: Do good in thy good pleasure unto Zion: build thou the walls of Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, ne dosan Xiyooneyyo keha; Yerusalaame gimbbeta gimbba.

English Sentences: Then shalt thou be pleased with the sacrifices of righteousness, with burnt offering and whole burnt offering: then shall they offer bullocks upon thine altar.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode xillo yarshshuwan, xuuggiyo yarshshuwaaninne mehiyaa ashuwaa wurssi xuuggiyo yarshshuwan neeni ufaittana. Qassi korimati ne yarshshiyoosan yarshshettana.

English Sentences: Why boastest thou thyself in mischief, O mighty man? the goodness of God endureth continually.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenoo, wolqqaama bitaniyau, Xoossaa asatu bolli iitabaa oottiyoogan, gallassa ubban aissi ceeqettai?

English Sentences: Thy tongue deviseth mischiefs; like a sharp razor, working deceitfully.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenoo, worddobaa haniyaagoo, neeni harata xaissanau maqettaasa. Ne inxxarssai qara magilaalaa mala.

English Sentences: Thou lovest evil more than good; and lying rather than to speak righteousness. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni lo77uwaappe iitaa siiqaasa; qassi tumaa haasayiyoogaappe wordduwaa haasayiyoogaa dosaasa.

English Sentences: Thou lovest all devouring words, O thou deceitful tongue.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenoo, worddanchchau, neeni bochchiya qaalaa ubbaa siiqaasa.

English Sentences: God shall likewise destroy thee for ever, he shall take thee away, and pluck thee out of thy dwelling place, and root thee out of the land of the living. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai nena merinau xaissana. I nena diippananne ne keettaappe dafidi kessana; i nena paxa de7iyaageetu giddoppe xoqollana.

English Sentences: The righteous also shall see, and fear, and shall laugh at him:
Wolaitta Sentences: Xilloti hagaa be7idi yayyana. Eti hagaadan yaagidi, ne bolli miiccana;

English Sentences: Lo, this is the man that made not God his strength; but trusted in the abundance of his riches, and strengthened himself in his wickedness.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Xoossaa baayyo qato oottibeenna, ba duretettaa daruwan ammanettida, iita oosuwan minnida bitaniyaa hagaa be7ite!" yaagana.

English Sentences: But I am like a green olive tree in the house of God: I trust in the mercy of God for ever and ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani Xoossaa keettan aaciya wogaraa mala. Aggenna a siiquwan taani meri merinau ammanettais.

English Sentences: I will praise thee for ever, because thou hast done it: and I will wait on thy name; for it is good before thy saints.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni oottido gishshau, taani nena merinau galatais. Taani Xoossaa asatu sinttan neeni keha gidiyoogaa yootana.

English Sentences: The fool hath said in his heart, There is no God. Corrupt are they, and have done abominable iniquity: there is none that doeth good.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eeyyati bantta wozanan, "Xoossai baawa" yaagoosona. Eta de7oi moorettiis. Eti pala sheneyiyaabaa oottoosona; lo77iyaabaa oottiya asi baawa.

English Sentences: God looked down from heaven upon the children of men, to see if there were any that did understand, that did seek God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa koyiya eranchchati de7iyaakkonne be7anau, GODAI saluwaappe duge asaa xeellees.

English Sentences: Every one of them is gone back: they are altogether become filthy; there is none that doeth good, no, not one.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ubbaikka Xoossaappe haakkidosona; ubbaikka issippe tunidosona. Lo77iyaabaa oottiya asi baawa; harai atto issoinne baawa.

English Sentences: Have the workers of iniquity no knowledge? who eat up my people as they eat bread: they have not called upon God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai, "Hageeti ta asaa bonqqi miidi de7iya iita asati tumu ainne erokkonaa? Eti tana woossokkona" yaagees.

English Sentences: There were they in great fear, where no fear was: for God hath scattered the bones of him that encampeth against thee: thou hast put them to shame, because God hath despised them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti kase dagammi erennaagaa keenaa dagammana. Aissi giikko, Xoossai ba asaa morkkiyaageetu meqettaa laalana. Xoossai eta karido gishshau, eti yeellatana.

English Sentences: Oh that the salvation of Israel were come out of Zion! When God bringeth back the captivity of his people, Jacob shall rejoice, and Israel shall be glad.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eelayyo atotettai Xiyooneppe yeerennee! Xoossai ba asaa omooduwaa zaariyo wode, Yaaqooba zareti ufaittana; Israa7eela asai ufaissau poccu gaana.

English Sentences: Save me, O God, by thy name, and judge me by thy strength.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, ne sunttan tana ashsha; ne wolqqan tana shatintta.

English Sentences: Hear my prayer, O God; give ear to the words of my mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, ta woosaa siya; ta doonaa haasayaa ezgga.

English Sentences: For strangers are risen up against me, and oppressors seek after my soul: they have not set God before them. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Otoranchchati ta bolli denddoosona; daganttiya asati tana woranau koyoosona. Eti Xoossaa wudokkona.

English Sentences: Behold, God is mine helper: the Lord is with them that uphold my soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hekko Xoossai tana maaddiyaagaa; Godai tana zemppissiyaagaa.

English Sentences: He shall reward evil unto mine enemies: cut them off in thy truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, ta morkketussi eta iitatettaa zaara. Neeni ammanettiyaagaa gidiyoogaadan eta xaissa.

English Sentences: I will freely sacrifice unto thee: I will praise thy name, O LORD; for it is good.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani ta dosan neeyyo yarshshana; neeni keha gidiyo gishshau, taani ne sunttaa galatana.

English Sentences: For he hath delivered me out of all trouble: and mine eye hath seen his desire upon mine enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, neeni tana ta meto ubbaappe ashshadasa; ta morkketi xoonettiyoogaa ta aifiyan be7aas.

English Sentences: Give ear to my prayer, O God; and hide not thyself from my supplication.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, ta woosaa siya; ta watiwatuwaa ai metoo gooppa.

English Sentences: Attend unto me, and hear me: I mourn in my complaint, and make a noise;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ezgga; ta woosaa siya; ta qofai tana waissin, taani shabbarettaas.

English Sentences: Because of the voice of the enemy, because of the oppression of the wicked: for they cast iniquity upon me, and in wrath they hate me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, ta morkketu cenggurssaappenne iitatu naaquwaappe denddidaagaana. Eti ta bolli meto ehoosonanne bantta yiilluwan tana morkkoosona.

English Sentences: My heart is sore pained within me: and the terrors of death are fallen upon me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta wozana aifiyan diddiqees; haiquwaa hirggai tana maashissiis.

English Sentences: Fearfulness and trembling are come upon me, and horror hath overwhelmed me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana yashshainne kokkorssai oiqqiis; dagamai tana worirggiis.

English Sentences: And I said, Oh that I had wings like a dove! for then would I fly away, and be at rest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani, "Taayyo haraphphiyaadan qefee de7eerenneeshsha. Yaaniyaakko taani paallada baada shemppana shin;

English Sentences: Lo, then would I wander far off, and remain in the wilderness. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani haakkada baana shin; bazzon aqana shin.

English Sentences: I would hasten my escape from the windy storm and tempest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani gotiyaappenne uushuwaappe attiyoosaa eesotada gakkana shin" yaagaas.

English Sentences: Destroy, O Lord, and divide their tongues: for I have seen violence and strife in the city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau, taani katamaa giddon ooshshaanne waretaa be7ido gishshau, iitatu haasayaa balbbuqa.

English Sentences: Day and night they go about it upon the walls thereof: mischief also and sorrow are in the midst of it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitati gallassinne qammi katamaa gimbbiyaa yuuyoosona; iitatettainne kobai katamaa giddon de7ees.

English Sentences: Wickedness is in the midst thereof: deceit and guile depart not from her streets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bashshai a giddon de7ees; naaqoikka cimoikka a gutaraappe shaahettenna.

English Sentences: For it was not an enemy that reproached me; then I could have borne it: neither was it he that hated me that did magnify himself against me; then I would have hid myself from him:
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana cayiyaagee ta morkkiyaa gidenna; gidiyaakko taani danddayana. Ta bolli ceeqettiyaagee tana ixxiyaagaa gidenna; gidiyaakko taani appe qosettana.

English Sentences: But it was thou, a man mine equal, my guide, and mine acquaintance.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin hagaa ubbaa oottiyaagee nena, ta laggiyaa, ta dabbuwaanne ta siiquwaa.

English Sentences: We took sweet counsel together, and walked unto the house of God in company.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni issoi issuwaara ulobaa haasayida; nuuni issippe Xoossaa keettan goinnida.

English Sentences: Let death seize upon them, and let them go down quick into hell: for wickedness is in their dwellings, and among them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketi wodee gakkennan haiqqona; eti paxa moogettona. Aissi giikko, iitatettai eta giddooninne eti de7iyoosan de7ees.

English Sentences: As for me, I will call upon God; and the LORD shall save me.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani GODAA Xoossaa xeesais; i tana ashshees.

English Sentences: Evening, and morning, and at noon, will I pray, and cry aloud: and he shall hear my voice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maallado, gallassinne omarssi taani waassananne ta metuwaa ayyo yootana; yootin i tabaa siyana.

English Sentences: He hath delivered my soul in peace from the battle that was against me: for there were many with me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daroti tana morkkikkokka, i tana olaa tooraappe ashshees.

English Sentences: God shall hear, and afflict them, even he that abideth of old. Selah. Because they have no changes, therefore they fear not God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beniisappe kawotaa araatan uttida Xoossai, bantta ogiyaa laammennaageetubaanne baayyo yayyennaageetubaa siyidi, i eta kaushshana.

English Sentences: He hath put forth his hands against such as be at peace with him: he hath broken his covenant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta laggee ba dabbotu bolli ba kushiyaa yeddiis; etaara maacettido maachchaa koliis.

English Sentences: The words of his mouth were smoother than butter, but war was in his heart: his words were softer than oil, yet were they drawn swords.
Wolaitta Sentences: A haasayai oissaappekka aadhdhida shugo; shin ba wozanan morkkiis. A qaalati zaitiyaappekka aadhdhidi woppissidosona; shin qara bisuwaadan qanxxidosona.

English Sentences: Cast thy burden upon the LORD, and he shall sustain thee: he shall never suffer the righteous to be moved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne toohuwaa Xoossan wotta; i nena zemppissana. Xoossai audenne xilloti shabbarettanaadan oottenna.

English Sentences: But thou, O God, shalt bring them down into the pit of destruction: bloody and deceitful men shall not live out half their days; but I will trust in thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Abeet Xoossau, neeni iita asata ciimma ollan duge olana. Suuttaa gussiyaageetinne cimmiyaageeti bantta daana laittau baggaanne de7okkona; shin taani nenan ammanettana.

English Sentences: Be merciful unto me, O God: for man would swallow me up; he fighting daily oppresseth me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, asati tana yedhdhiyo gishshaunne gallassa ubbankka ta morkketi tana qohido gishshau, taayyo qaretta.

English Sentences: Mine enemies would daily swallow me up: for they be many that fight against me, O thou most High.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketi gallassa ubban tana yedhdhoosona; daroti otoruwan tana oloosona.

English Sentences: What time I am afraid, I will trust in thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani yayyido wode, nenan ammanettais.

English Sentences: In God I will praise his word, in God I have put my trust; I will not fear what flesh can do unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Xoossan ammanettais; taani a qaalaa galatiyo Xoossan ammanettaisinne yayyikke. Asi tana ai oottanee?

English Sentences: Every day they wrest my words: all their thoughts are against me for evil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gallassa ubban ta morkketi taayyo meto medhdhoosona; eti ubbaton taayyo iitabaa qoppoosona.

English Sentences: They gather themselves together, they hide themselves, they mark my steps, when they wait for my soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ta bolli maqettoosona; zuggidi wochchoosonanne ta ogiyaa naagoosona; tana woranau koyoosona.

English Sentences: Shall they escape by iniquity? in thine anger cast down the people, O God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta iitatettaa gishshau, eta yeddoppa; ne hanqquwan he asata ziqqi ootta.

English Sentences: Thou tellest my wanderings: put thou my tears into thy bottle: are they not in thy book?
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta metoi woisaakko qoodadasa. Taani woisu afuttaa tigidaakko, neeni eraasa. Eti ne mazggafan de7okkonaa?

English Sentences: When I cry unto thee, then shall mine enemies turn back: this I know; for God is for me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena xeesiyo wode, ta morkketi guyye simmana. Xoossai ta bagga gidiyoogaa taani erais.

English Sentences: In God will I praise his word: in the LORD will I praise his word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani a qaalaa galatiyo Xoossan, taani a qaalaa galatiyo GODAN,

English Sentences: In God have I put my trust: I will not be afraid what man can do unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani he Xoossan ammanettais; yayyikke. Asi tana ai oottannee?

English Sentences: Thy vows are upon me, O God: I will render praises unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, taani neessi shiiqettidobaa oottana; hegaa galataa yarshshuwaa taani neeyyo immana.

English Sentences: For thou hast delivered my soul from death: wilt not thou deliver my feet from falling, that I may walk before God in the light of the living?
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, neeni tana haiquwaappe, ta tohuwaa kunddettaappe ashshadasa. Hegaa gishshau, i paxa de7iyaageetu bollan poo7issiyo poo7uwan Xoossaa sinttan taani hemettais.

English Sentences: Be merciful unto me, O God, be merciful unto me: for my soul trusteth in thee: yea, in the shadow of thy wings will I make my refuge, until these calamities be overpast.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana maara; abeet Xoossau, tana maara; taani neekko baqatais. Taani bashshai aadhdhana gakkanaassi, ne qefiyaa giddo baqatada attais.

English Sentences: I will cry unto God most high; unto God that performeth all things for me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossaassi, taassi ubbabaa oottiya Xoossaassi waassais.

English Sentences: He shall send from heaven, and save me from the reproach of him that would swallow me up. Selah. God shall send forth his mercy and his truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai saluwaappe kiittidi, tana ashshana; tana yedhdhiyaageeta kaushshana; Xoossai aggenna ba siiquwaanne ba tumatettaa taayyo kiittana.

English Sentences: My soul is among lions: and I lie even among them that are set on fire, even the sons of men, whose teeth are spears and arrows, and their tongue a sharp sword.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta morkketu giddon, asaa dafidi miya gaammo malatu giddon de7ais. Eta achchai tooraanne wonddafiyaa zubbiyaa mala; eta inxxarssai qara biso mala.

English Sentences: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens; let thy glory be above all the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, neeni salotuppe bollaara xoqqu xoqqu ga; ne bonchchoi sa7a ubbaa bollaara de7o.

English Sentences: They have prepared a net for my steps; my soul is bowed down: they have digged a pit before me, into the midst whereof they are fallen themselves. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ta gediyaassi piriyaa wottidosona; taani metootada hokkaas. Eti ta ogiyan ollaa bookkidosona; shin he ollan banttau kunddidosona.

English Sentences: My heart is fixed, O God, my heart is fixed: I will sing and give praise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta wozanai minnidi de7ees; abeet Xoossau, ta wozanai minnidi de7ees. Taani neeyyo yexxananne nena sabbana.

English Sentences: Awake up, my glory; awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tanooshsho, beegotta! Diittaunne maazinqqiyau, beegottite! Taanikka maallado guuraara beegottana.

English Sentences: I will praise thee, O Lord, among the people: I will sing unto thee among the nations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau, taani nena asaa giddon galatana; qassi kawotettaa giddon nena sabbana.

English Sentences: For thy mercy is great unto the heavens, and thy truth unto the clouds.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, aggenna ne siiqoi gita; salota gakkiis. Ne tumatettaikka bolla shaaradan xoqqees.

English Sentences: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: let thy glory be above all the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, salotuppe bollaara xoqqu xoqqu ga! Ne bonchchoi sa7a ubbaa bolli gido.

English Sentences: Do ye indeed speak righteousness, O congregation? do ye judge uprightly, O ye sons of men?
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo deriyaa haariyaageetoo, tumaappe likke haasayeetii? Asa ubbaa giddon xilluwaa pirdeetii?

English Sentences: Yea, in heart ye work wickedness; ye weigh the violence of your hands in the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: CHii, intte wozanan iitabaa halchcheeta; biittan intte kushee makkalabaa oottiis.

English Sentences: The wicked are estranged from the womb: they go astray as soon as they be born, speaking lies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita asi aayee uluwaappe doommidi halees; yelettido gallassaappe doommidi, mooreesinne wordduwaa haasayees.

English Sentences: Their poison is like the poison of a serpent: they are like the deaf adder that stoppeth her ear;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti shooshshaadan yiishshaara de7oosona;

English Sentences: Which will not hearken to the voice of charmers, charming never so wisely.
Wolaitta Sentences: eti wolqqaama eeqanchchai daadumattiyoogaa siyennaadan, ba haittaa tucciya tulle hasuwaa mala.

English Sentences: Break their teeth, O God, in their mouth: break out the great teeth of the young lions, O LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, eta achchaa eta gappata giddon mentta; abeet GODAU, gaammotu kasilaa xukka.

English Sentences: Let them melt away as waters which run continually: when he bendeth his bow to shoot his arrows, let them be as cut in pieces.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti goggi xayiya haattaadan xayona. Eti bantta wonddafiyaa dukkiyo wode, zubbiyaa xeeran caddiya aifee xayo.

English Sentences: As a snail which melteth, let every one of them pass away: like the untimely birth of a woman, that they may not see the sun.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti maashidi saasso kiyiya xaadhdhiyaadan hanona; aayee uluwaappe boshettidi yelettida, poo7uwaa be7enna na7adan hanona.

English Sentences: Before your pots can feel the thorns, he shall take them away as with a whirlwind, both living, and in his wrath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti aguntta gididi daayanaappe kase, eti biron puutiyan de7ishin, i eta ba hanqquwan xaissana.

English Sentences: The righteous shall rejoice when he seeth the vengeance: he shall wash his feet in the blood of the wicked.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haluwaa kessiyoogaa be7iyo wode, xilloti ufaittana. Iitatu suuttan bantta tohuwaa meecettana.

English Sentences: So that a man shall say, Verily there is a reward for the righteous: verily he is a God that judgeth in the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode asai, "Tumakka xillotussi woitoi de7ees; tumakka sa7aa bolli pirddiya Xoossi de7ees" yaagana.

English Sentences: Deliver me from mine enemies, O my God: defend me from them that rise up against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet ta Xoossau, ta morkketuppe tana ashsha; ta bolli denddiyaageetuppe tana naaga.

English Sentences: Deliver me from the workers of iniquity, and save me from bloody men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita oottiyaageetuppe tana ashsha ekka; suuttaa gussiya asatuppe tana ashsha.

English Sentences: For, lo, they lie in wait for my soul: the mighty are gathered against me; not for my transgression, nor for my sin, O LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, eti tana woranau zuggidi naagiyoogaa be7a! He wolqqaama iita asati ta bolli yaa7oosona. Abeet GODAU, ta mooruwaa gishshau woikko ta nagaraa gishshau gidenna.

English Sentences: They run and prepare themselves without my fault: awake to help me, and behold.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti tana olanau wottaa jaamiyoogee, ta balaa gishshaassa gidenna. Beegotta, taakko haa yaada be7a.

English Sentences: Thou therefore, O LORD God of hosts, the God of Israel, awake to visit all the heathen: be not merciful to any wicked transgressors. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAU Xoossau, Israa7eela Xoossau, kawotettata ubbaa pirddanau beegotta; makkalaa oottiyaageeta maaroppa.

English Sentences: They return at evening: they make a noise like a dog, and go round about the city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti omarssan simmoosona; kanatudan bocciiddi, katama giddon yuuyoosona.

English Sentences: Behold, they belch out with their mouth: swords are in their lips: for who, say they, doth hear?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hekko, eti bantta doonan haasayidi salokkona; eta inxxarssai bisuwaa mala. Eti biron, "Ooninne siyenna" giidi qoppoosona.

English Sentences: But thou, O LORD, shalt laugh at them; thou shalt have all the heathen in derision.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin abeet GODAU, neeni eta bolli miiccaasa; kawotettatu ubbaa bolli qilliiccaasa.

English Sentences: Because of his strength will I wait upon thee: for God is my defence.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossau, neeni taayyo qosetta attiyo soho gidiyo gishshau, taani ne wolqqan ammanettais.

English Sentences: The God of my mercy shall prevent me: God shall let me see my desire upon mine enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta Xoossai aggenna ba siiquwan taakko yaana; ta Xoossai ta morkketa xooniyoogaa i tana bessana.

English Sentences: Slay them not, lest my people forget: scatter them by thy power; and bring them down, O Lord our shield.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta asati balirggenna mala, neeni eta woroppa. Abeet Godau, nu gonddalliyau, ne wolqqan eta toilayada ongga.

English Sentences: For the sin of their mouth and the words of their lips let them even be taken in their pride: and for cursing and lying which they speak.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta doonaa nagaraa gishshaunne bantta inxxarssaa qaalaa gishshau, bantta otoruwan oiqqettona. Eta qanggettaa gishshaunne eti haasayiyo wordduwaa gishshau,

English Sentences: Consume them in wrath, consume them, that they may not be: and let them know that God ruleth in Jacob unto the ends of the earth. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: ne hanqquwan eta xaissa. Xoossai Yaaqooba zareta haariyoogaanne sa7aa gaxaa gakkanaassi de7iya biittaa haariyoogaa asai erana mala, eta mulekka attennaadan xaissa.

English Sentences: And at evening let them return; and let them make a noise like a dog, and go round about the city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketi omarssan simmoosona; kanatudan bocciiddi, katamaa giddon yuuyoosona.

English Sentences: Let them wander up and down for meat, and grudge if they be not satisfied.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti miyoobaa hasanau toilattoosona; kallana xayikko zuuzummoosona.

English Sentences: But I will sing of thy power; yea, I will sing aloud of thy mercy in the morning: for thou hast been my defence and refuge in the day of my trouble.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani ne wolqqaa sabbana; maallado aggenna ne siiquwaabaa yexxana. Aissi giikko, neeni taayyo ta waayiyaa gallassi, taani baqata attiyoosaanne qosetta attiyoosaa gidadasa.

English Sentences: Unto thee, O my strength, will I sing: for God is my defence, and the God of my mercy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet taassi wolqqa gidida Xoossau, taani nena sabbana. Aissi giikko, taani qosetta attiyo sohoinne aggenna siiquwaa tana bessiya Xoossai nena.

English Sentences: O God, thou hast cast us off, thou hast scattered us, thou hast been displeased; O turn thyself to us again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, neeni nuna aggadasa; nu miixaa menttadasa. Neeni nuna hanqqettadasa; shin ha77i nuukko simma.

English Sentences: Thou hast made the earth to tremble; thou hast broken it: heal the breaches thereof; for it shaketh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni biittaa qaattadasanne za7issadasa; biittai kokkoriyo gishshau, neeni a za77uwaa bara.

English Sentences: Thou hast shewed thy people hard things: thou hast made us to drink the wine of astonishment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne asaa metuwaa bessadasa; neeni nuna ganddigaarissiya woiniyaa ushshadasa.

English Sentences: Thou hast given a banner to them that fear thee, that it may be displayed because of the truth. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeyyo yayyiyaageeti bantta morkkiyaa wonddafiyaappe attana mala, malaataa immadasa.

English Sentences: That thy beloved may be delivered; save with thy right hand, and hear me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni siiqiyoogeeti attana mala, ne ushachcha kushiyan nuna ashsha; neeni nuussi alla.

English Sentences: God hath spoken in his holiness; I will rejoice, I will divide Shechem, and mete out the valley of Succoth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ba geeshsha sohuwan hagaadan yaagiis; "Taani xoonada Sekeema biittaa shaakkana; qassi Sukkota Dilbbaa likkana.

English Sentences: Gilead is mine, and Manasseh is mine; Ephraim also is the strength of mine head; Judah is my lawgiver;
Wolaitta Sentences: Gala7aadee taagaa; Minaaseekka taassa; Efireemi ta huuphiyaa ashshiya qophe; Yihudai ta kawotaa xam77aa.

English Sentences: Moab is my washpot; over Edom will I cast out my shoe: Philistia, triumph thou because of me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Moo7aabi taani meecettiyo kuixaaro; Eedoomi taagaa gidiyoogaa erissanau ta caammaa a bolli wottais; Taani Pilisxxeema xoonada gereerais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Who will bring me into the strong city? who will lead me into Edom?
Wolaitta Sentences: Gimbbettida katamaakko, tana oonee efaanai? Eedooma gakkanaassi tana oonee kaalettanai?

English Sentences: Wilt not thou, O God, which hadst cast us off? and thou, O God, which didst not go out with our armies?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, nuna aggidai nena gidikkii? Abeet Xoossau, neeni nu tooranchchatuura olau kiyakka.

English Sentences: Give us help from trouble: for vain is the help of man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asa maadoi pattenna gishshau, morkkiyaara olettanau neeni nuna maadda.

English Sentences: Through God we shall do valiantly: for he it is that shall tread down our enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa wolqqan nu morkketa nuuni xoonana; nu morkketa yedhdhanai a.

English Sentences: Hear my cry, O God; attend unto my prayer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, neeni ta waasuwaa siya; ta woosaa ezgga.

English Sentences: From the end of the earth will I cry unto thee, when my heart is overwhelmed: lead me to the rock that is higher than I.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta sooppe kiyada haaho sohuwan de7ishin, ta wozanai taahido wode, taani nena xeesais. Taappe xoqqiya zaallaakko, tana kaaletta.

English Sentences: For thou hast been a shelter for me, and a strong tower from the enemy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, neeni taayyo qatonne taani ta morkketuppe naagettiyo mino miixaa.

English Sentences: I will abide in thy tabernacle for ever: I will trust in the covert of thy wings. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne dunkkaaniyan merinaayyo de7arkkinaa! Taani ne qefiyaa haphaa giddon saro attarkkinaa!

English Sentences: For thou, O God, hast heard my vows: thou hast given me the heritage of those that fear thy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, neeni ta shiiquwaa siyadasa. Ne sunttaa yayyiyaageeti laattiyo laataa taayyo immadasa.

English Sentences: Thou wilt prolong the king's life: and his years as many generations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawuwaa bariyaa adussa; i yeletaappe yeletaa gakkanaassi de7o.

English Sentences: He shall abide before God for ever: O prepare mercy and truth, which may preserve him.
Wolaitta Sentences: I Xoossaa sinttan merinau kawoto; aggenna ne siiquwaaninne ne tumatettan neeni a naaga.

English Sentences: So will I sing praise unto thy name for ever, that I may daily perform my vows.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatiyaabaa gidikko, taani ta shiiquwaa gallassi gallassi gattaidda, ne sunttaa ubbaton sabbana.

English Sentences: Truly my soul waiteth upon God: from him cometh my salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa xalaalan taani shemppuwaa demmaas; ta atotettai appe yees.

English Sentences: He only is my rock and my salvation; he is my defence; I shall not be greatly moved.
Wolaitta Sentences: A xalaalai ta wogga zaallaanne tana ashshiyaagaa; i taani qosetta attiyo soho gidiyo gishshau, mulekka yeeqikke.

English Sentences: How long will ye imagine mischief against a man? ye shall be slain all of you: as a bowing wall shall ye be, and as a tottering fence.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woddiya godanne qaaxxiya dirssanne milatiya asa woranau, intte aude gakkanaassi dendduuteetii?

English Sentences: They only consult to cast him down from his excellency: they delight in lies: they bless with their mouth, but they curse inwardly. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti a bonchcho sohuwaappe a wottanaagaa xalaalaa koyoosona; eti wordduwan ufaittoosona. Bantta doonan anjjoosona; shin bantta wozanan qanggoosona.

English Sentences: My soul, wait thou only upon God; for my expectation is from him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa xalaalan taani shemppuwaa demmaas; taani ufaissan naagiyoogee appe yees.

English Sentences: He only is my rock and my salvation: he is my defence; I shall not be moved.
Wolaitta Sentences: A xalaalai ta wogga zaallaanne tana ashshiyaagaa; i taani qosetta attiyo soho gidiyo gishshau, mulekka yeeqikke.

English Sentences: In God is my salvation and my glory: the rock of my strength, and my refuge, is in God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta atotettainne ta bonchchoi Xoossaana; i ta mino zaallaanne ta qatuwaa.

English Sentences: Trust in him at all times; ye people, pour out your heart before him: God is a refuge for us. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asau, Xoossan ubba wode ammanettite; i nuuyyo qato gidiyo gishshau, intte metuwaa ayyo yootite.

English Sentences: Surely men of low degree are vanity, and men of high degree are a lie: to be laid in the balance, they are altogether lighter than vanity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi ubbi issiton shemppiyo carkko mala; xoqqin ziqqin, asi hada. Meezaanan wottinkka eti ainne deexxokkona; eti issiton shemppiyo carkkoppekka kauyyoosona.

English Sentences: Trust not in oppression, and become not vain in robbery: if riches increase, set not your heart upon them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Makkalan ammanettoppite; bonqqi shiishshidi duretanau halchchoppite. Intte duretettai darikkokka, intte wozanaa a bolli wottoppite.

English Sentences: God hath spoken once; twice have I heard this; that power belongeth unto God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai hagaadan giyoogaa taani zaara zaarada siyaas; "Wolqqai Xoossaassa.

English Sentences: Also unto thee, O Lord, belongeth mercy: for thou renderest to every man according to his work.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aggenna siiqoi Xoossaabaa" yaagiis. Abeet GODAU, neeni asa ubbaassi a oosuwaadan oosuwaadan qanxxana.

English Sentences: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is;
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, neeni ta Xoossaa; ta wozanai nena laamotees; ta ashoikka nena amottees. Mela, qa77enne haatti bainna biittaadan ta kumetta asatettai nena saamettees.

English Sentences: To see thy power and thy glory, so as I have seen thee in the sanctuary.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena geeshsha sohuwan be7arkkinaa; ne wolqqaakka ne bonchchuwaakka tana bessa.

English Sentences: Because thy lovingkindness is better than life, my lips shall praise thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aggenna ne siiqoi de7uwaappe lo77iyo gishshau, ta inxxarssai nena bonchchana.

English Sentences: Thus will I bless thee while I live: I will lift up my hands in thy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta de7uwaa laittan taani nena galatana; ta kushiyaa miccada, taani nena woossana.

English Sentences: My soul shall be satisfied as with marrow and fatness; and my mouth shall praise thee with joyful lips:
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi oissa qumaa kalliyoogaadan, taani nena kallana. Taani ta inxxarssan ufaissaa yettan nena galatana.

English Sentences: When I remember thee upon my bed, and meditate on thee in the night watches.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta hiixan nena hassayais; qamma ubban nebaa qoppais;

English Sentences: Because thou hast been my help, therefore in the shadow of thy wings will I rejoice.
Wolaitta Sentences: aissi giikko, neeni tana maaddidaagaa. Taani ne qefiyaa kuwan uttada, ufaissau yexxais.

English Sentences: My soul followeth hard after thee: thy right hand upholdeth me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne mati shiiqa uttais; ne ushachcha kushee tana oiqqidi naagees.

English Sentences: But those that seek my soul, to destroy it, shall go into the lower parts of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin tana worana koyiyaageeti biitta garssa ciimma sohuwan moogettana.

English Sentences: They shall fall by the sword: they shall be a portion for foxes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bisuwau aadhdhidi immettana; eti godare kaho gidana.

English Sentences: But the king shall rejoice in God; every one that sweareth by him shall glory: but the mouth of them that speak lies shall be stopped.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin kawoi Xoossan ufaittana. Xoossaa sunttan caaqqiya ubbai a galatana; shin wordduwaa haasayiyaageetu doonai gorddettana.

English Sentences: Hear my voice, O God, in my prayer: preserve my life from fear of the enemy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, taani maganniyo maganaa neeni siya. Taani ta morkketussi yayyaas; tana ashsha.

English Sentences: Hide me from the secret counsel of the wicked; from the insurrection of the workers of iniquity:
Wolaitta Sentences: Palatu maqquwaappenne iitaa oottiyaageetu yaa7aappe tana gentta.

English Sentences: Who whet their tongue like a sword, and bend their bows to shoot their arrows, even bitter words:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta inxxarssaa bisodan leefidosona; qassi marzze qaalata wonddafiyaa zubbiyaadan dukkanau giigissidosona.

English Sentences: That they may shoot in secret at the perfect: suddenly do they shoot at him, and fear not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti qosettidi, bantta wonddafiyaa xillo asa bolli dafoosona; akeeki bainnan dukkoosona; eti yayyokkona.

English Sentences: They encourage themselves in an evil matter: they commune of laying snares privily; they say, Who shall see them?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta iita maqquwaassi issoi issuwaa minttettoosona; bantta piriyaa qottiyoosaa zorettoosona. Eti, "A ooni be7anee?" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: They search out iniquities; they accomplish a diligent search: both the inward thought of every one of them, and the heart, is deep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti iitabaa maqettiiddi, "Nuuni lo77o maqqo maqettida" yaagoosona. Hegeenne, asassi wozanainne kahai ciimma gidiyoogaa bessees.

English Sentences: But God shall shoot at them with an arrow; suddenly shall they be wounded.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai eta ba wonddafiyan dukkana; eti akeekennan masunxxana.

English Sentences: So they shall make their own tongue to fall upon themselves: all that see them shall flee away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta maqquwaa gishshau, i eta xaissana; eta be7iya ubbai huuphiyaa qaattana.

English Sentences: And all men shall fear, and shall declare the work of God; for they shall wisely consider of his doing.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode asai ubbai Xoossaassi yayyana; a oosuwaabaa yootananne zaari zaaridi qoppana.

English Sentences: The righteous shall be glad in the LORD, and shall trust in him; and all the upright in heart shall glory.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xilloti GODAN ufaittonanne akko baqatidi attona; wozanaa suureti ubbai galatona.

English Sentences: Praise waiteth for thee, O God, in Sion: and unto thee shall the vow be performed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, Xiyoonen neeyyo galatai bessees; nuuni neeyyo shiiqettidobaakka gattana.

English Sentences: O thou that hearest prayer, unto thee shall all flesh come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet woosaa siyiyaagoo, asai ubbai neekko yaana.

English Sentences: Iniquities prevail against me: as for our transgressions, thou shalt purge them away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu nagarai nuna muukkido wode, neeni nu mooruwaa atto gaadasa.

English Sentences: Blessed is the man whom thou choosest, and causest to approach unto thee, that he may dwell in thy courts: we shall be satisfied with the goodness of thy house, even of thy holy temple.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni dooridonne ne shilootan uttanau mataa shiishshiyo asi anjjettidaagaa. Nuuni ne son, ne geeshsha Beeta Maqidasiyan de7iya lo77oban kumida.

English Sentences: By terrible things in righteousness wilt thou answer us, O God of our salvation; who art the confidence of all the ends of the earth, and of them that are afar off upon the sea:
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet nuna ashshiya Xoossau, garamissiya ne xillo oosuwan neeni nuuyyo allaasa. Sa7aa gaxaappe gaxaa gakkanaassi, haaho abbatuppekka hefinttan de7iya asa ubbau ammanettiyaagee nena.

English Sentences: Which by his strength setteth fast the mountains; being girded with power:
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni nena wolqqaa gixissada; gita dereta ne minotettan essadasa.

English Sentences: Which stilleth the noise of the seas, the noise of their waves, and the tumult of the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni abbaa wocamaanne beetaa gunttaa sirphphi oottaasa; qassi deree denddiyo denttaa irxxissaasa.

English Sentences: They also that dwell in the uttermost parts are afraid at thy tokens: thou makest the outgoings of the morning and evening to rejoice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan neeni oottido malaataa gishshau, sa7aa gaxaa gakkanaassi de7iya asai ubbai neeyyo, "Hoola!" gees. Mokkiyoosaappe wulliyoosaa gakkanaassi de7iya asa ubbaa ufaisadasa.

English Sentences: Thou visitest the earth, and waterest it: thou greatly enrichest it with the river of God, which is full of water: thou preparest them corn, when thou hast so provided for it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni biittaa naagada haattaa ushshaasa; yaatada daro dureyaasa. Asaayyo kattai mokkana mala, Xoossaa shaafai haattai kumidoogaa; hegaadan oottada neeni giigissadasa.

English Sentences: Thou waterest the ridges thereof abundantly: thou settlest the furrows thereof: thou makest it soft with showers: thou blessest the springing thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHakkiliyaa worana malanne gagaraa shugissana mala, neeni yafaran haattaa kunttaasa; kunttada kattai mokkana mala anjjaasa.

English Sentences: Thou crownest the year with thy goodness; and thy paths drop fatness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laittaa kalo laitta oottaasa; neeni aadhdhiyoosai ubbai kumi goggees.

English Sentences: They drop upon the pastures of the wilderness: and the little hills rejoice on every side.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni bazzuwaa mehiyan kunttaasa; keratakka ufaissaa gixissaasa.

English Sentences: The pastures are clothed with flocks; the valleys also are covered over with corn; they shout for joy, they also sing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni hentta gadiyaa wudiyaa maizzaasa; dilbba biittaakka kattaa kunttaasa. Eti ufaissau hombbocoosonanne yexxoosona.

English Sentences: Make a joyful noise unto God, all ye lands:
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7an de7iya asa ubbau, intte qaalaa xoqqissidi, ufaissan Xoossaa galatite.

English Sentences: Sing forth the honour of his name: make his praise glorious.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Xoossaa sunttai bonchchetto!" giidi yexxite; bonchcho galataa ayyo immite.

English Sentences: Say unto God, How terrible art thou in thy works! through the greatness of thy power shall thine enemies submit themselves unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaayyo hagaadan yaagite; "Ne oosoti aiba garamissiyaabee! Ne wolqqai darido gishshau, ne morkketi yashshau ne sinttan gulbbatoosona.

English Sentences: All the earth shall worship thee, and shall sing unto thee; they shall sing to thy name. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7an de7iya ubbati neeyyo goinnoosona; nena sabboosona; ne sunttaayyo galataa yexxoosona" yaagite.

English Sentences: Come and see the works of God: he is terrible in his doing toward the children of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haayite; Xoossai oottidobaa be7ite; i asaa giddon garamissiya oosuwaa oottiis.

English Sentences: He turned the sea into dry land: they went through the flood on foot: there did we rejoice in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: I abbaa haattaa melissiis; qassi beni nu aawati shaafaara bantta tohuwan hemettidi pinnidosona. Hegan i oottidoban nuuni ufaittida.

English Sentences: He ruleth by his power for ever; his eyes behold the nations: let not the rebellious exalt themselves. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba wolqqan merinaayyo haarees. Kawotettata ba aifiyan xeellees; hegaa gishshau, makkaliyaageeti a bolli denddoppona.

English Sentences: O bless our God, ye people, and make the voice of his praise to be heard:
Wolaitta Sentences: Asatoo, nu Xoossaa galatite; intte a galatiyo galatai siyetto.

English Sentences: Which holdeth our soul in life, and suffereth not our feet to be moved.
Wolaitta Sentences: I nuna paxa wottiis; nuuni kunddennaadaaninne naagiis.

English Sentences: For thou, O God, hast proved us: thou hast tried us, as silver is tried.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, neeni nuna qoradasa; biraa geeshshanau seerissiyoogaadan nuna paaccadasa.

English Sentences: Thou broughtest us into the net; thou laidst affliction upon our loins.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni nuna piriyan gelissadasa. Nu zokkuwankka deexobaa toossadasa.

English Sentences: Thou hast caused men to ride over our heads; we went through fire and through water: but thou broughtest us out into a wealthy place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Morkketi nu huuphiyaara togganaadan oottadasa. Nuuni haatta giddooranne tama giddoora kanttida; shin ha77i nuna ishaliyoosaa ehaadasa.

English Sentences: I will go into thy house with burnt offerings: I will pay thee my vows,
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani xuuggiyo yarshshuwaara ne keettaa gelada, ta shiiquwaa neeyyo gattana.

English Sentences: Which my lips have uttered, and my mouth hath spoken, when I was in trouble.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani metootido wode ta doonan shiiqettido shiiquwaa, ta inxxarssaappe kiyidaagaa, taani gattana.

English Sentences: I will offer unto thee burnt sacrifices of fatlings, with the incense of rams; I will offer bullocks with goats. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani neeyyo xuuggidi yarshshiyo dorssa orggeta shiishshana. Korima booratanne deeshsha orggeta neeyyo yarshshana; he yarshshotu cuwai saluwaa gakkana.

English Sentences: Come and hear, all ye that fear God, and I will declare what he hath done for my soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, Xoossaassi yayyiyaageetoo, ubbati haa yiidi, siyite. Xoossai taassi oottidobaa taani inttessi yootana.

English Sentences: I cried unto him with my mouth, and he was extolled with my tongue.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta qaalaa xoqqu oottada taani Xoossaa woossaas; ta inxxarssan ayyo galataa shiishshaas.

English Sentences: If I regard iniquity in my heart, the Lord will not hear me:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta wozanan nagaraa genttidaakko, Godai taayyo siyenna.

English Sentences: But verily God hath heard me; he hath attended to the voice of my prayer.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai tumuppe taayyo siyiis; ta woosaanne ezggiis.

English Sentences: Blessed be God, which hath not turned away my prayer, nor his mercy from me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ta woosaa ixxibeenna gishshau, qassi aggenna ba siiquwaa taayyo diggibeenna gishshau, galatetto.

English Sentences: God be merciful unto us, and bless us; and cause his face to shine upon us; Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai nuuyyo qarettonne nuna anjjo; ba som77uwaa nu bollan poo7isso.

English Sentences: That thy way may be known upon earth, thy saving health among all nations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne ogeti ha sa7aa bollan, ne ashshiya wolqqaikka kawotettatu ubbaa gidduwan erettona.

English Sentences: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, asai nena galato; asai ubbai nena galato.

English Sentences: O let the nations be glad and sing for joy: for thou shalt judge the people righteously, and govern the nations upon earth. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotettati ubbai, "Hashshu!" giidi, ufaissau yexxona. Aissi giikko, neeni asaa xillotettan pirddaasa; qassi sa7an de7iya kawotettata kaalettaasa.

English Sentences: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, asai nena galato; asai ubbai nena galato.

English Sentences: Then shall the earth yield her increase; and God, even our own God, shall bless us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittai kattaa mokkiis; Xoossai, nu Xoossai nuna anjjiis.

English Sentences: God shall bless us; and all the ends of the earth shall fear him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai nuna anjjiis. Sa7aa gaxaa gakkanaassi de7iya asai ubbai ayyo yayyo.

English Sentences: Let God arise, let his enemies be scattered: let them also that hate him flee before him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai denddo; a morkketi laalettona. A ixxiyaageeti a sinttaappe baqatona.

English Sentences: As smoke is driven away, so drive them away: as wax melteth before the fire, so let the wicked perish at the presence of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Cuwai carkkuwan suragettiyoogaadan neeni eta goodda. Eessaa muqaaddai taman seeriyoogaadan, iitati Xoossaa sinttappe xayona.

English Sentences: But let the righteous be glad; let them rejoice before God: yea, let them exceedingly rejoice.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin xilloti hashshu goona; Xoossaa sinttan ufaittona; ufaissan ililona.

English Sentences: Sing unto God, sing praises to his name: extol him that rideth upon the heavens by his name JAH, and rejoice before him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaassi yexxite; a sunttaa sabbite. SHaaraa toggiyaagaayyo ogiyaa kessite; a sunttai GODAA; a sinttan ufaittite.

English Sentences: A father of the fatherless, and a judge of the widows, is God in his holy habitation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ba de7iyo geeshsha sohuwan, aawi bainna naatussi aawa; qassi azinai haiqqido maccaasata naagiyaagaa.

English Sentences: God setteth the solitary in families: he bringeth out those which are bound with chains: but the rebellious dwell in a dry land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai barkka de7iyaageetussi keetta asaa immees. Qasho keettan de7iyaageeta birshshidi, eta ufaissan wottees. SHin makkalanchchati melida biittan de7oosona.

English Sentences: O God, when thou wentest forth before thy people, when thou didst march through the wilderness; Selah:
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, neeni ne asaa kaalettido wode, neeni etaara mela bazzuwaa kanttido wode,

English Sentences: The earth shook, the heavens also dropped at the presence of God: even Sinai itself was moved at the presence of God, the God of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siinaa Deriyan qonccida Xoossaa sinttan, Israa7eela Xoossaa sinttan biittai qaaxxiis; saloti iraa duge tigi bayidosona.

English Sentences: Thou, O God, didst send a plentiful rain, whereby thou didst confirm thine inheritance, when it was weary.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, neeni iraa darissada bukissadasa; qa77ettida biittaa zaarada ooraxissadasa.

English Sentences: Thy congregation hath dwelt therein: thou, O God, hast prepared of thy goodness for the poor.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne asainne yan uttiis. Abeet Xoossau, ne kehatettan hiyyeesatussi koshshiyaabaa giigissada immadasa.

English Sentences: The Lord gave the word: great was the company of those that published it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godai kiitaa kiittiis; he kiitaa efiida maccaasati daro.

English Sentences: Kings of armies did flee apace: and she that tarried at home divided the spoil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti yaagidosona; "Morkke kawotinne eta tooranchchati baqataa shaaridosona; son attida maccaasati omooduwaa shaakkidosona.

English Sentences: Though ye have lien among the pots, yet shall ye be as the wings of a dove covered with silver, and her feathers with yellow gold.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHooliya worqqa qefiyaara de7iya, biraappe merettida haraphphiyaa misiliyaa omoodoi, dorssaa birddiyaa giddon aqiyaageetakka gakkiis" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: When the Almighty scattered kings in it, it was white as snow in Salmon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaa Danddayiya Xoossai kawota laalido wode, Xalmmoona Deriyaa bolli shachchaa bukissiis.

English Sentences: The hill of God is as the hill of Bashan; an high hill as the hill of Bashan.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baasaane dereti wogga gita dereta; baasaane dereti daro xeerati de7iyoogeeta.

English Sentences: Why leap ye, ye high hills? this is the hill which God desireth to dwell in; yea, the LORD will dwell in it for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro xeerati de7iyo deretoo, Xoossai baassa oottanau doorido deriyaa intte aissi qanaatidi xeelleetii? GODAI an merinau de7ana.

English Sentences: The chariots of God are twenty thousand, even thousands of angels: the Lord is among them, as in Sinai, in the holy place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa olaa paraa gaareti tammu sha7aaninne sha7u sha7an qoodettiyaageeta; Godai Siinaa deriyaappe ba geeshsha sohuwaa yiis.

English Sentences: Thou hast ascended on high, thou hast led captivity captive: thou hast received gifts for men; yea, for the rebellious also, that the LORD God might dwell among them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Omoodettida darota ekkidi, i pude xoqqaa kiyiis. Asaappe, harai atto makkalanchcha asaappekka imuwaa ekkiis. GODAI Xoossai yan de7ana.

English Sentences: Blessed be the Lord, who daily loadeth us with benefits, even the God of our salvation. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hachchi hachchi nu toohuwaa tookkiya Godai galatetto; Xoossai nuna ashshiyaagaa.

English Sentences: He that is our God is the God of salvation; and unto GOD the Lord belong the issues from death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ee, nu Xoossai nuna ashshiya Xoossaattennee! Haiquwaappe attiyoi Ubbaa Haariya GODAI ashshiina.

English Sentences: But God shall wound the head of his enemies, and the hairy scalp of such an one as goeth on still in his trespasses.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai tumaappe bari morkketu guuggiyaa kinchchana; nagaraa ogiyan hemettiya goofaranchchatu huuphiyaa menttana.

English Sentences: The Lord said, I will bring again from Bashan, I will bring my people again from the depths of the sea:
Wolaitta Sentences: Godai yaagiis; "Taani intte morkketa Baasaaneppe zaarada ehaana; taani eta ciimma abbaa giddoppe kessada guyye ehaana.

English Sentences: That thy foot may be dipped in the blood of thine enemies, and the tongue of thy dogs in the same.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, neeni ne morkketu suuttaa giddoora colbbaya yedhdhaidda hemettanaassanne ne kanatikka morkkiyaa suuttaappe bantta gishshaa inxxarssan laaccanaassa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: They have seen thy goings, O God; even the goings of my God, my King, in the sanctuary.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, ne salppee, ta Xoossaa ta kawuwaa salppee, Beeta Maqidasiyaa geliyo wode ubbau beettees.

English Sentences: The singers went before, the players on instruments followed after; among them were the damsels playing with timbrels.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yexxiyaageeti sinttaana; diixxiyaageeti guyyeena; qassi cachcha karaabiyaa baqqiya geela7oti gidduwaana.

English Sentences: Bless ye God in the congregations, even the Lord, from the fountain of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti, "Xoossaa kunttida yaa7an galatite; inttenoo, Israa7eela zerettatoo, GODAA galatite" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: There is little Benjamin with their ruler, the princes of Judah and their council, the princes of Zebulun, and the princes of Naphtali.
Wolaitta Sentences: He salppiyan ubbaappe kaalotiya Biniyaama zareti koiro beettoosona. Kaallidi Yihudaa halaqati bantta citaara de7oosona; wurssettan Zaabiloona halaqatinne Nifttaaleema halaqati beettoosona.

English Sentences: Thy God hath commanded thy strength: strengthen, O God, that which thou hast wrought for us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, ne wolqqaa qonccissa. Abeet nuussi oottida Xoossau, ne minotettaa bessa.

English Sentences: Because of thy temple at Jerusalem shall kings bring presents unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Yerusalaamen de7iya ne Beeta Maqidasiyaa kawoti yiidi, neeyyo imuwaa immana.

English Sentences: Rebuke the company of spearmen, the multitude of the bulls, with the calves of the people, till every one submit himself with pieces of silver: scatter thou the people that delight in war.
Wolaitta Sentences: Do7aadan maqqaa giddon de7iya Gibxxe asata neeni seera. Booratunne maratu wudiyaa milatiya kawotettata neeni godata. Eti gulbbatidi, bantta biraa neeyyo immana gakkanaassi, neeni eta seera. Olettanau yeemottiya asata laala.

English Sentences: Princes shall come out of Egypt; Ethiopia shall soon stretch out her hands unto God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitettida halaqati Gibxxeppe yaana; Toophphiyaa bari kushiyaa eesuwan Xoossaakko miccana.

English Sentences: Sing unto God, ye kingdoms of the earth; O sing praises unto the Lord; Selah:
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, sa7aa kawotettatoo, Xoossaassi yexxite; salotan, beni salotan toggiya Godaa sabbite.

English Sentences: To him that rideth upon the heavens of heavens, which were of old; lo, he doth send out his voice, and that a mighty voice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Siyite! I ba cenggurssaa, ba wolqqaama gunttaa kiittees.

English Sentences: Ascribe ye strength unto God: his excellency is over Israel, and his strength is in the clouds.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa wolqqaabaa awaajjite; a anggai Israa7eela bollaana; a wolqqaikka saluwaana.

English Sentences: O God, thou art terrible out of thy holy places: the God of Israel is he that giveth strength and power unto his people. Blessed be God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ba Beeta Maqidasiyan, "Hoola!" giissiyaagaa. Israa7eela Xoossai ba asau minotaanne wolqqaa immees. Xoossai galatetto.

English Sentences: Save me, O God; for the waters are come in unto my soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, tana ashsha; aissi giikko, haattai taayyo qooriyaa gakkiis.

English Sentences: I sink in deep mire, where there is no standing: I am come into deep waters, where the floods overflow me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tohoi eqqiyoosi bainna liqimisiyan muukettais; ciimma haattaa giddo gelaas; haattaa zulee ta bolli zin77ana hanees.

English Sentences: I am weary of my crying: my throat is dried: mine eyes fail while I wait for my God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maadossi waassaidda daafurais; ta qorjjantteekka meliis. Ta Xoossai allees gaada xeellishin, ta aifee galjjiis.

English Sentences: They that hate me without a cause are more than the hairs of mine head: they that would destroy me, being mine enemies wrongfully, are mighty: then I restored that which I took not away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana coo ixxiyaageeti ta huuphiyaa binnaanaappe daro. Wordduwan tana morkkiyaageetinne xaissanau koyiyaageeti daridosona. Taani mabeenna miishshaa tana qanxxissoosona.

English Sentences: O God, thou knowest my foolishness; and my sins are not hid from thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, ta mooruwaa eeyyatettaa neeni eraasa; taani oottido nagarai neeppe qosettenna.

English Sentences: Let not them that wait on thee, O Lord GOD of hosts, be ashamed for my sake: let not those that seek thee be confounded for my sake, O God of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAU, nena ufaissan naagiyaageeti ta gaasuwan yeellatoppona. Abeet Israa7eela Xoossau, neekko shiiqiyaageeti ta gaasuwan kauyyoppona.

English Sentences: Because for thy sake I have borne reproach; shame hath covered my face.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani cashshaa danddayidoogeenne ta som77oi yeellaa maayidoogee ne gishshaassa.

English Sentences: I am become a stranger unto my brethren, and an alien unto my mother's children.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta ishanttussi imatta, qassi ta aayee naatussi allaga gidaas.

English Sentences: For the zeal of thine house hath eaten me up; and the reproaches of them that reproached thee are fallen upon me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne keettau mishettiyo mishoi tana tamadan xuuggees; nena cayiyaageetu cashshai ta bolli wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: When I wept, and chastened my soul with fasting, that was to my reproach.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani xoomada, ta huuphiyaa kaushshidoogee, taayyo cashsha gidiis.

English Sentences: I made sackcloth also my garment; and I became a proverb to them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani kayyo maayuwaa maayido wode, etau leemisidi odiyoobaa gidaas.

English Sentences: They that sit in the gate speak against me; and I was the song of the drunkards.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ogiyan yuuyiyaageeti tana qilliiccoosona; mattottiyaageeti tabaa yetta kessoosona.

English Sentences: But as for me, my prayer is unto thee, O LORD, in an acceptable time: O God, in the multitude of thy mercy hear me, in the truth of thy salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin abeet GODAU, tana gidikko, taani nena woossais. Abeet Xoossau, ne dosiyo wodiyan, aggenna ne siiquwaa daruwan, neeni maaddana giidoogaadan taayyo zaaruwaa imma.

English Sentences: Deliver me out of the mire, and let me not sink: let me be delivered from them that hate me, and out of the deep waters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Liqimisiyan muukettennaadan tana ashsha. Tana ixxiyaageetuppe, ciimma haattatuppe neeni kessa ekka.

English Sentences: Let not the waterflood overflow me, neither let the deep swallow me up, and let not the pit shut her mouth upon me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haattaa zuliyaa ta bolli zin77issoppa; woikko liqimisiyan tana mitissoppa; woikko duufuwaa doonaa ta bolli gorddissoppa.

English Sentences: Hear me, O LORD; for thy lovingkindness is good: turn unto me according to the multitude of thy tender mercies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, aggenna ne siiquwaa kehatettaadan taayyo zaaruwaa imma. Ne qaretaa daruwaadan taakko simma.

English Sentences: And hide not thy face from thy servant; for I am in trouble: hear me speedily.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taappe ne ashkkaraappe ne som77uwaa genttoppa; taani waayettiyo gishshau, taayyo eesuwan zaaruwaa imma.

English Sentences: Draw nigh unto my soul, and redeem it: deliver me because of mine enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni taakko shiiqa; tana woza; ta morkketuppe tana birshsha yedda.

English Sentences: Thou hast known my reproach, and my shame, and my dishonour: mine adversaries are all before thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani cashshaa, yeellaanne kaushshaa ekkidoogaa neeni eraasa. Aissi giikko, ta morkketa ubbaa neeni be7aasa.

English Sentences: Reproach hath broken my heart; and I am full of heaviness: and I looked for some to take pity, but there was none; and for comforters, but I found none.
Wolaitta Sentences: Cashshai ta wozanaa paxennaadan menttiis; taayyo qarettiyaabaa koyaas. SHin issoinne baawa; tana minttettiya asa xeellaas; shin demmabeikke.

English Sentences: They gave me also gall for my meat; and in my thirst they gave me vinegar to drink.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani namisettido wode, taayyo cammiya qumaa aattidosona. Taani saamettido wode, taayyo caala woine eessaa immidosona.

English Sentences: Let their table become a snare before them: and that which should have been for their welfare, let it become a trap.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti miyo masoofee etau pire gido. Eti yarshshuwaa yarshshiiddi miyo gibirai etau gite gido.

English Sentences: Let their eyes be darkened, that they see not; and make their loins continually to shake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xeellennaadan eta aifee goozetto; eta gaadiyaa ubbaton kokkorssa.

English Sentences: Pour out thine indignation upon them, and let thy wrathful anger take hold of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne hanqquwaa eta bolli tiga; ne suulo hanqqoi eta yedettidi oiqqo.

English Sentences: Let their habitation be desolate; and let none dwell in their tents.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta keettai mela de7o; eta dunkkaaniyan ooninne de7oppo.

English Sentences: For they persecute him whom thou hast smitten; and they talk to the grief of those whom thou hast wounded.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti neeni qaxxayidoogeeta yedettoosona; qassi neeni dechchidoogeetu tuggaabaa denttidi haasayoosona.

English Sentences: Add iniquity unto their iniquity: and let them not come into thy righteousness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni eta nagaraa bolli eta nagaraa gujjada mazggafa; ne atotettaappe eta aibinne gakkoppo.
