English Sentences: Let them be blotted out of the book of the living, and not be written with the righteous.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti de7o maxaafaappe qucettona; xillo asaara mazggafettoppona.

English Sentences: But I am poor and sorrowful: let thy salvation, O God, set me up on high.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani waayettaiddanne tuggataidda de7ais. Abeet Xoossau, tana ashshada, saro sohuwan wotta.

English Sentences: I will praise the name of God with a song, and will magnify him with thanksgiving.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Xoossaa sunttaa yettan galatana; galataa imuwan a gitayana.

English Sentences: This also shall please the LORD better than an ox or bullock that hath horns and hoofs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, booraa yarshshiyoogaappe woikko kacaama korimaa yarshshiyoogaappe aadhdhidi, GODAA ufaissana.

English Sentences: The humble shall see this, and be glad: and your heart shall live that seek God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naaqettidaageeti tana GODAI ashshidoogaa be7idi ufaittona. Inttenoo Xoossaakko shiiqiyaageetoo, intte wozanai minetto.

English Sentences: For the LORD heareth the poor, and despiseth not his prisoners.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAI hiyyeesatuyyo siyees; qasho keettan de7iya ba asaakka karenna.

English Sentences: Let the heaven and earth praise him, the seas, and every thing that moveth therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saloinne sa7ai, qassi abbainne a giddon woxxi qaaxxiya ubbati GODAA galatona.

English Sentences: For God will save Zion, and will build the cities of Judah: that they may dwell there, and have it in possession.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Xoossai Xiyoone ashshana; Yihudaa katamaa zaaridi keexxana. Keexxin a asai yan de7ananne he biittai etassa gidana.

English Sentences: The seed also of his servants shall inherit it: and they that love his name shall dwell therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: A ashkkaratu naati he biittaa laattana; a sunttaa siiqiyaageeti yan de7ana.

English Sentences: MAKE HASTE, O GOD, TO DELIVER ME; MAKE HASTE TO HELP ME, O LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, tana ashshanau eeno ga; abeet GODAU, tana maaddanau eesota.

English Sentences: Let them be ashamed and confounded that seek after my soul: let them be turned backward, and put to confusion, that desire my hurt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana woranau koyiyaageeti yeellatonanne kauyyona. Taani qohettanaagaa amottiyaageeti, kauyyidi guyye simmona.

English Sentences: Let them be turned back for a reward of their shame that say, Aha, aha.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta bolli, "Au hashshu! Hashshu!" giidaageeti xoonettido gishshau yeellatona.

English Sentences: Let all those that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee: and let such as love thy salvation say continually, Let God be magnified.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin nena koyiya ubbati nenan ufaittonanne hashshu goona. Qassi ne atotettaa dosiyaageeti ubbati, "Xoossai gitato!" yaagona.

English Sentences: But I am poor and needy: make haste unto me, O God: thou art my help and my deliverer; O LORD, make no tarrying.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hiyyeesanne metootanchcha; abeet Xoossau, eesuwan taakko haaya. Tana maaddiyainne ashshiyai nena; abeet GODAU, gam77oppa.

English Sentences: In thee, O LORD, do I put my trust: let me never be put to confusion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani neekko baqatais; audenne tana yeellayoppa.

English Sentences: Deliver me in thy righteousness, and cause me to escape: incline thine ear unto me, and save me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne xillotettan tana wotta ekka; ne haittaa taakko yeggada, tana ashsha.

English Sentences: Be thou my strong habitation, whereunto I may continually resort: thou hast given commandment to save me; for thou art my rock and my fortress.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni taani geemmiyo wogga zaallanne tana ashshiya mino qato gida. Ee, neeni ta wogga zaallaanne ta qato.

English Sentences: Deliver me, O my God, out of the hand of the wicked, out of the hand of the unrighteous and cruel man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet ta Xoossau, iitatu kushiyaappenne, pala qareti bainna asatu wolqqaappe tana ashsha.

English Sentences: For thou art my hope, O Lord GOD: thou art my trust from my youth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, abeet Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, neeni taani ufaissan naagiyoogaanne ta yelagatettaa wodiyaappe doommada, taani ammanettiyoogaa gidadasa.

English Sentences: By thee have I been holden up from the womb: thou art he that took me out of my mother's bowels: my praise shall be continually of thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani yelettiyo wodiyaappe doommada nenan zemppaas; ta aayee uluwaappe wodhdhoosappe doommada neeni tana naagadasa. Ubbatonkka ta galatai neessa.

English Sentences: I am as a wonder unto many; but thou art my strong refuge.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni taayyo baqata attiyo wolqqaama soho gidido gishshau, ta de7oi daro asaayyo leemiso gidiis.

English Sentences: Let my mouth be filled with thy praise and with thy honour all the day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gallassa ubban ta doonai ne galataaninne ne bonchchuwan kumiis.

English Sentences: Cast me not off in the time of old age; forsake me not when my strength faileth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani cimido wodiyan tana oloppa; ta wolqqai ixxido wodiyan tana aggoppa.

English Sentences: For mine enemies speak against me; and they that lay wait for my soul take counsel together,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ta morkketi ta bolli haasayoosona, Tana woranau koyiyaageeti issippe shiiqidi maqettoosona.

English Sentences: Saying, God hath forsaken him: persecute and take him; for there is none to deliver him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti, "Xoossai a aggiis; yedettidi a oiqqoos. Aissi giikko, a ashshanai ooninne baawa" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: O God, be not far from me: O my God, make haste for my help.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, taappe neeni haakkoppa. Abeet ta Xoossau, tana maaddanau ellella.

English Sentences: Let them be confounded and consumed that are adversaries to my soul; let them be covered with reproach and dishonour that seek my hurt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana mootiyaageeti yeellatidi xayona. Tana qohanau koyiyaageeti yeellaanne kaushshaa maayona.

English Sentences: But I will hope continually, and will yet praise thee more and more.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin tana gidikko, taani ubbaton nena ufaissan naagana. Taani gujja gujjada nena galatana.

English Sentences: My mouth shall shew forth thy righteousness and thy salvation all the day; for I know not the numbers thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woisaakko likkiyaa erana xayikkokka, ta doonai gallassa ubban ne xillotettaabaanne ashshiya ne oosuwaabaa yootana.

English Sentences: I will go in the strength of the Lord GOD: I will make mention of thy righteousness, even of thine only.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAA wolqqan yaana; yaada ne xalaalai xillo gidiyaagaa awaajjana.

English Sentences: O God, thou hast taught me from my youth: and hitherto have I declared thy wondrous works.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, neeni ta yelagatettaappe doommada tana tamaarissadasa. Ha77i gakkanaassi taani ne garamissiya oosuwaabaa yootais.

English Sentences: Now also when I am old and greyheaded, O God, forsake me not; until I have shewed thy strength unto this generation, and thy power to every one that is to come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, ne wolqqaanne ne minotettaa yiya yeleta ubbaassi yootana gakkanaassi, taani cimada puulummikkokka tana aggoppa.

English Sentences: Thy righteousness also, O God, is very high, who hast done great things: O God, who is like unto thee!
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, ne xillotettai bolla saluwaa gakkiis. Abeet gitabaa oottida Xoossau, ne mali ooninne baawa.

English Sentences: Thou, which hast shewed me great and sore troubles, shalt quicken me again, and shalt bring me up again from the depths of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta bolli daro metuwaa ehaadasa; gidikkonne, neeni ta de7uwaa zaarada ooraxissana; neeni tana duufuwan gelennaadan naagana.

English Sentences: Thou shalt increase my greatness, and comfort me on every side.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta bonchchuwaa kaseegaappe darissana; neeni tana zaarettadakka minttettana.

English Sentences: I will also praise thee with the psaltery, even thy truth, O my God: unto thee will I sing with the harp, O thou Holy One of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet ta Xoossau, ne tumatettaa gishshau, taani nena diittan galatana. Abeet Israa7eela geeshshau, taani maazinqqiyan nena sabbana.

English Sentences: My lips shall greatly rejoice when I sing unto thee; and my soul, which thou hast redeemed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani diixxaidda, ufaissau ta qaalaa xoqqu oottada yexxana; neeni tana ashshido gishshau, taani nena sabbana.

English Sentences: My tongue also shall talk of thy righteousness all the day long: for they are confounded, for they are brought unto shame, that seek my hurt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta inxxarssai ne xillo oosuwaabaa ubba gallassi yootana; aissi giikko, tana qohanau koyiyaageeti yeellatidosonanne kauyyidosona.

English Sentences: Give the king thy judgments, O God, and thy righteousness unto the king's son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, kawoi ne suuretettan pirddanaadan, neeni a tamaarissa; nu kawuwaayyo ne xillotettaa imma.

English Sentences: He shall judge thy people with righteousness, and thy poor with judgment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatikko, i ne asau xillotettan pirddo; naaqettidaageetayyookka suure daannato.

English Sentences: The mountains shall bring peace to the people, and the little hills, by righteousness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dereti sarotettaa aifiyaa, keratikka xillotettaa aifiyaa ne asaayyo aifona.

English Sentences: He shall judge the poor of the people, he shall save the children of the needy, and shall break in pieces the oppressor.
Wolaitta Sentences: He kawoi asaa giddon naaqettidaageetu gishshaa mootetto; hiyyeesata i ashsho; huqqunniyaageeta i mentteretto.

English Sentences: They shall fear thee as long as the sun and moon endure, throughout all generations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, awainne aginai de7iyo wode ubban, yeletaappe yeletaa gakkanaashin, ne asai neeyyo goinno.

English Sentences: He shall come down like rain upon the mown grass: as showers that water the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi shooqan bukkiya iraanne gadiyaa kalissiya iraa mala gido.

English Sentences: In his days shall the righteous flourish; and abundance of peace so long as the moon endureth.
Wolaitta Sentences: I de7iyo laitta ubban xillotettai daayo; aginai xayana gakkanaassi sarotettai daro.

English Sentences: He shall have dominion also from sea to sea, and from the river unto the ends of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abbaappe abbaa gakkanaassi, qassi Efiraaxiisa SHaafaappe sa7aa gaxaa gakkanaassi i haaro.

English Sentences: They that dwell in the wilderness shall bow before him; and his enemies shall lick the dust.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bazzo asati ayyo hokkona; a morkketi buhiyaa laaccona.

English Sentences: The kings of Tarshish and of the isles shall bring presents: the kings of Sheba and Seba shall offer gifts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tarsseesanne haruurotu kawoti ayyo giiraa giirona. Arabanne Saaba kawoti ayyo imuwaa ehoona.

English Sentences: Yea, all kings shall fall down before him: all nations shall serve him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotu ubbai ayyo gulbbatona; kawotettati ubbai ayyo kiitettona.

English Sentences: For he shall deliver the needy when he crieth; the poor also, and him that hath no helper.
Wolaitta Sentences: A xeesiya hiyyeesata, naaqettidaageetanne maaddiyaabi bainnaageeta i ashshees.

English Sentences: He shall spare the poor and needy, and shall save the souls of the needy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hiyyeesatussinne manqqotussi i qarettees; hiyyeesatu shemppuwaa ashshees.

English Sentences: He shall redeem their soul from deceit and violence: and precious shall their blood be in his sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta naaquwaappenne makkalaappe i wozees. Eta suuttai a sinttan al77o.

English Sentences: And he shall live, and to him shall be given of the gold of Sheba: prayer also shall be made for him continually; and daily shall he be praised.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi shemppo gam77o; Araba biittaa worqqai ayyo imetto. Paccennan ayyo woosai woosetto; gallassa ubban i anjjetto.

English Sentences: There shall be an handful of corn in the earth upon the top of the mountains; the fruit thereof shall shake like Lebanon: and they of the city shall flourish like grass of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittan daro kattai mokko; dereti kattan kamettona. Biittai Liibaanoose deree mokkiyoogaadan kattaa mokko; maatai dembbaa kumiyoogaadan asai katamaa kumo.

English Sentences: His name shall endure for ever: his name shall be continued as long as the sun: and men shall be blessed in him: all nations shall call him blessed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawuwaa sunttai merinau de7o; awai de7ido keesa ubban xeegettiiddi, gam77o. Asai ubbai a baggaara anjjettana; kawotettati ubbai a, "Ufaitta" yaagidi anjjana.

English Sentences: Blessed be the LORD God, the God of Israel, who only doeth wondrous things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maalaalissiyaabaa barkka oottiya GODAASSI, Israa7eela Xoossaassi galatai gido.

English Sentences: And blessed be his glorious name for ever: and let the whole earth be filled with his glory; Amen, and Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: A bonchcho sunttai merinaayyo galatetto; a bonchchoi sa7aa ubbaa kumo. Amin77i. Amin77i.

English Sentences: The prayers of David the son of Jesse are ended.
Wolaitta Sentences: Isseya na7aa Daawita woosai hagan polettiis.

English Sentences: Truly God is good to Israel, even to such as are of a clean heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Israa7eelayyo tumuppe lo77o; wozanaa geeshshatuyyo i keha.

English Sentences: But as for me, my feet were almost gone; my steps had well nigh slipped.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin tana gidikko, ta gedee xubettanau guuttaa attiis; ta tohoi hallixxanau matiis.

English Sentences: For I was envious at the foolish, when I saw the prosperity of the wicked.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, iita asatuyyo sarotettai de7iyoogaa be7ada, he otoranchchata taani qanaataas.

English Sentences: For there are no bands in their death: but their strength is firm.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etayyo tuggi baawa. Eta bollai payyanne mino.

English Sentences: They are not in trouble as other men; neither are they plagued like other men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hara asai tuggatiyoogaadan tuggatokkona; eti hara asaagaadan metuwan shocettibookkona.

English Sentences: Therefore pride compasseth them about as a chain; violence covereth them as a garment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, eti otoruwaa alleeqodan qooriyan aattoosona; makkalaa afaladan maayoosona.

English Sentences: Their eyes stand out with fatness: they have more than heart could wish.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta wozanai iitabaa pulttees. Eta qofai pala halchchoi kumidoogaa.

English Sentences: They are corrupt, and speak wickedly concerning oppression: they speak loftily.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti baceessoosonanne iitabaa haasayoosona; eti bantta otoruwan harata un77ettanau naassoosona.

English Sentences: They set their mouth against the heavens, and their tongue walketh through the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti saluwan de7iya Xoossaa bantta doonan cayoosona. Sa7an de7iya asaa bollikka bantta inxxarssan otoruwaa haasayoosona.

English Sentences: Therefore his people return hither: and waters of a full cup are wrung out to them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hari atto, Xoossaa asaikka etakko simmana; eti yootiyoobaakka eesuwan ammanana.

English Sentences: And they say, How doth God know? and is there knowledge in the most High?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti, "Xoossai nubaa ainne erenna; Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossai ainne be7enna" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: Behold, these are the ungodly, who prosper in the world; they increase in riches.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi iitati hagaa mala; eti ubbatonkka injjetin de7oosona; eti gujji gujji duretoosona.

English Sentences: Verily I have cleansed my heart in vain, and washed my hands in innocency.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatikko, taani ta wozanaa geeshsha oottidoogeenne taani ta xillotettaa bessanau ta kushiyaa meecettidoogee tumuppe mela.

English Sentences: For all the day long have I been plagued, and chastened every morning.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gallassa kumettan taani metuwan shocettaas; wonttin wonttin qaxxayettaas.

English Sentences: If I say, I will speak thus; behold, I should offend against the generation of thy children.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani iitatudan, "Xoossai erenna" yaagidaakko, taani ne asaayyo ammanettennaagaa gidana shin.

English Sentences: When I thought to know this, it was too painful for me;
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ha ubba yohuwaa eranau qoppiyo wode, taayyo erettenna deexobaa gidiis.

English Sentences: Until I went into the sanctuary of God; then understood I their end.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani Xoossaa geeshsha sohuwaa gelido wode, iitatu wurssetta qaadaa akeekaas.

English Sentences: Surely thou didst set them in slippery places: thou castedst them down into destruction.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta neeni tumuppe hallixxiya sohuwan utissaasa; neeni eta onggaasanne bashshaasa.

English Sentences: How are they brought into desolation, as in a moment! they are utterly consumed with terrors.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti akeekennan xayidosona; dagaman issoi attennan mule wuridosona.

English Sentences: As a dream when one awaketh; so, O Lord, when thou awakest, thou shalt despise their image.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi asi beegottiyo wode, i aimuwan be7idobai dogettiyoogaadan, abeet Godau, neeni denddiyo wode, etabaa ubbaa dogana.

English Sentences: Thus my heart was grieved, and I was pricked in my reins.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani yiillotido wodenne ta wozanan mishettido wode,

English Sentences: So foolish was I, and ignorant: I was as a beast before thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: ainne akeekennan dammaas; taani ne sinttan miizza mala gidaas.

English Sentences: Nevertheless I am continually with thee: thou hast holden me by my right hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani ubbatookka nenaara de7ais; ta ushachcha kushiyaa neeni oiqqadasa.

English Sentences: Thou shalt guide me with thy counsel, and afterward receive me to glory.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne zoriyan tana kaalettaasa; hegaappe guyyiyan neeni tana bonchchuwaayyo efaana.

English Sentences: Whom have I in heaven but thee? and there is none upon earth that I desire beside thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taayyo saluwan neeppe attin, harai ooni de7ii? Taani neeppe attin, sa7an harabaa aibanne amottikke.

English Sentences: My flesh and my heart faileth: but God is the strength of my heart, and my portion for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta wolqqainne ta wozanai daafuranau danddayees; shin Xoossai ta wozanaa minttiyaagaanne merinaayyo tana gakkida saamaa.

English Sentences: For, lo, they that are far from thee shall perish: thou hast destroyed all them that go a whoring from thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeppe haakkiyaageeti xayana; nena kaddiyaageeta ubbaa neeni wurssana.

English Sentences: But it is good for me to draw near to God: I have put my trust in the Lord GOD, that I may declare all thy works.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taassa gidikko, taani Xoossaa matan de7iyoogee taayyo lo77o. Taani Ubbaa Haariya GODAA taayyo baqata attiyo soho oottaas. Hegaa gishshau, a oosuwaa ubbaa taani yootana.

English Sentences: O God, why hast thou cast us off for ever? why doth thine anger smoke against the sheep of thy pasture?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, neeni nuna merinau aissi aggadii? Ne hanqqoi ne qooruwan de7iya dorssatu bolli aibissi suullidee?

English Sentences: Remember thy congregation, which thou hast purchased of old; the rod of thine inheritance, which thou hast redeemed; this mount Zion, wherein thou hast dwelt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni beni doorido asaa, neeni neeyyo buzo oottada wozido zareta hassaya. Neeni de7ido Xiyoone Deriyaa qoppa.

English Sentences: Lift up thy feet unto the perpetual desolations; even all that the enemy hath done wickedly in the sanctuary.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ane ne Beeta Maqidasee laalettido sohuwaa yaada xeella. Morkketi an de7iyaabaa ubbaa bashshidosona.

English Sentences: Thine enemies roar in the midst of thy congregations; they set up their ensigns for signs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne morkketi ne Beeta Maqidasiyaa giddon, "Nuuni xoonida" yaagidi gereeridosona. Xoonuwaa malaataa yaagidi, bantta banddiraa essidosona.

English Sentences: A man was famous according as he had lifted up axes upon the thick trees.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti mittaa qanxxanau bantta kalttaa xoqqu oottidi eqqida asatudan hanidosona.

English Sentences: But now they break down the carved work thereof at once with axes and hammers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti masettida sanqqaa ubbaa bantta kalttaaninne naariqan qeri yeggidosona.

English Sentences: They have cast fire into thy sanctuary, they have defiled by casting down the dwelling place of thy name to the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeta Maqidasiyaa taman xuuggidi xaissidosona; neessi goinniyo sohuwaa tunissidosona.

English Sentences: They said in their hearts, Let us destroy them together: they have burned up all the synagogues of God in the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bantta wozanan, "Eta nuuni muleera kinchcherettana" yaagidi qoppidosona. Israa7eela biittan asi Xoossaassi goinniyo soho ubbaa taman xuuggidosona.

English Sentences: We see not our signs: there is no more any prophet: neither is there among us any that knoweth how long.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode malaatai nuussi imettennan ixxiis; hananabaa yootiyaabai issoinne baawa. Hagaadan hanidi, woisa wodiyaa de7anaakko, eriya asi nu giddon issoinne baawa.

English Sentences: O God, how long shall the adversary reproach? shall the enemy blaspheme thy name for ever?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, ne morkketi woisa wodiyaa ne bolli qilliiccanee? Eti ne sunttaa merinaayyo cayanee?

English Sentences: Why withdrawest thou thy hand, even thy right hand? pluck it out of thy bosom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne kushiyaa shiishsha ekkada aissi gam77ai? Ne ushachcha kushiyaa ne qumaashaa giddoppe kessa.

English Sentences: For God is my King of old, working salvation in the midst of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, abeet Xoossau, neeni benippekka nu kawuwaa; neeni nuna daroton ashshadasa.

English Sentences: Thou didst divide the sea by thy strength: thou brakest the heads of the dragons in the waters.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne gita wolqqan neeni abbaa shaakkadasa; a giddon de7iya miimminttiyaa huuphiyaa neeni mentterettadasa.

English Sentences: Thou brakest the heads of leviathan in pieces, and gavest him to be meat to the people inhabiting the wilderness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Lewaataana giyo miimminttiyaa huuphiyaa menttada, a ashuwaa bazzon de7iya meretatussi quma oottada immidaagee nena.

English Sentences: Thou didst cleave the fountain and the flood: thou driedst up mighty rivers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni pulttota dooya yeddadasa; ubbaton goggiya shaafata qassi melissadasa.

English Sentences: The day is thine, the night also is thine: thou hast prepared the light and the sun.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gallassai nebaa; qammaikka nebaa; qassi awaanne aginaa eta sohuwan wottidaagee nena.

English Sentences: Thou hast set all the borders of the earth: thou hast made summer and winter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittaayyo zawaa wottidaagee balgguwaanne boniyaa oottidaagee nena.

English Sentences: Remember this, that the enemy hath reproached, O LORD, and that the foolish people have blasphemed thy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin abeet GODAU, ne morkketi nena waati qilliiccidaakko, qassi eeyya asati ne sunttaa waati cayidaakko hassaya.

English Sentences: O deliver not the soul of thy turtledove unto the multitude of the wicked: forget not the congregation of thy poor for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenan ammanettiyaageeta iita morkketussi aattada immoppa. Metootanchchata merinaayyo dogoppa.

English Sentences: Have respect unto the covenant: for the dark places of the earth are full of the habitations of cruelty.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu biittan de7iya xuma sohoi ubbai makkalanchchatun kumido gishshau, neeni nuuyyo maacettido maachchaa qoppa.

English Sentences: O let not the oppressed return ashamed: let the poor and needy praise thy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naaqettidaageeta yeellayoppa; hiyyeesatinne metootanchchati ne sunttaa galatona.

English Sentences: Arise, O God, plead thine own cause: remember how the foolish man reproacheth thee daily.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, dendda; ne yohuwaa mootetta. Ammanenna asati gallassa ubban ne bolli qilliiccidoogaa hassaya.

English Sentences: Forget not the voice of thine enemies: the tumult of those that rise up against thee increaseth continually.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne morkketi ne bolli waassiyo waasuwaanne nena ixxiyaageeti paci bainnan wocamiyo wocamaa dogoppa.

English Sentences: Unto thee, O God, do we give thanks, unto thee do we give thanks: for that thy name is near thy wondrous works declare.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neessi galataa immoos; abeet Xoossau, nena galatoos; "Ne sunttai gitaa" giidi awaajjoosinne maalaalissiya ne oosuwaa ubbaa yootoos.

English Sentences: When I shall receive the congregation I will judge uprightly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; "Doorada keerido gallassi, suure pirddaa pirddana.

English Sentences: The earth and all the inhabitants thereof are dissolved: I bear up the pillars of it. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ainne an de7iyaageeti ubbai qaaxxinkka, a mintta essiyaagee tana.

English Sentences: I said unto the fools, Deal not foolishly: and to the wicked, Lift not up the horn:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani otoranchchata, Otorettoppite yaagais; iitatakka, Intte kaciyaa bessoppite.

English Sentences: Lift not up your horn on high: speak not with a stiff neck.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte kaciyaa xoqqissi bessoppite; zaatturidi haasayoppite yaagais" yaagees.

English Sentences: For promotion cometh neither from the east, nor from the west, nor from the south.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pirddai awai mokkiyoosaappe woi wulliyoosaappe woikko deriyaappe woikko bazzoppe yeenna.

English Sentences: But God is the judge: he putteth down one, and setteth up another.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin pirddiyaagee Xoossaa; i issuwaa bolli pirddees; issuwaa shatinttees.

English Sentences: For in the hand of the LORD there is a cup, and the wine is red; it is full of mixture; and he poureth out of the same: but the dregs thereof, all the wicked of the earth shall wring them out, and drink them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa kushiyan issi wanccai de7ees; he wanccai Xoossaa hanqquwaa woine eessan kumi uttiis. I hegaappe ushshaa tigin, sa7an de7iya iita asati hegaa uyana; eti orccuwaanne ashshennan cinggirishidi uyana.

English Sentences: But I will declare for ever; I will sing praises to the God of Jacob.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani Yaaqooba Xoossaabaa yootananne merinau a sabbana.

English Sentences: All the horns of the wicked also will I cut off; but the horns of the righteous shall be exalted.
Wolaitta Sentences: I iita asatu kaciyaa ubbaa menttana, shin xillotu kacee xoqqu xoqqu gaana.

English Sentences: In Judah is God known: his name is great in Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Yihudan erettidaagaa; a sunttai Israa7eelan gita.

English Sentences: In Salem also is his tabernacle, and his dwelling place in Zion.
Wolaitta Sentences: A dunkkaanee Salaameena; i de7iyoosai Xiyooneena.

English Sentences: There brake he the arrows of the bow, the shield, and the sword, and the battle. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hegan kolxxiya morkketu wonddafiyaa zubbiyaa, gonddalliyaa, bisuwaanne hara ola miishshata mentterettiis.

English Sentences: Thou art more glorious and excellent than the mountains of prey.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, ne bonchchoi ai keena gitee! Neeni ne morkketa xoonada deriyaappe simmiyo wode, ne anggai aiba yashshiyaabee!

English Sentences: The stouthearted are spoiled, they have slept their sleep: and none of the men of might have found their hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gooba tooranchchati banttau de7iyaabaa ubbaa bonqqettiichchidosona. Ha77i simmi eti haiqqidosona; etappe issoinne ba kushiyaa denttibeenna.

English Sentences: At thy rebuke, O God of Jacob, both the chariot and horse are cast into a dead sleep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Yaaqooba Xoossau, neeni seerido wode, paraasatinne parati kunddidi, haiqqi aggidosona.

English Sentences: Thou, even thou, art to be feared: and who may stand in thy sight when once thou art angry?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin abeet Xoossau, neeni yashshaasa! Ne hanqqoi suullido wode, ne sinttan oonee eqqanai?

English Sentences: Thou didst cause judgment to be heard from heaven; the earth feared, and was still,
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni pirddaa saluwaappe sissadasa.

English Sentences: When God arose to judgment, to save all the meek of the earth. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni sa7an qohettidaageeta ashshanau pirddaayyo denddido wode, sa7an de7iya asai yayyidi, co77u giis.

English Sentences: Surely the wrath of man shall praise thee: the remainder of wrath shalt thou restrain.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaa hanqqoi darido keenaa neeni galatettaasa. Olaappe palahida asati ubbai ne ayyaana gallassata bonchchana.

English Sentences: Vow, and pay unto the LORD your God: let all that be round about him bring presents unto him that ought to be feared.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAAYYO, intte Xoossaayyo, shiiqettidoogaa gattite. Inttenoo shooro kawotettatoo, yayettanau bessiyaagaayyo immiyoobaa ehiite.

English Sentences: He shall cut off the spirit of princes: he is terrible to the kings of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: I halaqatu otoruwaa giishshees; wolqqaama kawotakka i yashissees.

English Sentences: I cried unto God with my voice, even unto God with my voice; and he gave ear unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Xoossaassi magannais; taayyo siyo gaada taani Xoossaa woossais.

English Sentences: In the day of my trouble I sought the Lord: my sore ran in the night, and ceased not: my soul refused to be comforted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta metuwaa gallassi Godaa koyais. Qamman taani shemppennan ta kusheta akko miccais; gidikkonne, taani minettanau danddayikke.

English Sentences: I remembered God, and was troubled: I complained, and my spirit was overwhelmed. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Xoossaabaa qoppiyo wode, oolais; taani abaa yereriyo wode, ta shemppoi daafurees.

English Sentences: Thou holdest mine eyes waking: I am so troubled that I cannot speak.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni qamma ubbaa tana xiskkuwaa diggada aissaasa. Taani keehi hirggiyo gishshau, haasayanau danddayikke.

English Sentences: I have considered the days of old, the years of ancient times.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani aadhdhida gallassata qoppais; kase laittatakka hassayais.

English Sentences: I call to remembrance my song in the night: I commune with mine own heart: and my spirit made diligent search.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani qofaa sheekkaidda aqais; ta wozanai yererees. Taani ta huuphiyaa hagaadan yaagada oichchais;

English Sentences: Will the Lord cast off for ever? and will he be favourable no more?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Xoossai nuna merinau aggi bayanee? Zaarettidi i nuna keha bessennee?

English Sentences: Is his mercy clean gone for ever? doth his promise fail for evermore?
Wolaitta Sentences: A siiqoi attidee? I giidobai hagaappe sinttanau sohuwan de7ennee?

English Sentences: Hath God forgotten to be gracious? hath he in anger shut up his tender mercies? Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai maariyoogaa dogidee? Ba qaretaakka hanqquwan laammidee?" yaagada oichchais.

English Sentences: And I said, This is my infirmity: but I will remember the years of the right hand of the most High.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassikka taani, "Tana qohidaagee, Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossaa ushachcha kushee kaseppe hitidoogaa" yaagais.

English Sentences: I will remember the works of the LORD: surely I will remember thy wonders of old.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAU, ne oosota taani qoppana. Ee; neeni beni wode oottido maalaalissiyaabata ubbaa taani hassayana.

English Sentences: I will meditate also of all thy work, and talk of thy doings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne oottidobaa ubbaa taani zaara zaarada qoppana; ne wolqqaama oosota ubbaa taani yererana.

English Sentences: Thy way, O God, is in the sanctuary: who is so great a God as our God?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, ne ogee geeshsha; ai xoossinne nu Xoossaa mala gita gidenna.

English Sentences: Thou art the God that doest wonders: thou hast declared thy strength among the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni maalaalissiyaabaa oottiya Xoossaa. Asaa giddon ne wolqqaa qonccissiyaagaa.

English Sentences: Thou hast with thine arm redeemed thy people, the sons of Jacob and Joseph. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne asaa, Yaaqoobanne Yooseefa zerettata ne qesiyan ashshadasa.

English Sentences: The waters saw thee, O God, the waters saw thee; they were afraid: the depths also were troubled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, haattati nena be7idosona; haattati nena be7idi yayyidosona. Abbaa ciimmatikka kokkoridosona.

English Sentences: The clouds poured out water: the skies sent out a sound: thine arrows also went abroad.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHaarati iraa duge zaaridi tigidosona; dadai saluwan guummiis. Ne wolqqanttai yan han wolqqammiis.

English Sentences: The voice of thy thunder was in the heaven: the lightnings lightened the world: the earth trembled and shook.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne dadaa gunttai gotiyaa giddon kooshimmiis; ne wolqqanttaa phoolettai sa7aa poo7issiis. Biittaikka gajigajidi kokkoriis.

English Sentences: Thy way is in the sea, and thy path in the great waters, and thy footsteps are not known.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni abbaa giddoora hemettaasa; ciimma abbaa giddoora kanttaasa; gidikkonne, ne gedee yedhdhido sohoi beettenna.

English Sentences: Thou leddest thy people like a flock by the hand of Moses and Aaron.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusenne Aaroona kushiyan neeni ne asaa dorssa wudiyaadan kaalettadasa.

English Sentences: Give ear, O my people, to my law: incline your ears to the words of my mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta asau, taani inttena tamaarissiyoogaa siyite; ta doonaappe kiyiya qaalaa ezggite.

English Sentences: I will open my mouth in a parable: I will utter dark sayings of old:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani etayyo haasayiyo wode, leemisuwan haasayais;

English Sentences: Which we have heard and known, and our fathers have told us.
Wolaitta Sentences: beniisappe geemmida yohota, nuuni siyidonne erido yohota, qassi nu aawati nuuyyo yootido yohota haasayana.

English Sentences: We will not hide them from their children, shewing to the generation to come the praises of the LORD, and his strength, and his wonderful works that he hath done.
Wolaitta Sentences: He yohota nuuni nu naatuppe qosokko; GODAAYYO bessiya galatata, a wolqqaanne garamissiya a oosuwaa yiya yeletaukka nuuni yootana.

English Sentences: For he established a testimony in Jacob, and appointed a law in Israel, which he commanded our fathers, that they should make them known to their children:
Wolaitta Sentences: I Yaaqooba zaretussi azazuwaa, Israa7eela asaassi higgiyaa immiis. Kase nu aawati bantta naata he higgeta tamaarissana mala azaziis.

English Sentences: That the generation to come might know them, even the children which should be born; who should arise and declare them to their children:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, kaalliya yeletai, he biron yelettana naati eranaassanne etikka bantta naatuyyo yootanaassa.

English Sentences: That they might set their hope in God, and not forget the works of God, but keep his commandments:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, he naati Xoossan ufaissaa oottanaassa; i oottidobaakka balennan agganaassanne a azazuwaa naaganaassa.

English Sentences: And might not be as their fathers, a stubborn and rebellious generation; a generation that set not their heart aright, and whose spirit was not stedfast with God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti kase bantta aawatudan wozana muumenne makkalanchcha asa gidennan agganaassanne Xoossan eqqennanne ammanettenna yeleta gidennan agganaassa.

English Sentences: The children of Ephraim, being armed, and carrying bows, turned back in the day of battle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efireema asati olaayyo wonddafiyaara zubbiyaara giigidi, olaa gallassi guyye simmidosona.

English Sentences: They kept not the covenant of God, and refused to walk in his law;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Xoossaa maachchaa naagibookkona; a higgiyaadan hemettennan ixxidosona.

English Sentences: And forgat his works, and his wonders that he had shewed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti i oottidobaanne eta i bessido malaataa dogidosona.

English Sentences: Marvellous things did he in the sight of their fathers, in the land of Egypt, in the field of Zoan.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta aawatu sinttan Gibxxe biittan, Xo7aane Dembban malaataa oottiis.

English Sentences: He divided the sea, and caused them to pass through; and he made the waters to stand as an heap.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abbaa shaakkidi, gidduwaara eta pinttiis; i haattaa shaakkidi, yan han godadan essiis.

English Sentences: In the daytime also he led them with a cloud, and all the night with a light of fire.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta gallassi shaaran, qammi tamaa poo7uwan kaalettiis.

English Sentences: He clave the rocks in the wilderness, and gave them drink as out of the great depths.
Wolaitta Sentences: I bazzuwan zaallaa phalqqidi, ciimmaappe daro haattaa eta ushshiis.

English Sentences: He brought streams also out of the rock, and caused waters to run down like rivers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zaallaappe haattaa pulttissidi, shaafadan duge gogissiis.

English Sentences: And they sinned yet more against him by provoking the most High in the wilderness.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti a bolli nagaraa oosuwaa gede gujjidosona; Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossaa bolli bazzon makkalidosona.

English Sentences: And they tempted God in their heart by asking meat for their lust.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bantta amottido qumaa oichchiyoogan Xoossaa eriiddi paaccidosona.

English Sentences: Yea, they spake against God; they said, Can God furnish a table in the wilderness?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Xoossaa bolli hagaadan yaagidi haasayidosona; "Bazzon Xoossai nuuyyo qumaa aattanau danddayii?

English Sentences: Behold, he smote the rock, that the waters gushed out, and the streams overflowed; can he give bread also? can he provide flesh for his people?
Wolaitta Sentences: Zaallaa shocin, pulttoi kiyidi, shaafai goggiis; shin oittaakka i nuussi immanau danddayii? Woikko ba asaayyo ashuwaakka immanau danddayii?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Therefore the LORD heard this, and was wroth: so a fire was kindled against Jacob, and anger also came up against Israel;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hegaa siyido wode, eta bolli daro hanqqettiis. Yaaqooba zaretu bolli tamai eexxiis; Israa7eela bolli a hanqqoi dari daridi biis.

English Sentences: Because they believed not in God, and trusted not in his salvation:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti Xoossan ammanibookkona; woi i ashshiyoogan ammanettibookkona.

English Sentences: Though he had commanded the clouds from above, and opened the doors of heaven,
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, i bolla saluwaa azazidi, saluwaa penggiyaa dooyiis.

English Sentences: And had rained down manna upon them to eat, and had given them of the corn of heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti maanau, etau mannaa bukissiis; saluwaa kattaa etayyo immiis.

English Sentences: Man did eat angels' food: he sent them meat to the full.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitanchchatu oittaa asai miis; Xoossai etassi qumaa darissidi immiis.

English Sentences: He caused an east wind to blow in the heaven: and by his power he brought in the south wind.
Wolaitta Sentences: Arshsho carkkoi carkkanaadan oottiis; ba wolqqan tohossa bagga carkkuwaa denttettiis.

English Sentences: He rained flesh also upon them as dust, and feathered fowls like as the sand of the sea:
Wolaitta Sentences: I asaayyo ashuwaa baanaa keenaa kiittiis; paalliya kafota abbaa doona shafiyaa keenata bukissiis.

English Sentences: And he let it fall in the midst of their camp, round about their habitations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti de7iyoosan, dunkkaaniyaa yuushuwan wodhdhidosona.

English Sentences: So they did eat, and were well filled: for he gave them their own desire;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti amottidoogaa etayyo immiis; immin eti miidi, bantta ganjjiyaa kunttidosona.

English Sentences: They were not estranged from their lust. But while their meat was yet in their mouths,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti bantta amottido ashuwaa kallennan de7ishin, ashoi etau biron doonan de7ishin,

English Sentences: The wrath of God came upon them, and slew the fattest of them, and smote down the chosen men of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa hanqqoi eta bolli wodhdhiis; wodhdhidi, eta giddoppe payya asatanne Israa7eelappe muruta asata woriis.

English Sentences: For all this they sinned still, and believed not for his wondrous works.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagee ubbai haninkka, eti nagaraa oottiyoogaa aggibookkona. Ba malaata ubbaa oottinkka, ammanibookkona.

English Sentences: Therefore their days did he consume in vanity, and their years in trouble.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, i eta gallassata carkkuwaadan, eta laittatakka akeekennan xaissiis.

English Sentences: When he slew them, then they sought him: and they returned and enquired early after God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai etappe woriyo wode, attidaageeti nagaraa paaxidi, Xoossaa mintti koyidosona.

English Sentences: And they remembered that God was their rock, and the high God their redeemer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Xoossai etau wogga zaallaa gididoogaanne Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossai eta wozidaagaa gididoogaa hassayidosona.

English Sentences: Nevertheless they did flatter him with their mouth, and they lied unto him with their tongues.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti bantta inxxarssan ayyo worddotidi, bantta doonan cimmidosona.

English Sentences: For their heart was not right with him, neither were they stedfast in his covenant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta wozanai Xoossan eqqenna; i etaara maacettido maachchaayyo ammanettokkona.

English Sentences: But he, being full of compassion, forgave their iniquity, and destroyed them not: yea, many a time turned he his anger away, and did not stir up all his wrath.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i eta maariyaagee; eta iitatettaa atto giis. Eta xaissibeenna; daroto ba hanqquwaa teqqiis; ba hanqquwaa tegaa ubbaara eta bolli yeddibeenna.

English Sentences: For he remembered that they were but flesh; a wind that passeth away, and cometh not again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti asho xalaala gidiyoogaanne yaa carkkidosaappe haa simmenna carkko mala gidiyoogaa hassayiis.

English Sentences: How oft did they provoke him in the wilderness, and grieve him in the desert!
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bazzon a bolli woqqutoo makkalidonaa! Mela bazzon woqqutoo lanccissidonaa!

English Sentences: Yea, they turned back and tempted God, and limited the Holy One of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti zaari zaaridi, Xoossaa paaccidosona; Israa7eela Geeshshaa hanqqetissidosona.

English Sentences: They remembered not his hand, nor the day when he delivered them from the enemy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti a wolqqaabaa dogidosona; i eta morkketuppe wozido gallassaa,

English Sentences: How he had wrought his signs in Egypt, and his wonders in the field of Zoan:
Wolaitta Sentences: i Gibxxe biittan malaataa, Xo7aane Dembban maalaalissiyaabaa oottido wodiyaa hassayibookkona.

English Sentences: And had turned their rivers into blood; and their floods, that they could not drink.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta shaafaa haattaa suuttau laammiis; hegaa gishshau, Gibxxe asati he shaafaappe uyanau danddayibookkona.

English Sentences: He sent divers sorts of flies among them, which devoured them; and frogs, which destroyed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta waayissiya udunxxetanne eta biittaa bashshiya shodhdheta kiittiis.

English Sentences: He gave also their increase unto the caterpiller, and their labour unto the locust.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etau mokkida kattaa ukkubuwaassi, eti oottidi daafuridobaa booliyaassi immiis.

English Sentences: He destroyed their vines with hail, and their sycomore trees with frost.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta woiniyaa turaa shachchan, eta balase giyo mittaakka kinchchuwan xaissiis.

English Sentences: He gave up their cattle also to the hail, and their flocks to hot thunderbolts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta miizzata shachchan woriis; eta dorssaa wudiyaa xuuqqiya dadan mereessi wurssiis.

English Sentences: He cast upon them the fierceness of his anger, wrath, and indignation, and trouble, by sending evil angels among them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta bolli ba suulliya hanqquwaa, yiilluwaa, lancciyaanne ixuwaa, bashshiya kiitanchchatu citan yeddiis.

English Sentences: He made a way to his anger; he spared not their soul from death, but gave their life over to the pestilence;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba hanqquwaa aatti yeddiis. Eta bashshaassi aattidi immiisippe attin, haiquwaappe ashshibeenna.

English Sentences: And smote all the firstborn in Egypt; the chief of their strength in the tabernacles of Ham:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxen yelettida baira naata ubbaa woriis.

English Sentences: But made his own people to go forth like sheep, and guided them in the wilderness like a flock.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i ba asaa dorssadan kessiis; wudiyaadan bazzon heemmiis.

English Sentences: And he led them on safely, so that they feared not: but the sea overwhelmed their enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta saruwan kaalettiis; hegaa gishshau, eti yayyibookkona; shin eta morkketa abbai muukkiis.

English Sentences: And he brought them to the border of his sanctuary, even to this mountain, which his right hand had purchased.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi i eta ba geeshsha biittaa, ba ushachcha kushiyan xoonido deree dariyo biittaa ehiis.

English Sentences: He cast out the heathen also before them, and divided them an inheritance by line, and made the tribes of Israel to dwell in their tents.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta sinttaappe kawotettata laaggidi, eta biittaa shaakkidi, Israa7eela zaretuyyo gishshiis. Gishidi ba asaa eta keettan wottiis.

English Sentences: Yet they tempted and provoked the most high God, and kept not his testimonies:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossaa bolli makkalidi, a paaccidosona. A azazuwaakka naagibookkona.

English Sentences: But turned back, and dealt unfaithfully like their fathers: they were turned aside like a deceitful bow.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta aawatudan makkalanchchatanne kaddanchchata gididosona. Geella tooraadan wora wodhdhidosona.

English Sentences: For they provoked him to anger with their high places, and moved him to jealousy with their graven images.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta goinniyo xoqqa sohotun a yiilloyidosona; bantta eeqatun a qanaatissidosona.

English Sentences: When God heard this, he was wroth, and greatly abhorred Israel:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Xoossai hagaa siyidi hanqqettiis; Israa7eela muleera kariis.

English Sentences: So that he forsook the tabernacle of Shiloh, the tent which he placed among men;
Wolaitta Sentences: Seelon i de7ido sohuwaa, asaa giddon i de7ido ba dunkkaaniyaa aggiis.

English Sentences: And delivered his strength into captivity, and his glory into the enemy's hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa wolqqaayyoonne bonchchuwaayyo malaata gidida Taabootaa morkketu kushiyan aattidi omoodissiis.

English Sentences: He gave his people over also unto the sword; and was wroth with his inheritance.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba asaayyo hanqqettiis; i eta bisuwaayyo aattidi immiis.

English Sentences: The fire consumed their young men; and their maidens were not given to marriage.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta wodallati ubbai olan haiqqidosona; yaatin, eta geela7oti azina gelennan attidosona.

English Sentences: Their priests fell by the sword; and their widows made no lamentation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta qeeseti bisuwan wuridosona. Gidikkone, eta maccaasati bantta azinatau yeekkennaadan digettidosona.

English Sentences: Then the LORD awaked as one out of sleep, and like a mighty man that shouteth by reason of wine.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Godai xiskkuwaappe woi woine eessaa mattuwaappe beegottiya asadan beegottiis.

English Sentences: And he smote his enemies in the hinder parts: he put them to a perpetual reproach.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba morkketa guyye zaaridi shociis; eta merinau yeellayiis.

English Sentences: Moreover he refused the tabernacle of Joseph, and chose not the tribe of Ephraim:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefa zerettaa kariis; Efireema zariyaa dooribeenna.

English Sentences: But chose the tribe of Judah, the mount Zion which he loved.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i Yihudaa zariyaanne siiqiyo Xiyoone deriyaa dooriis.

English Sentences: And he built his sanctuary like high palaces, like the earth which he hath established for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan i ba Beeta Maqidasiyaa saluwaadan xoqqan keexxiis; sa7aadan merinau essiis.

English Sentences: He chose David also his servant, and took him from the sheepfolds:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba ashkkaraa Daawita dooridi, dorssaa wudiyaa heemmiyoosaappe ekkiis.

English Sentences: From following the ewes great with young he brought him to feed Jacob his people, and Israel his inheritance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dorssaa heemmishin, ba asaa Yaaqooba, ba buzuwaa Israa7eela henttanau ekkidi ehiis.

English Sentences: So he fed them according to the integrity of his heart; and guided them by the skilfulness of his hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, Daawiti eta suure wozanaappe heemmiis; qassi ba hiilla kushiyan kaalettiis.

English Sentences: O GOD, the heathen are come into thine inheritance; thy holy temple have they defiled; they have laid Jerusalem on heaps.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, dere asati ne biittaa bolli woraajjidosona. Ne Beeta Maqidasiyaa tunissidosona; Yerusalaame qoqqofidosona.

English Sentences: The dead bodies of thy servants have they given to be meat unto the fowls of the heaven, the flesh of thy saints unto the beasts of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ne ashkkaratu ahaa saluwaa kafuwaayyo quma oottidi immidosona. Qassi ne geeshshatu ashuwaa sa7aa do7atuyyo immidosona.

English Sentences: Their blood have they shed like water round about Jerusalem; and there was none to bury them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta suuttaa Yerusalaame giddon haattaadan gussidosona; eta ahaa moogiyaabai xayiis.

English Sentences: We are become a reproach to our neighbours, a scorn and derision to them that are round about us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu shoorotuyyo nuuni cayiyoobaa gidida; nu heeran de7iyaageetuyyo miicciyoobaanne qiriyoobaa gidida.

English Sentences: How long, LORD? wilt thou be angry for ever? shall thy jealousy burn like fire?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, hagee aude gakkanaassi hananee? Neeni merinau hanqqettuuttee? Ne qanaatiya hanqqoi tamadan eexxanee?

English Sentences: Pour out thy wrath upon the heathen that have not known thee, and upon the kingdoms that have not called upon thy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nena erenna deretu bollinne ne sunttaa xeesenna kawotettatu bolli ne hanqquwaa tiga.

English Sentences: For they have devoured Jacob, and laid waste his dwelling place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti Yaaqooba zerettata woridosonanne eti de7iyoosaa bashshidosona.

English Sentences: O remember not against us former iniquities: let thy tender mercies speedily prevent us: for we are brought very low.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kase nu aawatu iitatettaa nu bolli qoodoppa. Eesuwan ne maarotaa nuuyyo kiitta; aissi giikko, nuuni keehippe metootida.

English Sentences: Help us, O God of our salvation, for the glory of thy name: and deliver us, and purge away our sins, for thy name's sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet nuna ashshiya Xoossau, ne sunttaa bonchchuwaa gishshau, nuna maadda. Ne sunttaa gishshau, nuna ashsha; nu nagaraa atto yaaga.

English Sentences: Wherefore should the heathen say, Where is their God? let him be known among the heathen in our sight by the revenging of the blood of thy servants which is shed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dereti aibissi, "Eta Xoossai awan de7ii?" yaaganee? Ne ashkkaratu suuttaa eti gussidoogaa haluwaa neeni kessiyoogaa nuuni xeellishin, eta gidduwan qonccissa.

English Sentences: Let the sighing of the prisoner come before thee; according to the greatness of thy power preserve thou those that are appointed to die;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qasho asatu oolee ne sintti gakko. Haiquwau pirddettidaageeta ne wolqqaa gitatettaadan ashsha.

English Sentences: And render unto our neighbours sevenfold into their bosom their reproach, wherewith they have reproached thee, O Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau, nu shooro kawotettati nena cayidoogaa haluwaa laappun kushiyaa eta kiyuwan idintta.

English Sentences: So we thy people and sheep of thy pasture will give thee thanks for ever: we will shew forth thy praise to all generations.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode nuuni ne asati, ne wudiyaa dorssati, merinau galataa neeyyo immana; yeletaappe yeletaa gakkanaayyo nena zaari zaaridi galatana.

English Sentences: Give ear, O Shepherd of Israel, thou that leadest Joseph like a flock; thou that dwellest between the cherubims, shine forth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Israa7eela henttanchchau, Yooseefa asaa wudiyaadan kaalettiyaagoo, neeni nuuyyo siya.

English Sentences: Before Ephraim and Benjamin and Manasseh stir up thy strength, and come and save us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiruubeta giyo kiitanchchatuppe bollaara de7iya araatan uttidaagoo, Efireema, Biniyaamanne Minaase sinttan qoncca. Ne wolqqaa denttada nuna ashshanau haaya.

English Sentences: Turn us again, O God, and cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, nuna zaara; nuuni attanaadan, ne som77uwaa nuussi poo7issa.

English Sentences: O LORD God of hosts, how long wilt thou be angry against the prayer of thy people?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAU Xoossau, ne asaa woosaa bolli aude gakkanaayyo hanqqettuutee?

English Sentences: Thou feedest them with the bread of tears; and givest them tears to drink in great measure.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni eta yeehuwaa qumadan mizadasa; qassi afuttaa haattadan ushshadasa.

English Sentences: Thou makest us a strife unto our neighbours: and our enemies laugh among themselves.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni nuna nu shoorotu ooshshaassi gaaso oottadasa; nu morkketi nu bolli miiccidosona.

English Sentences: Turn us again, O God of hosts, and cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Ubbaappe Wolqqaama Xoossau, nuna zaara; nuuni attanaadan, ne som77uwaa nuussi poo7issa.

English Sentences: Thou hast brought a vine out of Egypt: thou hast cast out the heathen, and planted it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni Gibxxeppe woiniyaa anuwaa ehaadasa; ehaada dere asata yedettada, eta biittan a tokkadasa.

English Sentences: Thou preparedst room before it, and didst cause it to take deep root, and it filled the land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni lanqqiyaa qeexadasa; yaatin, xaphuwaa yeddidi, daayidi, biitta ubbaa gakkiis.

English Sentences: The hills were covered with the shadow of it, and the boughs thereof were like the goodly cedars.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dereti a kuwan, wolqqaama zigati a tashetan kamettidosona.

English Sentences: She sent out her boughs unto the sea, and her branches unto the river.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba tasheta Meediteraane Abbaa gakkanaayyo, qassi ba xeerata Efiraaxiisa SHaafaa gakkanaayyo yeddiis.

English Sentences: Why hast thou then broken down her hedges, so that all they which pass by the way do pluck her?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, ogiyaara aadhdhiya ubbai a aifiyaa duuttanaadan, a yuushuwan de7iya gimbbiyaa aissi qoladii?

English Sentences: The boar out of the wood doth waste it, and the wild beast of the field doth devour it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bazzo gudunttai a bolli duridi bashshees; qassi gaden woxxi qaaxxiya meretati ubbai a moosona.

English Sentences: Return, we beseech thee, O God of hosts: look down from heaven, and behold, and visit this vine;
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Ubbaappe Wolqqaama Xoossau, neeni nuukko simma. Saluwaara duge xeellada be7a; ha woiniyaa naaga.

English Sentences: And the vineyard which thy right hand hath planted, and the branch that thou madest strong for thyself.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ne ushachcha kushee tokkido xapho; neeni neessi gaada dichchido tashe.

English Sentences: It is burned with fire, it is cut down: they perish at the rebuke of thy countenance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne morkketi ne woiniyaa qeexidosona; taman xuuggidosona. Hegaa gishshau, neeni eta ne hanqquwaa suuluwan xaissa.

English Sentences: Let thy hand be upon the man of thy right hand, upon the son of man whom thou madest strong for thyself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne kushee, ne ushachchan de7iya asaa, neeni neessi gaada dichchido asaa naago.

English Sentences: So will not we go back from thee: quicken us, and we will call upon thy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatikko, nuuni neeppe guyye simmokko. Nuna paxa wotta; ne sunttaa nuuni galatana.

English Sentences: Turn us again, O LORD God of hosts, cause thy face to shine; and we shall be saved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAU Xoossau, nuna zaara; nuuni attanaadan, ne som77uwaa nuussi poo7issa.

English Sentences: Sing aloud unto God our strength: make a joyful noise unto the God of Jacob.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuyyo wolqqa gidiya Xoossaassi intte qaalaa xoqqu oottidi yexxite; Yaaqooba Xoossaa sabbite.

English Sentences: Take a psalm, and bring hither the timbrel, the pleasant harp with the psaltery.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yexxanau doommite; karaabiyaa baqqite; diittaaninne maazinqqiyan lo77o yettaa sissite.

English Sentences: Blow up the trumpet in the new moon, in the time appointed, on our solemn feast day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aginai xeeriyo wode, goobanaa uttiyo wodenne ayyaana gallassan malkkataa punnite.

English Sentences: For this was a statute for Israel, and a law of the God of Jacob.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagee Israa7eelayyo higge; Yaaqooba Xoossaappe woga.

English Sentences: This he ordained in Joseph for a testimony, when he went out through the land of Egypt: where I heard a language that I understood not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxe biittaa i shocido wode, Yooseefa asaayyo ha wogaa awaajjiis. Taani erenna cenggurssaa hagaadan yaagiyaagaa siyais;

English Sentences: I removed his shoulder from the burden: his hands were delivered from the pots.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte hashiyaappe toohuwaa wottaas; intte kushiyaa keshiyaappe shemppissaas.

English Sentences: Thou calledst in trouble, and I delivered thee; I answered thee in the secret place of thunder: I proved thee at the waters of Meribah. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte metuwaa wode tana xeesideta; xeesin inttena ashshaas; taani dadaa giddon geemmidosaappe intteyyo allaas. Mariiba giyo pulttuwaa matan taani inttena paaccaas.

English Sentences: Hear, O my people, and I will testify unto thee: O Israel, if thou wilt hearken unto me;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta asau, taani inttena seeriyoogaa siyite; hai Israa7eelatoo, ezggeerekketii!

English Sentences: There shall no strange god be in thee; neither shalt thou worship any strange god.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte giddon allaga xoossi de7oppo; hara xoossaayyo goinnoppite.

English Sentences: I am the LORD thy God, which brought thee out of the land of Egypt: open thy mouth wide, and I will fill it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani, GODAA intte Xoossaa, inttena Gibxxe biittaappe kessada ehiidaagaa. Ne doonaa keehi hangga; taani nena tuxxada barssana.

English Sentences: But my people would not hearken to my voice; and Israel would none of me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin ta asati ta qaalaa siyibookkona; Israa7eelati taayyo azazettibookkona.

English Sentences: So I gave them up unto their own hearts' lust: and they walked in their own counsels.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani eti bantta qofaa kaallana mala, eenenna wozanaayyo aattada immaas.

English Sentences: Oh that my people had hearkened unto me, and Israel had walked in my ways!
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta asai taayyo siyidaakko, Israa7eelati ta ogiyaa kaallidaakko.

English Sentences: I should soon have subdued their enemies, and turned my hand against their adversaries.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta morkkiyaa eesuwan xoonana shin; eta baarigaaraatu bolli ta kushiyaa wottana shin.

English Sentences: The haters of the LORD should have submitted themselves unto him: but their time should have endured for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA ixxiyaageeti a sinttan hokkana shin, eta qixaateenne merinaassa gidana shin.

English Sentences: He should have fed them also with the finest of the wheat: and with honey out of the rock should I have satisfied thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttena lo77o gisttiyaa mizana shin; qassi eessaa shuchchaa kooppuwaappe kalissana shin" yaagees.

English Sentences: God standeth in the congregation of the mighty; he judgeth among the gods.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai saluwaa yaa7aa shiishshees. SHiishshidi xoossatu giddon hagaadan yaagidi pirddees;

English Sentences: How long will ye judge unjustly, and accept the persons of the wicked? Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte geellaa pirddiyoogaa aggite; naa77antto iitatu bagga gidoppite.

English Sentences: Defend the poor and fatherless: do justice to the afflicted and needy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hiyyeesatuyyoonne aawai bainnaageetuyyo mootettite; manqqonne naaqettida asatu maataa naagissite.

English Sentences: Deliver the poor and needy: rid them out of the hand of the wicked.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hiyyeesatanne metootanchchata ashshite; iitatu kushiyaappe eta wotti ekkite.

English Sentences: They know not, neither will they understand; they walk on in darkness: all the foundations of the earth are out of course.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte ainne erekketanne ainne akeekekketa; intte xuman hemetteeta. Xillotettai xayin, biittai yaaqiyaaqees.

English Sentences: I have said, Ye are gods; and all of you are children of the most High.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani inttena, Intte xoossata; intte ubbaikka Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossaa naata.

English Sentences: But ye shall die like men, and fall like one of the princes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, intte asi haiqqiyoogaadan haiqqana. Qassi hara halaqati kunddidoogaadan inttekka kunddana yaagais" yaagees.

English Sentences: Arise, O God, judge the earth: for thou shalt inherit all nations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, dendda; sa7aa pirdda; kawotetti ubbai nebaa.

English Sentences: Keep not thou silence, O God: hold not thy peace, and be not still, O God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, co77u gooppa; sirphphi gooppa; abeet Xoossau, shenehoo gooppa.

English Sentences: For, lo, thine enemies make a tumult: and they that hate thee have lifted up the head.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7a! Ne morkketi ne bolli denddoosona; nena ixxiyaageeti ne bolli makkaloosona.

English Sentences: They have taken crafty counsel against thy people, and consulted against thy hidden ones.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ne asaa bollan geeman yaa7oosona; neeni siiqiyo asatu bolli maqettoosona.

English Sentences: They have said, Come, and let us cut them off from being a nation; that the name of Israel may be no more in remembrance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti, "Haayite, eta kawotettaa xaissoos; Israa7eela giyo suntti merinau hassayettennaadan oottoos" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: For they have consulted together with one consent: they are confederate against thee:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti issi wozana gididi, issippe maqettoosonanne ne bolli maachchaa maacettoosona.

English Sentences: The tabernacles of Edom, and the Ishmaelites; of Moab, and the Hagarenes;
Wolaitta Sentences: Maacettiyaageetinne Eedoomanne Isimaa7eela keettaa asata, Moo7aaba zaretanne Aggaari zareta;

English Sentences: Gebal, and Ammon, and Amalek; the Philistines with the inhabitants of Tyre;
Wolaitta Sentences: Gebaala asata, Amoona asata, Amaaleeqa asata, Pilisxxeema asatanne Xiiroosa asata.

English Sentences: Assur also is joined with them: they have holpen the children of Lot. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asoore asatikka etaara issippe gaittidosona; eti Looxe zaretussi wolqqaama maado gididosona.

English Sentences: Do unto them as unto the Midianites; as to Sisera, as to Jabin, at the brook of Kison:
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni Midiyaama asatu bollinne Sisaaranne Yaabina bolli Qiishoona SHaafan oottidoogaadan eta bolli ootta.

English Sentences: Which perished at Endor: they became as dung for the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Enddooren xayidosona; eta ahai moogettennan biittan musiis.

English Sentences: Make their nobles like Oreb, and like Zeeb: yea, all their princes as Zebah, and as Zalmunna:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta halaqata neeni Oreebanne Za7eeba oottidoogaadan ootta; eta haariyaageeta neeni Zebaahanne Xalmmunaa7a xaissidoogaadan xaissa.

English Sentences: Who said, Let us take to ourselves the houses of God in possession.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeetinne, "Nuuni Xoossaa biittaa nuuyyo buzottana" yaagidaageeta.

English Sentences: O my God, make them like a wheel; as the stubble before the wind.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet ta Xoossau, eta baanadan laala; carkkoi efiyo sulladan ootta.

English Sentences: As the fire burneth a wood, and as the flame setteth the mountains on fire;
Wolaitta Sentences: Xaragai buuraa miidi wurssiyoogaadan, tamaa lacoi deriyaa maayiyoogaadan,

English Sentences: So persecute them with thy tempest, and make them afraid with thy storm.
Wolaitta Sentences: hegaadankka ne uushuwan eta yedetta; ne gotiyan eta dagantta.

English Sentences: Fill their faces with shame; that they may seek thy name, O LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, asai ne sunttaa erana mala, neeni eta som77uwaa yeellaa maizza.

English Sentences: Let them be confounded and troubled for ever; yea, let them be put to shame, and perish:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti merinaayyo yeellatonanne hirggona; kauyyidi xayona.

English Sentences: That men may know that thou, whose name alone is JEHOVAH, art the most high over all the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne xalaalai GODAA gidiyoogaa, ne Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossai sa7aa ubbaa haariyoogaa eti erona.

English Sentences: How amiable are thy tabernacles, O LORD of hosts!
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAU, neeni de7iyoosai aiba lo77ii!

English Sentences: My soul longeth, yea, even fainteth for the courts of the LORD: my heart and my flesh crieth out for the living God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaa laamotais; ta kumetta asatettai de7o Xoossaayyo ufaissan yexxees.

English Sentences: Yea, the sparrow hath found an house, and the swallow a nest for herself, where she may lay her young, even thine altars, O LORD of hosts, my King, and my God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAU, ta kawuwau, ta Xoossau, neeyyo yarshshiyo sohuwaa matan siine kafiyaa baayyo de7iyoosaa demmaasu. Haraphphiyaakka baayyo phuuphulliyo keettaa yan keexxaasu.

English Sentences: Blessed are they that dwell in thy house: they will be still praising thee. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne Beeta Maqidasiyan de7iyaageetinne merinau nena sabbiyaageeti anjjettidaageeta.

English Sentences: Blessed is the man whose strength is in thee; in whose heart are the ways of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wolqqaa neeppe demmiyaageeti, bantta wozanan Xiyoone efiya ogiyaa baanau amottiyaageeti anjjettidaageeta.

English Sentences: Who passing through the valley of Baca make it a well; the rain also filleth the pools.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baaka giyo mela zanggaaraara eti kanttiyo wode, he sohoi pultto kiyees. Badhdheesaa iraikka bukkidi, yan deelliyaa zin77issees.

English Sentences: They go from strength to strength, every one of them in Zion appeareth before God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti biyo wode, wolqqaa gujji gujjidi baana. Eti xoossatu Xoossaa Xiyoonen be7ana.

English Sentences: O LORD God of hosts, hear my prayer: give ear, O God of Jacob. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAU Xoossau, ta woosaa neeni siya. Abeet Yaaqooba Xoossau, ezgga.

English Sentences: Behold, O God our shield, and look upon the face of thine anointed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, nu gonddalliyaa be7a; neeni doorido kawuwaa ne keha aifiyan xeella.

English Sentences: For a day in thy courts is better than a thousand. I had rather be a doorkeeper in the house of my God, than to dwell in the tents of wickedness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani harasan sha7u gallassaa de7anaappe Xoossaa keettan issi gallassaa de7iyoogee lo77o. Iitatu dunkkaaniyan de7anaagaappe ta Xoossaa keettaa penggiyaa naagiyoogee taayyo lo77o.

English Sentences: For the LORD God is a sun and shield: the LORD will give grace and glory: no good thing will he withhold from them that walk uprightly.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Xoossai nuussi gonddallenne nuna naagiyaagaa; i nuussi bonchchuwaanne kehatettaa immees. Suuretettan hemettiyaageeta i lo77obaa ubbaa diggenna.

English Sentences: O LORD of hosts, blessed is the man that trusteth in thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAU, nenan ammanettiyaageeti anjjettidaageeta.

English Sentences: Lord, thou hast been favourable unto thy land: thou hast brought back the captivity of Jacob.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni ne biittaa maaradasa; Yaaqooba asaa omooduwaa zaaradasa.

English Sentences: Thou hast forgiven the iniquity of thy people, thou hast covered all their sin. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne asaa naaquwaa atto gaadasa; eta nagaraa ubbaa quccadasa.

English Sentences: Thou hast taken away all thy wrath: thou hast turned thyself from the fierceness of thine anger.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne yiilluwaa ubbaa aggadasa; ne hanqquwaa suuluwaappekka simmadasa.

English Sentences: Turn us, O God of our salvation, and cause thine anger toward us to cease.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet nuna ashshiya Xoossau, nuna guyye zaara. Neeni nuussi lanccidoogaanne agga.

English Sentences: Wilt thou be angry with us for ever? wilt thou draw out thine anger to all generations?
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni nuna merinaayyo hanqqettuutee? Ne hanqquwaa yeleta ubbaa gakkanau gam77issuutee?

English Sentences: Wilt thou not revive us again: that thy people may rejoice in thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne asai nenan ufaittana mala, nuna ooraxissa.

English Sentences: Shew us thy mercy, O LORD, and grant us thy salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, aggenna ne siiquwaa nuna bessa; neeni nuna maaddada ashsha.

English Sentences: I will hear what God the LORD will speak: for he will speak peace unto his people, and to his saints: but let them not turn again to folly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAI Xoossai yootiyoobaa siyais. Nuuni nu eeyya ogiyaa guyye baana xayikko, i nuuyyo, ba asaayyo, "Sarotettaa immana" giidi yootees.

English Sentences: Surely his salvation is nigh them that fear him; that glory may dwell in our land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tumukka Xoossaassi yayyiyaageeta ashshanau i matan de7ees; hegeenne, a bonchchoi nu biittan de7anaassa.

English Sentences: Mercy and truth are met together; righteousness and peace have kissed each other.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aggenna siiqoinne tumatettai issippe gaittana. Xillotettainne sarotettai issippe yerettana.

English Sentences: Truth shall spring out of the earth; and righteousness shall look down from heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaa tumatettai sa7aappe pude kiyana; Xoossaa xillotettai saluwaappe duge xeellana.

English Sentences: Yea, the LORD shall give that which is good; and our land shall yield her increase.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ee, Xoossai kehabaa immana; nu biittaikka lo77o kattaa mokkana.

English Sentences: Righteousness shall go before him; and shall set us in the way of his steps.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xillotettai GODAAPPE sinttaara heemettana; ayyo ogiyaa giigissana.

English Sentences: Bow down thine ear, O LORD, hear me: for I am poor and needy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani hiyyeesanne metootanchcha asa gidiyo gishshau, ta waasuwaa siyada, taassi alla.

English Sentences: Preserve my soul; for I am holy: O thou my God, save thy servant that trusteth in thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Xoossaa asa gidiyo gishshau, tana paxa wotta. Nenan ammanettiya tana, ne ashkkaraa ashsha. Neeni ta Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Be merciful unto me, O Lord: for I cry unto thee daily.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau, taani gallassa ubbaa neeyyo waassiyo gishshau, taayyo qaretta.

English Sentences: Rejoice the soul of thy servant: for unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau, taani ta shemppuwaappe nena woossiyo gishshau, tana, ne ashkkaraa ufaissa.

English Sentences: For thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau, neeni kehanne atto giyaagaa; nena xeegiya ubbaayyo aggenna ne siiqoi dariyoogaa.

English Sentences: Give ear, O LORD, unto my prayer; and attend to the voice of my supplications.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ta woosaa siya; taani watiwatiyo watiwatuwaa ezgga.

English Sentences: In the day of my trouble I will call upon thee: for thou wilt answer me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni taayyo alliyo gishshau, ta metuwaa gallassan taani neeyyo waassais.

English Sentences: Among the gods there is none like unto thee, O Lord; neither are there any works like unto thy works.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau, xoossatu giddon ne mali baawa; ne oosuwaa mala oosoikka baawa.

English Sentences: All nations whom thou hast made shall come and worship before thee, O Lord; and shall glorify thy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau, neeni medhdhido kawotettaa asai ubbai yiidi, ne sinttan gulbbatana; eti ne sunttaa bonchchana.

English Sentences: For thou art great, and doest wondrous things: thou art God alone.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, neeni gita; neeni maalaalissiyaabaa oottaasa. Ne xalaalai Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Teach me thy way, O LORD; I will walk in thy truth: unite my heart to fear thy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani ne tuman hemettana mala, tana ne ogiyaa tamaarissa. Taani ne sunttaayyo yayyana mala, taayyo issi wozanaa imma.

English Sentences: I will praise thee, O Lord my God, with all my heart: and I will glorify thy name for evermore.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau ta Xoossau, taani nena ta kumetta wozanaappe galatana. Ne sunttaa merinau bonchchana.

English Sentences: For great is thy mercy toward me: and thou hast delivered my soul from the lowest hell.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, aggenna ne siiqoi taayyo daro; neeni tana duufuwan geliyoosaappe ashshadasa.

English Sentences: O God, the proud are risen against me, and the assemblies of violent men have sought after my soul; and have not set thee before them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, otoranchcha asati ta bolli denddidosona; daganttiya asatu citai tana woranau koyees. Eti nena wudokkona.

English Sentences: But thou, O Lord, art a God full of compassion, and gracious, long suffering, and plenteous in mercy and truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin abeet Godau, neeni qarettiyanne maariya Xoossaa; hanqqettanau gam77iyaagaa; aggenna siiqoinne ammanettiyoobai dariyoogaa.

English Sentences: O turn unto me, and have mercy upon me; give thy strength unto thy servant, and save the son of thine handmaid.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taakko simmada taayyo qaretta. Ne ashkkaraayyo wolqqaa imma; ne ashkkaree na7aa tana ashsha.

English Sentences: Shew me a token for good; that they which hate me may see it, and be ashamed: because thou, LORD, hast holpen me, and comforted me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne kehatettaa malaataa tana bessa. Neeni tana maaddidoogaanne minttettidoogaa be7iyo wode, tana ixxiyaageeti hegan yeellatana.

English Sentences: His foundation is in the holy mountains.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA katamai geeshsha deriyan keexettiis.

English Sentences: The LORD loveth the gates of Zion more than all the dwellings of Jacob.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Yerusalaame katamaa Israa7eelan de7iyo soho ubbaappe aattidi siiqees.

English Sentences: Glorious things are spoken of thee, O city of God. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenoo Xoossaa katamau, neeni bonchchettana mala, Xoossai hagaadan yaagees;

English Sentences: I will make mention of Rahab and Babylon to them that know me: behold Philistia, and Tyre, with Ethiopia; this man was born there.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani taayyo azazettiya kawotettata mazggafiyo wode, Gibxxenne Baabiloone gatta mazggafana; Pilisxxeema, Xiiroosenna Toophphiyaa asaa Yerusalaamen de7iya asaara issippe qoodana" yaagees.

English Sentences: And of Zion it shall be said, This and that man was born in her: and the highest himself shall establish her.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai, "Kawotetta ubbai Xiyoonessa" yaagana. Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossai a essana.

English Sentences: The LORD shall count, when he writeth up the people, that this man was born there. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI asaa xaafiyo mazggafan, "Hagee Xiyoonessa" yaagidi xaafana.

English Sentences: As well the singers as the players on instruments shall be there: all my springs are in thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti yexxidi kaa7iiddi, "Nu anjjoi ubbai Xiyooneppe pulttees" yaagana.

English Sentences: O LORD God of my salvation, I have cried day and night before thee:
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, tana ashshiya Xoossau, taani gallassi neessi waassais; qammikka ne sinttan yeekkais.

English Sentences: Let my prayer come before thee: incline thine ear unto my cry;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta woosai ne sintti gakko; ne haittaa ta waasuwaakko yegga.

English Sentences: For my soul is full of troubles: and my life draweth nigh unto the grave.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ta de7oi metuwan kumiis; taani haiqqana mataas.

English Sentences: I am counted with them that go down into the pit: I am as a man that hath no strength:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani duufuwan geliya asatuura qoodettaas; wolqqi bainna asa gidaas.

English Sentences: Free among the dead, like the slain that lie in the grave, whom thou rememberest no more: and they are cut off from thy hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ahatu giddon aggido asa mala; woridi duufuwan yeggido asatu mala. Taani neeni mule dogido, neeppe duuxxida asatu mala.

English Sentences: Thou hast laid me in the lowest pit, in darkness, in the deeps.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana ciimma ollan, hirkki xuma sohuwan yeggadasa.

English Sentences: Thy wrath lieth hard upon me, and thou hast afflicted me with all thy waves. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne hanqqoi tana deexxees; ne hanqquwaa beetai tana muleera muukkiis.

English Sentences: Thou hast put away mine acquaintance far from me; thou hast made me an abomination unto them: I am shut up, and I cannot come forth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta dabbota taappe haassadasa; etayyo tana sheneyiyaabaa oottadasa. Taani un77ettaas; kessa ekkanaukka danddayikke.

English Sentences: Mine eye mourneth by reason of affliction: LORD, I have called daily upon thee, I have stretched out my hands unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, kayyuwaa gaasuwan ta aifeti galjjidosona. Ubba gallassi taani neekko waassais; ta kushiyaa neekko miccaas.

English Sentences: Wilt thou shew wonders to the dead? shall the dead arise and praise thee? Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni haiqqidaageetussi maalaalissiyaabaa oottakka; eti denddidi nena galatokkona.

English Sentences: Shall thy lovingkindness be declared in the grave? or thy faithfulness in destruction?
Wolaitta Sentences: Aggenna ne siiqoi mulekka duufo giddon haasayettenna; neeni ammanettiyoogeekka bashshaa sohuwan odettenna.
