English Sentences: Shall thy wonders be known in the dark? and thy righteousness in the land of forgetfulness?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne maalaalissiya oosoikka xuman erettenna; woikko ne kehatettai dogettido asatu biittan de7enna.

English Sentences: But unto thee have I cried, O LORD; and in the morning shall my prayer prevent thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani neekko waassais; maalladuwan ta woosai ne sintti gakkees.

English Sentences: LORD, why castest thou off my soul? why hidest thou thy face from me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, tana neeni aissi aggai? Ne som77uwaa taappe aissi genttai?

English Sentences: I am afflicted and ready to die from my youth up: while I suffer thy terrors I am distracted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yelagatettaasappe doommada, taani tuggataasinne haiqqana mataas. Taani neeyyo dagammada yibbaatana hanais.

English Sentences: Thy fierce wrath goeth over me; thy terrors have cut me off.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne suulliya hanqqoi ta bolli uushiis; ne dagamai tana bashshees.

English Sentences: They came round about me daily like water; they compassed me about together.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti gallassa ubbaa di7uwaadan tana dooddoosona; tana muddoosona.

English Sentences: Lover and friend hast thou put far from me, and mine acquaintance into darkness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta laggetanne ta siiqota taappe haassadasa; xumaa xalaalai taayyo dabbo.

English Sentences: I will sing of the mercies of the LORD for ever: with my mouth will I make known thy faithfulness to all generations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, aggenna ne siiquwaabaa taani merinau yexxana. "GODAI ammanettiyaagaa" gaada, yeleta ubbaayyo ta doonan awaajjana.

English Sentences: For I have said, Mercy shall be built up for ever: thy faithfulness shalt thou establish in the very heavens.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani aggenna ne siiqoi merinaayyo eqqidoogaanne neeni ne tumatettaa saluwaadan minttada essidoogaa yootana.

English Sentences: I have made a covenant with my chosen, I have sworn unto David my servant,
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni, "Taani dooridoogaara maachchaa maacettaas. Ta ashkkaraa Daawitayyo hagaadan yaagada caaqqaas;

English Sentences: Thy seed will I establish for ever, and build up thy throne to all generations. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne zerettaa merinaayyo kawoyana; ne kawotaa araataa yeleta ubbau minttana yaagaas" yaagadasa.

English Sentences: And the heavens shall praise thy wonders, O LORD: thy faithfulness also in the congregation of the saints.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, saloti neeni oottido maalaalissiyaabaanne neeni ammanettiyoogaa geeshshatu yaa7aan galatoosona.

English Sentences: For who in the heaven can be compared unto the LORD? who among the sons of the mighty can be likened unto the LORD?
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwan GODAARA likkettanau danddayiyai oonee? Saluwaa meretettatu giddon qassi GODAA mali oonee?

English Sentences: God is greatly to be feared in the assembly of the saints, and to be had in reverence of all them that are about him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geeshshatu yaa7aa giddon Xoossai yayettidaagaa. Bana dooddidaageetu ubbaappe aadhdhidi, keehi daganttiyaagaa.

English Sentences: O LORD God of hosts, who is a strong LORD like unto thee? or to thy faithfulness round about thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Ubbaappe Wolqqaama GODAU Xoossau, nenadan wolqqaami oonee? Abeet GODAU, neeni ubbabankka ammanettiyaagaa.

English Sentences: Thou rulest the raging of the sea: when the waves thereof arise, thou stillest them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni sugettiya abbaa wolqqaa azazaasa. Denddiya beetaakka co77u oottaasa.

English Sentences: Thou hast broken Rahab in pieces, as one that is slain; thou hast scattered thine enemies with thy strong arm.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni Ra7aaba giyo abbaa demiyaa wori yeggidobaadan mentterettadasa; ne morkketa ne wolqqaama qesiyan laaladasa.

English Sentences: The heavens are thine, the earth also is thine: as for the world and the fulness thereof, thou hast founded them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saloti neegeeta; sa7aikka nebaa; biittaanne an kumida ubbabaa neeni oottadasa.

English Sentences: The north and the south thou hast created them: Tabor and Hermon shall rejoice in thy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Huuphessaanne tohossaa neeni medhdhadasa; Taabooranne Hermmoone giyo gita dereti ufaissan ne sunttaa sabboosona.

English Sentences: Thou hast a mighty arm: strong is thy hand, and high is thy right hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeyyo wolqqaama qesee de7ees; ne kushee mino; ne ushachchai baabisees.

English Sentences: Justice and judgment are the habitation of thy throne: mercy and truth shall go before thy face.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xillotettainne suure pirddai ne kawotaa araataassi baaso. Aggenna siiqoinne tumatettai nena ajaboosona.

English Sentences: Blessed is the people that know the joyful sound: they shall walk, O LORD, in the light of thy countenance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, nena sabbi eriyaageetinne ne som77uwaa poo7uwan heemettiyaageeti anjjettidaageeta.

English Sentences: In thy name shall they rejoice all the day: and in thy righteousness shall they be exalted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne sunttan gallassa ubban ufaittoosona; ne xillotettaa gishshau, eti nena xoqqu xoqqu oottoosona.

English Sentences: For thou art the glory of their strength: and in thy favour our horn shall be exalted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ceeqettiyo wolqqai nena; ne nashuwan nu kacee xoqqu xoqqu yaagiis.

English Sentences: For the LORD is our defence; and the Holy One of Israel is our king.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu gonddallee nu GODAASSA; nu kawoi Israa7eela geeshshaassa.

English Sentences: Then thou spakest in vision to thy holy one, and saidst, I have laid help upon one that is mighty; I have exalted one chosen out of the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beni neeni ne ammanettida asatuyyo ajjuutan hagaadan yaagadasa; "Taani olettiyaagaa maaddaas. Taani asaa giddoppe doorettidaagaa xoqqu xoqqu oottaas.

English Sentences: I have found David my servant; with my holy oil have I anointed him:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta ashkkaraa Daawita demmaas; ta geeshsha zaitiyaa tiyada a kawoyaas.

English Sentences: With whom my hand shall be established: mine arm also shall strengthen him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta kushee aara merinau daana; ta qeseekka a minttana.

English Sentences: The enemy shall not exact upon him; nor the son of wickedness afflict him.
Wolaitta Sentences: A ai morkkeenne xoonenna; ai iita asinne a huqqunnenna.

English Sentences: And I will beat down his foes before his face, and plague them that hate him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani a morkketa a sinttan kinchcherettana; a ixxiyaageeta shoca yeggana.

English Sentences: But my faithfulness and my mercy shall be with him: and in my name shall his horn be exalted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta tumatettainne ta aggenna siiqoi aara issippe gidana. Ta sunttan a kacee xoqqu xoqqu gaana.

English Sentences: I will set his hand also in the sea, and his right hand in the rivers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani a kawotettaa Meediteraane Abbaappe Efiraaxiisa SHaafaa gakkanaassi aassana.

English Sentences: He shall cry unto me, Thou art my father, my God, and the rock of my salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti tana, Neeni ta aawaa, ta Xoossaanne tana ashshiya zaallaa yaagidi xeesana.

English Sentences: Also I will make him my firstborn, higher than the kings of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani a bairayana; sa7an de7iya kawotu ubbaappe a gitayana.

English Sentences: My mercy will I keep for him for evermore, and my covenant shall stand fast with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani aggenna ta siiquwaa ayyo merinau naagana. Taani aara maacettido maachchaa minttana.

English Sentences: His seed also will I make to endure for ever, and his throne as the days of heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani a zerettaa merinaayyo minttada essana; a kawotaa araataakka saluwaadan gam77ettana.

English Sentences: If his children forsake my law, and walk not in my judgments;
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin a zerettati ta higgiyaa aggikko, qassi eti ta woggaadan hemettennan ixxikko,

English Sentences: If they break my statutes, and keep not my commandments;
Wolaitta Sentences: eti ta awaajjuwaa shaarikko, ta azazuwaa naagana xayikko,

English Sentences: Then will I visit their transgression with the rod, and their iniquity with stripes.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani eta nagaraa gishshau gatiman, eta iitatettaa gishshau, lissuwan shocada qaxxayana.

English Sentences: Nevertheless my lovingkindness will I not utterly take from him, nor suffer my faithfulness to fail.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani aggenna ta siiquwaa appe ekkikke; woikko taani au ammanettiyoogaa aggikke.

English Sentences: My covenant will I not break, nor alter the thing that is gone out of my lips.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani etaara maacettido maachchaa birshshikke; ta doonaappe kiyida qaalaa laammikke.

English Sentences: Once have I sworn by my holiness that I will not lie unto David.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani issitonkka merinaayyo ta geeshshatettan caaqqarggaas; Daawitassi worddotikke.

English Sentences: His seed shall endure for ever, and his throne as the sun before me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, a zerettai merinaassi daana; a kawotaa araataikka ta sinttan awaadan gam77ana.

English Sentences: It shall be established for ever as the moon, and as a faithful witness in heaven. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwan ammanettiya markka gidiya aginaadan, he kawotettai merinaayyo minni eqqidi daana" yaagadasa.

English Sentences: But thou hast cast off and abhorred, thou hast been wroth with thine anointed.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ha77i neeni tiyada kawoyidoogaa bolli daro hanqqettadasa; a ixxadasanne aggadasa.

English Sentences: Thou hast made void the covenant of thy servant: thou hast profaned his crown by casting it to the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne ashkkaraara maacettido maachchaa kaddadasa; a kallachchaanne baanan olada tunissadasa.

English Sentences: Thou hast broken down all his hedges; thou hast brought his strong holds to ruin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni a katamaa gimbbiyaa ubbaa laaladasa; i naagettiyo miixaa ubbaa bashshadasa.

English Sentences: All that pass by the way spoil him: he is a reproach to his neighbours.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ogiyaara aadhdhiya ubbati a bonqqidosona; i ba shoorotuyyo boriyoobaa gidiis.

English Sentences: Thou hast set up the right hand of his adversaries; thou hast made all his enemies to rejoice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni a morkketuyyo xoonuwaa immada, eta ubbaa ufaissadasa.

English Sentences: Thou hast also turned the edge of his sword, and hast not made him to stand in the battle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni a bisuwaa xeeraa qalam77adasa; neeni olan a maaddabaakka.

English Sentences: Thou hast made his glory to cease, and cast his throne down to the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni a kawotaa xam77aa a kushiyaappe wotta ekkadasa; qassi a kawotaa araataa biittan oladasa.

English Sentences: The days of his youth hast thou shortened: thou hast covered him with shame. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni a yelagatettaa wodiyaa qanttadasa; qassi a yeellaa maizzadasa.

English Sentences: How long, LORD? wilt thou hide thyself for ever? shall thy wrath burn like fire?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, aude gakkanau gam77anee? Neeni merinau geemmuutee? Ne hanqqoi tamaadan aude gakkanaayyo eexxanee?

English Sentences: Remember how short my time is: wherefore hast thou made all men in vain?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta laittai ai keena qanttakko qoppa; asaa ubbaa coo hada medhdhadii!

English Sentences: What man is he that liveth, and shall not see death? shall he deliver his soul from the hand of the grave? Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi haiqqennan coo de7anau waani danddayii? Qassi duufuwan gelennaadan, bana ashshanau waani danddayii?

English Sentences: Lord, where are thy former lovingkindnesses, which thou swarest unto David in thy truth?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau, neeni ne tumatettan Daawitassi caaqqido, aggenna beni ne siiqoi awan de7ii?

English Sentences: Remember, Lord, the reproach of thy servants; how I do bear in my bosom the reproach of all the mighty people;
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau, ne ashkkarai woqqaa borettidaakkonne neeni hassaya. Taani asaa ubbaa boriyaa waata danddayidaakko qoppa.

English Sentences: Wherewith thine enemies have reproached, O LORD; wherewith they have reproached the footsteps of thine anointed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, morkketi qilliiccidosona; neeni doorada tiyido kawuwaa tangguwan tangguwan qilliiccidosona.

English Sentences: Blessed be the LORD for evermore. Amen, and Amen.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI meri merinau galatetto! Amin77i. Amin77i.

English Sentences: Lord, thou hast been our dwelling place in all generations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godau, neeni yeleta ubban nuuni de7iyo soho gidadasa.

English Sentences: Before the mountains were brought forth, or ever thou hadst formed the earth and the world, even from everlasting to everlasting, thou art God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dereti merettanaappe kase, woikko neeni sa7aa oottanaappe kase, merinaappe merinaa gakkanaayyookka neeni Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Thou turnest man to destruction; and sayest, Return, ye children of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni asaa naata, "Asaa naatoo, guyye biittau simmite" yaagada, eta guyye eti merettido biittau zaaraasa.

English Sentences: For a thousand years in thy sight are but as yesterday when it is past, and as a watch in the night.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHa7u laittai neeyyo zinoi aadhdhiyoogaa mala; woikko qammaa giddoppe issi saate mala.

English Sentences: Thou carriest them away as with a flood; they are as a sleep: in the morning they are like grass which groweth up.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni asaa qoppennan di7uwaadan efaasa. Eti aimo mala; maallado maallado mokkiya maataa mala.

English Sentences: In the morning it flourisheth, and groweth up; in the evening it is cut down, and withereth.
Wolaitta Sentences: He maatainne maallado wode diccidi ciyyees; omariyo wode shullidi melees.

English Sentences: For we are consumed by thine anger, and by thy wrath are we troubled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni ne yiilluwan wurida; ne hanqquwaa suuluwan dagammida.

English Sentences: Thou hast set our iniquities before thee, our secret sins in the light of thy countenance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni nu iita oosuwaa ne sinttan wottadasa; qassi nu geemmida nagaraa ne sintta poo7uwaakko aattadasa.

English Sentences: For all our days are passed away in thy wrath: we spend our years as a tale that is told.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu gallassa ubbai ne hanqquwan aadhdhiis; nu laittaa issi ooledan wurssoos.

English Sentences: The days of our years are threescore years and ten; and if by reason of strength they be fourscore years, yet is their strength labour and sorrow; for it is soon cut off, and we fly away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu de7uwaa laittai laappun tamma; woi minnikko, hosppun tamma; hegeekka metonne tugga. Nu laittai eesuwan aadhdhees; nuunikka eesuwan kichchoos.

English Sentences: Who knoweth the power of thine anger? even according to thy fear, so is thy wrath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne hanqquwaa wolqqaanne ne hanqquwaa suuloi ehiyo yashshaa ooninne erenna.

English Sentences: So teach us to number our days, that we may apply our hearts unto wisdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, nuuni aadhdhida eranchcha gidana mala, nu laittai qantta gidiyoogaa nuna tamaarissa.

English Sentences: Return, O LORD, how long? and let it repent thee concerning thy servants.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne hanqqoi aude gakkanaassee? Simma; ne ashkkaratuyyo qaretta!

English Sentences: O satisfy us early with thy mercy; that we may rejoice and be glad all our days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu laittaa ubban nuuni ufaittanaadaaninne yexxanaadan, maallado maallado aggenna ne siiquwan nuna kalssa.

English Sentences: Make us glad according to the days wherein thou hast afflicted us, and the years wherein we have seen evil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni nuna metoyido gallassatu keesaanne nuuni tuggaa be7ido laittatu keesaa, nuna ufaissa.

English Sentences: Let thy work appear unto thy servants, and thy glory unto their children.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuyyo ne ashkkaratuyyo ne oosoi qoncco; ne bonchcho wolqqai nu naatuyyo beetto.

English Sentences: And let the beauty of the LORD our God be upon us: and establish thou the work of our hands upon us; yea, the work of our hands establish thou it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaa nu Xoossaa kehatettai nu bollan gido; nu kushiyaa oosuwaa nuussi injjeya. Ee, nu kushiyaa oosuwaa injjeya.

English Sentences: He that dwelleth in the secret place of the most High shall abide under the shadow of the Almighty.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossan naagettidi de7iyaanne Ubbaappe Wolqqaama Xoossaa kuwaa giddon aqiya asi GODAASSI yaagana,

English Sentences: I will say of the LORD, He is my refuge and my fortress: my God; in him will I trust.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Neeni taayyo qatonne baqata attiyo soho; neeni taani ammanettiyo ta Xoossaa" yaagana.

English Sentences: Surely he shall deliver thee from the snare of the fowler, and from the noisome pestilence.
Wolaitta Sentences: I nena shankkanchchatu gitiyaappekka wori wurssiya harggiyaappekka ashshana.

English Sentences: He shall cover thee with his feathers, and under his wings shalt thou trust: his truth shall be thy shield and buckler.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba baalletun nena kammana; a qefetu garssi neeni baqatada qosetta attana. I ammanettiyaagaa; a tumatettai neeyyo gonddalle.

English Sentences: Thou shalt not be afraid for the terror by night; nor for the arrow that flieth by day;
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni qammi daganttiyaabau, woikko gallassi xonggettiya zubbiyau,

English Sentences: Nor for the pestilence that walketh in darkness; nor for the destruction that wasteth at noonday.
Wolaitta Sentences: woikko xuman oiqqiya harggiyau, woikko gallassa seetan wurssiya boshau yayyakka.

English Sentences: A thousand shall fall at thy side, and ten thousand at thy right hand; but it shall not come nigh thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHa7ai ne miyyessaara, qassi tammu sha7ai neeppe ushachcha baggaara kunddana; shin nena aibinne bochchenna.

English Sentences: Only with thine eyes shalt thou behold and see the reward of the wicked.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne aifiyan xeello xeellananne iitati qaxxayettiyoogaa be7ana.

English Sentences: Because thou hast made the LORD, which is my refuge, even the most High, thy habitation;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA neeni neeyyo baqata attiyo soho oottido gishshaunne, Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossaa neeyyo de7iyo soho oottido gishshau,

English Sentences: There shall no evil befall thee, neither shall any plague come nigh thy dwelling.
Wolaitta Sentences: iitabai nena bochchenna; boshaikka ne keettaa shiiqenna.

English Sentences: For he shall give his angels charge over thee, to keep thee in all thy ways.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ne ogiyan ubban nena naagana mala, Xoossai ba kiitanchchata azazana.

English Sentences: They shall bear thee up in their hands, lest thou dash thy foot against a stone.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne tohoi shuchchan xubettenna mala, kiitanchchati bantta kushiyan nena denttana.

English Sentences: Thou shalt tread upon the lion and adder: the young lion and the dragon shalt thou trample under feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni gaammuwaanne shooshshaa bollan heemettana; qassi yashshiya gaammuwaanne woriya shooshshaa neeni yedhdhana.

English Sentences: Because he hath set his love upon me, therefore will I deliver him: I will set him on high, because he hath known my name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; "I tana siiqido gishshau, taani a ashshana. I ta sunttaa erido gishshau, taani a naagana.

English Sentences: He shall call upon me, and I will answer him: I will be with him in trouble; I will deliver him, and honour him.
Wolaitta Sentences: I tana xeegiyo wode, taani ayyo koyana. Metuwan taani aara issippe gidana; taani a ashshananne bonchchana.

English Sentences: With long life will I satisfy him, and shew him my salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani a bariyaa adussada kalssana; ta atotettaa a bessana" yaagees.

English Sentences: IT IS A GOOD THING TO GIVE THANKS UNTO THE LORD, AND TO SING PRAISES UNTO THY NAME, O MOST HIGH:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA galatiyoogee lo77o. Abeet Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossau, ne sunttaa sabbiyoogee lo77o.

English Sentences: To shew forth thy lovingkindness in the morning, and thy faithfulness every night,
Wolaitta Sentences: Tammu baqettan waaxettida diittaanne maazinqqiyaa diixxiiddi,

English Sentences: Upon an instrument of ten strings, and upon the psaltery; upon the harp with a solemn sound.
Wolaitta Sentences: maallado aggenna siiquwaa, qammi neeni ammanettiyaagaa gidiyoogaa awaajjiyoogee lo77o.

English Sentences: For thou, LORD, hast made me glad through thy work: I will triumph in the works of thy hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, neeni ne wolqqaama oosuwan tana ufaissido gishshau, ne kushiyaa oosuwaa gishshau, taani ufaissau yexxais.

English Sentences: O LORD, how great are thy works! and thy thoughts are very deep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne oosoi ai keesa gitee! Ne qofai ai keesa ciimmee!

English Sentences: A brutish man knoweth not; neither doth a fool understand this.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eeyya asi eranau danddayenna; damma asikka akeekanau danddayenna.

English Sentences: When the wicked spring as the grass, and when all the workers of iniquity do flourish; it is that they shall be destroyed for ever:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, iitati maataadan diccikkokka, iita oottiya ubbati daayikkokka, eti merinaayyo xayana.

English Sentences: But thou, LORD, art most high for evermore.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin abeet GODAU, neeni merinaayyo ubbaappe xoqqa.

English Sentences: For, lo, thine enemies, O LORD, for, lo, thine enemies shall perish; all the workers of iniquity shall be scattered.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne morkketi xayanaagaanne iita oottiya ubbati piskki gaanaagaa nuuni eroos.

English Sentences: But my horn shalt thou exalt like the horn of an unicorn: I shall be anointed with fresh oil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta kaciyaa bazzo menttaa kaciyaadan xoqqissadasa; lo77o zaitiyaa tana tiyadasa.

English Sentences: Mine eye also shall see my desire on mine enemies, and mine ears shall hear my desire of the wicked that rise up against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketi xoonettidoogaa ta aifiyan be7aas; ta iita baarigaaratu waasuwaa ta haittan siyaas.

English Sentences: The righteous shall flourish like the palm tree: he shall grow like a cedar in Lebanon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xilloti zambbaadan daayana; qassi Liibaanoosa zigaadan diccana.

English Sentences: Those that be planted in the house of the LORD shall flourish in the courts of our God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etinne GODAA keettan tokettida mittaa mala; eti nu Xoossaa Beeta Maqidasiyan daayana.

English Sentences: They shall still bring forth fruit in old age; they shall be fat and flourishing;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ceeggidikka aifana; eti merinau irxxanne payya.

English Sentences: To shew that the LORD is upright: he is my rock, and there is no unrighteousness in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, GODAI suure gidiyoogaa bessees; i taayyo wogga zaallaa; iitatetti an baawa.

English Sentences: The LORD reigneth, he is clothed with majesty; the LORD is clothed with strength, wherewith he hath girded himself: the world also is stablished, that it cannot be moved.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI kawotiis! Bonchchuwaa maayiis; wolqqaa gixxiis. Sa7ai minnidi eqqiis; mulekka qaaxxenna.

English Sentences: Thy throne is established of old: thou art from everlasting.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne kawotaa araatai beniisappe eqqiis; neeni merinaasappe de7aasa.

English Sentences: The floods have lifted up, O LORD, the floods have lifted up their voice; the floods lift up their waves.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ciimma haattai guummiis; ee, ciimma haattai ba gunttaa xoqqu oottiis.

English Sentences: The LORD on high is mightier than the noise of many waters, yea, than the mighty waves of the sea.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwan de7iya GODAI daro haattaa gunttaappekka, abbaa dambbalaappekka aadhdhida wolqqaama.

English Sentences: Thy testimonies are very sure: holiness becometh thine house, O LORD, for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni yootidobai ammanettiyaagaa; ne keettaayyo geeshshatettai merinaayyo bessees.

English Sentences: O Lord God, to whom vengeance belongeth; O God, to whom vengeance belongeth, shew thyself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni haluwaa kessiya Xoossaa. Abeet haluwaa kessiya Xoossau, halo kessa.

English Sentences: Lift up thyself, thou judge of the earth: render a reward to the proud.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet sa7aa pirddiyaagoo, dendda; otoranchchatuyyo bessiya qixaatiyaa imma.

English Sentences: LORD, how long shall the wicked, how long shall the wicked triumph?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, aude gakkanaassi gam77anee? Iitati aude gakkanaassi ufaittanee?

English Sentences: How long shall they utter and speak hard things? and all the workers of iniquity boast themselves?
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitaa oottiya ubbati bantta otoro qaalaa biddoosona; eti ceeqettoosona.

English Sentences: They break in pieces thy people, O LORD, and afflict thine heritage.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, eti ne asaa diippoosona; neegeeta naaqqoosona.

English Sentences: They slay the widow and the stranger, and murder the fatherless.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti am77etanne beteta woroosona; aawai bainnaageetakka siifoosona.

English Sentences: Yet they say, The LORD shall not see, neither shall the God of Jacob regard it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi eti, "GODAI nuna be7enna; Yaaqooba Xoossai akeekenna" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: Understand, ye brutish among the people: and ye fools, when will ye be wise?
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, asa ubbaappe aadhdhida dammatoo, akeekite! Inttenoo eeyyatoo, aude eranchcha giduuteetii?

English Sentences: He that planted the ear, shall he not hear? he that formed the eye, shall he not see?
Wolaitta Sentences: Haittaa wottida Xoossai siyennee? Aifiyaa medhdhidaagee be7ennee?

English Sentences: He that chastiseth the heathen, shall not he correct? he that teacheth man knowledge, shall not he know?
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotettaa seeriyaagee qaxxayennee? Asaa eraa tamaarissiyaagee bau erennee?

English Sentences: The LORD knoweth the thoughts of man, that they are vanity.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI asaa qofai hada gidiyoogaa erees.

English Sentences: Blessed is the man whom thou chastenest, O LORD, and teachest him out of thy law;
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni seeriyonne ne higgiyaappe tamaarissiyo asi anjjettidaagaa.

English Sentences: That thou mayest give him rest from the days of adversity, until the pit be digged for the wicked.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitati kunddiyo ollai bookettana gakkanaassi, metoi gakkiyo gallassan neeni a shemppissaasa.

English Sentences: For the LORD will not cast off his people, neither will he forsake his inheritance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ba asaa yeggenna; i baageeta aggenna.

English Sentences: But judgment shall return unto righteousness: and all the upright in heart shall follow it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pirddai simmidi xillo pirdda gidana; wozanaa suureti ubbai he xillo pirddaa maaddana.

English Sentences: Who will rise up for me against the evildoers? or who will stand up for me against the workers of iniquity?
Wolaitta Sentences: Makkalanchchatu bolli ta gishshaa denddiyai oonee? Iitaa oottiyaageetuura ta gishshaa eqettidai oonee?

English Sentences: Unless the LORD had been my help, my soul had almost dwelt in silence.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI tana maaddennaakko, taani eesuwan duufuwan gelada sirphphi gaana shin.

English Sentences: When I said, My foot slippeth; thy mercy, O LORD, held me up.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani, "Ta gedee hallixxees" yaagido wode, aggenna ne siiqoi tana kaafiis.

English Sentences: In the multitude of my thoughts within me thy comforts delight my soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana hirggai woriyo wode, neeni tana woppu oottada ufaissaasa.

English Sentences: Shall the throne of iniquity have fellowship with thee, which frameth mischief by a law?
Wolaitta Sentences: Higgiyaa shaariya geella daannatuura neeni zuppetakka.

English Sentences: They gather themselves together against the soul of the righteous, and condemn the innocent blood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xillota woranau eti issippe yaa7oosona; geeshshata haiquwau pirddoosona.

English Sentences: But the LORD is my defence; and my God is the rock of my refuge.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, GODAI taani baqata attido soho; ta Xoossai taani qosettiyo wogga zaalla.

English Sentences: And he shall bring upon them their own iniquity, and shall cut them off in their own wickedness; yea, the LORD our God shall cut them off.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta iitatettaa gishshau, i eta qaxxayana; eta nagaraa gishshau, i eta xaissana; ee, GODAI nu Xoossai eta xaissana.

English Sentences: O come, let us sing unto the LORD: let us make a joyful noise to the rock of our salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haayite; ane GODAA sabboos. Nuna ashshiya zaallaassi ufaissau yexxoos.

English Sentences: Let us come before his presence with thanksgiving, and make a joyful noise unto him with psalms.
Wolaitta Sentences: A sintti galataara shiiqoos. Galata yettaa ufaissan yexxoos.

English Sentences: For the LORD is a great God, and a great King above all gods.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAI wolqqaama Xoossaa, xoossaatu ubbaa bolli wolqqaama kawo.

English Sentences: In his hand are the deep places of the earth: the strength of the hills is his also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittaa ciimmati a kushiyan de7oosona; deriyaa kiiketikka abaa.

English Sentences: The sea is his, and he made it: and his hands formed the dry land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abbaa haattaikka abaa; hegaa i medhdhiis; mela biittaakka a kushee oottiis.

English Sentences: O come, let us worship and bow down: let us kneel before the LORD our maker.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haayite; hokkidi ane ayyo goinnoos; nuna medhdhida GODAA sinttan gulbbatoos.

English Sentences: For he is our God; and we are the people of his pasture, and the sheep of his hand. To day if ye will hear his voice,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i nu Xoossaa. Nuuni a qooruwan de7iya asata; nuuni i heemmiyo a dorssaa wudeta. GODAI inttena hagaadan giyoogaa hachchi siyite!

English Sentences: Harden not your heart, as in the provocation, and as in the day of temptation in the wilderness:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Kase intte maizza aawati Mariiba giyo sohuwan hanidoogaadan, he gallassi Maasa Bazzuwan ixxidoogaadan, inttekka zore ekkennan ixxoppite.

English Sentences: When your fathers tempted me, proved me, and saw my work.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ta oosuwaa be7idikka, tana qoridosonanne paaccidosona.

English Sentences: Forty years long was I grieved with this generation, and said, It is a people that do err in their heart, and they have not known my ways:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani he yeletaa oitamu laittaa shenetaas; Eti ubba wode bantta wozanan baliya asa; eti ta ogiyaa eribokkona yaagaas.

English Sentences: Unto whom I sware in my wrath that they should not enter into my rest.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka qassi, taani hanqqetta caaqqada, Eti taani shemppiyoosaa mulekka gelokkona yaagaas" yaagees.

English Sentences: O sing unto the LORD a new song: sing unto the LORD, all the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAASSI ooratta yettaa yexxite; sa7an de7iya asau, ubbai GODAASSI yexxite.

English Sentences: Sing unto the LORD, bless his name; shew forth his salvation from day to day.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAASSI yexxite; a sunttaa sabbite; i ashshiyo mishiraachchuwaa hachchi hachchi yootite.

English Sentences: Declare his glory among the heathen, his wonders among all people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotettaa giddon a bonchchuwaabaa, asaa ubbaa giddon a maalaalissiya oosuwaabaa awaajjite.

English Sentences: For the LORD is great, and greatly to be praised: he is to be feared above all gods.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAI gita; aaro galatai ayyo bessees. Xoossatu ubbaappe aadhdhidi i yayettanau bessees.

English Sentences: For all the gods of the nations are idols: but the LORD made the heavens.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hara asaa xoossati ubbai eeqata; shin GODAI salota medhdhida Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Honour and majesty are before him: strength and beauty are in his sanctuary.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bonchchoinne anggai a yuushuwan de7ees; minotettainne puulai a Beeta Maqidasiyan de7ees.

English Sentences: Give unto the LORD, O ye kindreds of the people, give unto the LORD glory and strength.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, asa zaretoo ubbau, GODAABAA yootite; "Bonchchoinne wolqqai GODAABAA" giidi yootite.

English Sentences: Give unto the LORD the glory due unto his name: bring an offering, and come into his courts.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Bonchchoi a sunttaassa" giidi GODAABAA yootite. Yarshshuwaa ekkidi, a Beeta Maqidasiyaa gelite.

English Sentences: O worship the LORD in the beauty of holiness: fear before him, all the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: A geeshshatettaa puulan GODAAYYO goinnite; biittan de7iya asau ubbau, a sinttan kokkorite.

English Sentences: Say among the heathen that the LORD reigneth: the world also shall be established that it shall not be moved: he shall judge the people righteously.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotettatu giddon, "GODAI kawotiis! Sa7ai minni eqqiis; mulekka qaaxxenna. GODAI asaa bolli suuretettan pirddana" yaagite.

English Sentences: Let the heavens rejoice, and let the earth be glad; let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saloti ufaittona; sa7ainne hashshu go; abbainne a giddon kumidabai guummo.

English Sentences: Let the field be joyful, and all that is therein: then shall all the trees of the wood rejoice
Wolaitta Sentences: SHooqainne shooqan de7iya ubbai ufaitto! Woran de7iya mitta ubbainne ufaissan a sinttan yexxana.

English Sentences: Before the LORD: for he cometh, for he cometh to judge the earth: he shall judge the world with righteousness, and the people with his truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAI yees; i sa7aa bollan pirddanau yees; i ha sa7aa bolli xillotettan, asaa bollikka tumatettan pirddana.

English Sentences: The LORD reigneth; let the earth rejoice; let the multitude of isles be glad thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI kawotiis sa7an de7iya asai ufaitto; haaho haruurotun de7iya asatikka ufaittona.

English Sentences: Clouds and darkness are round about him: righteousness and judgment are the habitation of his throne.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHaarainne sakkana xumai a yuuyi aadhdhiis. Xillotettainne tumatettai a kawotaa araataassi baaso.

English Sentences: A fire goeth before him, and burneth up his enemies round about.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tamai appe sinttaara bees; a yuuyi aadhdhida morkketa xuuggees.

English Sentences: His lightnings enlightened the world: the earth saw, and trembled.
Wolaitta Sentences: A wolqqanttai sa7aa poo7issees; biittai hegaa be7idi kokkorees.

English Sentences: The hills melted like wax at the presence of the LORD, at the presence of the Lord of the whole earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA sinttan, sa7aa ubbaa Godaa sinttan wogga dereti eessaa muqaaddadan seeroosona.

English Sentences: The heavens declare his righteousness, and all the people see his glory.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saloti a xillotettaa awaajjoosona; asai ubbai a bonchchuwaa be7ees.

English Sentences: Confounded be all they that serve graven images, that boast themselves of idols: worship him, all ye gods.
Wolaitta Sentences: Worddo xoossatussi goinniyaageetinne he go77enna eeqatun ceeqettiyaageeti ubbai yeellatoosona. Xoossati ubbai GODAAYYO gulbbatoosona.

English Sentences: Zion heard, and was glad; and the daughters of Judah rejoiced because of thy judgments, O LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, Xiyoone asai ne xillo pirddaa siyidi ufaittees; Yihudaa katamatu asaikka hashshu gees.

English Sentences: For thou, LORD, art high above all the earth: thou art exalted far above all gods.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni sa7aa ubbaappe xoqqiyaagaa; xoossatu ubbaappe neeni xoqqu giidaagaa.

English Sentences: Ye that love the LORD, hate evil: he preserveth the souls of his saints; he delivereth them out of the hand of the wicked.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI iitaa ixxiyaageeta siiqees. I Xoossaa asata naagees; qassi eta iitatu kushiyaappe ashshees.

English Sentences: Light is sown for the righteous, and gladness for the upright in heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xillotuyyo poo7oi poo7ees; wozanaa suuretuyyo ufaissai de7ees.

English Sentences: Rejoice in the LORD, ye righteous; and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo xillotoo, GODAN ufaittite; a geeshsha sunttaa galatite.

English Sentences: O sing unto the LORD a new song; for he hath done marvellous things: his right hand, and his holy arm, hath gotten him the victory.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAAYYO ooratta yettaa yexxite; aissi giikko, i maalaalissiyaabaa oottiis. A ushachcha kusheenne a geeshsha qesee ayyo xoonuwaa immiis.

English Sentences: The LORD hath made known his salvation: his righteousness hath he openly shewed in the sight of the heathen.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ba xoonuwaa erissiis; i ashshiyoogaa kawotettatau qonccissiis.

English Sentences: He hath remembered his mercy and his truth toward the house of Israel: all the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.
Wolaitta Sentences: I Israa7eela so asaa siiqiyoogaanne etau ammanettiyoogaa hassayiis. Sa7aa gaxaa gakkanaassi de7iya asai ubbai nu Xoossaa xoonuwaa be7iis.

English Sentences: Make a joyful noise unto the LORD, all the earth: make a loud noise, and rejoice, and sing praise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7aa bollan de7iya asau ubbau, GODAAYYO ufaissan yexxite; qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, ufaissa sabaa sabbite.

English Sentences: Sing unto the LORD with the harp; with the harp, and the voice of a psalm.
Wolaitta Sentences: Diittaa GODAAYYO diixxite; diittaaninne yettan GODAA sabbite.

English Sentences: With trumpets and sound of cornet make a joyful noise before the LORD, the King.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xurumbbaanne malkkataa punniiddi, ufaissan GODAA nu kawuwaa sinttan hombbocite.

English Sentences: Let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abbainne abbaa giddon kumidabai ubbai guummo. Sa7ainne sa7aa bollan de7iya ubbai yexxo.

English Sentences: Let the floods clap their hands: let the hills be joyful together
Wolaitta Sentences: SHaafati issippe bantta kushiyaa baqqona. Qeeri dereti GODAA sinttan issippe ufaissan yexxona.

English Sentences: Before the LORD; for he cometh to judge the earth: with righteousness shall he judge the world, and the people with equity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i sa7aa bollan daannatanau yees. I ha sa7aa bolli xillotettan asaa bollikka suuretettan daannatana.

English Sentences: The LORD reigneth; let the people tremble: he sitteth between the cherubims; let the earth be moved.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI kawotiis! Hegaassi asati kokkorona. Kiruubeta giyo kiitanchchatuppe bollaara kawotaa araatan uttees; hegaassi biittai qaaxxo;

English Sentences: The LORD is great in Zion; and he is high above all the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Xiyoonen gita; kawotettaa ubbaappe i xoqqu xoqqu giis.

English Sentences: Let them praise thy great and terrible name; for it is holy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daroppe yashshiya a gita sunttaa eti ubbai galatona. I geeshshattennee!

English Sentences: The king's strength also loveth judgment; thou dost establish equity, thou executest judgment and righteousness in Jacob.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni, wolqqaama kawoi, likke pirddaa dosaasa. Neeni Israa7eela biittan suuretettaa minttadasa. Xillotettaanne likke pirddaa essadasa.

English Sentences: Exalt ye the LORD our God, and worship at his footstool; for he is holy.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA nu Xoossaa xoqqu xoqqu oottite; a gedee yedhdhiyoosan gufannidi au goinnite. I geeshshattennee!

English Sentences: Moses and Aaron among his priests, and Samuel among them that call upon his name; they called upon the LORD, and he answered them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muuseenne Aarooni a qeseta; Sameelikka a sunttan woossidaageetuppe issuwaa. Eti GODAASSI waassidosona; waassin i etau alliis.

English Sentences: He spake unto them in the cloudy pillar: they kept his testimonies, and the ordinance that he gave them.
Wolaitta Sentences: I shaaraa tuussaa giddoora etayyo haasayiis; eti i immido higgiyaanne wogaa naagidosona.

English Sentences: Thou answeredst them, O LORD our God: thou wast a God that forgavest them, though thou tookest vengeance of their inventions.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, nu Xoossau, neeni eta woosaa siyadasa. Neeni eta iitatettaa gishshau qaxxayidabaa gidikkokka, etau atto giida Xoossaa.

English Sentences: Exalt the LORD our God, and worship at his holy hill; for the LORD our God is holy.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA nu Xoossaa, xoqqu xoqqu oottite; a geeshsha deriyaa bollan ayyo goinnite; aissi giikko, GODAI nu Xoossai geeshshattennee!

English Sentences: Make a joyful noise unto the LORD, all ye lands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7an de7iya asau ubbau, GODAAYYO intte qaalaa xoqqu oottidi yexxite.

English Sentences: Serve the LORD with gladness: come before his presence with singing.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAAYYO ufaissan goinnite; ufaissa yettaara a sintti shiiqite.

English Sentences: Know ye that the LORD he is God: it is he that hath made us, and not we ourselves; we are his people, and the sheep of his pasture.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Xoossaa gidiyoogaa erite; nuna medhdhidaagee a; nuuni aageeta. Nuuni a asatanne a qooruwan de7iya dorssata.

English Sentences: Enter into his gates with thanksgiving, and into his courts with praise: be thankful unto him, and bless his name.
Wolaitta Sentences: A penggiyaa galataara, a Beeta Maqidasiyaa sabaara gelite; a galatitenne a sunttaa sabbite.

English Sentences: For the LORD is good; his mercy is everlasting; and his truth endureth to all generations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAI keha. Aggenna a siiqoi merinaassa; i yeletaappe yeletaa gakkanaassi ammanettiyaagaa.

English Sentences: I will sing of mercy and judgment: unto thee, O LORD, will I sing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani aggenna siiquwaabaanne xillo pirddaabaa yexxana; abeet GODAU, taani neeyyo yexxana.

English Sentences: I will behave myself wisely in a perfect way. O when wilt thou come unto me? I will walk within my house with a perfect heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani suure ogiyaabaa qoppana. Neeni taakko aude yuutee? Taani ta keettan suuretettan hemettana.

English Sentences: I will set no wicked thing before mine eyes: I hate the work of them that turn aside; it shall not cleave to me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta aifiyan pokkobaa xeellikke. Xoossaappe wora simmida asatu oosuwaa ixxais; eti mulekka tanaara gidokkona.

English Sentences: A froward heart shall depart from me: I will not know a wicked person.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wozanaa geellatettai taappe haakkana; iitatettaa taani erikke.

English Sentences: Whoso privily slandereth his neighbour, him will I cut off: him that hath an high look and a proud heart will not I suffer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geeman ba shooruwaa zigiriyaagaa taani sirphphi oottana. Otorettiyaanne ayyiya asa taani danddayikke.

English Sentences: Mine eyes shall be upon the faithful of the land, that they may dwell with me: he that walketh in a perfect way, he shall serve me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti tanaara de7ana mala, biittaa bolli de7iya ammanettiyaageeta taani keha aifiyan xeellais. Suuretettan hemettiya asi taayyo kiitettana.

English Sentences: He that worketh deceit shall not dwell within my house: he that telleth lies shall not tarry in my sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Cimmiyaagee ta keettan de7enna; wordduwaa haasayiyaagee ta sinttan gam77enna.

English Sentences: I will early destroy all the wicked of the land; that I may cut off all wicked doers from the city of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittan de7iya iita asaa ubbaa taani hachchi hachchi xaissana; iitaa oottiyaageeta ubbaa taani GODAA katamaappe xoqollana.

English Sentences: Hear my prayer, O LORD, and let my cry come unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ta woosaa siya; ta waasoi neekko gakko.

English Sentences: Hide not thy face from me in the day when I am in trouble; incline thine ear unto me: in the day when I call answer me speedily.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta waayiyaa gallassi ne som77uwaa taappe genttoppa. Ne haittaa taakko yegga; taani neeyyo waassiyo wode, taayyo eesuwan alla.

English Sentences: For my days are consumed like smoke, and my bones are burned as an hearth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ta laittai cuwaadan xayees; ta asatettaikka tamaa bonqquwaadan eexxees.

English Sentences: My heart is smitten, and withered like grass; so that I forget to eat my bread.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani shoci yeggido mela maataadan hanaas; qumaikka taayyo meetettenna.

English Sentences: By reason of the voice of my groaning my bones cleave to my skin.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta qaalaa xoqqu oottada oolais; ta gogai meqettaara ohettiis.

English Sentences: I am like a pelican of the wilderness: I am like an owl of the desert.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani bazzon de7iya ankko mala, woikko qoqqofettida keettan de7iya gutto mala.

English Sentences: I watch, and am as a sparrow alone upon the house top.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani zin77in, xiskkoi yeenna; taani keettaa huuphiyan barkka uttida kafo mala.

English Sentences: Mine enemies reproach me all the day; and they that are mad against me are sworn against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketi gallassa ubban tana cayoosona; tana qilliicciyaageeti ta sunttan qanggoosona.

English Sentences: For I have eaten ashes like bread, and mingled my drink with weeping,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne hanqquwaanne ne yiilluwaa gishshau, taani bidinttaa qumadan mais;

English Sentences: Because of thine indignation and thy wrath: for thou hast lifted me up, and cast me down.
Wolaitta Sentences: qassi ta afuttaa ta ushshaara walakkais. Neeni tana pude denttada, wora oladasa.

English Sentences: My days are like a shadow that declineth; and I am withered like grass.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta de7o laittai omarssa kuwaa mala; taani maataadan melais.

English Sentences: But thou, O LORD, shalt endure for ever; and thy remembrance unto all generations.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin abeet GODAU, neeni kawotaa araatan merinaayyo uttadasa; ne sunttaikka yeletaappe yeletaa gakkanaassi hassayettana.

English Sentences: Thou shalt arise, and have mercy upon Zion: for the time to favour her, yea, the set time, is come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni denddada, Xiyoonessi qarettana; aissi giikko, neeni a maariyo wodee gakkiis; hagee neeni doorido wodiyaa.

English Sentences: For thy servants take pleasure in her stones, and favour the dust thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: I qolettidaagaa gidikkokka, ne ashkkarati a siiqoosona. I moorettidaagaa gidikkokka, eti ayyo qarettoosona.

English Sentences: So the heathen shall fear the name of the LORD, and all the kings of the earth thy glory.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotettati GODAA sunttaayyo yayyana; sa7aa kawoti ubbai a anggaayyo dagammana.

English Sentences: When the LORD shall build up Zion, he shall appear in his glory.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAI Xiyoone zaaretti keexxidi, i ba gitatettaa bessana.

English Sentences: He will regard the prayer of the destitute, and not despise their prayer.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hiyyeesatu woosaa siyana; eta watiwatuwaa karenna.

English Sentences: This shall be written for the generation to come: and the people which shall be created shall praise the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biron yelettana asati GODAA galatana mala, hagee yiya yeletaayyo xaafetto.

English Sentences: For he hath looked down from the height of his sanctuary; from heaven did the LORD behold the earth;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI xoqqan de7iya ba geeshsha sohuwaappe duge xeelliis; i saluwaappe duge sa7aa dereqqiis.

English Sentences: To hear the groaning of the prisoner; to loose those that are appointed to death;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, qashettida asatu ooliyaa siyanaassanne haiquwaassi pirddettida asata birshshanaassa.

English Sentences: To declare the name of the LORD in Zion, and his praise in Jerusalem;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, GODAA sunttai Xiyoonen odettananne a galatai Yerusalaamen awaajettana.

English Sentences: When the people are gathered together, and the kingdoms, to serve the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Deretettainne kawotettai issippe shiiqidi, GODAAYYO he wode goinnana.

English Sentences: He weakened my strength in the way; he shortened my days.
Wolaitta Sentences: I taani yelagatettan de7ishin, ta wolqqaa ixissiis; ta bariyaa qanttiis.

English Sentences: I said, O my God, take me not away in the midst of my days: thy years are throughout all generations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, taani, "Abeet ta Xoossau, taani de7uwaa biron giddottishin, tana ekkoppa" yaagais. Abeet GODAU, neeni yeletaappe yeletaa gakkanaassi de7aasa.

English Sentences: Of old hast thou laid the foundation of the earth: and the heavens are the work of thy hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni beni sa7aa medhdhadasa; saloikka ne kushe ooso.

English Sentences: They shall perish, but thou shalt endure: yea, all of them shall wax old like a garment; as a vesture shalt thou change them, and they shall be changed:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeeti ubbai xayana; shin neeni de7ana; eti ubbaikka afaladan wurana. Neeni eta curqqa afaladan laammana; etikka aadhdhana.

English Sentences: But thou art the same, and thy years shall have no end.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin neeni nenakka; ne laittai mule wurenna.

English Sentences: The children of thy servants shall continue, and their seed shall be established before thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni ne ashkkarata; nu naati sarotettan de7ana. Eta zerettaikka ne sinttan minnidi eqqana.

English Sentences: Bless the LORD, O my soul: and all that is within me, bless his holy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tanooshsho, GODAA galata! Ta kumetta asatettau, a geeshsha sunttaa galata.

English Sentences: Bless the LORD, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits:
Wolaitta Sentences: Tanooshsho, GODAA galata! I neeyyo oottido kehatettaa ubbaa dogoppa.

English Sentences: Who forgiveth all thine iniquities; who healeth all thy diseases;
Wolaitta Sentences: I ta nagaraa ubbaa atto gees; i ta harggiyaa ubbaappe tana pattees.

English Sentences: Who redeemeth thy life from destruction; who crowneth thee with lovingkindness and tender mercies;
Wolaitta Sentences: I tana duufuwan gelennaadan ashshees; aggenna siiquwaaninne maarotan tana anjjees.

English Sentences: Who satisfieth thy mouth with good things; so that thy youth is renewed like the eagle's.
Wolaitta Sentences: Argganttaadan taani yelagana mala, i ta de7o ubban tana lo77obaa kalissees.

English Sentences: The LORD executeth righteousness and judgment for all that are oppressed.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI naaqettidaageetussi xillobaa ootteesinne suure pirddees.

English Sentences: He made known his ways unto Moses, his acts unto the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba ogiyaa Muusa, ba oosuwaa Israa7eela asata erissiis.

English Sentences: The LORD is merciful and gracious, slow to anger, and plenteous in mercy.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI qarettiyaagaanne maariyaagaa; i hanqqettanau eesotennaagaanne aggenna siiqoi dariyoogaa.

English Sentences: He will not always chide: neither will he keep his anger for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ubbatoo seerenna; merinau hanqqettenna.

English Sentences: He hath not dealt with us after our sins; nor rewarded us according to our iniquities.
Wolaitta Sentences: I nuna nu nagaraadan oottenna; nu iitatettaadan nuuyyo zaarenna.

English Sentences: For as the heaven is high above the earth, so great is his mercy toward them that fear him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saloi sa7aappe xoqqiyoogaadan, GODAAYYO yayyiyaageetuyyo aggenna a siiqoi gita.

English Sentences: As far as the east is from the west, so far hath he removed our transgressions from us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Awai mokkiyoosaappe awai wulliyoosai haakkiyoogaadan, hegaadankka GODAI nu mooruwaa nuuppe haassees.

English Sentences: Like as a father pitieth his children, so the LORD pitieth them that fear him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aawai ba naatuyyo qarettiyoogaadan, hegaadankka GODAI baassi yayyiyaageetuyyo qarettees.

English Sentences: For he knoweth our frame; he remembereth that we are dust.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, nuuni aibippe merettidaakkonne i erees; nuuni biitta gidiyoogaa i akeekees.

English Sentences: As for man, his days are as grass: as a flower of the field, so he flourisheth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asa gidikko, a de7oi maataa mala; i bazzo ciishshaadan ciyyees;

English Sentences: For the wind passeth over it, and it is gone; and the place thereof shall know it no more.
Wolaitta Sentences: ciyyidi, carkkoi a bolli carkkin xayi aggees; i naa77antto mulekka beettenna.

English Sentences: But the mercy of the LORD is from everlasting to everlasting upon them that fear him, and his righteousness unto children's children;
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAAYYO yayyiyaageetuyyo aggenna a siiqoi merinaappe merinaa gakkanaassa. A xillotettainne naatu naata gakkanaassa.

English Sentences: To such as keep his covenant, and to those that remember his commandments to do them.
Wolaitta Sentences: A maachchaa naagiyaageetussanne a azazuwaa polanau hassayiyaageetussa.

English Sentences: The LORD hath prepared his throne in the heavens; and his kingdom ruleth over all.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI salotun ba kawotaa araataa essiis; a kawotettai ubbaa haarees.

English Sentences: Bless the LORD, ye his angels, that excel in strength, that do his commandments, hearkening unto the voice of his word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, a kiitanchchatoo, a azazuwaa poliya wolqqaamatoo, i giyoobaa ezggiyaageetoo,

English Sentences: Bless ye the LORD, all ye his hosts; ye ministers of his, that do his pleasure.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo saluwan de7iya minotoo, a sheniyaa oottiya ashkkaratoo,

English Sentences: Bless the LORD, all his works in all places of his dominion: bless the LORD, O my soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, i haariyo soho ubban de7iya meretatoo, ubbaikkaTanooshsho, GODAA galata!

English Sentences: Bless the LORD, O my soul. O LORD my God, thou art very great; thou art clothed with honour and majesty.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tanooshsho, GODAA galata! Abeet GODAU ta Xoossau, neeni ai keena gitee! Neeni bonchchuwaanne anggaa maayadasa.

English Sentences: Who coverest thyself with light as with a garment: who stretchest out the heavens like a curtain:
Wolaitta Sentences: Poo7uwaa afaladan quuttadasa. Neeni saluwaa dunkkaaniyaadan toladasa.

English Sentences: Who layeth the beams of his chambers in the waters: who maketh the clouds his chariot: who walketh upon the wings of the wind:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne keettaa saluwaa gufanttuwaa bollan keexxaasa. SHaaraa para gaare kessaasa; carkkuwaa qefiyan toggaasa.

English Sentences: Who maketh his angels spirits; his ministers a flaming fire:
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni carkkota ne kiitanchcha, tamaa lacuwaakka ne ashkkara kessaasa.

English Sentences: Who laid the foundations of the earth, that it should not be removed for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni sa7aa a baasuwaa bolli essadasa; i meri merinaukka qaaxxenna.

English Sentences: Thou coveredst it with the deep as with a garment: the waters stood above the mountains.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gita abbai biittaa bollan afaladan micettiis; haattai gita dereta kammiis.

English Sentences: At thy rebuke they fled; at the voice of thy thunder they hasted away.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ne godatuwan haattati baqatidosona; ne azazuwaa siyidi, eesotidosona.

English Sentences: They go up by the mountains; they go down by the valleys unto the place which thou hast founded for them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti wogga deretuppe duge zanggaaraa, neeni etau bazzido sohuwaa goggidosona.

English Sentences: Thou hast set a bound that they may not pass over; that they turn not again to cover the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haattati simmidi biittaa kammennaadan, eti aadhdhanau danddayenna zawaa essadasa.

English Sentences: He sendeth the springs into the valleys, which run among the hills.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni pulttota zanggaaran pulttissaasa; eta haattai deretu gidduwaara goggees.

English Sentences: They give drink to every beast of the field: the wild asses quench their thirst.
Wolaitta Sentences: Goggiyaagaappe bazzo do7ati ubbai uyoosona; dembbaa hareti bantta saamuwaa appe aloosona.

English Sentences: By them shall the fowls of the heaven have their habitation, which sing among the branches.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwaa kafoti he haattaa matan bantta keettaa keexxidi, tashiyaa giddon yexxoosona.

English Sentences: He watereth the hills from his chambers: the earth is satisfied with the fruit of thy works.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni gita deretu bollan saluwaappe iraa bukissaasa; biittaikka ne anjjuwan kumees.

English Sentences: He causeth the grass to grow for the cattle, and herb for the service of man: that he may bring forth food out of the earth;
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni mehiyaassi maataa, asaassi kattaa mokissaasa.

English Sentences: And wine that maketh glad the heart of man, and oil to make his face to shine, and bread which strengtheneth man's heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, asai biittaa oottidi, biittaappe kattaa, asaa wozanaa ufaissiya woiniyaa, som77uwaa shicissiya zaitiyaanne wolqqaa kunttiya qumaa mokissanaassa.

English Sentences: The trees of the LORD are full of sap; the cedars of Lebanon, which he hath planted;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA mittati, i tokkido Liibaanoosa zigati, daro iraa uyoosona.

English Sentences: Where the birds make their nests: as for the stork, the fir trees are her house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etan kafoti bantta keettaa kexxoosona; qoolletikka xiiddaa bolli keexxidi de7oosona.

English Sentences: The high hills are a refuge for the wild goats; and the rocks for the conies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoqqa deretu bollan gaarati de7oosona; qassi guppalleti shuchchaa kooppuwan qosettoosona.

English Sentences: He appointed the moon for seasons: the sun knoweth his going down.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wodiyaa qoodaa erissana mala, neeni aginaa medhdhadasa. Awai ba wulliyo wodiyaa erees.

English Sentences: Thou makest darkness, and it is night: wherein all the beasts of the forest do creep forth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni qammaa medhdhadasa; xuman do7a ubbai kiyees.

English Sentences: The young lions roar after their prey, and seek their meat from God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wodala gaammoti shankkatiiddi gudoosona; eti banttau miyoobaa Xoossaappe koyoosona.

English Sentences: The sun ariseth, they gather themselves together, and lay them down in their dens.
Wolaitta Sentences: Awai mokkiyo wode, guyye simmidi bantta geessuwan zin77oosona.

English Sentences: Man goeth forth unto his work and to his labour until the evening.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode asai ba oosuwaayyo kiyees; sa7ai qammana gakkanaassi oottees.

English Sentences: O LORD, how manifold are thy works! in wisdom hast thou made them all: the earth is full of thy riches.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne oosoi ai keena daroo! Ne aadhdhida eratettan neeni eta ubbaa medhdhadasa; sa7ai neeni medhdhidoban kumiis.

English Sentences: So is this great and wide sea, wherein are things creeping innumerable, both small and great beasts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abbai hinin hegeehoo; i gitanne aaho; qoodai bainna qaaxxiya meretatun, gitatuuninne guuttatun kumidi de7ees.

English Sentences: There go the ships: there is that leviathan, whom thou hast made to play therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa bollan markkabeti boosona; qassi neeni medhdhido Lewaataana giyo miimminttee an kaa7ees.

English Sentences: These wait all upon thee; that thou mayest give them their meat in due season.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni eta koshshiyo wodiyan etau qumaa immana mala, eti ubbai nena xeelloosona.

English Sentences: That thou givest them they gather: thou openest thine hand, they are filled with good.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni etau immin, eti maxoosona; neeni ne kushiyaappe yeggin, eti lo77obaa kalloosona.

English Sentences: Thou hidest thy face, they are troubled: thou takest away their breath, they die, and return to their dust.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne som77uwaa genttiyo wode dagammoosona. Ne shemppuwaa neeni ekkiyo wode haiqqidi, bantta biittau simmoosona.

English Sentences: Thou sendest forth thy spirit, they are created: and thou renewest the face of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin neeni ne shemppuwaa kiittiyo wode, harati merettoosona; biittaanne ooraxissaasa.

English Sentences: The glory of the LORD shall endure for ever: the LORD shall rejoice in his works.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA bonchchoi merinau de7o; GODAI ba oosuwan ufaitto.

English Sentences: He looketh on the earth, and it trembleth: he toucheth the hills, and they smoke.
Wolaitta Sentences: I biittaa xeellin, biittai qaaxxees; qassi i dereta bochchin, dereti cuwattoosona.

English Sentences: I will sing unto the LORD as long as I live: I will sing praise to my God while I have my being.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta de7o ubban GODAAYYO yexxana; taani paxa de7ido keenan ubban ta Xoossaa sabbana.

English Sentences: My meditation of him shall be sweet: I will be glad in the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAN ufaittiyo gishshau, ta qofai a dosisso.

English Sentences: Let the sinners be consumed out of the earth, and let the wicked be no more. Bless thou the LORD, O my soul. Praise ye the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nagaranchchati biittaappe xayona; hagaappe sinttau iitati de7oppona. Tanooshsho, GODAA galata!

English Sentences: O give thanks unto the LORD; call upon his name: make known his deeds among the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA galatite; a sunttaa xeesite. I oottidobaa kawotettatu gidduwan erissite.

English Sentences: Sing unto him, sing psalms unto him: talk ye of all his wondrous works.
Wolaitta Sentences: A sabbite; galata yettaa au yexxite. A maalaalissiya oosuwaa ubbabaa yootite.

English Sentences: Glory ye in his holy name: let the heart of them rejoice that seek the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: A geeshsha sunttan ceeqettite; GODAA koyiyaageetu wozanati ufaittona.

English Sentences: Seek the LORD, and his strength: seek his face evermore.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAANNE a wolqqaa xomoosite; ubbatoo a sinttaa koyite.

English Sentences: Remember his marvellous works that he hath done; his wonders, and the judgments of his mouth;
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, a ashkkaraa Abrahaama zerettatoo, doorettida Yaaqooba naatoo,

English Sentences: O ye seed of Abraham his servant, ye children of Jacob his chosen.
Wolaitta Sentences: i oottido maalaalissiyaabaa, a malaataanne i pirddido pirddaa hassayite.

English Sentences: He is the LORD our God: his judgments are in all the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: I GODAA nu Xoossaa; a pirddaikka sa7aa ubbaa bollaana.

English Sentences: He hath remembered his covenant for ever, the word which he commanded to a thousand generations.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba maachchaa merinaassi, ba azazido qaalaa sha7u yeletaa gakkanaassi naagees.

English Sentences: Which covenant he made with Abraham, and his oath unto Isaac;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, i Abrahaamaara maacettido maachchaa, Yisaaqassi caaqqido maachchaa,

English Sentences: And confirmed the same unto Jacob for a law, and to Israel for an everlasting covenant:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobassi woga, Israa7eelassikka merinaa maachcha oottidi minttidoogaa.

English Sentences: Saying, Unto thee will I give the land of Canaan, the lot of your inheritance:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaadan yaagiis; "Neeyyo Kanaane biittaa immana; i ne zerettatuyyo laata gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When they were but a few men in number; yea, very few, and strangers in it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa asati qoodan qii guuttanne Kanaane biittan bete gididi de7iyo wode,

English Sentences: When they went from one nation to another, from one kingdom to another people;
Wolaitta Sentences: issi deriyaappe hara deriyaa, issi kawotettaappe hara kawotettaa yuuyidosona.

English Sentences: He suffered no man to do them wrong: yea, he reproved kings for their sakes;
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai eta ooninne naaqqanau immibeenna; eta gishshau kawota seeriiddi,

English Sentences: Saying, Touch not mine anointed, and do my prophets no harm.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani tiyidoogeeta bochchoppite; ta hananabaa yootiyaageeta qohoppite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Moreover he called for a famine upon the land: he brake the whole staff of bread.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Kanaane biittan koshaa yeddidi, eta kattaa ubbaa xaissiis.

English Sentences: He sent a man before them, even Joseph, who was sold for a servant:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i ba asaa ashshanau, issi bitaniyaa Gibxxe kiittiis; he bitanee aille gididi baizettida Yooseefa.

English Sentences: Whose feet they hurt with fetters: he was laid in iron:
Wolaitta Sentences: A gedeti biratan qashettidosona; a qooriyankka sanssalatai aadhdhiis.

English Sentences: Until the time that his word came: the word of the LORD tried him.
Wolaitta Sentences: I kase yootidoogee tumattana gakkanaassi, GODAA qaalai a paacciis.

English Sentences: The king sent and loosed him; even the ruler of the people, and let him go free.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxe kawoi, dereta haariyaagee kiittidi, a qasho keettaappe kessiis.

English Sentences: He made him lord of his house, and ruler of all his substance:
Wolaitta Sentences: Inne a ba keettau godaa oottiisinne baayyo waanna halaqata azazana malanne ba cimata zorana mala,

English Sentences: To bind his princes at his pleasure; and teach his senators wisdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: baayyo de7iyaabaa ubbaa bolli sunttiis.

English Sentences: Israel also came into Egypt; and Jacob sojourned in the land of Ham.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yaaqoobinne a keettaa asai Gibxxe geliis; he biittan bete gididi de7iis.

English Sentences: And he increased his people greatly; and made them stronger than their enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ba asaa daro corayiis; eta morkketuppe eta aattidi minttiis.

English Sentences: He turned their heart to hate his people, to deal subtilly with his servants.
Wolaitta Sentences: I Gibxxe asai ba asaa ixxanaadaaninne ba ashkkarata cimmanaadan oottiis.

English Sentences: He sent Moses his servant; and Aaron whom he had chosen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, ba ashkkaraa Muusanne ba doorido Aaroona etakko kiittiis.

English Sentences: They shewed his signs among them, and wonders in the land of Ham.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Gibxxe asatu sinttan Xoossaa malaataa, eta biittan oorattabaa oottidosona.

English Sentences: He sent darkness, and made it dark; and they rebelled not against his word.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI xumaa kiittidi, he biittaa xumissiis; shin Gibxxe asati a azazuwaa ixxisi giidosona.

English Sentences: He turned their waters into blood, and slew their fish.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta haattaa suuttau laammidi, moleta ubbaa woriis.

English Sentences: Their land brought forth frogs in abundance, in the chambers of their kings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta biittaa ubbaa, kawuwaa keettaakka shodhdhee kumiis.

English Sentences: He spake, and there came divers sorts of flies, and lice in all their coasts.
Wolaitta Sentences: I azazin, udunxxeenne biinnee eta biittaa ubbaa bolli sham77isham77iis.

English Sentences: He gave them hail for rain, and flaming fire in their land.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta biittaa bollan iraa gishshaa shachchaa wolqqanttaara bukissiis.

English Sentences: He smote their vines also and their fig trees; and brake the trees of their coasts.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta woiniyaa turaanne balasiyaa giyo mittaa shociis; eta biittan de7iya mittaakka kinchcherettiis.

English Sentences: He spake, and the locusts came, and caterpillers, and that without number,
Wolaitta Sentences: I azazin, booleenne qoodai bainna ukkubboi kiyiis.

English Sentences: And did eat up all the herbs in their land, and devoured the fruit of their ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiyidi eta biittan mokkida katta ubbaa miis; irxxabaa ubbaakka mi xaissiis.

English Sentences: He smote also all the firstborn in their land, the chief of all their strength.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Gibxxe asatu soo baira naata ubbaa woriis; koiro yelettida ubbaa xaissiis.

English Sentences: He brought them forth also with silver and gold: and there was not one feeble person among their tribes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, i Israa7eela asaa worqqaanne biraa alleequwaara kessiis; eta giddoppe kunddidi attidai ooninne baawa.

English Sentences: Egypt was glad when they departed: for the fear of them fell upon them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxe asati etau daro yayyido gishshau, eti kiyidoogaa ufaittidosona.

English Sentences: He spread a cloud for a covering; and fire to give light in the night.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI eta kammanau shaaraa micciis; qamma etau poo7issanau tamaa giigissiis.

English Sentences: The people asked, and he brought quails, and satisfied them with the bread of heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti miyoobaa oichchin, kuraachcho misatiya kafota etau yeddiis; eta saluwaa qumaa kalissiis.

English Sentences: He opened the rock, and the waters gushed out; they ran in the dry places like a river.
Wolaitta Sentences: I shuchchaa phalqqin, haattai pulttiis; pulttidi shaafadan bazzon goggiis.

English Sentences: For he remembered his holy promise, and Abraham his servant.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba ashkkaraa Abrahaamassi gelido geeshsha qaalaa hassayiis.

English Sentences: And he brought forth his people with joy, and his chosen with gladness:
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba asaa ufaissan, ba dooridoogeeta ililssan kessiis.

English Sentences: And gave them the lands of the heathen: and they inherited the labour of the people;
Wolaitta Sentences: I etayyo dere asatu biittaa immiis; immin eti harati daafurido goshshaa laattidosona.

English Sentences: That they might observe his statutes, and keep his laws. Praise ye the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa i oottidoogee eti a wogaa naaganaadaananne a higgiyaa oottanaadaana.

English Sentences: Praise ye the LORD. O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: I keha gidiyo gishshaunne aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa gidiyo gishshau, GODAA galatite.

English Sentences: Who can utter the mighty acts of the LORD? who can shew forth all his praise?
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI oottido wolqqaama oosuwaa yootanau, woikko a galataa ubbaa qonccissanau danddayiyai oonee?

English Sentences: Blessed are they that keep judgment, and he that doeth righteousness at all times.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pirddaa naagiyaageetinne ubbaton xillobaa oottiyaageeti anjjettidaageeta.

English Sentences: Remember me, O LORD, with the favour that thou bearest unto thy people: O visit me with thy salvation;
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni ne asaassi kehiyo wode, tanakka qoppa; eta neeni ashshiyo wode, taayyookka alla.

English Sentences: That I may see the good of thy chosen, that I may rejoice in the gladness of thy nation, that I may glory with thine inheritance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, ne doorido asaayyo sa7ai kehin, taani be7anaadaana, ne asaa ufaissaa taanikka ufaittanaadaananne neegeetuura issippe taanikka galatanaadaana.

English Sentences: We have sinned with our fathers, we have committed iniquity, we have done wickedly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni nu aawatudan nagaraa oottida; moorobaanne iitabaa oottida.

English Sentences: Our fathers understood not thy wonders in Egypt; they remembered not the multitude of thy mercies; but provoked him at the sea, even at the Red sea.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu aawati Gibxxen de7iyo wode, ne maalaalissiya oosuwaa qoppibookkona. Aggenna ne siiquwaa darotettaa eti hassayibookkona; Zo7o Abbaa lanqqiyan Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossaa bolli makkalidosona.

English Sentences: Nevertheless he saved them for his name's sake, that he might make his mighty power to be known.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkokka i ba sunttaa gishshau, ba gita wolqqaa erissanau eta ashshiis.

English Sentences: He rebuked the Red sea also, and it was dried up: so he led them through the depths, as through the wilderness.
Wolaitta Sentences: I Zo7o Abbaa azazin, abbai meliis; bazzuwan kaalettiyoogaadan, ciimmaa giddoora eta kaalettidi pinttiis.

English Sentences: And he saved them from the hand of him that hated them, and redeemed them from the hand of the enemy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pinttidi i eta ixxiyaageetu kushiyaappe ashshiis; morkketu kushiyaappe eta woziis.

English Sentences: And the waters covered their enemies: there was not one of them left.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta morkketa haattai mittiis; etappe issoinne attibeenna.

English Sentences: Then believed they his words; they sang his praise.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Israa7eelati a qaalaa ammanidosona; a sabbidosona.

English Sentences: They soon forgat his works; they waited not for his counsel:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, eti i oottidoogaa sohuwaarakka dogidosona. A zoretaa naagennan bantta koyidoogaa oottidosona.

English Sentences: But lusted exceedingly in the wilderness, and tempted God in the desert.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bazzon de7iiddi, eti qumaa daroppe amottidosona; qassi Xoossaa paaccidosona.

English Sentences: And he gave them their request; but sent leanness into their soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan i eti woossidoogaa immiis; shin iita harggiyaa eta giddo kiittiis.

English Sentences: They envied Moses also in the camp, and Aaron the saint of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asati bazzon bantta dunkkaaniyan de7iiddi, Muusanne GODAASSI dummatida ashkkaraa Aaroona qanaatido wode,

English Sentences: The earth opened and swallowed up Dathan, and covered the company of Abiram.
Wolaitta Sentences: biittai dooyettidi Daataana mittiis; Abiiraama a keetta asatuura moogiis.

English Sentences: And a fire was kindled in their company; the flame burned up the wicked.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi eta maabaraa giddon tamai eexxin, lacoi he iita asata xuuggiis.

English Sentences: They made a calf in Horeb, and worshipped the molten image.
Wolaitta Sentences: Koreba Deriyan de7iiddi, worqqaa seerissidi maraa misiliyaa medhdhidosona; medhdhidi he misiliyaayyo goinnidosona.

English Sentences: Thus they changed their glory into the similitude of an ox that eateth grass.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Xoossaa bonchchuwaa maataa miya miizzaa misiliyan laammidosona.

English Sentences: They forgat God their saviour, which had done great things in Egypt;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti banttana ashshida Xoossaa dogidosona; i Gibxxen gita oosuwaa,

English Sentences: Wondrous works in the land of Ham, and terrible things by the Red sea.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kaama biittan maalaalissiyaabaanne, Zo7o Abban, "Hoola!" giissiyaabaa oottidaagaa.

English Sentences: Therefore he said that he would destroy them, had not Moses his chosen stood before him in the breach, to turn away his wrath, lest he should destroy them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Xoossai eta xaissana giis; shin xaissenna mala, a hanqquwaa zaaranau, Xoossai doorido Muusee gidduwan eqqiis.

English Sentences: Yea, they despised the pleasant land, they believed not his word:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, eti a qaalaa ammanenna gishshau, he lo77o biittaa karidosona.

English Sentences: But murmured in their tents, and hearkened not unto the voice of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta dunkkaaniyaa giddon zuuzummidosonanne GODAA qaalaayyo azazettibookkona.

English Sentences: Therefore he lifted up his hand against them, to overthrow them in the wilderness:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, i eta bazzon xaissanaagaa,

English Sentences: To overthrow their seed also among the nations, and to scatter them in the lands.
Wolaitta Sentences: eta zerettaa kawotettatu giddon laalanaagaanne biittan sa7an eta bete kessanaagaa ba kushiyaa denttidi caaqqiis.

English Sentences: They joined themselves also unto Baalpeor, and ate the sacrifices of the dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, eti Pa7ooran de7iya Ba7aala eeqaayyo goinniyaageetuura issippe gaittidosona; shemppoi bainna eeqatuyyo yarshshettida yarshshuwaa miidosona.

English Sentences: Thus they provoked him to anger with their inventions: and the plague brake in upon them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta oosuwan GODAA hanqqetissidosona; hanqqetissin eta giddon iita harggee wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: Then stood up Phinehas, and executed judgment: and so the plague was stayed.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Piinhaasi denddidi, eta mooruwaa pirddin, iita harggee eta bollaappe kichchiis.

English Sentences: And that was counted unto him for righteousness unto all generations for evermore.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, yeletaappe yeletaa gakkanaassi merinau ayyo xillotetta gididi qoodettiis.

English Sentences: They angered him also at the waters of strife, so that it went ill with Moses for their sakes:
Wolaitta Sentences: Mariiba pulttuwaa matan GODAA hanqqetissidosona; eta gaasuwan Muuse bolli metoi gakkiis.

English Sentences: Because they provoked his spirit, so that he spake unadvisedly with his lips.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti a yiilloyidosona; yiillotin Muuse doonaappe bessenna qaalai kiyiis.

English Sentences: They did not destroy the nations, concerning whom the LORD commanded them:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI xaissite gin, eti Kanaane asata xaissibookkona.

English Sentences: But were mingled among the heathen, and learned their works.
Wolaitta Sentences: He palaappe, eti he asatuura geletti ehettidi, walahettidosonanne; eta de7uwaa wogaa kaallidosona.

English Sentences: And they served their idols: which were a snare unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa asati eta eeqaassi goinnidosona; hegeenne, etau pire gidiis.

English Sentences: Yea, they sacrificed their sons and their daughters unto devils,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta attumanne macca naata xalahetayyo yarshshidosona.

English Sentences: And shed innocent blood, even the blood of their sons and of their daughters, whom they sacrificed unto the idols of Canaan: and the land was polluted with blood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti xillo suuttaa, Kanaane eeqatuyyo yarshshido bantta attumanne macca naatu suuttaa gussidosona; he suuttan biittai tuniis.

English Sentences: Thus were they defiled with their own works, and went a whoring with their own inventions.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadan eti bantta oosuwan tunidosonanne shaaramuxadan eti bantta Xoossaassi ammanettennan ixxidosona.

English Sentences: Therefore was the wrath of the LORD kindled against his people, insomuch that he abhorred his own inheritance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, GODAA hanqqoi a asaa bolli eexxi kiyiis; i baageeta shenetiis.

English Sentences: And he gave them into the hand of the heathen; and they that hated them ruled over them.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta hara dere asatu kushiyan aattidi immiis; eta ixxidaageeti eta haaridosona.

English Sentences: Their enemies also oppressed them, and they were brought into subjection under their hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta morkketi eta naaqqidosonanne bantta sheniyan aissidosona.

English Sentences: Many times did he deliver them; but they provoked him with their counsel, and were brought low for their iniquity.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta daroto ashshiis; shin eti makkalaayyo gixxidi kiyidosona; bantta nagaraa gaasuwan xayidosona.
