English Sentences: Nevertheless he regarded their affliction, when he heard their cry:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gidikkonne, i eti waassido waasuwaa siyidi, eta waayiyaa qoppiis.

English Sentences: And he remembered for them his covenant, and repented according to the multitude of his mercies.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta gishshau, ba maachchaa hassayiis; aggenna ba siiquwaa daruwaadan eta maariis.

English Sentences: He made them also to be pitied of all those that carried them captives.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta omooddida ubbai etau qarettanaadan oottiis.

English Sentences: Save us, O LORD our God, and gather us from among the heathen, to give thanks unto thy holy name, and to triumph in thy praise.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, nu Xoossau, nuna ashsha. Nuuni ne geeshsha sunttaa galatanaadaaninne ne bonchchuwan ceeqettanaadan, kawotettatu giddoppe nuna shiishsha.

English Sentences: Blessed be the LORD God of Israel from everlasting to everlasting: and let all the people say, Amen. Praise ye the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI, Israa7eela Xoossai merinaappe merinaa gakkanaayyo galatetto! Asai ubbai, "Amin77i!" go.

English Sentences: O give thanks unto the LORD, for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i keha; aggenna a siiqoi merinaassa.

English Sentences: Let the redeemed of the LORD say so, whom he hath redeemed from the hand of the enemy;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ashshidoogeeti hegaadan giidi haasayona.

English Sentences: And gathered them out of the lands, from the east, and from the west, from the north, and from the south.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti i eta morkketu kushiyaappe wozidoogeetanne i biittatuppe, awai mokkiyoosaappenne wulliyoosaappe, huuphessanne tohossa baggappe qoridi shiishshidoogeeta.

English Sentences: They wandered in the wilderness in a solitary way; they found no city to dwell in.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etappe issoti issoti bazzo biittan yuuyidosona. Bantta de7iyo katamaa biyo ogiyaa demmanau danddayibookkona.

English Sentences: Hungry and thirsty, their soul fainted in them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti namisettidosonanne saamettidosona; eti yibbaatidosona.

English Sentences: Then they cried unto the LORD in their trouble, and he delivered them out of their distresses.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti metootido wode, GODAAYYO waassidosona; waassin i eta eta waayiyaappe ashshiis.

English Sentences: And he led them forth by the right way, that they might go to a city of habitation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti de7ana katamaa gakkanaashin, i eta sitta ogiyaara kaalettiis.

English Sentences: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!
Wolaitta Sentences: Aggenna a siiquwaayyoonne i asaassi oottido maalaalissiyaabaayyo eti GODAA galatona.

English Sentences: For he satisfieth the longing soul, and filleth the hungry soul with goodness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i saamettidaageeta alees; namisettidaageetakka lo77obaa kalssees.

English Sentences: Such as sit in darkness and in the shadow of death, being bound in affliction and iron;
Wolaitta Sentences: Etappe issoti issoti sakkana xumaa giddon uttidosona; eti birata sanssalatan qashettidaageeta.

English Sentences: Because they rebelled against the words of God, and contemned the counsel of the most High:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti Xoossaa qaalaayyo makkalidosonanne Ubbaappe Xoqqiya Xoossaa zoriyaa karidosona.

English Sentences: Therefore he brought down their heart with labour; they fell down, and there was none to help.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti tugga oosuwan daafuridosona; eti kunddidosona; shin eta maaddiyaabai xayiis.

English Sentences: Then they cried unto the LORD in their trouble, and he saved them out of their distresses.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti metootido wode, GODAAYYO waassidosona; waassin i eta eta waayiyaappe ashshiis.

English Sentences: He brought them out of darkness and the shadow of death, and brake their bands in sunder.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sakkana xumaappekka kessiis; eti qashettido birata sanssalataakka duuttiis.

English Sentences: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!
Wolaitta Sentences: Aggenna a siiquwaayyoonne i asaassi oottido maalaalissiyaabaayyo eti GODAA galatona.

English Sentences: For he hath broken the gates of brass, and cut the bars of iron in sunder.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i nahaasiyaappe oosettida gorddiyaa menttiis; birata hiraquwaakka xukkiis.

English Sentences: Fools because of their transgression, and because of their iniquities, are afflicted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etappe issoti issoti eeyya gididosona; bantta oottido nagaraa gaasuwaaninne bantta iitatettaa gaasuwan tuggatidosona.

English Sentences: Their soul abhorreth all manner of meat; and they draw near unto the gates of death.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti quma ubbaa shenetidi, haiquwau matidosona.

English Sentences: Then they cry unto the LORD in their trouble, and he saveth them out of their distresses.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti metootido wode, GODAAYYO waassidosona; waassin i eta eta waayiyaappe ashshiis.

English Sentences: He sent his word, and healed them, and delivered them from their destructions.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba qaalaa kiittidi, eta pattiis; duufuwan geliyoosaappe ashshiis.

English Sentences: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!
Wolaitta Sentences: Aggenna a siiquwaayyoonne i asaassi oottido maalaalissiyaabaayyo eti GODAA galatona.

English Sentences: And let them sacrifice the sacrifices of thanksgiving, and declare his works with rejoicing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ayyo galataa yarshshuwaa yarshshona; qassi ufaissa yettan i oottidobaa yootona.

English Sentences: They that go down to the sea in ships, that do business in great waters;
Wolaitta Sentences: Etappe issoti issoti markkabiyan gita abbaa bollan biidosona. Eti he gita abbaa bolli bantta oosuwaa oottiyaageeta.

English Sentences: These see the works of the LORD, and his wonders in the deep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti GODAA oosuwaa, i ciimmaa garssan oottido maalaalissiyaabaa be7idosona.

English Sentences: For he commandeth, and raiseth the stormy wind, which lifteth up the waves thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: I azazidi, gotiyaa denttiis; denddin abbaa dambbalai qaaxxiis.

English Sentences: They mount up to the heaven, they go down again to the depths: their soul is melted because of trouble.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qaaxxin markkabeti pude saluwaa cugudettidosona; hegaappe duge ciimmaa wodhdhidosona. He iita metoi gakkin, eta wozanai taahiis.

English Sentences: They reel to and fro, and stagger like a drunken man, and are at their wit's end.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti mattottida asadan xubettidi ganddigaaridosona; eta eraikka daalamiis.

English Sentences: Then they cry unto the LORD in their trouble, and he bringeth them out of their distresses.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti metootido wode, GODAAYYO waassidosona; waassin i eta eta waayiyaappe ashshiis.

English Sentences: He maketh the storm a calm, so that the waves thereof are still.
Wolaitta Sentences: I gotiyaa co77u oottiis; abbaa dambbalaakka sirphphi oottiis.

English Sentences: Then are they glad because they be quiet; so he bringeth them unto their desired haven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Co77u giido gishshau, eti ufaittidosona; GODAI eta eti amottido katamaa kessiis.

English Sentences: Oh that men would praise the LORD for his goodness, and for his wonderful works to the children of men!
Wolaitta Sentences: Aggenna a siiquwaayyoonne i asaassi oottido maalaalissiyaabaayyo eti GODAA galatona.

English Sentences: Let them exalt him also in the congregation of the people, and praise him in the assembly of the elders.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti a asatu yaa7an xoqqu xoqqu oottona; qassi cimatu yaa7an a galatona.

English Sentences: He turneth rivers into a wilderness, and the watersprings into dry ground;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan de7iya asatu iitatettaa gishshau, GODAI shaafata melissiis; pulttotikka goggennaadan teqqiis.

English Sentences: A fruitful land into barrenness, for the wickedness of them that dwell therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mokkiya aradda biittaakka mokkenna qa77e biittau laammiis.

English Sentences: He turneth the wilderness into a standing water, and dry ground into watersprings.
Wolaitta Sentences: I mela bazzuwan haattai eellanaadan, qassi mela biittan pulttoi xuuqqanaadan oottiis.

English Sentences: And there he maketh the hungry to dwell, that they may prepare a city for habitation;
Wolaitta Sentences: Namisettidaageeta he sohuwan wottiis; wottin eti banttau de7iyo katamaa keexxidosona.

English Sentences: And sow the fields, and plant vineyards, which may yield fruits of increase.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta goshshan zeridi, woiniyaa tokkidi, daro murutaa shiishshidosona.

English Sentences: He blesseth them also, so that they are multiplied greatly; and suffereth not their cattle to decrease.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta anjjin, eti keehi corattidosona; eta mehiyaakka guuttibeenna.

English Sentences: Again, they are minished and brought low through oppression, affliction, and sorrow.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asati xoonettiyo wodenne eti huqqunnaa, metuwaanne azzanuwaa gaasuwan kauyyiyo wode,

English Sentences: He poureth contempt upon princes, and causeth them to wander in the wilderness, where there is no way.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI eta halaqata karidoogaa bessees; ogee bainna bazzuwan toilattanaadan i eta oottees.

English Sentences: Yet setteth he the poor on high from affliction, and maketh him families like a flock.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i hiyyeesata tuggaappe kessidi, eta keettaa asaa corayees.

English Sentences: The righteous shall see it, and rejoice: and all iniquity shall stop her mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Suure asati i oottiyoogaa be7idi ufaittoosona; shin iita asati ubbai co77u goosona.

English Sentences: Whoso is wise, and will observe these things, even they shall understand the lovingkindness of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eranchcha gidiyaagee ha yohuwaa qoppo; GODAA aggenna siiquwaa akeeko.

English Sentences: O God, my heart is fixed; I will sing and give praise, even with my glory.
Wolaitta Sentences: wozanai minnidi de7ees; abeet Xoossau, ta wozanai minnidi de7ees. Taani neeyyo yexxananne nena sabbana.

English Sentences: Awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tanooshsho, beegotta! Diittaunne maazinqqiyau beegottite! Taanikka maallado guuraara beegottana.

English Sentences: I will praise thee, O LORD, among the people: and I will sing praises unto thee among the nations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani nena asaa giddon galatana; qassi kawotettaa giddon nena sabbana.

English Sentences: For thy mercy is great above the heavens: and thy truth reacheth unto the clouds.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, aggenna ne siiqoi gita; saluwaappe bollau aadhdhees. Ne tumatettaikka bolla shaaraadan xoqqees.

English Sentences: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: and thy glory above all the earth;
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, salotuppe bollaara xoqqu xoqqu ga! Ne bonchchoi sa7a ubbaa bolli gido.

English Sentences: That thy beloved may be delivered: save with thy right hand, and answer me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni siiqiyoogeeti attana mala, ne ushachcha kushiyan nuna ashsha; neeni taassi alla.

English Sentences: God hath spoken in his holiness; I will rejoice, I will divide Shechem, and mete out the valley of Succoth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai ba geeshsha sohuwan hagaadan yaagiis; "Taani xoonada Sekeema biittaa shaakkana; qassi Sukkota Dilbbaa likkana.

English Sentences: Gilead is mine; Manasseh is mine; Ephraim also is the strength of mine head; Judah is my lawgiver;
Wolaitta Sentences: Gala7aadee taagaa; Minaaseekka taassa; Efireemi ta huuphiyaa ashshiya qophe; Yihudai ta kawotaa xam77aa.

English Sentences: Moab is my washpot; over Edom will I cast out my shoe; over Philistia will I triumph.
Wolaitta Sentences: Moo7aabi taani meecettiyo kuixaaro; Eedoomi taagaa gidiyoogaa erissanau ta caammaa a bolli wottais. Taani Pilisxxeema xoonada gereerais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Who will bring me into the strong city? who will lead me into Edom?
Wolaitta Sentences: Gimbbettida katamaakko, tana oonee efaanai? Eedooma gakkanaassi tana oonee kaalettanai?

English Sentences: Wilt not thou, O God, who hast cast us off? and wilt not thou, O God, go forth with our hosts?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, nuna aggidai nena gidikkii? Abeet Xoossau, neeni nu tooranchchatuura olau kiyakka.

English Sentences: Give us help from trouble: for vain is the help of man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asa maadoi pattenna gishshau, morkkiyaara olettanau neeni nuna maadda.

English Sentences: Through God we shall do valiantly: for he it is that shall tread down our enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa wolqqan nuuni nu morkketa xoonana; nu morkketa yedhdhanai a.

English Sentences: Hold not thy peace, O God of my praise;
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet taani galatiyo Xoossau, neeni taayyo co77u gooppa.

English Sentences: For the mouth of the wicked and the mouth of the deceitful are opened against me: they have spoken against me with a lying tongue.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, iita worddanchcha asati bantta doonaa ta bolli dooyidosona; eti worddo inxarssan ta bolli haasayoosona.

English Sentences: They compassed me about also with words of hatred; and fought against me without a cause.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ixo qaalaara tana dooddoosona; gaasoi bainnan tanaara ooyettoosona.

English Sentences: For my love they are my adversaries: but I give myself unto prayer.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta siiqaisinne etau woossais; gidikkokka, eti tana mootoosona.

English Sentences: And they have rewarded me evil for good, and hatred for my love.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani lo77o oottin, eti taayyo iitaa zaaroosona; taani eta siiqin, eti tana ixxoosona.

English Sentences: Set thou a wicked man over him: and let Satan stand at his right hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkkiyaa bolli iita daannaa suntta; mootanchchai a ushachchan eqqo.

English Sentences: When he shall be judged, let him be condemned: and let his prayer become sin.
Wolaitta Sentences: A qoriyo wode, i mooranchcha gididi beetto; a woosaikka ayyo simmidi gometo!

English Sentences: Let his days be few; and let another take his office.
Wolaitta Sentences: A baree qaammo; a sunttatettaakka harai ekko!

English Sentences: Let his children be fatherless, and his wife a widow.
Wolaitta Sentences: A naati aawa xayidi hiyyeesona; a maccaasiyaa am77e gidu!

English Sentences: Let his children be continually vagabonds, and beg: let them seek their bread also out of their desolate places.
Wolaitta Sentences: A naati yuuyi yuuyidi woossona; bantta de7iyo onaappekka goodettona!

English Sentences: Let the extortioner catch all that he hath; and let the strangers spoil his labour.
Wolaitta Sentences: A aquwaa ubbaa acuwaawai oiqqo; i daafuridi kessidobaa ubbaa allagai bonqqo!

English Sentences: Let there be none to extend mercy unto him: neither let there be any to favour his fatherless children.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ooninne ayyo kehabaa oottoppo, woikko aawa xayida a naatussi qarettoppo!

English Sentences: Let his posterity be cut off; and in the generation following let their name be blotted out.
Wolaitta Sentences: A naati ubbai wuri xayona; kaalliya yeletan a sunttai dogetto.

English Sentences: Let the iniquity of his fathers be remembered with the LORD; and let not the sin of his mother be blotted out.
Wolaitta Sentences: A aawatu nagarai GODAA sinttan qofetto; a aayee nagarai mulekka qucettoppo!

English Sentences: Let them be before the LORD continually, that he may cut off the memory of them from the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: He nagarai ubbaton GODAA sinttan beetto; eta hassayissiyaabai sa7aappe xoqollettiichcho!

English Sentences: Because that he remembered not to shew mercy, but persecuted the poor and needy man, that he might even slay the broken in heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i kehabaa oottanau mulekka qoppibeenna; hiyyeesata, metootanchchatanne ixettidoogeeta gooddidi woriis.

English Sentences: As he loved cursing, so let it come unto him: as he delighted not in blessing, so let it be far from him.
Wolaitta Sentences: I qangganau dosido gishshau, ikka qanggettidaagaa gido! I anjjanau dosenna gishshau, anjjoi appe haakko!

English Sentences: As he clothed himself with cursing like as with his garment, so let it come into his bowels like water, and like oil into his bones.
Wolaitta Sentences: I qanggidi salenna; a qanggettai haattaadan a bollaa katto! Zaitiyaadan a meqettan gelo!

English Sentences: Let it be unto him as the garment which covereth him, and for a girdle wherewith he is girded continually.
Wolaitta Sentences: Afaladan a kammo; qabattodan ubbaton a xeessan de7o!

English Sentences: Let this be the reward of mine adversaries from the LORD, and of them that speak evil against my soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagee tana mootiyaageetussinne tana iitan zigiriyaagetussi GODAI immiyo woito gido!

English Sentences: But do thou for me, O GOD the Lord, for thy name's sake: because thy mercy is good, deliver thou me.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin abeet Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, ne sunttaa gishshau, tana maadda. Aggenna ne siiquwaanne ne kehatettaa gishshau, tana ashsha.

English Sentences: For I am poor and needy, and my heart is wounded within me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani hiyyeesanne metootanchcha asa; ta wozanaikka mazunxxiis.

English Sentences: I am gone like the shadow when it declineth: I am tossed up and down as the locust.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani omarssa kuwaadan xayana hanais; taani booliyaadan qoqqofettais.

English Sentences: My knees are weak through fasting; and my flesh faileth of fatness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoomishin ta gulbbatai hitiis; ta bollaikka laafiis.

English Sentences: I became also a reproach unto them: when they looked upon me they shaked their heads.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana mootiyaageetuyyo qilliicciyoobaa gidaas; eti tana be7idi, bantta huuphiyaa qaattoosona.

English Sentences: Help me, O LORD my God: O save me according to thy mercy:
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU ta Xoossau, tana maadda; aggenna ne siiquwaadan tana ashsha.

English Sentences: That they may know that this is thy hand; that thou, LORD, hast done it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, hegee ne kushe gididoogaanne hegaa neeni oottidoogaa ta morkketi erona.

English Sentences: Let them curse, but bless thou: when they arise, let them be ashamed; but let thy servant rejoice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti tana qanggikkonne, neeni tana anjja! Ta bolli denddiyaageeti yeellatona; shin tana ne ashkkaraa ufaissa.

English Sentences: Let mine adversaries be clothed with shame, and let them cover themselves with their own confusion, as with a mantle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana mootiyaageeti kaushshaa maayona; bantta yeellaakka kutadan qumaayona.

English Sentences: I will greatly praise the LORD with my mouth; yea, I will praise him among the multitude.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta inxxarssan GODAA daroppe galatana; daro asai shiiqidosan a galatana.

English Sentences: For he shall stand at the right hand of the poor, to save him from those that condemn his soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i hiyyeesaa gishshaa mootettees; haiquwau pirddiyosaappekka a ashshees.

English Sentences: The LORD said unto my Lord, Sit thou at my right hand, until I make thine enemies thy footstool.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ta godaa, "Taani ne morkketa neeni tohuwan yedhdha eqqiyoobaa oottana gakkanaassi, hagan taappe ushachcha baggaara utta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: The LORD shall send the rod of thy strength out of Zion: rule thou in the midst of thine enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ne kawotaa maataa Xiyooneppe kiittana; kiittidi, "Ne morkketa haara!" yaagana.

English Sentences: Thy people shall be willing in the day of thy power, in the beauties of holiness from the womb of the morning: thou hast the dew of thy youth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne morkketuura olettiyo gallassi ne asai eeno gaana. Maallado guuraa xaazaadan ne wodalla asai neekko qeeri geeshsha deretun shiiqana.

English Sentences: The LORD hath sworn, and will not repent, Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchizedek.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI, "Malkka Xedeqi qeese gididoogaadan, neenikka merinau qeese gidana" yaagidi caaqqiis; i ba qofaa laammenna.

English Sentences: The Lord at thy right hand shall strike through kings in the day of his wrath.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godai ne ushachchan de7ees; ba hanqquwaa gallassi i kawota kinchcherettana.

English Sentences: He shall judge among the heathen, he shall fill the places with the dead bodies; he shall wound the heads over many countries.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotettaa bolli i pirddana; olaa dembbatakka aha xalaala oottana; sa7an ubban de7iya kawota i mentterettana.

English Sentences: He shall drink of the brook in the way: therefore shall he lift up the head.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi ogiyaa lanqqen de7iya haattaa pulttuwaappe uyidi, i ba huuphiyaa xoqqu oottana.

English Sentences: Praise ye the LORD. I will praise the LORD with my whole heart, in the assembly of the upright, and in the congregation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Suureti shiiqiyo yaa7an taani ta polo wozanaappe GODAA galatana.

English Sentences: The works of the LORD are great, sought out of all them that have pleasure therein.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA oosoti ai keena gitee! Etan ufaittiyaageeti ubbai eta qoppanau bessees.

English Sentences: His work is honourable and glorious: and his righteousness endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: A oosoti bonchchuwaaninne anggan kumidaageeta. A xillotettaikka merinaassi de7ees.

English Sentences: He hath made his wonderful works to be remembered: the LORD is gracious and full of compassion.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba maalaalissiya oosoti hassayettanaadan oottiis. GODAI qarettiyaagaanne maariyaagaa.

English Sentences: He hath given meat unto them that fear him: he will ever be mindful of his covenant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baayyo yayyiyaageetuyyo qumaa i immees; i ba maachchaa merinaukka qoppees.

English Sentences: He hath shewed his people the power of his works, that he may give them the heritage of the heathen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Allagatu biittaa immiyoogan i ba oosuwaa wolqqaa ba asaa bessiis.

English Sentences: The works of his hands are verity and judgment; all his commandments are sure.
Wolaitta Sentences: A kushiyaa oosoti tumanne likke; a wogatikka ubbai ammanettiyaageeta.

English Sentences: They stand fast for ever and ever, and are done in truth and uprightness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etinne meri merinau eqqidi de7iyaageeta; tumatettaaninne suuretettan imettidaageeta.

English Sentences: He sent redemption unto his people: he hath commanded his covenant for ever: holy and reverend is his name.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba asaa wozidi kessiis; i ba maachchaa etaara merinau wottiis. A sunttai geeshshanne, "Hoola!" giissiyaagaa.

English Sentences: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom: a good understanding have all they that do his commandments: his praise endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eratettau koiroi GODAAYYO yayyiyoogaa; a wogaa oottiyaageetuyyo lo77o akeekai de7ees. GODAI merinau galatetto!

English Sentences: Praise ye the LORD. Blessed is the man that feareth the LORD, that delighteth greatly in his commandments.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAAYYO yayyiyanne a azazuwaa polanau daroppe ufaittiya asi anjjettidaagaa.

English Sentences: His seed shall be mighty upon earth: the generation of the upright shall be blessed.
Wolaitta Sentences: A naati biittan wolqqaama gidana; suure asatu yeletai anjjettana.

English Sentences: Wealth and riches shall be in his house: and his righteousness endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aqotai duretettai a keettan de7ees; a xillotettaikka merinau de7ana.

English Sentences: Unto the upright there ariseth light in the darkness: he is gracious, and full of compassion, and righteous.
Wolaitta Sentences: Suure asassi, keha, xillonne qarettiya asatussi, xumaa giddon poo7oi poo7ees.

English Sentences: A good man sheweth favour, and lendeth: he will guide his affairs with discretion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kehatettan coo tal77iya uraayyo, ba oosuwaa suuretettan oottiya uraayyo kehabai yaana.

English Sentences: Surely he shall not be moved for ever: the righteous shall be in everlasting remembrance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xillo asi audenne kunddenna; merinau i hassayettana.

English Sentences: He shall not be afraid of evil tidings: his heart is fixed, trusting in the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitabaa i siyikkokka dagammenna; aissi giikko, a wozanai yeeqenna; GODAN i ammanettees.

English Sentences: His heart is established, he shall not be afraid, until he see his desire upon his enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: A wozanai xala gidiyo gishshau, mulekka i yayyenna; wurssettan ba morkketi xoonettin be7ana.

English Sentences: He hath dispersed, he hath given to the poor; his righteousness endureth for ever; his horn shall be exalted with honour.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hiyyeesa asaayyo darissidi immiis; qassi a xillotettai merinau de7ees; a kaceenne bonchchuwan xoqqu gees.

English Sentences: The wicked shall see it, and be grieved; he shall gnash with his teeth, and melt away: the desire of the wicked shall perish.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita asi hegaa be7idi yiillotees; achchaa garccidi, coo xayees. Iita asa amoi coo attana.

English Sentences: Praise ye the LORD. Praise, O ye servants of the LORD, praise the name of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo GODAA ashkkaratoo, GODAA sunttaa galatite!

English Sentences: Blessed be the name of the LORD from this time forth and for evermore.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA sunttai hachchippe merinaa gakkanaassi galatetto!

English Sentences: From the rising of the sun unto the going down of the same the LORD's name is to be praised.
Wolaitta Sentences: Awai mokkiyoosaappe biidi wulliyoosaa gakkanaukka GODAA sunttai galatetto!

English Sentences: The LORD is high above all nations, and his glory above the heavens.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI kawotetta ubbaappe bollaara haariyaagaa; a bonchchoikka salotuppe xoqqiyaagaa.

English Sentences: Who is like unto the LORD our God, who dwelleth on high,
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA nu Xoossaa mali oonee? I bolla xoqqan kawotaa araatan uttiis.

English Sentences: Who humbleth himself to behold the things that are in heaven, and in the earth!
Wolaitta Sentences: I salotanne sa7aa xeellanau duge hokkees.

English Sentences: He raiseth up the poor out of the dust, and lifteth the needy out of the dunghill;
Wolaitta Sentences: I hiyyeesaa buhiyaappe xoqqu oottees; metootanchchaakka bidinttaa pituwaappe denttees.

English Sentences: That he may set him with princes, even with the princes of his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Denttidi ba asaa halaqatuura utissees.

English Sentences: He maketh the barren woman to keep house, and to be a joyful mother of children. Praise ye the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maine maccaasiyo naatu aayyiyo oottidi, ufaissidi i keettan o bonchchissees.

English Sentences: When Israel went out of Egypt, the house of Jacob from a people of strange language;
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai Gibxxe biittaappe kiyido wode, Yaaqooba keettaa asai allaga qaalan haasayiya asaa yeggidi biido wode,

English Sentences: Judah was his sanctuary, and Israel his dominion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa asai Godaayyo geeshsha asa gidiis; Israa7eela asaikka ayyo haaro gidiis.

English Sentences: The sea saw it, and fled: Jordan was driven back.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zo7o Abbai hegaa be7idi baqatiis; Yorddaanoosa SHaafaikka guyye simmiis.

English Sentences: The mountains skipped like rams, and the little hills like lambs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dereti deeshshatudan buraaqidosona; keratikka dorssa maraadan guperettidosona.

English Sentences: What ailed thee, O thou sea, that thou fleddest? thou Jordan, that thou wast driven back?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abbau, nena baqatissidabai aibee? Yorddaanoosa SHaafau, aissi guyye simmadii?

English Sentences: Ye mountains, that ye skipped like rams; and ye little hills, like lambs?
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo deretoo, deeshshatudan aissi buraaqidetii? Inttenoo keratoo, dorssa maradan aissi guperettidetii?

English Sentences: Tremble, thou earth, at the presence of the Lord, at the presence of the God of Jacob;
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenoo biittau, GODAA sinttan, Yaaqooba Xoossaa sinttan kokkora.

English Sentences: Which turned the rock into a standing water, the flint into a fountain of waters.
Wolaitta Sentences: I shuchchaa haatta kessidaagaa; zaallaa haatta pultto oottidaagaa.

English Sentences: Not unto us, O LORD, not unto us, but unto thy name give glory, for thy mercy, and for thy truth's sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, nu gishsha gidenna; nu gishsha gidennan, aggenna ne siiquwaanne ne tumatettaa gishshau, nuuni ne sunttaa bonchchanau bessees.

English Sentences: Wherefore should the heathen say, Where is now their God?
Wolaitta Sentences: Dere asati aissi, "Eta Xoossai awan de7ii?" giyonaa?

English Sentences: But our God is in the heavens: he hath done whatsoever he hath pleased.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu Xoossai saluwaana; i ba dosidobaa aiba gidikkokka oottees.

English Sentences: Their idols are silver and gold, the work of men's hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eta eeqati biranne worqqa; eti asa kushen merettidaageeta.

English Sentences: They have mouths, but they speak not: eyes have they, but they see not:
Wolaitta Sentences: Etau doonai de7ees; shin haasayokkona; aifee de7ees; shin xeellokkona.

English Sentences: They have ears, but they hear not: noses have they, but they smell not:
Wolaitta Sentences: Etau haittai de7ees; shin siyokkona; siiree de7ees; shin singgokkona.

English Sentences: They have hands, but they handle not: feet have they, but they walk not: neither speak they through their throat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etau kushee de7ees; shin oiqqi xeellokkona; tohoikka de7ees; shin hemettokkona; eti bantta qooriyaara cenggurssaa sissokkona.

English Sentences: They that make them are like unto them; so is every one that trusteth in them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta medhdhiyaageetinne etan ammanettiyaageeti ubbai eta mala gidona.

English Sentences: O Israel, trust thou in the LORD: he is their help and their shield.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, Israa7eela asatoo, GODAN ammanettite! I inttena maaddiyaagaanne intte gonddalliyaa.

English Sentences: O house of Aaron, trust in the LORD: he is their help and their shield.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, Aaroona keettaa asatoo, GODAN ammanettite! I inttena maaddiyaagaanne intte gonddalliyaa.

English Sentences: Ye that fear the LORD, trust in the LORD: he is their help and their shield.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, GODAASSI yayyiyaageetoo, GODAN ammanettite! I inttena maaddiyaagaanne intte gonddalliyaa.

English Sentences: The LORD hath been mindful of us: he will bless us; he will bless the house of Israel; he will bless the house of Aaron.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI nuna qoppees; i nuna anjjana. I Israa7eela asata anjjana. I Aaroona keettaa asata anjjana.

English Sentences: He will bless them that fear the LORD, both small and great.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAASSI yayyiyaageeta, guuttatakka gitatakka i gatto anjjana.

English Sentences: The LORD shall increase you more and more, you and your children.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI inttenakka intte naatakka darisso!

English Sentences: Ye are blessed of the LORD which made heaven and earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwaanne sa7aa medhdhida GODAN anjjettite!

English Sentences: The heaven, even the heavens, are the LORD's: but the earth hath he given to the children of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bolla xoqqa saloi Xoossaabaa; shin sa7aa i asaassi immiis.

English Sentences: The dead praise not the LORD, neither any that go down into silence.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haiqqidaageeti, duufuwan co77u giidaageeti, GODAA galatokkona.

English Sentences: But we will bless the LORD from this time forth and for evermore. Praise the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin nuuni, paxa de7iyaageeti, hachchippe doommidi merinaa gakkanaassi GODAA galatoos.

English Sentences: I love the LORD, because he hath heard my voice and my supplications.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ta cenggurssaanne ta watiwatuwaa siyido gishshau, taani GODAA siiqais.

English Sentences: Because he hath inclined his ear unto me, therefore will I call upon him as long as I live.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba haittaa taakko yeggido gishshau, taani paxa de7ido keenan ubban a xeesana.

English Sentences: The sorrows of death compassed me, and the pains of hell gat hold upon me: I found trouble and sorrow.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haiqoi piredan tana oiqqanau haniis; moogettana hirggai tana iissiis. Tana gashee toliis.

English Sentences: Then called I upon the name of the LORD; O LORD, I beseech thee, deliver my soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode taani, "Abeet GODAU, hadara! Tana ashsha" yaagada GODAA sunttaa xeesaas.

English Sentences: Gracious is the LORD, and righteous; yea, our God is merciful.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI kehanne maariyaagaa; nu Xoossai qarettiyaagaa.

English Sentences: The LORD preserveth the simple: I was brought low, and he helped me.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI maaddiyaabi bainnaageeta naagees; taani metootido wode, i tana ashshiis.

English Sentences: Return unto thy rest, O my soul; for the LORD hath dealt bountifully with thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tanooshsho, simmi woppu ga; aissi giikko, GODAI neeyyo kehiis.

English Sentences: For thou hast delivered my soul from death, mine eyes from tears, and my feet from falling.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI tana haiquwaappe, ta aifiyaa afuttaappe, ta tohuwaakka xubiyaappe ashshiis.

English Sentences: I will walk before the LORD in the land of the living.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani paxa de7iyaageetu giddon, GODAA sinttan hemettais.

English Sentences: I believed, therefore have I spoken: I was greatly afflicted:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani, "Tana gashee toliis" giyo wodekka, ta ammanuwaa aggabeikke.

English Sentences: I said in my haste, All men are liars.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani dagammada, "Asi ubbi worddo" yaagaas.

English Sentences: What shall I render unto the LORD for all his benefits toward me?
Wolaitta Sentences: I taassi kehido kehatettaa gishshaa taani GODAASSI ai qanxxanau danddayiyaanaa?

English Sentences: I will take the cup of salvation, and call upon the name of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani wancca kumetta woiniyaa eessaa galataassi shiishshaidda, GODAA sunttaa xeegana.

English Sentences: I will pay my vows unto the LORD now in the presence of all his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: A asaa ubbaa sinttan taani shiiquwaa GODAAYYO gattana.

English Sentences: Precious in the sight of the LORD is the death of his saints.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geeshshatu haiqoi GODAA sinttan keehi daroppe bonchchettidaagaa.

English Sentences: O LORD, truly I am thy servant; I am thy servant, and the son of thine handmaid: thou hast loosed my bonds.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani ne ashkkaraa; ee, taani ne ashkkaraa, ne ashkkaree na7aa. Tana qashuwaappe neeni birshshadasa.

English Sentences: I will offer to thee the sacrifice of thanksgiving, and will call upon the name of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani galataa yarshshuwaa neeyyo yarshshana; yarshshada ne suntta xeegana.

English Sentences: I will pay my vows unto the LORD now in the presence of all his people,
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaa ubbaa sinttan taani shiiquwaa GODAAYYO gattana.

English Sentences: In the courts of the LORD's house, in the midst of thee, O Jerusalem. Praise ye the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaakka taani gattanaagee, Yerusalaamen de7iya GODAA keettaa dabaabaana.

English Sentences: O Praise the LORD, all ye nations: praise him, all ye people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotettatoo ubbau,Asau ubbau, a gitayite!

English Sentences: For his merciful kindness is great toward us: and the truth of the LORD endureth for ever. Praise ye the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, aggenna a siiqoi nuussi gita; GODAI merinaukka ammanettiyaagaa.

English Sentences: O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: because his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i keha. Aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: Let Israel now say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai, "Aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa" yaago.

English Sentences: Let the house of Aaron now say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aaroona keettaa asai, "Aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa" yaago.

English Sentences: Let them now that fear the LORD say, that his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAASSI yayyiyaageeti ubbai, "Aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa" yaagona.

English Sentences: I called upon the LORD in distress: the LORD answered me, and set me in a large place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani un77ettido wode GODAAYYO waassaas; waassin i ta waasuwaa allidi, tana kessiis.

English Sentences: The LORD is on my side; I will not fear: what can man do unto me?
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI tanaara de7iyo gishshau, taani yayyikke. Asi tana ai oottii?

English Sentences: The LORD taketh my part with them that help me: therefore shall I see my desire upon them that hate me.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI tana maaddanau tanaara de7ees; ta morkketi xoonettidaageeta taani be7ana.

English Sentences: It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asan ammanettiyoogaappe GODAAKKO baqatiyoogee lo77o.

English Sentences: It is better to trust in the LORD than to put confidence in princes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daannatun ammanettiyoogaappe GODAAKKO baqatiyoogee lo77o.

English Sentences: All nations compassed me about: but in the name of the LORD will I destroy them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotettati ubbai tana dooddi oiqqidosona; shin GODAA sunttan taani eta xoonaas.

English Sentences: They compassed me about; yea, they compassed me about: but in the name of the LORD I will destroy them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti tana dooddidosona; ubbasaara dooddi oiqqidosona; shin GODAA sunttan taani eta xoonaas.

English Sentences: They compassed me about like bees; they are quenched as the fire of thorns: for in the name of the LORD I will destroy them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti mattai gau7idoogaadan, ta yuushuwan gau7idosona. SHin agunttai taman eexxiyoogaadan eexxi xayidosona. GODAA sunttan taani eta xoonaas.

English Sentences: Thou hast thrust sore at me that I might fall: but the LORD helped me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana sugi yeggin, kunddana hanais; shin GODAI tana maaddiis.

English Sentences: The LORD is my strength and song, and is become my salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI taayyo wolqqanne minota; i tana ashshiyaagaa gidiis.

English Sentences: The voice of rejoicing and salvation is in the tabernacles of the righteous: the right hand of the LORD doeth valiantly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Olaa xoonidi simmiya asai xillotu dunkkaaniyan hombbociiddi, giyobaa siyite. Eti, "GODAA ushachcha kushee wolqqaamabaa oottiis!

English Sentences: The right hand of the LORD is exalted: the right hand of the LORD doeth valiantly.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA ushachcha kushee xoonuwaa immiis! GODAA ushachcha kushee wolqqaamabaa oottiis!" yaagoosona.

English Sentences: I shall not die, but live, and declare the works of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani haiqqikke; paxa de7ananne GODAI oottidobaa awaajjana.

English Sentences: The LORD hath chastened me sore: but he hath not given me over unto death.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI tana iita qaxxayuwaa qaxxayiis; shin haiquwaayyo aattidi immibeenna.

English Sentences: Open to me the gates of righteousness: I will go into them, and I will praise the LORD:
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani giddo gelada GODAA galatana mala, Beeta Maqidasiyaa penggeta ane taayyo dooyite.

English Sentences: This gate of the LORD, into which the righteous shall enter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagee GODAA penggiyaa; ha penggiyaara xillotu xalaalai geloosona.

English Sentences: I will praise thee: for thou hast heard me, and art become my salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni taayyo siyido gishshaunne xoonuwaa immido gishshau, taani nena galatais.

English Sentences: The stone which the builders refused is become the head stone of the corner.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gimbbiyaageeti karidi ixxido shuchchai, godaa xaphuwaa minttiya, ubbaappe aadhdhiya shuchcha gidiis.

English Sentences: This is the LORD's doing; it is marvellous in our eyes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagee GODAI oottidobaa; qassi nu aifiyaassikka garamissiyaabaa.

English Sentences: This is the day which the LORD hath made; we will rejoice and be glad in it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagee gallassai GODAI xoonuwaa immido gallassaa. Ane nuuni an ufaittoosinne ililoos.

English Sentences: Save now, I beseech thee, O LORD: O LORD, I beseech thee, send now prosperity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, hai nuna ashsharkkii! Abeet GODAU, hai nuussi injjeyarkkii!

English Sentences: Blessed be he that cometh in the name of the LORD: we have blessed you out of the house of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA sunttan yiya asi anjjettidaagaa gido! Nuuni GODAA Beeta Maqidasiyaappe inttena anjjoos.

English Sentences: God is the LORD, which hath shewed us light: bind the sacrifice with cords, even unto the horns of the altar.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Xoossaa; i nu bollan poo7issiis. Irxxa tashiyaa oiqqidi, ayyaana gallassaa bonchchite; yarshshiyoosaakka yuuyi aadhdhite.

English Sentences: Thou art my God, and I will praise thee: thou art my God, I will exalt thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta Xoossaa; taani nena galatana. Neeni ta Xoossaa; taani nena gitayana.

English Sentences: O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i keha; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: Blessed are the undefiled in the way, who walk in the law of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bantta ogiyan boree bainnaageetinne GODAA higgiyaadan hemettiyaageeti anjjettidaageeta.

English Sentences: Blessed are they that keep his testimonies, and that seek him with the whole heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: I yootidoogaa oottiyaageetinne bantta kumetta wozanaappe a shiiqiyaageeti anjjettidaageeta.

English Sentences: They also do no iniquity: they walk in his ways.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti mulekka balabaa oottokkona; GODAA ogiyan hemettoosona.

English Sentences: Thou hast commanded us to keep thy precepts diligently.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne wogaayyo ammanettidi naagana mala, neeni nuna azazadasa.

English Sentences: O that my ways were directed to keep thy statutes!
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne awaajjuwaassi azazettiyoogan ta ogee minnanaadan amottais.

English Sentences: Then shall I not be ashamed, when I have respect unto all thy commandments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatikko, ne azazuwaa ubbaa ezggada, taani mulekka yeellatikke.

English Sentences: I will praise thee with uprightness of heart, when I shall have learned thy righteous judgments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne xillo pirddaa tamaaraidda, taani nena suure wozanaappe galatana.

English Sentences: I will keep thy statutes: O forsake me not utterly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne awaajjuwaadan oottana; tana mulekka yeggoppa.

English Sentences: Wherewithal shall a young man cleanse his way? by taking heed thereto according to thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yelagai ba ogiyaa geeshsha oottidi waati naaganau danddayii? Ne qaalai giyoogaadan de7ikko danddayees.

English Sentences: With my whole heart have I sought thee: O let me not wander from thy commandments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta polo wozanaappe nena koyais; ne azazotuppe wora hemettennaadan tana naaga.

English Sentences: Thy word have I hid in mine heart, that I might not sin against thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena naaqqennaadan ne qaalaa ta wozanan wottaas.

English Sentences: Blessed art thou, O LORD: teach me thy statutes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni galatetta! Ne awaajjuwaa tana tamaarissa.

English Sentences: With my lips have I declared all the judgments of thy mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne doonaappe kiyida pirddaa taani ta inxxarssan yootais.

English Sentences: I have rejoiced in the way of thy testimonies, as much as in all riches.
Wolaitta Sentences: Duretettan ufaittiyoogaappe, taani neeni yootidoban aatta ufaittais.

English Sentences: I will meditate in thy precepts, and have respect unto thy ways.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne wogata zaara zaarada qoppaisinne ne ogiyaa loitta akeekais.

English Sentences: I will delight myself in thy statutes: I will not forget thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne awaajjuwan ufaittais; ne qaalaakka taani dogikke.

English Sentences: Deal bountifully with thy servant, that I may live, and keep thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani paxa de7ana malanne ne qaalaayyo azazettana mala, taassi ne ashkkaraassi kehabaa ootta.

English Sentences: Open thou mine eyes, that I may behold wondrous things out of thy law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne higgiyaa giddon de7iya maalaalissiya tumatettaa taani be7ana mala, ta aifiyaa poga.

English Sentences: I am a stranger in the earth: hide not thy commandments from me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ha sa7an imatta; ne azazota taappe genttoppa.

English Sentences: My soul breaketh for the longing that it hath unto thy judgments at all times.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ubba wode ne pirddaa laamotaidda haiqqais.

English Sentences: Thou hast rebuked the proud that are cursed, which do err from thy commandments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Otorettiyaageeta, qanggettidaageeta, ne azazuwaappe wora hemettiyaageeta neeni seeraasa.

English Sentences: Remove from me reproach and contempt; for I have kept thy testimonies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani neeni yootidoogaa oottido gishshau, eta cashshaanne eta karettaa ta bollaappe digga.

English Sentences: Princes also did sit and speak against me: but thy servant did meditate in thy statutes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Harai atto halaqati shiiqidi, ta bolli maqettikkokka, taani, ne ashkkarai, ne awaajjuwaa zaara zaarada qoppana.

English Sentences: Thy testimonies also are my delight and my counsellors.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni yootidoogee tana ufaissees; i tana zorees.

English Sentences: My soul cleaveth unto the dust: quicken thou me according to thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani haiqqana hanais; neeni giido qaalaadan ta shemppuwaa ashsha.

English Sentences: I have declared my ways, and thou heardest me: teach me thy statutes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta ogiyaabaa neessi yootin, neeni taayyo siyadasa; simmi ne awaajjuwaa tana tamaarissa.

English Sentences: Make me to understand the way of thy precepts: so shall I talk of thy wondrous works.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne wogaa ogiyaa tana akeekissa; maalaalissiya ne oosuwaa taani zaara zaaradakka qoppana.

English Sentences: My soul melteth for heaviness: strengthen thou me according unto thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Azzanoi daridoogan ta shemppoi daafuriis; neeni giido qaalaadan tana minttetta.

English Sentences: Remove from me the way of lying: and grant me thy law graciously.
Wolaitta Sentences: Worddo ogiyaa taappe haassa; ne aaro kehatettan ne higgiyaa tana tamaarissa.

English Sentences: I have chosen the way of truth: thy judgments have I laid before me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani tumaa ogiyaa dooraas; ne pirddaa ezggaas.

English Sentences: I have stuck unto thy testimonies: O LORD, put me not to shame.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani neeni yootidoogaa mintta oiqqaas; simmi tana yeellayoppa!

English Sentences: I will run the way of thy commandments, when thou shalt enlarge my heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana daro wozanttido gishshau, taani ne azazuwaa ogiyan woxxais.

English Sentences: Teach me, O LORD, the way of thy statutes; and I shall keep it unto the end.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne anjjuwaa birshshettaa tana tamaarissa; taani wurssettai gakkanau a naagana.

English Sentences: Give me understanding, and I shall keep thy law; yea, I shall observe it with my whole heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne higgiyaa naagana malanne ta kumetta wozanaappe taani au azazettana mala, neeni taayyo akeekaa imma.

English Sentences: Make me to go in the path of thy commandments; for therein do I delight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne azazuwaa ogiyan tana kaaletta; aissi giikko, taani an ufaittais.

English Sentences: Incline my heart unto thy testimonies, and not to covetousness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta wozanaa miishshaakko gidennan, neeni yootidobaakko zaara.

English Sentences: Turn away mine eyes from beholding vanity; and quicken thou me in thy way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pattennabaa xeellenna mala, ta aifeta teqqa; ne ogiyan ta de7uwaa ooraxissa.

English Sentences: Stablish thy word unto thy servant, who is devoted to thy fear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neessi yayyiyaageetuyyo neeni giido qaalaa taassi, ne ashkkaraassi pola.

English Sentences: Turn away my reproach which I fear: for thy judgments are good.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani yayyiyo cashshaa taappe digga. Ne pirddai ai mala lo77o!

English Sentences: Behold, I have longed after thy precepts: quicken me in thy righteousness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne wogaa naaganau amottais; neeni xillo gidiyo gishshau, ta de7uwaa ooraxissa.

English Sentences: Let thy mercies come also unto me, O LORD, even thy salvation, according to thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, aggenna ne siiquwaa tana bessa; neeni giido qaalaadan tana ashsha.

English Sentences: So shall I have wherewith to answer him that reproacheth me: for I trust in thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne qaalan ammanettiyo gishshau, tana cayiyaageetuyyo zaaranau danddayais.

English Sentences: And take not the word of truth utterly out of my mouth; for I have hoped in thy judgments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne pirddan ufaissaa oottiyo gishshau, ta inxxarssaappe tumatettaa qaalaa xaissoppa.

English Sentences: So shall I keep thy law continually for ever and ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ubbatoo, meri merinaukka ne higgiyaassi azazettana.

English Sentences: And I will walk at liberty: for I seek thy precepts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne wogaa poliyo gishshau, aahuwan hemettana.

English Sentences: I will speak of thy testimonies also before kings, and will not be ashamed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani kawotu sinttan eqqada, neeni yootidobaa yootaidda yeellatikke.

English Sentences: And I will delight myself in thy commandments, which I have loved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne azazota siiqiyo gishshau, etan ufaittais.

English Sentences: My hands also will I lift up unto thy commandments, which I have loved; and I will meditate in thy statutes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani siiqiyo ne azazota bonchchais; ne awaajjuwaakka zaara zaarada qoppana.

English Sentences: Remember the word unto thy servant, upon which thou hast caused me to hope.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni taassi, ne ashkkaraassi, immido qaalaa qoppa; he qaalan taani ufaissaa oottais.

English Sentences: This is my comfort in my affliction: for thy word hath quickened me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni, "Taani nena paxa wottana" giido qaalai ta tuggaa wode tana minttettees.

English Sentences: The proud have had me greatly in derision: yet have I not declined from thy law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Otoranchchati tana likkiyaappe aattidi cayoosona; shin taani ne higgiyaappe sher77i giikke.

English Sentences: I remembered thy judgments of old, O LORD; and have comforted myself.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, beniisappe de7iya ne pirddaa taani hassayais; hegan taani minettais.

English Sentences: Horror hath taken hold upon me because of the wicked that forsake thy law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitati ne higgiyaayyo azazettennaagaa be7in, yiilloi tana worees.

English Sentences: Thy statutes have been my songs in the house of my pilgrimage.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani de7iyo allaga biittan ne awaajjoi taayyo yexxiyoobaa gidiis.

English Sentences: I have remembered thy name, O LORD, in the night, and have kept thy law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani qammi ne sunttaa qoppais; ne higgiyaakka naagais.

English Sentences: This I had, because I kept thy precepts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne wogaassi azazettiyoogee taayyo anjjo gidiis.

English Sentences: Thou art my portion, O LORD: I have said that I would keep thy words.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, tana gakkida saamai nena; taani ne qaalaassi azazettana yaagais.

English Sentences: I intreated thy favour with my whole heart: be merciful unto me according to thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta kumetta wozanaappe nena woossais. Neeni giido qaalaadan taayyo qaretta.

English Sentences: I thought on my ways, and turned my feet unto thy testimonies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta ogiyaa akeeka xeellada, neeni yootidobaakko simmaas.

English Sentences: I made haste, and delayed not to keep thy commandments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne azazuwaa naaganau, eesotanaappe attin takkikke.

English Sentences: The bands of the wicked have robbed me: but I have not forgotten thy law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitati tana wodoruwaara dooddikkokka, taani ne higgiyaa dogabeikke.

English Sentences: At midnight I will rise to give thanks unto thee because of thy righteous judgments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne xillo pirddaa gishshau, nena galatanau, taani qamma bilahe denddais.

English Sentences: I am a companion of all them that fear thee, and of them that keep thy precepts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani neeyyo yayyiyaageetu ubbaayyoonne ne wogaa naagiyaageetuyyo dabbo.

English Sentences: The earth, O LORD, is full of thy mercy: teach me thy statutes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, sa7ai aggenna ne siiquwan kumiis; ne awaajjuwaa tana tamaarissa.

English Sentences: Thou hast dealt well with thy servant, O LORD, according unto thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne giido qaalaadan taassi ne ashkkaraassi kehabaa oottadasa.

English Sentences: Teach me good judgment and knowledge: for I have believed thy commandments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne azazotan ammanettiyo gishshau, lo77o pirddaanne eratettaa tana tamaarissa.

English Sentences: Before I was afflicted I went astray: but now have I kept thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani qaxxayettanaappe kase wora hemettaas; shin ha77i ne qaalau azazettais.

English Sentences: Thou art good, and doest good; teach me thy statutes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni keha; neeni kehabaa oottaasa; ne awaajjuwaa tana tamaarissa.

English Sentences: The proud have forged a lie against me: but I will keep thy precepts with my whole heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Otoranchchati tana wordduwaa tiyoosona; shin taani ne wogaa ta kumetta wozanaappe naagana.

English Sentences: Their heart is as fat as grease; but I delight in thy law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta wozanai mulekka damma; shin taani ne higgiyan ufaittais.

English Sentences: It is good for me that I have been afflicted; that I might learn thy statutes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani qaxxayettidoogee tau lo77iis; aissi giikko, ne awaajjuwaa tamaaranaassi tana maaddiis.

English Sentences: The law of thy mouth is better unto me than thousands of gold and silver.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro sha7u worqqaappenne biraappe, ne doonaappe kiyida higgee taayyo aadhdhees.

English Sentences: Thy hands have made me and fashioned me: give me understanding, that I may learn thy commandments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana ne kushee medhdhiisinne giigissiis. Ne azazuwaa taani tamaarana mala, taayyo akeekaa imma.

English Sentences: They that fear thee will be glad when they see me; because I have hoped in thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne qaalan ufaissaa oottido gishshau, neessi yayyiyaageeti tana be7idi ufaittona.

English Sentences: I know, O LORD, that thy judgments are right, and that thou in faithfulness hast afflicted me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne pirddai xillo gidiyoogaanne neeni tana tuman qaxxayidoogaa taani erais.

English Sentences: Let, I pray thee, thy merciful kindness be for my comfort, according to thy word unto thy servant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni taayyo ne ashkkaraayyo giido qaalaadan, aggenna ne siiqoi tana minttetto.

English Sentences: Let thy tender mercies come unto me, that I may live: for thy law is my delight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani paxa de7ana mala, taayyo qaretta; aissi giikko, ne higgee tana ufaissees.

English Sentences: Let the proud be ashamed; for they dealt perversely with me without a cause: but I will meditate in thy precepts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Otoranchchati wordduwan tana qohiyo gishshau, yeellatona. Tana gidikko, taani ne wogata zaara zaarada qoppais.

English Sentences: Let those that fear thee turn unto me, and those that have known thy testimonies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neessi yayyiyaageetinne neeni yootidobaa eriyaageeti ubbai taakko yona.

English Sentences: Let my heart be sound in thy statutes; that I be not ashamed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani yeellatenna mala, ne awaajjuwaassi azazettiyoogan boree bainnaagaa gidarkkinaa!

English Sentences: My soul fainteth for thy salvation: but I hope in thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana ashshana mala, taani naagaidda daafurais; taani ne qaalan ufaissaa oottais.

English Sentences: Mine eyes fail for thy word, saying, When wilt thou comfort me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni giido qaalai polettin be7anau xeelliiddi, ta aifee galjjiis. Taani, "Bau neeni tana aude minttettaneeshsha?" yaagais.

English Sentences: For I am become like a bottle in the smoke; yet do I not forget thy statutes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Cuwan kaqqido ogoruwaa gidada gunddaas; gidikkonne, ne awaajjuwaa balikke.

English Sentences: How many are the days of thy servant? when wilt thou execute judgment on them that persecute me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne ashkkarai aude gakkanaassi naagoo? Tana yedettiyaageeta neeni aude pirdduutee?

English Sentences: The proud have digged pits for me, which are not after thy law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne higgiyaa naagenna otoranchchati tana onggana giidi, taayyo ollaa bookkoosona.

English Sentences: All thy commandments are faithful: they persecute me wrongfully; help thou me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne azazoti ubbai ammanttiyaageeta. Tana asati wordduwan yedettiyo gishshau, hai tana maadda!

English Sentences: They had almost consumed me upon earth; but I forsook not thy precepts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti tana worirggidi qiisan ashshidosona; shin taani ne wogaa aggabeikke.

English Sentences: Quicken me after thy lovingkindness; so shall I keep the testimony of thy mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aggenna ne siiquwan ta de7uwaa naaga; hegeenne, neeni ne doonaappe yootidoogaa taani naaganaassa.

English Sentences: For ever, O LORD, thy word is settled in heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne qaalai merinaagaa; inne saluwan minnidi de7ees.

English Sentences: Thy faithfulness is unto all generations: thou hast established the earth, and it abideth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni yeletaappe yeletaa gakkanaassi ammanettiyaagaa. Neeni ha sa7aa baasada essadasa; inne minnidi de7ees.

English Sentences: They continue this day according to thine ordinances: for all are thy servants.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni giidoogaadan ubbabaikka hachchi gakkanaassi minnidi de7ees; aissi giikko, ubbatikka ne ashkkarata.

English Sentences: Unless thy law had been my delights, I should then have perished in mine affliction.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne higgee tana ufaissennabaa gidiyaakko, ta tuggaa wode taani xayana shin.

English Sentences: I will never forget thy precepts: for with them thou hast quickened me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne wogaa mulekka dogikke; aissi giikko, neeni an tana paxa wottadasa.

English Sentences: I am thine, save me; for I have sought thy precepts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nebaattennee; tana ashsha; aissi giikko, taani ne wogaa naaganau koyais.

English Sentences: The wicked have waited for me to destroy me: but I will consider thy testimonies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitati tana xaissanau zuggidi naagoosona; shin taani neeni yootidoogaa qoppais.

English Sentences: I have seen an end of all perfection: but thy commandment is exceeding broad.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbabau zawi de7iyoogaa taani be7aas; shin ne higgiyau zawi baawa.

English Sentences: O how love I thy law! it is my meditation all the day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne higgiyaa aiba siiqiyaanaa! Gallassaa kumettaa taani qoppiyoogee a.

English Sentences: Thou through thy commandments hast made me wiser than mine enemies: for they are ever with me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne azazoti ubba wodekka tanaara de7iyo gishshau, eti tana ta morkketuppe aadhdhida eranchcha kessoosona.

English Sentences: I have more understanding than all my teachers: for thy testimonies are my meditation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani neeni yootidoogaa qoppiyo gishshau, tana tamaarissida ubbaappekka aadhdhida akeekai taayyo de7ees.

English Sentences: I understand more than the ancients, because I keep thy precepts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne wogaayyo azazettiyo gishshau, cimatuugaappe aattada akeekais.

English Sentences: I have refrained my feet from every evil way, that I might keep thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne qaalaayyo azazettanau koyiyo gishshau, ta tohuwaa iita oge ubbaappe naagaas.

English Sentences: I have not departed from thy judgments: for thou hast taught me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana tamaarissido gishshau, taani ne pirddaappe wora babeikke.

English Sentences: How sweet are thy words unto my taste! yea, sweeter than honey to my mouth!
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne qaalai aiba mal77ii! Eessaa ililuwaappekka aadhdhidi, ta manggaagan mal77ees.

English Sentences: Through thy precepts I get understanding: therefore I hate every false way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne wogaappe akeekaa demmaas; hegaa gishshau, taani geella oge ubbaa ixxais.

English Sentences: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne qaalai ta gediyaassi xomppe, ta ogiyaassikka poo7o.

English Sentences: I have sworn, and I will perform it, that I will keep thy righteous judgments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne xillo pirddaadan de7anau, taani caaqqido caaquwaa minttana.

English Sentences: I am afflicted very much: quicken me, O LORD, according unto thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani daro tuggataas; abeet GODAU, neeni giido qaalaadan tana paxa wotta.

English Sentences: Accept, I beseech thee, the freewill offerings of my mouth, O LORD, and teach me thy judgments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ta doonaappe kiyiya galataa ekka; tana pirddaa tamaarissa.

English Sentences: My soul is continually in my hand: yet do I not forget thy law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne gishshau, ta shemppuwaa immanau giigaas; taani ne higgiyaa dogikke.

English Sentences: The wicked have laid a snare for me: yet I erred not from thy precepts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitati taayyo gitiyaa yeggidosona; shin taani ne wogaappe sher77i gabeikke.

English Sentences: Thy testimonies have I taken as an heritage for ever: for they are the rejoicing of my heart.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni yootidobai merinau tabaa; ee, i ta wozanaayyo ufaissa.

English Sentences: I have inclined mine heart to perform thy statutes alway, even unto the end.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani merinau, wurssettaa gakkanau ne awaajjuwaadan oottanau qachchaas.

English Sentences: I hate vain thoughts: but thy law do I love.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani naa77u qofai de7iyo asata ixxais; shin ne higgiyaa siiqais.

English Sentences: Thou art my hiding place and my shield: I hope in thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni taayyo qosetta attiyo sohonne ta gonddalliyaa; taani ne qaalan ufaissaa oottais.

English Sentences: Depart from me, ye evildoers: for I will keep the commandments of my God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta Xoossaa azazuwaa naagana mala, inttenoo, iitabaa oottiyaageetoo, taappe haakkite!

English Sentences: Uphold me according unto thy word, that I may live: and let me not be ashamed of my hope.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni giido qaalaadan tana kaafa; yaatikko, taani paxa de7ana. Taani ufaissan naagiyooban tana yeellayoppa.

English Sentences: Hold thou me up, and I shall be safe: and I will have respect unto thy statutes continually.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana zemppissa; yaatikko, taani saro de7ana; taani ubba wode ne awaajjuwaa ezggana.

English Sentences: Thou hast trodden down all them that err from thy statutes: for their deceit is falsehood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne awaajjuwaappe wora biyaageeta ubbaa neeni ekkakka; eta cimoi coo hada.

English Sentences: Thou puttest away all the wicked of the earth like dross: therefore I love thy testimonies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7an de7iya iitata ubbaa neeni pitodan qoodaasa; hegaa gishshau, taani neeni yootidobaa siiqais.

English Sentences: My flesh trembleth for fear of thee; and I am afraid of thy judgments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta bollai neessi yayyidi kokkorees; taani ne pirddaassi yayyais.

English Sentences: I have done judgment and justice: leave me not to mine oppressors.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani likkebaanne xillobaa oottaas; tana huqqunniyaageetussi oloppa.

English Sentences: Be surety for thy servant for good: let not the proud oppress me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana ne ashkkaraa maaddanau geppa; tana otoranchchatun huqqunnissoppa.

English Sentences: Mine eyes fail for thy salvation, and for the word of thy righteousness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni, "Taani nena ashshana" giido qaalaa polo gaada naagishin, ta aifee galjjiis.

English Sentences: Deal with thy servant according unto thy mercy, and teach me thy statutes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taayyo, ne ashkkaraayyo, neeni aggenna ne siiquwaadan ootta; ne awaajjuwaakka tana tamaarissa.

English Sentences: I am thy servant; give me understanding, that I may know thy testimonies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne ashkkaraa; neeni yootiyoobaa taani erana mala, akeekaa taayyo imma.

English Sentences: It is time for thee, LORD, to work: for they have made void thy law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, asati ne higgiyaa menttido gishshau, neeni pirddanau wodee ha77a.

English Sentences: Therefore I love thy commandments above gold; yea, above fine gold.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne azazuwaa worqqaappe aattada siiqais; ee, geeshsha worqqaappekka aattada siiqais.

English Sentences: Therefore I esteem all thy precepts concerning all things to be right; and I hate every false way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani ne wogati ubbai giyoogaadan hemettais; geella oge ubbaa taani ixxais.

English Sentences: Thy testimonies are wonderful: therefore doth my soul keep them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni yootidobai maalaalissiyaabaa; hegaa gishshau, taani au azazettais.

English Sentences: The entrance of thy words giveth light; it giveth understanding unto the simple.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne qaalaa birshshettai poo7uwaa immees; akeekai paccidoogeetussi akeekaa immees.

English Sentences: I opened my mouth, and panted: for I longed for thy commandments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne azazuwaassi daro saamettada hel77ais.

English Sentences: Look thou upon me, and be merciful unto me, as thou usest to do unto those that love thy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haa taakko simma; ne sunttaa siiqiyaageetu ubbau neeni oottiyoogaadan taassikka qaretta.

English Sentences: Order my steps in thy word: and let not any iniquity have dominion over me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni giido qaalaadan ta hemetaa suurissa; ai nagarinne tana haaroppo.

English Sentences: Deliver me from the oppression of man: so will I keep thy precepts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne wogaayyo azazettanau, tana huqqunnidaageetu kushiyaappe woza.

English Sentences: Make thy face to shine upon thy servant; and teach me thy statutes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta bolli, ne ashkkaraa bolli, ne som77uwaa poo7issa; ne awaajjuwaakka tamaarissa.

English Sentences: Rivers of waters run down mine eyes, because they keep not thy law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne higgiyau asai azazettibeenna gishshau, ta aifiyaappe afuttai shaafaadan goggees.

English Sentences: Righteous art thou, O LORD, and upright are thy judgments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni xillo; ne pirddaikka likke.

English Sentences: Thy testimonies that thou hast commanded are righteous and very faithful.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni yootidobai xillonne mule ammanettiyaagaa.

English Sentences: My zeal hath consumed me, because mine enemies have forgotten thy words.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketi ne qaala toochchido gishshau, ne qaalaa mishoi ta gomppan eexxi kiyiis.

English Sentences: Thy word is very pure: therefore thy servant loveth it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni giido qaalai daroppe ammanettiyaagaa; taani, ne ashkkarai a siiqais.

English Sentences: I am small and despised: yet do not I forget thy precepts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani guuttanne karettida asa; gidikkonne, taani ne wogaa dogikke.

English Sentences: Thy righteousness is an everlasting righteousness, and thy law is the truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne xillotettai merinau de7ees; ne higgeekka tuma.

English Sentences: Trouble and anguish have taken hold on me: yet thy commandments are my delights.
Wolaitta Sentences: Metoinne tuggai tana gakkiis; shin ne azazoti tana ufaissoosona.

English Sentences: The righteousness of thy testimonies is everlasting: give me understanding, and I shall live.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni yootidobai merinaukka xillo; taani paxa de7ana mala, akeekaa taayyo imma.

English Sentences: I cried with my whole heart; hear me, O LORD: I will keep thy statutes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, kumetta wozanaappe neeyyo waassaas; taayyo alla. Taaninne ne awaajjuwaassi azazettana.

English Sentences: I cried unto thee; save me, and I shall keep thy testimonies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani neeyyo waassaas; tana ashsha; taaninne neeni yootidobaa oottana.

English Sentences: I prevented the dawning of the morning, and cried: I hoped in thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xalqqee dolenna guuran denddada, "Tana maadda" gaada neeyyo waassais. Neeni taayyo giido qaalan ufaissaa oottais.

English Sentences: Mine eyes prevent the night watches, that I might meditate in thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne qaalaabaa zaara zaarada qoppanau, qamma utta aqais.

English Sentences: Hear my voice according unto thy lovingkindness: O LORD, quicken me according to thy judgment.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, aggenna ne siiquwaa gishshau, tabaa siya; ne xillo pirddaadan tana paxa wotta.

English Sentences: They draw nigh that follow after mischief: they are far from thy law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iitabau tana yedettiyaageeti tana matoosona; eti ne higgiyaappe haakkoosona.

English Sentences: Thou art near, O LORD; and all thy commandments are truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin abeet GODAU, neeni ta matan de7aasa; ne azazoti ubbaikka tuma.

English Sentences: Concerning thy testimonies, I have known of old that thou hast founded them for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani benippe doommada, neeni yootidobaa tamaaraas; a neeni merinau mintta essadasa.

English Sentences: Consider mine affliction, and deliver me: for I do not forget thy law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta tuggaa be7ada, tana ashsha; aissi giikko, taani ne higgiyaa dogabeikke.

English Sentences: Plead my cause, and deliver me: quicken me according to thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta gishshaa mootettada tana shatintta; neeni giido qaalaadan tana paxa wotta.

English Sentences: Salvation is far from the wicked: for they seek not thy statutes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne awaajjuwaa eti ekkenna gishshau, atotettai iitatuppe haahuwan de7ees.

English Sentences: Great are thy tender mercies, O LORD: quicken me according to thy judgments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne qaretai daro; ne xillo pirddaadan tana paxa wotta.

English Sentences: Many are my persecutors and mine enemies; yet do I not decline from thy testimonies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketinne tana yedettiyaageeti daro; shin taani neeni yootidobaappe sher77i giikke.

English Sentences: I beheld the transgressors, and was grieved; because they kept not thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ne azazota naagenna gishshau, taani kaddanchchata be7ada shenetaas.

English Sentences: Consider how I love thy precepts: quicken me, O LORD, according to thy lovingkindness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani ne wogaa siiqiyo siiquwaa qoppa; aggenna ne siiquwaadan tana paxa wotta.

English Sentences: Thy word is true from the beginning: and every one of thy righteous judgments endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne qaalai koirokka tuma; ne xillo pirddai ubbaikka merinau de7ees.

English Sentences: Princes have persecuted me without a cause: but my heart standeth in awe of thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Halaqati tana coo yedettoosona; shin ta wozanai ne qaalau yayyees.

English Sentences: I rejoice at thy word, as one that findeth great spoil.
Wolaitta Sentences: Darobaa omooddida asi ufaittiyoogaadan, neeni giido qaalan taani ufaittais.

English Sentences: I hate and abhor lying: but thy law do I love.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani wordduwaa ixxaisinne shenetais; shin ne higgiyaa siiqais.

English Sentences: Seven times a day do I praise thee because of thy righteous judgments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne xillo pirddaa gishshau, taani nena gallassan laapputon galatais.

English Sentences: Great peace have they which love thy law: and nothing shall offend them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne higgiyaa siiqiyaageetau kumetta sarotettai de7ees; eta mulekka aibinne xubettanau danddayenna.

English Sentences: LORD, I have hoped for thy salvation, and done thy commandments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani ne atotettaa ufaissan naagais; ne azazotakka oottais.

English Sentences: My soul hath kept thy testimonies; and I love them exceedingly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani neeni yootidobaa naagais; taani daroppe a siiqais.

English Sentences: I have kept thy precepts and thy testimonies: for all my ways are before thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne wogaassinne neeni yootidobaassi azazettana; aissi giikko, ta ogiyaa ubbaa neeni be7aasa.

English Sentences: Let my cry come near before thee, O LORD: give me understanding according to thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ta waasoi ne sintti gakko; neeni giido qaalaadan taayyo akeekaa imma.

English Sentences: Let my supplication come before thee: deliver me according to thy word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta watiwatoi ne sintti gakko; neeni giido qaalaadan tana ashsha.

English Sentences: My lips shall utter praise, when thou hast taught me thy statutes.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne awaajjuwaa tana tamaarissiyo gishshau, ta doonaappe galatai pulttana.

English Sentences: My tongue shall speak of thy word: for all thy commandments are righteousness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne azazoti ubbai xillo gidiyo gishshau, ta inxxarssai ne qaalaabaa yexxana.

English Sentences: Let thine hand help me; for I have chosen thy precepts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne wogaa doorido gishshau, ne kushee tana maaddanau giigidaagaa gido.

English Sentences: I have longed for thy salvation, O LORD; and thy law is my delight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni tana ashshanaagaa laamotais; ne higgeenne tana ufaissees.

English Sentences: Let my soul live, and it shall praise thee; and let thy judgments help me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena galatana mala, tana paxa wotta; ne pirddaikka tana maaddo.

English Sentences: I have gone astray like a lost sheep; seek thy servant; for I do not forget thy commandments.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani bayida dorssadan bichchaarais; tana ne ashkkaraa koya; aissi giikko, taani ne azazuwaa dogabeikke.

English Sentences: In my distress I cried unto the LORD, and he heard me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta waayiyaa wode taani GODAA xeesaas; xeesin i taayyo koyiis.

English Sentences: Deliver my soul, O LORD, from lying lips, and from a deceitful tongue.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, worddotiya doonatuppenne cimmiya inxxarssatuppe tana ashsha.

English Sentences: What shall be given unto thee? or what shall be done unto thee, thou false tongue?
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo worddanchchatoo, GODAI inttena waatanddeeshsha? Simmi harabaa ai gujjanddeeshsha?

English Sentences: Sharp arrows of the mighty, with coals of juniper.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tooranchchatu zubbiyan qaran i inttena caddana; xiixinttaa bonqquwan i inttena xuuggana.

English Sentences: Woe is me, that I sojourn in Mesech, that I dwell in the tents of Kedar!
Wolaitta Sentences: Aayyee tanoo! Inttenaara de7iyoogee Mesheka woikko Qeedaare asaara de7iyoogaa mala iita.

English Sentences: My soul hath long dwelt with him that hateth peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sarotettaa ixxiya asatuura taani daro wodiyaa de7aas.

English Sentences: I am for peace: but when I speak, they are for war.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani saro asa; shin taani sarotettaabaa haasayiyo wode, eti olaabaa haasayoosona!

English Sentences: I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani xoqqu gaada wogga dereta xeellais; taayyo maadoi auppe yanddeeshsha?

English Sentences: My help cometh from the LORD, which made heaven and earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taayyo maadoi saluwaanne sa7aa medhdhida GODAAPPE yees.

English Sentences: He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: he that keepeth thee will not slumber.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ne gediyaa hallixissenna; nena naagiyaagee xiskkenna.

English Sentences: Behold, he that keepeth Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela naagiyaagee mulekka zin77ennanne xiskkenna.

English Sentences: The LORD is thy keeper: the LORD is thy shade upon thy right hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI nena naagiyaagaa. GODAI neeyyo ushachcha baggaara gididi, nena kuwayiyaagaa.

English Sentences: The sun shall not smite thee by day, nor the moon by night.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gallassi nena awai meenna; qammikka aginai nena qohenna.

English Sentences: The LORD shall preserve thee from all evil: he shall preserve thy soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI qohiyaabaa ubbaappe nena naagana; i nena saro wottana.

English Sentences: The LORD shall preserve thy going out and thy coming in from this time forth, and even for evermore.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ne yuussaa, ne buussaa, hachchippe merinaa gakkanaassi naagana.

English Sentences: I was glad when they said unto me, Let us go into the house of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti tana, "Ane GODAA keettaa boos" yaagin, taani ufaittaas.

English Sentences: Our feet shall stand within thy gates, O Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenoo Yerusalaame katamau, nuuni ne penggetuura gelidi eqqida!

English Sentences: Jerusalem is builded as a city that is compact together:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yerusalaame katamai, asai issippetettan de7iyo lo77o keexettida katama.

English Sentences: Whither the tribes go up, the tribes of the LORD, unto the testimony of Israel, to give thanks unto the name of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA awaajjuwaadan zareti, Israa7eela zareti, GODAA galatanau yiyo katamai hagaa.

English Sentences: For there are set thrones of judgment, the thrones of the house of David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawita zerettaappe kawotidaageeti bantta asaayyo pirddanau yan uttidosona.

English Sentences: Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: they shall prosper that love thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yerusalaame sarotettaayyo hagaadan yaagidi woossite; "Nena siiqiyaageetau eti oottiyoobai ubbai injjeto!

English Sentences: Peace be within thy walls, and prosperity within thy palaces.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne gimbbetu giddon saroi de7o! Ne qatotakka bochchiyaabai xayo!" yaagidi woossite.

English Sentences: For my brethren and companions' sakes, I will now say, Peace be within thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta ishatunne ta dabbotu gishshau gaada, "Ne giddon saroi de7o!" yaagais.

English Sentences: Because of the house of the LORD our God I will seek thy good.
