Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA nu Xoossaa keettaa gishshau gaada, taani Yerusalaamee duretanau woossana.

English Sentences: Unto thee lift I up mine eyes, O thou that dwellest in the heavens.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nenoo, kawotaa araatan saluwan uttidaagoo, taani pude neekko xeellais.

English Sentences: Behold, as the eyes of servants look unto the hand of their masters, and as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes wait upon the LORD our God, until that he have mercy upon us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ashkkarai ba godaa kushiyaa xeelliyoogaadaaninne ashkkariyaa ba godee kushiyaa xeelliyoogaadan, hegaadankka i nuna maarana gakkanaassi, nu aifee GODAAKKO, nu Xoossaakko, xeellees.

English Sentences: Have mercy upon us, O LORD, have mercy upon us: for we are exceedingly filled with contempt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuna maara; abeet GODAU, nuna maara. Aissi giikko, nuuyyo karee dariis.

English Sentences: Our soul is exceedingly filled with the scorning of those that are at ease, and with the contempt of the proud.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni ishaluwan de7iyaageetu cashshaanne otoranchchatu kariyaa kallida.

English Sentences: If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, now may Israel say;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI nu bagga gidennaakko, nuuni waananeeshsha? Israa7eela asati zaaruwaa hagaadan yaagidi zaarona;

English Sentences: If it had not been the LORD who was on our side, when men rose up against us:
Wolaitta Sentences: "GODAI nu bagga gidennaakko, nu bollan asai denddido wode,

English Sentences: Then they had swallowed us up quick, when their wrath was kindled against us:
Wolaitta Sentences: eti nu bollan hanqquwaa suullidi, nuna paxa mittana shin.

English Sentences: Then the waters had overwhelmed us, the stream had gone over our soul:
Wolaitta Sentences: Di7oi nuna meeccana shin; shaafaa haattai nuna muukkana shin;

English Sentences: Then the proud waters had gone over our soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: kixa haattai nuna maana shin" yaagona.

English Sentences: Blessed be the LORD, who hath not given us as a prey to their teeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuna nu morkketu achchan zalissibeenna GODAI galatetto.

English Sentences: Our soul is escaped as a bird out of the snare of the fowlers: the snare is broken, and we are escaped.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni shankkanchchatu piriyaappe kafoi kessi ekkiyoogaadan kessi ekkida. Pireenne meqqiis, nuuninne kessi ekkidi attida!

English Sentences: Our help is in the name of the LORD, who made heaven and earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu maadoi saluwaanne sa7aa medhdhida GODAAPPE yees.

English Sentences: They that trust in the LORD shall be as mount Zion, which cannot be removed, but abideth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAN ammanettiyaageeti qaaxxanau danddayenna, merinau de7iya Xiyoone Deriyaa mala.

English Sentences: As the mountains are round about Jerusalem, so the LORD is round about his people from henceforth even for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wogga dereti Yerusalaame katamaa yuushuwan de7iyoogaadan, hachchippe merinaa gakkanaassi, GODAI ba asaa yuushuwan de7ees.

English Sentences: For the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous; lest the righteous put forth their hands unto iniquity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita asati xillo asatu biittan haariiddi gam77okkona; gam77ikko, ooni erii, xillo asatikka etadan iitatettaa tamaarana.

English Sentences: Do good, O LORD, unto those that be good, and to them that are upright in their hearts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, keha asatussinne wozanaa suure asatussi kehabaa ootta.

English Sentences: As for such as turn aside unto their crooked ways, the LORD shall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity: but peace shall be upon Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bantta geella ogiyaa simmiyaageeta neeni iitaa oottiyaageetuura issippe qaxxaya. Israa7eelayyo saroi gido!

English Sentences: When the LORD turned again the captivity of Zion, we were like them that dream.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI nuna omoodettidaageeta zaaridi, Yerusalaame ehiido wode, nuuyyo aimo milatiis.

English Sentences: Then was our mouth filled with laughter, and our tongue with singing: then said they among the heathen, The LORD hath done great things for them.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode nuuni daro ufaitti, miiccidi, ufaissaa yettaa yexxida. Yaatin, hara kawotettati bantta giddon, "Hageetussi GODAI gitabaa oottiis" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: The LORD hath done great things for us; whereof we are glad.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tumukka GODAI nuussi gitabaa oottiis; nuunikka keehippe ufaittida.

English Sentences: Turn again our captivity, O LORD, as the streams in the south.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, Neegeeba Bazzuwan iraa bukissada, shaafaa haattaa zaarada kunttiyoogaadan, nuuyyookka nu aquwaa zaara.

English Sentences: They that sow in tears shall reap in joy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yeekkiiddi zeridaageeti, ufaissau yexxiiddi cakkona.

English Sentences: He that goeth forth and weepeth, bearing precious seed, shall doubtless come again with rejoicing, bringing his sheaves with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zerettaa tookkidi, yeekkiiddi biidaagee, ufaissa yettaa yexxiiddi, mirqqiyaa tookkidi simmana.

English Sentences: Except the LORD build the house, they labour in vain that build it: except the LORD keep the city, the watchman waketh but in vain.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI keettaa keexxana xayikko, keexxiyaageeti coo mela daafuroosona. GODAI katamaa naagana xayikko, naagiyaageeti coo mela naagoosona.

English Sentences: It is vain for you to rise up early, to sit up late, to eat the bread of sorrows: for so he giveth his beloved sleep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni maallado guuran denddiyoogee, omarssi qamissada zin77iyoogee, qumassi hirggada tuggatiyoogee coo mela; aissi giikko, GODAI ba siiqiyoogeetau qumaa immees.

English Sentences: Lo, children are an heritage of the LORD: and the fruit of the womb is his reward.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naati GODAAPPE imettiya imota; yeloti tumuppe woito.

English Sentences: As arrows are in the hand of a mighty man; so are children of the youth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi urai ba yelagatettan yelido naati, olanchchaa kushiyan de7iya tooratu mala.

English Sentences: Happy is the man that hath his quiver full of them: they shall not be ashamed, but they shall speak with the enemies in the gate.
Wolaitta Sentences: He tooratu mala daro naati de7iyo asi anjjettidaagaa. Aissi giikko, i ba morkketuura pirddaa yaa7an mootettiyo wode, mulekka shatimettenna.

English Sentences: Blessed is every one that feareth the LORD; that walketh in his ways.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAASSI yayyiyaageetinne a ogiyan hemettiyaageeti ubbai anjjettidaageeta.

English Sentences: For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands: happy shalt thou be, and it shall be well with thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne daafuraa aifiyaa maana; neeni ufaittananne neeyyo lo77o gidana.

English Sentences: Thy wife shall be as a fruitful vine by the sides of thine house: thy children like olive plants round about thy table.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne maccaasiyaa ne son aifiyaa herxxaxxida woiniyaa turaa mala gidana. Ne naatikka ne masoobiyaa yuushuwan, wogaraa puutiyaa mala gidana.

English Sentences: Behold, that thus shall the man be blessed that feareth the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAASSI yayyiya asi tumuppe hegaadan anjjettana.

English Sentences: The LORD shall bless thee out of Zion: and thou shalt see the good of Jerusalem all the days of thy life.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI nena Xiyooneppe anjjo! Neeni de7ido laitta ubban Yerusalaamee duretin be7a!

English Sentences: Yea, thou shalt see thy children's children, and peace upon Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne naatu naata be7a! Israa7eelayyo saroi gido!

English Sentences: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth, may Israel now say:
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asai hagaadan yaago; "Eti ta yelagatettaasappe doommidi, tana huqqunnidosona.

English Sentences: Many a time have they afflicted me from my youth: yet they have not prevailed against me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ee, eti ta yelagatettaasappe doommidi, tana huqqunnidosona; shin eti tana xaissibookkona.

English Sentences: The plowers plowed upon my back: they made long their furrows.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta zokkuwaa xurqqayyiyan shocii shocidi, goyido shooqaa milatissidosona" yaago.

English Sentences: The LORD is righteous: he hath cut asunder the cords of the wicked.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin GODAI xillo gididaagee iitatu qashuwaappe tana birshshi yeddiis.

English Sentences: Let them all be confounded and turned back that hate Zion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xiyoone ixxiya ubbai yeellatidi guyye simmo.

English Sentences: Let them be as the grass upon the housetops, which withereth afore it groweth up:
Wolaitta Sentences: Keettaa huuphiyan mokkidi, diccanaappe kasetidi meliya maataa mala gido.

English Sentences: Wherewith the mower filleth not his hand; nor he that bindeth sheaves his bosom.
Wolaitta Sentences: He maataa buuccanau kushen dankkiyai woikko mirqqe qachchiyai ooninne baawa.

English Sentences: Neither do they which go by say, The blessing of the LORD be upon you: we bless you in the name of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: He ogiyaara aadhdhiyaageeti, "GODAI wolqqaa immo" gin, cakkiyaageeti, "GODAI anjjo" giyoobai de7enna.

English Sentences: Out of the depths have I cried unto thee, O LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani metuwaa ciimman de7aidda, neeyyo waassais.

English Sentences: Lord, hear my voice: let thine ears be attentive to the voice of my supplications.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Godau, ta cenggurssaa siya; taani watiwatiyo watiwatuwaa ne haittai ezggo.

English Sentences: If thou, LORD, shouldest mark iniquities, O Lord, who shall stand?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni nu nagaraa mazggafan xaafidaakko, abeet Godau, woni ooni pirddaappe attanau danddayii?

English Sentences: But there is forgiveness with thee, that thou mayest be feared.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin nuuni nena bonchchidi azazettana mala, nuuyyo atto yaagaasa.

English Sentences: I wait for the LORD, my soul doth wait, and in his word do I hope.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAA naagais; ee, taani a laamotan naagais; a qaalankka ufaissaa oottais.

English Sentences: My soul waiteth for the Lord more than they that watch for the morning: I say, more than they that watch for the morning.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai aude wonttanddeeshsha giidi naagiya qamma konttomatuppe aadhdhada, ee, taani etappekka aadhdhada Godaa laamotan naagais.

English Sentences: Let Israel hope in the LORD: for with the LORD there is mercy, and with him is plenteous redemption.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asau, GODAN ufaissaa ootta; aissi giikko, aggenna siiqoi GODAANA; qassi i ubbaton asaa ashshanau koyees.

English Sentences: And he shall redeem Israel from all his iniquities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asaa eta nagaraa ubbaappe ashshanaagee a.

English Sentences: Lord, my heart is not haughty, nor mine eyes lofty: neither do I exercise myself in great matters, or in things too high for me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani ayyuwaa aggaas; ta hanuwaanikka otorettikke. Gitabaassi woikko eranau danddayenna maalaalissiyaabaassi taani hirggikke.

English Sentences: Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, as a child that is weaned of his mother: my soul is even as a weaned child.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa aggada xanttaa duuxxida na7i ba aayee achchan co77u giyoogaadan, taani co77o gaas. Ee, woppu giida na7adan taani woppu gaas.

English Sentences: Let Israel hope in the LORD from henceforth and for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asau, hachchippe merinaa gakkanaassi GODAN ufaissaa oottite.

English Sentences: Lord, remember David, and all his afflictions:
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, Daawitabaanne i danddayido metuwaa qoppa.

English Sentences: How he sware unto the LORD, and vowed unto the mighty God of Jacob;
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAASSI i caaqqidoogaa, Yaaqooba Xoossaayyo, Wolqqaamaayyo i hagaadan yaagidi geppidoogaa hassaya;

English Sentences: Surely I will not come into the tabernacle of my house, nor go up into my bed;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hagaappe sinttan taani ta soo gelikke, woikko ta hiixan zin77ikke.

English Sentences: I will not give sleep to mine eyes, or slumber to mine eyelids,
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta aifiyaa qilimmikke, woikko xiskkikke.

English Sentences: Until I find out a place for the LORD, an habitation for the mighty God of Jacob.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, taani GODAASSI soho, Yaaqooba Xoossaayyo, Wolqqaamaayyo de7iyoosaa giigissana gakkanaashiina" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Lo, we heard of it at Ephratah: we found it in the fields of the wood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hekko, nuuni Taabootaabaa Beetaliheemen siyida; Yi7aariima giyo kataman a nuuni demmida.

English Sentences: We will go into his tabernacles: we will worship at his footstool.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni, "Ane i de7iyoosaa boos; a gedee yedhdhiyoosan gufannidi, au goinnoos" yaagida.

English Sentences: Arise, O LORD, into thy rest; thou, and the ark of thy strength.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, dendda! Ne minotettau malaata gidiya ne Taabootaara ne Beeta Maqidasiyaa gelada de7a.

English Sentences: Let thy priests be clothed with righteousness; and let thy saints shout for joy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne qeeseti xillotettaa maayona; ne asati ufaissau yexxona.

English Sentences: For thy servant David's sake turn not away the face of thine anointed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne ashkkaraa Daawita gishshau, neeni doorido kawuwaa yeggoppa.

English Sentences: The LORD hath sworn in truth unto David; he will not turn from it; Of the fruit of thy body will I set upon thy throne.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Daawitassi mulekka kaddenna caaquwaa hagaadan yaagidi caaqqiis; "Ne gulbbataappe yelettida ne naatuppe issuwaa taani kawoyana.

English Sentences: If thy children will keep my covenant and my testimony that I shall teach them, their children shall also sit upon thy throne for evermore.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne naati ta maachchaanne taani tamaarissiyo timirttiyaa naagikko, eta naatikka ne kawotaa araatan merinau uttana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: For the LORD hath chosen Zion; he hath desired it for his habitation.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Xiyoone dooriis; baayyo de7iyoosa oottanaukka amottidi, hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: This is my rest for ever: here will I dwell; for I have desired it.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hagee taayyo merinau de7iyo soho; taani amottido gishshau, hagan uttana.

English Sentences: I will abundantly bless her provision: I will satisfy her poor with bread.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani daro kattaa immada Xiyoone anjjana; an de7iya hiyyeesatakka qumaa kalssana.

English Sentences: I will also clothe her priests with salvation: and her saints shall shout aloud for joy.
Wolaitta Sentences: An de7iya qeesetakka taani atotettaa maizzana; an de7iya Xoossaa asatikka ufaissau yexxana.

English Sentences: There will I make the horn of David to bud: I have ordained a lamp for mine anointed.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha sohuwan Daawita zerettaappe issuwaa kawoyana; taani doorido kawuwaa kawotettaa gam77issana.

English Sentences: His enemies will I clothe with shame: but upon himself shall his crown flourish.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani a morkketa yeellaa maizzana; shin a huuphiyan de7iya kawotaa kallachchai phoolana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Behold, how good and how pleasant it is for brethren to dwell together in unity!
Wolaitta Sentences: Ishantti issippetettan de7iyoogee aiba lo77obeenne ufaissiyaabee!

English Sentences: It is like the precious ointment upon the head, that ran down upon the beard, even Aaron's beard: that went down to the skirts of his garments;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee huuphiyaa tiyin, buuchchaara goggiya, Aaroona buuchchaara goggidi a maayuwaa morggiyaa gakkiya al77o zaitiyaa mala.

English Sentences: As the dew of Hermon, and as the dew that descended upon the mountains of Zion: for there the LORD commanded the blessing, even life for evermore.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee Hermmoone Deriyaa xaazai Xiyoone Dereta gakkiyoogaa mala. GODAI hegan anjjuwaa, merinaa de7uwaa immiis.

English Sentences: Behold, bless ye the LORD, all ye servants of the LORD, which by night stand in the house of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo GODAA ashkkaratoo, GODAA keettan qammi oottiyaageetoo, ubbaikka haa yiidi, GODAA galatite.

English Sentences: Lift up your hands in the sanctuary, and bless the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeta Maqidasiyan intte kushiyaa miccidi, GODAA galatite.

English Sentences: The LORD that made heaven and earth bless thee out of Zion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwaanne sa7aa medhdhida GODAI inttena Xiyooneppe anjjo.

English Sentences: Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the name of the LORD; praise him, O ye servants of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: nttenoo GODAA ashkkaratoo, GODAA sunttaa galatite!

English Sentences: Ye that stand in the house of the LORD, in the courts of the house of our God,
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo GODAA keettaa giddon, nu Xoossaa keettaa dabaaban eqqidaageetoo,

English Sentences: Praise the LORD; for the LORD is good: sing praises unto his name; for it is pleasant.
Wolaitta Sentences: I keha gidiyo gishshau,I lo77o gidiyo gishshau, a sunttaa sabbite!

English Sentences: For the LORD hath chosen Jacob unto himself, and Israel for his peculiar treasure.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Yaaqooba ba huuphessi, Israa7eela asaakka bau buzo oottidi dooriis.

English Sentences: For I know that the LORD is great, and that our Lord is above all gods.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI gita gidiyoogaanne nu Godai xoossatu ubbaappe xoqqiyoogaa taani erais.

English Sentences: Whatsoever the LORD pleased, that did he in heaven, and in earth, in the seas, and all deep places.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwankka sa7ankka, abbatunkka ciimma ubbaa giddonkka i ba dosidobaa ubbaa oottees.

English Sentences: He causeth the vapours to ascend from the ends of the earth; he maketh lightnings for the rain; he bringeth the wind out of his treasuries.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dulkka shaaraa sa7aa gaxaappe i denttees; i iraara wolqqanttaa kiittees; ba minjjiyo sohuwaappe carkkuwaa kessees.

English Sentences: Who smote the firstborn of Egypt, both of man and beast.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxe biittan asaa naatuppenne mehiyaa maraappe baira yelettidaageeta woriis.

English Sentences: Who sent tokens and wonders into the midst of thee, O Egypt, upon Pharaoh, and upon all his servants.
Wolaitta Sentences: He sohuwan Gibxxe kawuwaanne a ashkkarata ubbaa qaxxayanau, oorattabaanne maalaalissiyaabaa oottiis.

English Sentences: Who smote great nations, and slew mighty kings;
Wolaitta Sentences: I daro kawotettata bashshiis; wolqqaama kawotakka woriis.

English Sentences: Sihon king of the Amorites, and Og king of Bashan, and all the kingdoms of Canaan:
Wolaitta Sentences: Amooretu kawuwaa Sihoona Baasaane kawuwaa Ooganne Kanaane kawota ubbaa woridi,

English Sentences: And gave their land for an heritage, an heritage unto Israel his people.
Wolaitta Sentences: eta biittaa ba asata, Israa7eelata laatissiis.

English Sentences: Thy name, O LORD, endureth for ever; and thy memorial, O LORD, throughout all generations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne sunttai merinau de7ana; yeletaappe yeletaa gakkanaassi neeni hassayettana.

English Sentences: For the LORD will judge his people, and he will repent himself concerning his servants.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ba asaayyo pirddana; i ba ashkkaratuyyo qarettana.

English Sentences: The idols of the heathen are silver and gold, the work of men's hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dere asatu eeqati asa kushee biraappenne worqqaappe medhdhidoogeeta.

English Sentences: They have mouths, but they speak not; eyes have they, but they see not;
Wolaitta Sentences: Etau doonai de7ees, shin haasayokkona; aifee de7ees, shin xeellokkona.

English Sentences: They have ears, but they hear not; neither is there any breath in their mouths.
Wolaitta Sentences: Haittai de7ees, shin siyokkona; eta doonan shemppoi baawa.

English Sentences: They that make them are like unto them: so is every one that trusteth in them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta medhdhidaageetinne etan ammanettiyaageeti ubbai etadan hanona.

English Sentences: Bless the LORD, O house of Israel: bless the LORD, O house of Aaron:
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela keettaa asatoo, GODAA galatite; Aaroona keettaa asatoo, GODAA galatite;

English Sentences: Bless the LORD, O house of Levi: ye that fear the LORD, bless the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Leewa keettaa asatoo, GODAA galatite; GODAAYYO yayyiyaageetoo, ubbai GODAA galatite.

English Sentences: Blessed be the LORD out of Zion, which dwelleth at Jerusalem. Praise ye the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yerusalaamen de7iya GODAI Xiyoonen galatetto!

English Sentences: O give thanks unto the LORD; for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i keha; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: O give thanks unto the God of gods: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossatu Xoossaa galatite! Aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: O give thanks to the Lord of lords: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: GodatuAggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: To him who alone doeth great wonders: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: A xalaalai gita maalaalissiyaabaa oottees; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: To him that by wisdom made the heavens: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba aadhdhida eran i salota medhdhiis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: To him that stretched out the earth above the waters: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biittaa haattaa bollan micciis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: To him that made great lights: for his mercy endureth for ever:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gita poo7ota medhdhiis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: The sun to rule by day: for his mercy endureth for ever:
Wolaitta Sentences: Awai gallassi haaranaadan oottiis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: The moon and stars to rule by night: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aginainne xoolintteti qammi haaranaadan oottiis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: To him that smote Egypt in their firstborn: for his mercy endureth for ever:
Wolaitta Sentences: I Gibxxe biittan bairata woriis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: And brought out Israel from among them: for his mercy endureth for ever:
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asaa Gibxxeppe kaalettidi kessiis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: With a strong hand, and with a stretched out arm: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba mino kushiyan, ba wolqqaama qesiyan hagaa oottiis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: To him which divided the Red sea into parts: for his mercy endureth for ever:
Wolaitta Sentences: Zo7o Abbaa shaakki yeggiis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: And made Israel to pass through the midst of it: for his mercy endureth for ever:
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asaa he abbaa gidduwaara pinttiis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: But overthrew Pharaoh and his host in the Red sea: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gibxxe kawuwaanne a olanchchata Zo7o Abban muukissiis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: To him which led his people through the wilderness: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba asaa kaalettidi, bazzuwaa kanttissiis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: To him which smote great kings: for his mercy endureth for ever:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gita kawota shociis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: And slew famous kings: for his mercy endureth for ever:
Wolaitta Sentences: Erettida kawota woriis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: Sihon king of the Amorites: for his mercy endureth for ever:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ee, Amooretu kawuwaa Sihoona woriis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: And Og the king of Bashan: for his mercy endureth for ever:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Baasaane kawuwaa Ooga woriis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: And gave their land for an heritage: for his mercy endureth for ever:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi eta biittaa ba asaa laatissiis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: Even an heritage unto Israel his servant: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ee, ba ashkkaraa Israa7eela laatissiis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: Who remembered us in our low estate: for his mercy endureth for ever:
Wolaitta Sentences: I nuuni kauyyido wodekka nuna qoppiis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: And hath redeemed us from our enemies: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuna nu morkketuppe ashshiis; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: Who giveth food to all flesh: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mereta ubbau qumaa immees; aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: O give thanks unto the God of heaven: for his mercy endureth for ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwaa Xoossaa galatite! Aggenna a siiqoi merinaagaa.

English Sentences: By the rivers of Babylon, there we sat down, yea, we wept, when we remembered Zion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloone shaafatu lanqqen uttidi, nuuni Xiyoone qoppido wode yeekkida.

English Sentences: We hanged our harps upon the willows in the midst thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: He sohuwan nuuni nu diittaa mittaa bolli kaqqida.

English Sentences: For there they that carried us away captive required of us a song; and they that wasted us required of us mirth, saying, Sing us one of the songs of Zion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuna omooddida asati nuuni yexxidi, eta ufaissana mala, "Xiyoone yettaappe issuwaa ane nuuyyo yexxite" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: How shall we sing the LORD's song in a strange land?
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA yettaa nuuni allaga biittan waati yexxonii?

English Sentences: If I forget thee, O Jerusalem, let my right hand forget her cunning.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yerusalaame katamau, taani nena balikko, ta ushachcha kushee ba oosuwaa balo.

English Sentences: If I do not remember thee, let my tongue cleave to the roof of my mouth; if I prefer not Jerusalem above my chief joy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena hassayennan aggikkonne ta ufaissa ubbaappe aattada Yerusalaame dosennan aggikko, ta inxxarssai kookkiyaara oiqetto.

English Sentences: Remember, O LORD, the children of Edom in the day of Jerusalem; who said, Rase it, rase it, even to the foundation thereof.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, Yerusalaamee omoodettiyo gallassi Eedooma asati oottidobaa hassaya; eti, "Qolite! Qolite! Hirkki xaphuwaa gakkanaassi laalite!" yaagidoogaa baloppa.

English Sentences: O daughter of Babylon, who art to be destroyed; happy shall he be, that rewardeth thee as thou hast served us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Baabiloone biittau, neenikka bayana! Neeni nu bollan oottido palaa haluwaa ne bolli oottiyaagee anjjettidaagaa.

English Sentences: Happy shall he be, that taketh and dasheth thy little ones against the stones.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne guutta naata oiqqidi, zaallaa bolla shociyaagee anjjettidaagaa.

English Sentences: I will praise thee with my whole heart: before the gods will I sing praise unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani ta kumetta wozanaappe nena galatana; xoossatu sinttan nena sabbana.

English Sentences: I will worship toward thy holy temple, and praise thy name for thy lovingkindness and for thy truth: for thou hast magnified thy word above all thy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne geeshsha Beeta Maqidasiyaakko simmada ziggaidda, aggenna ne siiquwaanne ne tumatettaa gishshau, taani ne sunttaa galatais; aissi giikko, neeni ne sunttaanne ne qaalaa ubbaappe aattada xoqqu oottadasa.

English Sentences: In the day when I cried thou answeredst me, and strengthenedst me with strength in my soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani xeesido gallassi taayyo koyadasa; ne minotettan tana minttadasa.

English Sentences: All the kings of the earth shall praise thee, O LORD, when they hear the words of thy mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, sa7an de7iya kawoti ubbai nena galatona; aissi giikko, eti ne doonaappe kiyida qaalaa siyidosona.

English Sentences: Yea, they shall sing in the ways of the LORD: for great is the glory of the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAA bonchchoi gita gidiyo gishshau, eti GODAA ogiyaabaa yexxana.

English Sentences: Though the LORD be high, yet hath he respect unto the lowly: but the proud he knoweth afar off.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI bolla xoqqan de7ikkokka, hiyyeesata keha aifiyan xeellees. SHin otoranchchata i haahuwan erees.

English Sentences: Though I walk in the midst of trouble, thou wilt revive me: thou shalt stretch forth thine hand against the wrath of mine enemies, and thy right hand shall save me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani meto giddoora hemettikkokka, neeni tana saro ashshaasa. Ta morkketu hanqquwaa bolli ne kushiyaa miccaasa; ne ushachchan tana ashshaasa.

English Sentences: The LORD will perfect that which concerneth me: thy mercy, O LORD, endureth for ever: forsake not the works of thine own hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI taassi giidi qoppidoogaa polana; abeet GODAU, aggenna ne siiqoi merinaagaa. Ne kushe oosuwaa yegga aggoppa.

English Sentences: O LORD, thou hast searched me, and known me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni tana qoradasa; qoradakka eradasa.

English Sentences: Thou knowest my downsitting and mine uprising, thou understandest my thought afar off.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani aude uttiyaakkonne aude eqqiyaakko, neeni eraasa; neeni ta qofaa ubbaa haahuwan akeekaasa.

English Sentences: Thou compassest my path and my lying down, and art acquainted with all my ways.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani biyoosaanne shemppiyoosaa xomoosaasa; ta ogeta ubbaa neeni eraasa.

English Sentences: For there is not a word in my tongue, but, lo, O LORD, thou knowest it altogether.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani ta inxxarssan issi qaala haasayanaappe kasetada, neeni ta qofaa ubbaa eraasa.

English Sentences: Thou hast beset me behind and before, and laid thine hand upon me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta yuushuwan ubba baggaarakka de7aasa; ne kushiyan tana naagaasa.

English Sentences: Such knowledge is too wonderful for me; it is high, I cannot attain unto it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne eratettai tana keehippe maalaalissiyaabaa; taani akeekanau danddayiyoosaappe xoqqa.

English Sentences: Whither shall I go from thy spirit? or whither shall I flee from thy presence?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani neeppe au baanau danddayiyaanaa? Woikko ne sinttaappe au baqatanau danddayiyaanaa?

English Sentences: If I ascend up into heaven, thou art there: if I make my bed in hell, behold, thou art there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pude saluwaa kiyikko, neeni yan de7aasa! Duge Si7ooliyaa wodhdhikkokka, neeni yan de7aasa.

English Sentences: If I take the wings of the morning, and dwell in the uttermost parts of the sea;
Wolaitta Sentences: Awai mokkiyoosaa baggi paallada biikko, woikko awai wulliyoosaa baggan haakkada de7ikko,

English Sentences: Even there shall thy hand lead me, and thy right hand shall hold me.
Wolaitta Sentences: he sohuwankka ne kushee tana kaalettees; ne ushachcha kushee tana zemppissees.

English Sentences: If I say, Surely the darkness shall cover me; even the night shall be light about me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani, "Xumau, tana gentta; poo7uwau, qammau laametta" yaagiyaakkokka,

English Sentences: Yea, the darkness hideth not from thee; but the night shineth as the day: the darkness and the light are both alike to thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: xumaa addiniitai neeyyo xumenna; qammai gallassaadan poo7ees; aissi giikko, neeyyo xumai poo7o mala.

English Sentences: For thou hast possessed my reins: thou hast covered me in my mother's womb.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta giddo asatettaa ubbaa medhdhadasa; ta aayee uluwan tana neeni tiladasa.

English Sentences: I will praise thee; for I am fearfully and wonderfully made: marvellous are thy works; and that my soul knoweth right well.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana maalaalissiya oorattabaa oottada medhdhido gishshau, taani nena galatais. Ne oosoti maalaalissiyaageeta! Taani qassi hegaa wurssada erais.

English Sentences: My substance was not hid from thee, when I was made in secret, and curiously wrought in the lowest parts of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani geema sohuwan merettiyo wode, ta meqettati neeppe geemmibookkona. Ta bollai ta aayee uluwaa ciimmaa giddon hiillan alleeqettidi oosettiyo wode,

English Sentences: Thine eyes did see my substance, yet being unperfect; and in thy book all my members were written, which in continuance were fashioned, when as yet there was none of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: yelettibeenna ta bollaa ne aifee be7iis. Biron issoinne doomettennan de7iiddi, taayyo neeni bazzido gallassati ubbati ne mazggafan xaafettidosona.

English Sentences: How precious also are thy thoughts unto me, O God! how great is the sum of them!
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, ne qofati aiba corattidonaa! Eta eranaagee aiba waayissii!

English Sentences: If I should count them, they are more in number than the sand: when I awake, I am still with thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta qoodiyaakko, eti shaahetaappe darana shin. Taani beegottiyo wode, ha77ikka nenaara de7ais.

English Sentences: Surely thou wilt slay the wicked, O God: depart from me therefore, ye bloody men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, neeni iitata woranddiishsha! Suuttaa gussiya asati taappe haakkona!

English Sentences: For they speak against thee wickedly, and thine enemies take thy name in vain.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ne bolli iitabaa haasayoosona; ne morkketi ne sunttaa mooroosona.

English Sentences: Do not I hate them, O LORD, that hate thee? and am not I grieved with those that rise up against thee?
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, nena ixxiyaageeta taani ixxikkinaa? Ne bolli denddiyaageeta taani shenetikkinaa?

English Sentences: I hate them with perfect hatred: I count them mine enemies.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani eta mule ixxais; eta taani ta morkketudan qoodais.

English Sentences: Search me, O God, and know my heart: try me, and know my thoughts:
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, tana qorada, ta wozanaa era; tana paaccada, ta qofaa era.

English Sentences: And see if there be any wicked way in me, and lead me in the way everlasting.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ane tanan iitabai de7ikko xeella; xeellada, merinaa ogiyan tana kaaletta.

English Sentences: Deliver me, O LORD, from the evil man: preserve me from the violent man;
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, iita asatuppe tana ashsha; makkalanchcha asatuppe tana naaga.

English Sentences: Which imagine mischiefs in their heart; continually are they gathered together for war.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ubba wode iitabaa oottanau maqettoosona; ubba gallassikka ooshshaa denttanau karchchoosona.

English Sentences: They have sharpened their tongues like a serpent; adders' poison is under their lips. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta inxxarssaa shooshshaagaadan qarayoosona; eta doonaappe asa woriya shooshshaa yiishshaa mala haasayai kiyees.

English Sentences: Keep me, O LORD, from the hands of the wicked; preserve me from the violent man; who have purposed to overthrow my goings.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, iita asatu kushiyaappe tana ashsha; ta tohuwaa qaxxanau qoppiya makkalanchcha asatuppe tana naaga.

English Sentences: The proud have hid a snare for me, and cords; they have spread a net by the wayside; they have set gins for me. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Otoranchcha asati taayyo diizzaa giigissidosona; gitiyaa hiixxidosona; tana oiqqanau piriyaa ogiyan wottidosona.

English Sentences: I said unto the LORD, Thou art my God: hear the voice of my supplications, O LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani GODAA, "Neeni ta Xoossaa" yaagais. Abeet GODAU, taani watiwatiyo watiwatuwaa siya.

English Sentences: O GOD the Lord, the strength of my salvation, thou hast covered my head in the day of battle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, tana ashshiya minuwau, olaa gallassi ta huuphiyaa gonddalladasa.

English Sentences: Grant not, O LORD, the desires of the wicked: further not his wicked device; lest they exalt themselves. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, iitatuyyo eta amuwaa immoppa; eta iita maqquwaa polissoppa.

English Sentences: As for the head of those that compass me about, let the mischief of their own lips cover them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta morkketun tana xoonissoppa; eta doonaappe kiyiya iitabai etau simmo.

English Sentences: Let burning coals fall upon them: let them be cast into the fire; into deep pits, that they rise not up again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta bolli xuuggiya bonqqoi qoletto; eti ollan olettona; hegaappe naa77antto denddoppona.

English Sentences: Let not an evil speaker be established in the earth: evil shall hunt the violent man to overthrow him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zigiriyaageeta biittai tookkoppo; makkalanchcha asata iitabai yedetaa sirqqo.

English Sentences: I know that the LORD will maintain the cause of the afflicted, and the right of the poor.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hiyyeesatussi pirddiyoogaanne metootanchchatu maataa naagissiyoogaa erais.

English Sentences: Surely the righteous shall give thanks unto thy name: the upright shall dwell in thy presence.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tumuppe xilloti ne sunttaa galatana; suure asati ne sinttan de7ana.

English Sentences: Lord, I cry unto thee: make haste unto me; give ear unto my voice, when I cry unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani nena xeesais; tana maaddanau ellella. Taani neessi waassiyo wode, ta cenggurssaa siya!

English Sentences: Let my prayer be set forth before thee as incense; and the lifting up of my hands as the evening sacrifice.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta woosai ixaanaa cuwaadan ne sintti shiiqo; taani ta kushiyaa micciyoogee neeyyo omarssa yarshsho mala gido.

English Sentences: Set a watch, O LORD, before my mouth; keep the door of my lips.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ta doonaa naagiyaabaa wotta; ta menttershshatu penggiyan zabainnaa essa.

English Sentences: Incline not my heart to any evil thing, to practise wicked works with men that work iniquity: and let me not eat of their dainties.
Wolaitta Sentences: Moorobaa oottiya asatuura iita oosuwaa oottenna mala, ta wozanaa iitabaakko zaaroppa. Eta yarshshuwaa gibiraakka tana mizoppa.

English Sentences: Let the righteous smite me; it shall be a kindness: and let him reprove me; it shall be an excellent oil, which shall not break my head: for yet my prayer also shall be in their calamities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xillo asi tana aggenna siiquwan seeranaunne qaxxayanau danddayees; shin taani iita asatuppe bonchchwaakka ekkennan ixxais; aissi giikko, taani ubbatonkka eta iita oosuwaa bolli woossais.

English Sentences: When their judges are overthrown in stony places, they shall hear my words; for they are sweet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta daannati zaallaa aafuwaara duge olettiyo wode, ta qaalai tuma gidiyoogaa eta asai erana.

English Sentences: Our bones are scattered at the grave's mouth, as when one cutteth and cleaveth wood upon the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mittai phalqqettiyoogaadaaninne pinccettiyoogaadan eta meqettaikka duufuwaa doonan laalettana.

English Sentences: But mine eyes are unto thee, O GOD the Lord: in thee is my trust; leave not my soul destitute.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Ubbaa Haariya GODAU, ta aifee nena xeellees; taani neekko baqatada attais; tana haiquwau aattada immoppa.

English Sentences: Keep me from the snares which they have laid for me, and the gins of the workers of iniquity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti taayyo yeggi wottido gitiyaappenne iitaa oottiyaageetu piriyaappe tana naaga.

English Sentences: Let the wicked fall into their own nets, whilst that I withal escape.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani saro aadhdhishin, iitati bantta wottido gitiyan oiqettona.

English Sentences: I cried unto the LORD with my voice; with my voice unto the LORD did I make my supplication.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta qaalaa xoqqu oottada, taani GODAASSI waassais. Ta qaalaa xoqqu oottada, GODAASSI watiwatais.

English Sentences: I poured out my complaint before him; I shewed before him my trouble.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta qohuwaa ubbaa ayyo magannais; ta metuwaa ubbaa ayyo yootais.

English Sentences: When my spirit was overwhelmed within me, then thou knewest my path. In the way wherein I walked have they privily laid a snare for me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani hitido wode, neeni ta ogiyaa eraasa. Taani hemettiyo ogiyan taayyo gitiyaa qotti wottidosona.

English Sentences: I looked on my right hand, and beheld, but there was no man that would know me: refuge failed me; no man cared for my soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ushachchi simmada xeelliyo wode, tana maaddiyaabi issoinne baawa; taani qosetta attiyoosi baawa; tana naagiyaabi mulekka baawa.

English Sentences: I cried unto thee, O LORD: I said, Thou art my refuge and my portion in the land of the living.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani neeyyo hagaadan gaidda waassais; "Neeni taani baqatada attiyo soho; taani paxa de7ishin, tana gakkida saama" yaagais.

English Sentences: Attend unto my cry; for I am brought very low: deliver me from my persecutors; for they are stronger than I.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani keehippe metootiyo gishshau, ta waasuwaa ezgga. Tana yedettiyaageeti taayyo keehippe wolqqaamido gishshau, tana etappe ashsha.

English Sentences: Bring my soul out of prison, that I may praise thy name: the righteous shall compass me about; for thou shalt deal bountifully with me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ne sunttaa galatana mala, tana qashuwaappe birshsha. Neeni taayyo kehiyo gishshau, xilloti ta yuushuwan shiiqana.

English Sentences: Hear my prayer, O LORD, give ear to my supplications: in thy faithfulness answer me, and in thy righteousness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ta woosaa siya; ta watiwatuwaa ezgga. Neeni xillonne ammanettiyaagaa gidiyo gishshau, taayyo zaaruwaa imma.

English Sentences: And enter not into judgment with thy servant: for in thy sight shall no man living be justified.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne sinttan xillo gidana asi baawa; hegaa gishshau, tana ne ashkkaraa pirddau shiishshoppa.

English Sentences: For the enemy hath persecuted my soul; he hath smitten my life down to the ground; he hath made me to dwell in darkness, as those that have been long dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana ta morkkee yedettidi, biittaara gatti kinchcherettiis; beni haiqqida asatudan tana xuman wottiis.

English Sentences: Therefore is my spirit overwhelmed within me; my heart within me is desolate.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani hitaas; ta wozanaikka yibbaatiis.

English Sentences: I remember the days of old; I meditate on all thy works; I muse on the work of thy hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani beni wodeta hassayais; neeni oottido oosuwaa ubbaa zaara zaarada qoppaisinne ne kushee oottidobaa akeekais.

English Sentences: I stretch forth my hands unto thee: my soul thirsteth after thee, as a thirsty land. Selah.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta kushiyaa neekko miccaas; mela biittai haattaa koyiyoogaadan, taani nena saamettais.

English Sentences: Hear me speedily, O LORD: my spirit faileth: hide not thy face from me, lest I be like unto them that go down into the pit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taayyo zaaruwaa immanau ellella! Taani hitaas. Taani duge duufuwan geliya asatu mala gidennaadan, ne som77uwaa taappe genttoppa.

English Sentences: Cause me to hear thy lovingkindness in the morning; for in thee do I trust: cause me to know the way wherein I should walk; for I lift up my soul unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena ammanettiyo gishshau, maallado aggenna ne siiquwaabaa tana sissa. Taani ta shemppuwaappe nena woossiyo gishshau, taani baanau bessiya ogiyaa tana tamaarissa.

English Sentences: Deliver me, O LORD, from mine enemies: I flee unto thee to hide me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, taani neekko baqatido gishshau, tana ta morkketuppe ashsha.

English Sentences: Teach me to do thy will; for thou art my God: thy spirit is good; lead me into the land of uprightness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ta Xoossaa gidiyo gishshau, taani ne sheniyaa oottana mala, tana tamaarissa; taayyo keha; tana salalla ogiyaa kaaletta.

English Sentences: Quicken me, O LORD, for thy name's sake: for thy righteousness' sake bring my soul out of trouble.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne sunttaa gishshau, tana ashsha; ne xillotettan tana metuwaappe kessa.

English Sentences: And of thy mercy cut off mine enemies, and destroy all them that afflict my soul: for I am thy servant.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aggenna ne siiquwan ta morkketa wora; ta baarigaarata ubbaa xaissa; aissi giikko, taani ne ashkkaraa.

English Sentences: Blessed be the LORD my strength, which teacheth my hands to war, and my fingers to fight:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI, ta wogga zaallai galatetto! I ta kushiyaa olau, ta biradhdhetakka toorau loohissees.

English Sentences: My goodness, and my fortress; my high tower, and my deliverer; my shield, and he in whom I trust; who subdueth my people under me.
Wolaitta Sentences: I tana siiqiya Xoossaanne ta qatuwaa; i ta miixaanne tana ashshiyaagaa. I ta gonddalliyaanne taani baqatada attiyo soho. Kawotettata i taayyo haarissiyaagaa.

English Sentences: LORD, what is man, that thou takest knowledge of him! or the son of man, that thou makest account of him!
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, neeni ayyo qoppiyoogee asi aibee? Neeni kabboyiyoogee asa na7i aibee?

English Sentences: Man is like to vanity: his days are as a shadow that passeth away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi issiton carkkiya carkko mala; a gallassatikka aadhdhiya kuwaa mala.

English Sentences: Bow thy heavens, O LORD, and come down: touch the mountains, and they shall smoke.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne saluwaa phalqqada duge wodhdha! Wogga dereta bochcha; etinne cuwattona!

English Sentences: Cast forth lightning, and scatter them: shoot out thine arrows, and destroy them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wolqqanttaa yeddada ne morkketa laala! Ne wonddafiyaa zubbiyaa yeddada eta yedetta!

English Sentences: Send thine hand from above; rid me, and deliver me out of great waters, from the hand of strange children;
Wolaitta Sentences: Bollaara ne kushiyaa duge yeddada, tana ciimma haattatuppe goochchada kessa; allaga asatu kushiyaappe tana wotta ekka.

English Sentences: Whose mouth speaketh vanity, and their right hand is a right hand of falsehood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti tumaa haasayana giidi caaqqidikka, wordduwaa haasayoosona.

English Sentences: I will sing a new song unto thee, O God: upon a psaltery and an instrument of ten strings will I sing praises unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet Xoossau, taani neeyyo ooratta yettaa yexxana; tammu baqettan waaxettida diittaa neeyyo diixxana.

English Sentences: It is he that giveth salvation unto kings: who delivereth David his servant from the hurtful sword.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawotussi xoonuwaa immaasa; ne ashkkaraa Daawita ashshaasa.

English Sentences: Rid me, and deliver me from the hand of strange children, whose mouth speaketh vanity, and their right hand is a right hand of falsehood:
Wolaitta Sentences: Tana pala bisuwaappe ashsha; allaga asatu kushiyaappe tana wotta ekka. Eti tumaa haasayana giidi caaqqidikka, wordduwaa haasayoosona.

English Sentences: That our sons may be as plants grown up in their youth; that our daughters may be as corner stones, polished after the similitude of a palace:
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu attuma naati bantta yelagatettan dalqqidalqqidi, dicciya mittaa mala gidona. Nu macca naatikka kawo keettaa zoozziyan alleequwau essido tuuqe mala gidona.

English Sentences: That our garners may be full, affording all manner of store: that our sheep may bring forth thousands and ten thousands in our streets:
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu gootarati daro dumma dumma qommo kattan kumona; nu dembbatun de7iya dorssati sha7aa, tammu sha7aa yelona.

English Sentences: That our oxen may be strong to labour; that there be no breaking in, nor going out; that there be no complaining in our streets.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu miizzati modhdhona; eti aucayennan yelettidi corattona. Nu ogetun dagama waasoi siyettoppo.

English Sentences: Happy is that people, that is in such a case: yea, happy is that people, whose God is the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha yohoi tumu haniyo asati anjjettidaageeta. Eta Xoossai GODAA gidiyo asati anjjettidaageeta.

English Sentences: I will extol thee, my God, O king; and I will bless thy name for ever and ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet ta Xoossau, ta kawuwau, taani nena gitayananne ne sunttaa meri merinau galatana.

English Sentences: Every day will I bless thee; and I will praise thy name for ever and ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nena ubba gallassi sabbana; ne sunttaanne meri merinau galatana.

English Sentences: Great is the LORD, and greatly to be praised; and his greatness is unsearchable.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI gita; aaro galatai ayyo bessees. A gitatettai asa qofaappe aadhdhees.

English Sentences: One generation shall praise thy works to another, and shall declare thy mighty acts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi yeletai hara yeletaayyo neeni oottidobaa yootana; ne maalaalissiya oosotakka awaajjana.

English Sentences: I will speak of the glorious honour of thy majesty, and of thy wondrous works.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ne bonchchuwaanne ne anggaa gitatettaabaa haasayana; taanikka ne maalaalissiya oosuwaa zaara zaarada qoppana.

English Sentences: And men shall speak of the might of thy terrible acts: and I will declare thy greatness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai, "Hoola!" giissiya ne oosuwaa wolqqaabaa haasayana; taanikka ne gitatettaa awaajjana.

English Sentences: They shall abundantly utter the memory of thy great goodness, and shall sing of thy righteousness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ne kehatettaa daruwaabaa yootana; ne xillotettaabaakka yexxana.

English Sentences: The LORD is gracious, and full of compassion; slow to anger, and of great mercy.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI qarettiyaagaanne maariyaagaa; i hanqqettanau eesotennaagaa; danddayanchchaanne aggenna siiqoi dariyoogaa.

English Sentences: The LORD is good to all: and his tender mercies are over all his works.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ubbau keha; i ba medhdhido ubbau qarettiyaagaa.

English Sentences: All thy works shall praise thee, O LORD; and thy saints shall bless thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abeet GODAU, ne mereta ubbai nena galatana; ne asati ubbaikka nena sabbana.

English Sentences: They shall speak of the glory of thy kingdom, and talk of thy power;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ne kawotettaa bonchchuwaabaa haasayana; ne wolqqaabaa yootana.

English Sentences: To make known to the sons of men his mighty acts, and the glorious majesty of his kingdom.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, ne wolqqaama oosuwaabaanne ne kawotettaa bonchchuwaa anggaabaa asaa erissanaassa.

English Sentences: Thy kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and thy dominion endureth throughout all generations.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne kawotettai merinaa kawotettaa; ne maatai yeleta ubbaa gakkanaassa. GODAI ba giido qaalau ubbau ammanettiyaagaa; i ba ooso ubban qarettiyaagaa.

English Sentences: The LORD upholdeth all that fall, and raiseth up all those that be bowed down.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI hokkidaageeta ubbaa zemppissees; kunddidaageeta ubbaa denttees.

English Sentences: The eyes of all wait upon thee; and thou givest them their meat in due season.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaa aifee neekko xeellees; eta koshshiyo wodiyan neeni etau qumaa immaasa.

English Sentences: Thou openest thine hand, and satisfiest the desire of every living thing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni ne kushiyaappe yeggada, paxa de7iyaageeta ubbaa amuwaa alaasa.

English Sentences: The LORD is righteous in all his ways, and holy in all his works.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI ba ogiyan ubban xillo; i ba ooso ubban qarettiyaagaa.

English Sentences: The LORD is nigh unto all them that call upon him, to all that call upon him in truth.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI bana xeesiya ubbau, tuman bana xeesiya ubbau matan de7ees.

English Sentences: He will fulfil the desire of them that fear him: he also will hear their cry, and will save them.
Wolaitta Sentences: I baayyo yayyiyaageetu ubbaayyo amuwaa kunttees. Qassi i eta waasuwaa siyidi, eta ashshees.

English Sentences: The LORD preserveth all them that love him: but all the wicked will he destroy.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI bana siiqiyaageeta ubbaa naagees; shin iitata ubbaa xaissana.

English Sentences: My mouth shall speak the praise of the LORD: and let all flesh bless his holy name for ever and ever.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani ta doonan GODAA galatana. Mereta ubbai a geeshsha sunttaa meri merinau galato!

English Sentences: Praise ye the LORD. Praise the LORD, O my soul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tanooshsho, GODAA galata!

English Sentences: While I live will I praise the LORD: I will sing praises unto my God while I have any being.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ta de7o laitta ubban taani GODAA galatana; taani de7ido keenan ubban ta Xoossaa sabbana.

English Sentences: Put not your trust in princes, nor in the son of man, in whom there is no help.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi ashshanau danddayenna gishshau, asaa halaqatun ammanettoppite.

English Sentences: His breath goeth forth, he returneth to his earth; in that very day his thoughts perish.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta shemppoi kiyiyo wode, eti biittau simmoosona; eta halchchoi ubbai he gallassikka atti aggees.

English Sentences: Happy is he that hath the God of Jacob for his help, whose hope is in the LORD his God:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqooba Xoossai maaddiyo urainne GODAA ba Xoossaa baayyo ufaissa oottiya urai anjjettidaagaa.

English Sentences: Which made heaven, and earth, the sea, and all that therein is: which keepeth truth for ever:
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai saluwaanne sa7aa, gita abbaanne a giddon de7iyaabaa ubbaa medhdhidaagaa; i merinaukka ammanettiyaagaa.

English Sentences: Which executeth judgment for the oppressed: which giveth food to the hungry. The LORD looseth the prisoners:
Wolaitta Sentences: I naaqettidaageetau pirddiyaagaa; namisettidaageetau qumaa immiyaagaa. GODAI qashettidaageeta birshshees;

English Sentences: The LORD openeth the eyes of the blind: the LORD raiseth them that are bowed down: the LORD loveth the righteous:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI qooqeta xeelissees. GODAI kunddidaageeta denttees; GODAI xillota siiqees.

English Sentences: The LORD preserveth the strangers; he relieveth the fatherless and widow: but the way of the wicked he turneth upside down.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI beteta naagees. Am77etanne aawai bainna naata maaddees; shin iitatu ogiyaa halissees.

English Sentences: The LORD shall reign for ever, even thy God, O Zion, unto all generations. Praise ye the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI merinau kawotees. Xiyoonee, ne Xoossai, yeletaappe yeletaa gakkanaassi kawotana.

English Sentences: Praise ye the LORD: for it is good to sing praises unto our God; for it is pleasant; and praise is comely.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu Xoossaa sabbiyoogee lo77ottennee; a sabbiyoogee ufaissiyaabaanne bessiyaabaa.

English Sentences: The LORD doth build up Jerusalem: he gathereth together the outcasts of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI Yerusalaame bottokonees; Israa7eela asatuppe betidaageetakka shiishshees.

English Sentences: He healeth the broken in heart, and bindeth up their wounds.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wozanai meqqidoogeeta i pattees; eta mazunttaakka i qachchees.

English Sentences: He telleth the number of the stars; he calleth them all by their names.
Wolaitta Sentences: I xoolintteta medhdhiyo wode, eta qoodaa likkiyan wottiis; eta ubbaakka eta sunttan sunttan xeegees.

English Sentences: Great is our Lord, and of great power: his understanding is infinite.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nu Godai gita; a wolqqai daro; a akeekai likkiyaappe aadhdhiyaagaa.

English Sentences: The LORD lifteth up the meek: he casteth the wicked down to the ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI naaqettidaageeta zemppissees; shin iitata biittan duge olees.

English Sentences: Sing unto the LORD with thanksgiving; sing praise upon the harp unto our God:
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAASSI galataa yettaa yexxite; nu Xoossaassi diittaa diixxite.

English Sentences: Who covereth the heaven with clouds, who prepareth rain for the earth, who maketh grass to grow upon the mountains.
Wolaitta Sentences: I saluwaa shaaraa maizzees; sa7aassi iraa bukissees; qeera deretu bolli maataa mokissees.

English Sentences: He giveth to the beast his food, and to the young ravens which cry.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mehetuyyoonne waassiya quuro maratuyyo miyoobaa i immees.

English Sentences: He delighteth not in the strength of the horse: he taketh not pleasure in the legs of a man.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ufaittiyoi paratu wolqqaaninne tooranchchatu minotettan gidenna.

English Sentences: The LORD taketh pleasure in them that fear him, in those that hope in his mercy.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAI bau yayyiyaageetuuninne aggenna a siiquwan bantta ufaissaa wottidaageetun ufaittees.

English Sentences: Praise the LORD, O Jerusalem; praise thy God, O Zion.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yerusalaame katamau, GODAA galata! Xiyoonee, ne Xoossaa galata!

English Sentences: For he hath strengthened the bars of thy gates; he hath blessed thy children within thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, i ne penggiya hiraquwaa minttees; ne giddon de7iya ne asaakka anjjees.

English Sentences: He maketh peace in thy borders, and filleth thee with the finest of the wheat.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ne zawaa sarotettan naagees; nena keehippe lo77iya gisttiyaa kalssees.

English Sentences: He sendeth forth his commandment upon earth: his word runneth very swiftly.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba kiitaa biittaayyo kiittees; a qaalainne eesuwan gakkees.

English Sentences: He giveth snow like wool: he scattereth the hoarfrost like ashes.
Wolaitta Sentences: I shachchaa bullukkodan miccees; akkaa bidinttaadan laalees.

English Sentences: He casteth forth his ice like morsels: who can stand before his cold?
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba gita shachchaa shuchchaadan duge olees. He meeguwan eqqanau ooninne danddayenna.

English Sentences: He sendeth out his word, and melteth them: he causeth his wind to blow, and the waters flow.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba qaalaa kiittidi, shachchaa seerissees. I carkkuwaa carkkissin, haattai goggees.

English Sentences: He sheweth his word unto Jacob, his statutes and his judgments unto Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba qaalaa Yaaqooba zerettaassi, ba awaajjuwaanne pirddaa Israa7eela asaassi awaajjees.

English Sentences: He hath not dealt so with any nation: and as for his judgments, they have not known them. Praise ye the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hara kawotettaa asaassi hagaa oottibeenna; eti a pirddaa erokkona.

English Sentences: Praise ye the LORD. Praise ye the LORD from the heavens: praise him in the heights.
Wolaitta Sentences: Salotun de7iyaageetoo, GODAA galatite; bolla xoqqan de7iyaageetoo, a galatite.

English Sentences: Praise ye him, all his angels: praise ye him, all his hosts.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, a kiitanchchatoo, ubbai a galatite. Saluwan de7iya a olanchchatoo, ubbai a galatite.

English Sentences: Praise ye him, sun and moon: praise him, all ye stars of light.
Wolaitta Sentences: Awau, aginau, a galatite; poo7iya xoolinttetoo, ubbai a galatite.

English Sentences: Praise him, ye heavens of heavens, and ye waters that be above the heavens.
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, ubbaappe bolla xoqqan de7iya salotoo, a galatite. Salo gufanttuwaappe bollaara de7iya haattatoo, a galatite.

English Sentences: Let them praise the name of the LORD: for he commanded, and they were created.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ubbati GODAA sunttaa galatona; aissi giikko, i azazin, eti ubbaikka merettidosona.

English Sentences: He hath also stablished them for ever and ever: he hath made a decree which shall not pass.
Wolaitta Sentences: I eta meri merinau eta sohuwan sohuwan wottiis. Eti mulekka ixxanau danddayenna azazuwaa i etau immiis.

English Sentences: Praise the LORD from the earth, ye dragons, and all deeps:
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7an de7iyaageetoo,Miimminttetoo, gita abbaa ciimmatoo, ubbatikka a galatite.

English Sentences: Fire, and hail; snow, and vapours; stormy wind fulfilling his word:
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, wolqqanttau, shachchau, shaarau, cigaarau, a azazuwaa poliya gotiyau, ubbatikka a galatite.

English Sentences: Mountains, and all hills; fruitful trees, and all cedars:
Wolaitta Sentences: Inttenoo, deretoo, keratoo, miyo aifiyaa aifiya mittatoo, zigatoo, ubbatikka a galatite.

English Sentences: Beasts, and all cattle; creeping things, and flying fowl:
Wolaitta Sentences: Mehetoo, do7atoo, sa7aara gooshettiya meretatoo, paalliya kafotoo, ubbatikka a galatite.

English Sentences: Kings of the earth, and all people; princes, and all judges of the earth:
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7aa kawotoo, kawotettaa asatoo, halaqatoo, deriyaa haariyaageetoo, ubbatikka a galatite.

English Sentences: Both young men, and maidens; old men, and children:
Wolaitta Sentences: Wodallatoo, geela7otoo, cimatoo, naatoo, ubbatikka a galatite.

English Sentences: Let them praise the name of the LORD: for his name alone is excellent; his glory is above the earth and heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ubbati GODAA sunttaa galatona; aissi giikko, a sunttai ubbaappe bollaara de7iyaagaa; a bonchchoi salotuppekka sa7aappekka bollaara xoqqan de7ees.

English Sentences: He also exalteth the horn of his people, the praise of all his saints; even of the children of Israel, a people near unto him. Praise ye the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: A bagga gidiya, ayyo matattiya Israa7eela asati a galatana mala, i eta minttiis.

English Sentences: Praise ye the LORD. Sing unto the LORD a new song, and his praise in the congregation of saints.
Wolaitta Sentences: GODAAYYO ooratta yettaa yexxite! Ammaniyaageetu yaa7an a sabbite!

English Sentences: Let Israel rejoice in him that made him: let the children of Zion be joyful in their King.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asati banttana medhdhidaagan ufaittona. Xiyoone asati bantta kawuwan keehippe ufaittona.

English Sentences: Let them praise his name in the dance: let them sing praises unto him with the timbrel and harp.
Wolaitta Sentences: Duriiddi, karaabiyaa baqqiiddinne diittaa diixxiiddi, a sunttaa sabbona.

English Sentences: For the LORD taketh pleasure in his people: he will beautify the meek with salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, GODAI ba asan ufaittees; naaqettidaageetau xoonuwaa immidi, i eta bonchchees.

English Sentences: Let the saints be joyful in glory: let them sing aloud upon their beds.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa asati bantta xoonuwan ufaittona; qamman ubban ufaissau yexxona.

English Sentences: Let the high praises of God be in their mouth, and a two-edged sword in their hand;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta doonan Xoossaa galatai, eta kushiyankka naa77u bagga qara bisoi de7o.

English Sentences: To execute vengeance upon the heathen, and punishments upon the people;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeenne, eti kawotettatuyyo haluwaa kessanaassanne asata qaxxayanaassa.

English Sentences: To bind their kings with chains, and their nobles with fetters of iron;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta kawota sanssalatan, eta ola gadaawatakka biratan qachchanaassanne,

English Sentences: To execute upon them the judgment written: this honour have all his saints. Praise ye the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: eta bolli xaafettida pirddaa polanaassa. Hegee Xoossaa asatu ubbaayyo xoono.

English Sentences: Praise ye the LORD. Praise God in his sanctuary: praise him in the firmament of his power.
Wolaitta Sentences: A geeshsha sohuwan Xoossaa galatite; a wolqqaama salo gufanttuwan a galatite.

English Sentences: Praise him for his mighty acts: praise him according to his excellent greatness.
Wolaitta Sentences: A wolqqaama oosotu gishshau, a galatite; ubbaappe aadhdhiya a gitatettaadan a galatite.

English Sentences: Praise him with the sound of the trumpet: praise him with the psaltery and harp.
Wolaitta Sentences: Malkkataa punniiddi, a galatite; diittaanne maazinqqiyaa diixxiiddi a galatite.

English Sentences: Praise him with the timbrel and dance: praise him with stringed instruments and organs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Karaabiyaa baqqiiddinne duriiddi, a galatite; diittaa diixxiiddinne pulaaliyaa punniiddi, a galatite.

English Sentences: Praise him upon the loud cymbals: praise him upon the high sounding cymbals.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daalaa qaattiiddi, a galatite; daalaa shociiddi, a galatite.

English Sentences: Let every thing that hath breath praise the LORD. Praise ye the LORD.
Wolaitta Sentences: Paxa shemppiya ubbati GODAA galatona!
